40026013	Ka jiŋ gana/ aha/ ṯora um gwo mo ki: E mo yin jin minu c̱i gwom ’borga/ yan e mony’ceshi ’baar mo tani a’di jin miin ma yim mo tani minu ṯor mo mmonyoŋ mo mo mmoka ayim e mo be.
40026014	Dhali yan’ko’d jan ṯal ’deŋ kamu/ ’peni uni jin ’dap̱ uni ’twa/ ka ’kume’d i’ce’dka su/ mo jin yuḵu gway ka Yahuusa Isḵariyuuṯi mo tani a’di yaki’d mo e igasiis kun can mo be
40026015	dhali o gwo mo ki: Atinta mmina umi c̱i aha/ mo waḵki/ aha/ mina c̱i a’di ki um mo? Dhali uni ki c̱i a’di gabul ’dolkon kushi iss ’de/ i’ce’dka ’kume’d mo be.
40026016	Dhali ’peni mo c̱aan ki jahanne/ mo tani a’di c̱orki’da c̱or mo mmogam embul gana/ mo mmo’ciṯẖ a’di is ki gwo mo be.
40026017	Dhali ka cim jin ṯwa/a/ gi Maaŋḵuthu’d jin miinu ki dar ga cumaṯ mo tani imanciḵ gwo p̱u’dkina Yesus mo mmo/o gwo mo ki: Mana o /e bwa jin mina amani thoson to mo gom /e mo mmoshwa ki Mompe’kup̱anyolos mo?
40026018	A’di ki o uni gwo mo ki: Iiku/ mo e ’peŋkuman bampa/ mo dhali e jan ’deŋ kamu/ mo dhali o a’di gwo mo ki: Amanṯor gwo o gwo mo ki: Mom pem ’dishi’d mo hila/. Aha/ mina mii rash di ki Mompe’kup̱anyolos yan e gu’b pini nyaḵki imanciḵ aha/ gwo mo be.
40026019	Dhali imanciḵ a’di gwo miikin mo me’d jin ḵankin ma Yesus uni gwo mo, dhali uni ki thoson to mo gom Mompe’kup̱anyolos mo be.
40026020	Dhali ki mo ta mom’pimpili/ mo tani a’di c̱a’bki’da tharabeesa nyaḵki imanciḵ a’di gwo mo kun ’koni ’kume’d i’ce’dka su/ mo be.
40026021	Dhali ki uni ’kokin mo mmoshwa to mo tani a’di ki o uni gwo mo ki: Ka jiŋ gana/ aha/ ṯora um gwo mo ki jan ’de/ ’peni um midi ’ciṯẖ aha/ is ki gwo mo be.
40026022	Dhali uni ’kokina bwa mmodiṯ mo kagahara, dhali uni ki ṯel mii ’pen mo mmo/o a’di gwo mo ka rem ’kup̱ ka baṯẖ ’pen mo ki: Aha/ ’taa? Tap̱a.
40026023	Dhali a’di ki thoḵ gwo mo ki: A’di jin ’thup̱ki me’d piti eya sahan nyaḵki aha/ mo tani a’di midi ’ciṯẖ aha/ is ki gwo mo be.
40026024	Haali/ Ya/ gi ’Kwani yaki’d mo me’d gwo jin ’kwarkunu mo gom a’di mo, hili wayyi e wathi/ yan a’di jin midi ’ciṯẖ Ya/ gi ’Kwani is ki gwo mo. A’di midi ’taki ’bor ki ’bor gana/ mo gom wathi/ yan waḵki/ a’di minu ’taki ’koki dhodhu/ mo be.
40026025	Yahuusa be a’di jin ’ciṯẖki a’di is ki gwo mo a’di ki o a’di gwo mo ki: A/aha/ ’taa, Tap̱a? A’di ki thoḵ a’di gwo mo ki: /E oki a’di wakan si’da/ mo be.
40026026	Dhali me’d jin ’kokina uni mmoshwa tonṯe/ mo tani Yesus bu’thki maaŋḵuthu’d mo dhali ’bora ’bor bwa i is mo, dhali a’di ki ’ce’d a’di mo dhali c̱i a’di ki imanciḵ a’di gwo mo dhali o gwo mo ki: Buthi a’di mo ma, dhali ’kayi mo ma. A’di yansan ita buŋgwar is pem mo be.
40026027	Dhali a’di bu’thki’da ḵubbaaya mo dhali ki a’di c̱iki mom’bor bwa i is mo tani a’di ki c̱i a’di ki uni mo mmo/o gwo mo ki: P̱iyi a’di mo ma, aris umi ’baar mo,
40026028	haali/ a’di yansan ita’da bas pem ki gwo jin gamu me’d mo, a’di jin wolki’d ka pije/ mo gom ’kwani ka ris mo gom mogwama gwam gom miinthus mo be.
40026029	Aha/ ṯora um gwo mo ki aha/ mina diki doḵ/e p̱i yiman maman cwa yansan ki sule/ ntaga tee jin miga/ p̱i a’di jin ta jin this nyaḵki um e Bampa/ ma Ababam pem jin di’d e momis mo be.
40026030	Dhali ki uni yuḵki gway mo tani uni iikin ka pije/ mo e ’Kuwosh Seṯuun mo be.
40026031	Yan’ko’d aYesus ki o uni gwo mo ki: Umi ’baar mo mini ṯa’k mo gom aha/ mon’thiny yan shwane/ mo tani haali/ a’di ’kwarkunu mo ki: Aha/ mina ’kosha manhil ḵa’bal mo dhali ḵa’bal ’pena ma’diny piti mo tani uni minu c̱eker bwa mo be.
40026032	Hili ŋ’ko’d mo tani ki aha/ piyunu/ mo tani aha/ mina ya um iṯwa/a/ e Pany Jaliil mo be.
40026033	Dhala Buṯerus ki ṯor a’di gwo mo eya tente/ ki: Ba uni gwansani ’baar mo mini ṯa’k mo gom /e mo tani aha/ mina diki biṯ ki sule/ mo be.
40026034	Dhala Yesus ki o a’di gwo mo ki: Ka jiŋ gana/ aha/ ṯora /e gwo mo ki mon’thiny yansan shwane/ mo nṯwa/a/ ka dhoŋgola ŋwa diki ko e naskina/ mo tani /e mini waṯaa/ gway me’di kwara mo be.
40026035	Dhala Buṯerus thoḵ a’di gwo mo ki: Hili waḵki/ aha/ mina mii wu mo nyaḵki /e mo tani aha/ mina diki waṯ /e gway mo. Dhali imanciḵ a’di gwo ’baar mo o gwo wakansan mo be.
40026036	Dhali yan’ko’d aYesus yaki’d nyaḵki uni mo e mo jin yuḵu ka Jaṯẖsemaani mo dhali a’di ki o imanciḵ a’di gwo gwo mo ki: ’Koyi mmahan mo ma ki aha/ mina thoṯẖ is mo mmaṯṯaan dhali ’tho mo be.
40026037	Dhali a’di ki susa Buṯerus nyaḵki a’di mo dhali iya/ ma Sabadi isu/ mo, dhali a’di ṯelki mii ’pen mo mmoḵal bwan diṯi’d mo dhali bwa jin ṯoco’d mo be.
40026038	Dhali yan’ko’d a’di ki o uni gwo mo ki: Aḵashiram pem a’di diṯa bwa ki diṯ kagahara mo gom mowu mo. ’Koyi mmahan mo ma, dhali timi nyaḵki aha/ mo ma.
40026039	Dhali mmothoṯẖkina a’di ’peny’ce ari’ceenne/ mo tani a’di biṯki bwam/em piti a’cesh mo dhali ’tho mo ki: Ababam pem, waḵki/ a’di yan mishu mii mo tani dhalka ḵubbaaya yan ya’di pe aha/ mo ma. Bahili a’di jin oyaa/ bwa mo yisa. Hili a’di jin ta bwam pini mo be.
40026040	Dhali a’di p̱u’dki’d e imanciḵ a’di gwo mo dhali gam uni ki uni ishki e mo. Dhali a’di ki owa Buṯerus gwo mo ki: A/um bunya/ mini ’koki tim nyaḵki aha/ ka tente/ ’de/ mo?
40026041	Timi mo mo ma, dhali ’thoyi mo ma, ki um mini ’taki ’koki cic̱ mo e mo jin palu mo, haali/ shi/in ka jiŋ gana/ mo tani a’di ona bwa mo, hili buŋgwar is a’di ihatha’ko’d ki ha’th mo be.
40026042	Doḵ/e gom me’d jin ’ko a’di isu/ mo tani a’di yaki’d mo dhali ’tho mo ki: Ababam pem, waḵki/ a’di yan mol pe mo tani hili isi ciki/ aha/ mina p̱i a’di mo, dhalki a’di jin ta bwam pini mo tani dhalki a’di miinu mo ma.
40026043	Dhali doḵ/e a’di p̱u’dki’d mo dhali gam uni ki uni ishki e mo haali/ em buni ṯo’dki uni is mo be.
40026044	Wakan a’di dhalki uni mo doḵ/e dhali a’di ki ya mo dhali ’tho mo gom me’di kwara mo mmo/o jasi gwon ṯal ’de/ mo be.
40026045	Dhali yan’ko’d a’di p̱u’dki’d mo e imanciḵ a’di gwo mo dhali o uni gwo mo ki: A/um ’kon mmo/ish e kan mo? dhali bu’th mosi/is bum mo? Hili mo mo ma, mo p̱u’dki’d mo hila/ mo dhali Ya/ gi ’Kwani ’ciṯẖkunu is ki gwo mo e me’d gi ’kwani kun ta imanmii miinthus mo be.
40026046	Cuyi mis mo ma. Dhalki ana iina mo. Hili, a’di jin ’ciṯẖki aha/ is ki gwo mo tani a’di p̱u’dki’d mo be.
40026047	Ki a’di di’d mo mmo/o gwo naskina/ mo tani Yahuusa p̱u’dki’d mo, a’di jin ’dap̱ tiya ’twa/ ka ’kume’d i’ce’dka su/ mo, dhali nyaḵki a’di mo tani dhana waambuhany ’kwani p̱u’dkin ki gandala turga/ mme’d mo dhali cwa mo, ’peni igasiis kun can mo dhali ’kwaniŋ gwanyjaḵa/ gi ’kwani mo be.
40026048	Dhali a’di jin ’ciṯẖki a’di is ki gwo mo c̱iki uni jamas mii mo mmo/o gwo mo ki: A’din ’de/ jin miga/ p̱i ’twa/ mo tani ta wathi/ mo. Buthi a’di mo ma.
40026049	Dhali a’di p̱u’dki’da Yesus ki jahanne/ mo dhali o gwo mo ki: Hayy, Tap̱a. Dhali a’di ki p̱i a’di ’twa/ mo be.
40026050	Yesus ki o a’di gwo mo ki: Akam pem, /e miina ta mmahan mo? Dhali yan’ko’d uni ki p̱u’du/ i a’di mo dhali dhu me’d buni ap̱owa Yesus mo dhali bu’th a’di mo be.
40026051	Dhali hili jan ’de/ ’peni uni gwansan jin nyaḵ di ka Yesus mo tani a’di he’thki me’d piti mo dhali buḵ gandala turgam piti mo dhali ruṯẖun c̱iŋkina/ ma gasiis jin ca’d mo dhali ’ciṯẖ ’cem piti mo be.
40026052	Dhali yan’ko’d Yesus ki o a’di gwo mo ki: Dwari gandala turgam pini ka nyaŋ’ko’d e mom piti mo ma, haali/ aris uni gwansani ’baar mo kun ḵalki gandala turga/ mo tani minu ’ce’d sho’k ki gandala turga/ mo be.
40026053	A/ṯosha /e ki aha/ mina mol Ababam pem ’tho mo dhali a’di ki c̱i aha/ ki jahanne/ awaambuhany iman’doyu gwom piti ka ris mo mmo’koki ’ko jasi ’kume’d i’ce’dka su/ mo?
40026054	Hili bakataye ki Gwo ma Arumgimis minu ’taki thim mo ki a’di minu mii mii wakan mo be.
40026055	Dhali ki mo yan mo tani aYesus ki owa waambuhany ’kwani gwo mo ki: Um iiyin ka pije/ ki gandala turga/ mme’d mo dhali ki cwa mo mmobu’th aha/ mmohabus mo me’d wathin ’di/ mo. Ka tee kun baṯẖani ’ko’d mo tani aha/ dikina mo e gu’b gi mondheleladhelel mo mmoṯor gwo mo dhali um ’koki bu’th aha/ mo be.
40026056	Hili aris to gwansani ’baar mo tani uni bu’thki embul mo mo, ki Gwo ma Arumgimis kun ’kwarkina imanc̱i gwo ma Arumgimis kadhamo/ mo minu mii thim mo be. Dhali yan’ko’d aris imanciḵ a’di gwo uni dhalki a’di ’pen mo dhali so mo be.
40026057	Dhali yan’ko’d uni gwansan kun bu’thkina Yesus mo tani uni ki sus a’di eya Ḵayaap̱a jin ta’da gasiis jin ca’d mo e mo jin tulkina iman’kwar to is mo dhali ’kwani gwanyjaḵa/ si’da/ mo be.
40026058	Hila Buṯerus baṯẖki a’di nsho’k isa dhana/ mo ntagi mo gi bwaagoŋ ma gasiis jin ca’d mo. Dhali a’di ki seyu bwaman mo. Dhali a’di ki nyaḵ c̱a’b ki uni kun hili mo mo mmop̱ar ’pemen gwo e mo be.
40026059	Dhali igasiis kun can dhali aris uni ’baar mo gi montul is yan mo tani uni ŋap̱ki gwonthus mo mmo’ce’da Yesusa p̱o/ mo, ki uni mini ’taki kar a’di mmowu mo be.
40026060	Hili uni ’koki gam tonthusa ’de/ mo, bahili aris iman/o gwonthus ap̱o/ a’di mo tani uni p̱u’dkin kadhoŋ mo. Ŋ’ko’d uni su/ p̱u’dkin kadhoŋ mo
40026061	dhali o gwo mo ki: Agarr yansan o gwo mo ki: Aha/ misha mmo’ce’d gu’b gi mondheleladhelel ma Arumgimis sho’k mo dhali nyaŋ a’di ka cim kwara mo be.
40026062	Dhala gasiis jin ca’d a’di doshki’d ki mis mo dhali o gwo mo ki: Ayy, /e moli ’twaŋ kamu/ ’de’k mo? Gwo wakata ona ’kwani gwansan ap̱o e mo?
40026063	Hila Yesus c̱a’bki’d ki shwam mo. Dhala gasiis jin ca’d ki o a’di gwo mo ki: Aha/ ḵana /e gwo ka Arumgimis jin di ki e mo. Ba ṯor am gwo mo ma, waḵki e tana Ḵrisṯẖos mo, a’di jin ta Ya/ ma Arumgimis mo.
40026064	AYesus ki o a’di gwo mo ki: A’di ta gwo jin ona /e si’da/ mo be. Hili aha/ mina ṯor /e a’di ’peni shwane/ mo, /e mini p̱ar Ya/ gi ’Kwani e mo mmoc̱a’b ki me’da bim poros ki mom’bi’th mo dhali mmoyayu/ e bwaaraḵ ’peni momis mo be.
40026065	Dhali yan’ko’d agasiis jin ca’d dherki burrinyem piti bwa mo dhali o gwo mo ki: A’di walki gwo sor jin shi/ashi/ mo. Atinta ’kokina ana mmoŋap̱ gwo mo mmo/o ap̱o/ a’di mo? Um ciḵki gwo sor ’peni ’twam piti shwane/ mo be.
40026066	Gwom bum jin ṯosha um wakata mo? Uni thoḵ gwo mo ki: A’di ha me’d mo mmowu mo be.
40026067	Dhali yan’ko’d uni ki ’taḵ a’di manya/ e bwam/em piti mo dhali dor a’di mo dhali kun tiya ki dor a’di ki cwa mo
40026068	mmo/o gwo mo ki: Oyi am gwo is mo ma, /e jin tana Ḵrisṯẖos mo. Kaja ’dunn idorki /e kan mo?
40026069	Dhala Buṯerus a’di c̱a’bki’da pije/ e bwaman ma goŋ mo. Dhali ari nyarany c̱iŋkina/ p̱u’dki’di a’di mo dhali o a’di gwo mo ki: /E si’da/, /e nyaḵki di ka Yesus gi Pany Jaliil mo be.
40026070	Hili a’di waṯki gwo mo mbwambori uni ’baar mo mmo/o gwo mo ki: Aha/ dinaki mish ’pemen gwom pini yan jin ona /e mo be.
40026071	Dhali ki a’di yaki’d mo ka pije/ eya lambalany gu’b mo tani ari c̱iŋkina/ nyaraŋ kamu/ p̱arki a’di e mo dhala yim ki o uni gwansan gwo kun doshkina pije/ ki: Wathi/ yansan nyaḵ di ka Yesus gi Pa Naasira mo be.
40026072	Dhali yan’ko’d doḵ/e a’di waṯki gwo mo ki gwo mmoṯe gwo mo ki: Aha/ dinaki mish wathi/ yan mo be.
40026073	Yan’ko’d ari’ceenne/ uni kun doshkina pije/ mo tani p̱u’dkin mo dhali owa Buṯerus gwo mo ki: Ka jiŋ gana e ta jan ṯal ’de/ si’da/ ’peni uni mo haali/ ’twam pini ṯor /e eya tente/ mo be.
40026074	Yan’ko’d a’di ṯelki mii ’pen mo mmojee is piti jwa ki is piti mo dhali mmothul gwo me’da p̱o/ mo mmo/o gwo mo ki: Aha/ dinaki mish wathi/ yan mo be. Dhali ki jahanne/ adhoŋgola ŋwa gwoki’d mo.
40026075	Dhala Buṯerus ka gwo ma Yesus e mo jin ona a’di a’di nṯwa/a/: Ka dhoŋgola ŋwa diki ko e mo naskina/ tani /e mini waṯ aha/ gway me’di kwara mo. Dhali a’di yaki’d ka pije/ mo dhali ko ki jabu’th ki ḵu’bu/ ḵu’bu/ mo be.
40027001	Dhali ki mon’thamo/ p̱u’dki’d mo tani aris igasiis kun can dhali ’kwaniŋ gwanyjaḵa/ gi ’kwani mo uni gamki ’twa/ ’kup̱ ap̱owa Yesus mo mmokar a’di mmowu mo be.
40027002	Dhali uni ki deḵ a’di mo dhali sus a’di mo dhali mmoc̱i a’di ka Bilaaṯus jin ta’da mudhiir mo be.
40027003	Ka Yahuusa jin ta’da man’ciṯẖ a’di is ki gwo p̱arki a’di e mo ki a’di waḵkunu mo tani a’di rici’da du is mo dhali a’di ki ’doyu ’dolkon kush jin ta’da iss ’de/ i’ce’dka ’kume’d ka nyaŋ’ko’d mo e igasiis kun can mo dhali ’kwaniŋ gwanyjaḵa/ mo
40027004	mmo/o gwo mo ki: Aha/ miikina miinthus mo mmo’ciṯẖ a’di is ki gwo mo, a’di jin din ma bas ka p̱o/ mo. Dhali uni ki thoḵ a’di gwo mo ki: A’di yan ta’da ta gom am mo? Hili is pini ’teyi e ma.
40027005	Dhali a’di ki ṯa’k ’dolkon kush e gu’b gi mondheleladhelel mo dhali a’di ki pi ka pije/ mo dhali ya mo dhali shir is piti ka nyoḵ mo be.
40027006	Hili igasiis kun can uni bu’thki ’dolkon kush mo mmo/o gwo mo ki: A’di diki ta mii jin dhala gwoŋḵan bway mo mmodhu uni mo e mo jin dhunuwa guurush mo haali/ uni tana guurush ma bas mo be.
40027007	Wakan uni gamki ’twa/ ’kup̱ mo mmobu’th uni mo dhali yol mo gi iman/uḵa nos mo mmokan ’kwani kun ta yilkina/ nycine/ mo be.
40027008	Wakan mombunto yan yuḵkunu gway ki Mombunto ma Bas mo ntaga tee yansan mo be.
40027009	Wakan gwo thimkunu mo, a’di jin okin ma manc̱i gwo ma Arumgimis kadhamo/ mo jin ta’da Irmiya mo mmo/o gwo mo ki: Dhali uni bu’thki ’dolkon kush kun ’koni iss ’de/ i’ce’dka ’kume’d mo jin ta she/ yol piti mo, a’di jin ta she/ yol jin karkina unin tiya kun ta iya/ gi uc̱i ma Israyiil mo be.
40027010	Dhali uni ki c̱i uni gom uni kun cila mombunto ma iman/uḵa nos mo be me’d gwo jin shukina tap̱a aha/ bway mo be.
40027011	Dhala Yesus doshki’d mbwambora mudhiir mo dhala mudhiir ki doṯ a’di gwo mo ki: Ki /e de /e tana Maliḵ gi ’Kwani Yahuuda/ mo? Dhala Yesus ki thoḵ a’di gwo mo ki: A’di ta gwo jin ona /e si’da/ mo be.
40027012	Hili ki a’di yerkunu is ki gway mo ki igasiis kun can mo dhali ’kwaniŋ gwanyjaḵa/ mo tani a’di diki thoḵ ’twaŋ kamu/ mo be.
40027013	Dhali yan’ko’da Bilaaṯus ki o a’di gwo mo ki: Dina /e ki ciḵ gwo mo ’taa? ama’diny gwo kun ona uni ap̱o e mo?
40027014	Hili a’di diki c̱i a’di ’twan thoḵa ’de/ mo walla ari gwoŋ kamu/ jin yerkunu a’di is ki gway mo. Wakan ntaga mudhiir a’di merki’d kagahara mo be.
40027015	Dhali ka yuḵ jin yuḵu mo tani mii ma mudhiir isa yempa/ mo mmo’cuḵka waambuhany jan ṯal ’de/ ’peni uni habuus mo a’di jin doṯkina uni mo be.
40027016	Dhali uni tan gi wathi/ eya sijin jin mishu ’baar mo eya tente/, a’di jin yuḵkunu gway ka Baraabas mo be.
40027017	Wakan uni tulki is mo mmonṯal ’de/ mo dhala Bilaaṯus ki o uni gwo mo ki: Kaja i/o um bwa jin miga/ ’cuḵki um mo, a/Baraabas ’taa? walla Yesus a’di jin yuḵu ka Ḵrisṯẖos mo?
40027018	Haali/ a’di mishki dhap̱an buni jin takina uni mo mmoc̱i a’di mo be.
40027019	Isa dhamo/ ’teya ki a’di diki’d mmoc̱a’ba kursi jin dwallu gwo jin ta jim piti mo tani ashim piti hashki a’di gwo mo mmodhalku/ toŋ kamu/ ki mii ap̱o/ wathiŋ ḵar/e yan mo haali/ aha/ ṯo’ckunu bwa kagahara shwane/ gom a’di mo ki gwony jan mo be.
40027020	Dhali igasiis kun can dhali ’kwaniŋ gwanyjaḵa/ uni lalki ’kwani sho’k ki gwo mo mmodoṯ gwo mo goma Baraabas mo dhali mmo’ce’da Yesus sho’k mo be.
40027021	Dhala mudhiir ki o uni gwo mo doḵ/e ki: Jana ’peni bwam uni su/ jin o um bwa mo jin miga/ ’cuḵki um mo? Dhali uni ki thoḵ gwo mo ki: aBaraabas be.
40027022	Dhala Bilaaṯus ki o uni gwo mo ki: Dhali aha/ mina miiya tinta ka Yesus mo a’di jin yuḵu gway ka Ḵrisṯẖos mo? Uni ’baar mo thoḵ gwo mo ki: Dhalki a’di ’koshu ki cwany’ciṯẖan dhul mo.
40027023	Dhali a’di ki thoḵ uni gwo mo ki: Gomata sa/? Tonthus gi wakatinta imiikina a’di mo? Hili uni cuukin kagahara mo mmonṯal ’de/ mo mmo/o gwo mo ki: Dhalki a’di ’koshu ki cwany’ciṯẖan dhul mo.
40027024	Wakan ka Bilaaṯus p̱arki a’di e mo ki a’di mol gwo p̱i jip̱i/ mo tani hili a’di ki dhal mii e i is mo goma dulaṯṯ jin ṯelkunu ’pen mo tani a’di ki bu’th yi’de/ mo dhali ’thur me’d piti mo mbwambor ma waambuhany ’kwani mo mmo/o gwo mo ki: Aha/ dina ka p̱o/ ’pena bas gi wathi/ yan mo. Hili a’di ’te/ ki is bumi niin ma.
40027025	Dhali aris ’kwani ’baar mo thoḵ a’di gwo mo ki: Abas piti midi di ap̱o/ aman mo dhali ap̱o/ uc̱im bam mo be.
40027026	Dhali yan’ko’d a’di ki ’cuḵki uni aBaraabas mo dhali ki a’di dorki’da Yesus ki yis bip̱ mo tani a’di ki c̱i a’di mmo’kosh ki cwany’ciṯẖan dhul mo be.
40027027	Dhali yan’ko’d i/askar ma mudhiir uni ki susa Yesus mo e bwaagoŋ gi gu’b ma mudhiir mo dhali uni ki tula askar isi ’baar mo mmonṯal ’de/ mo ibwambori a’di mo be.
40027028	Dhali uni ki ’cuḵ a’di burrinye/ mo dhali hi’th a’di is ki burrinye/ jin ta’da duḵ is mo be.
40027029	Dhali uni ki thoson toŋ’kup̱ ’pena ’de/ mo dhali uni ki hi’th a’di i’kup̱ piti mo dhali uni ki kar a’di guluca cwahan e me’da bim poros piti mo dhali luŋ ki jiŋ ’kup̱a’dup̱uni bwambori a’di ka maḵ mo mmo/o gwo mo ki: Hayy, Maliḵ gi ’Kwani Yahuuda/ mo.
40027030	Dhali uni ki ’taḵ a’di manya/ i is mo dhali uni ki bu’th gulu’c mo dhali dor a’di e ’kup̱ piti mo be.
40027031	Dhali ki uni miiki a’di ka maḵ mo tani uni ki ’cuḵ a’di burrinyen duḵ is mo dhali uni ki hi’th a’di burrinyem piti i is mo dhali uni ki sus a’di ka pije/ mo mmo’kosh ki cwany’ciṯẖan dhul mo be.
40027032	Me’d jin ’kokina uni mmoya ka pije/ mo tani uni p̱u’dkin mo e wathi/ gi Paŋ Kerawaan jin yuḵu gway ka Simaan mo. Wathi/ yansan a’di ṯu’ckina uni mo mmoḵal cwany’ciṯẖan dhul piti mo be.
40027033	Dhali ki uni p̱u’dkin mo e mo jin yuḵu ka Gulguṯẖa mo tani (a’di jin ta ’pemen gwo jin onu ki: Mo ma Simaŋ ’Kup̱ mo)
40027034	uni ki c̱i a’di yimana mura’th jin ’koshu e ki toŋ ḵa/ga/ mo. Hili ki a’di nyoḵki a’di mo tani a’di ushki a’di p̱i mo be.
40027035	Dhali ki uni ’koshki a’di ki cwany’ciṯẖan dhul mo tani uni ki ḵwa/ burrinyem piti bwa mo e bwam uni ’cena mo mmoṯa’k to mo.
40027036	Yan’ko’d uni ki ’ko a’cesh mo dhali rash ’ko mo mmotim a’di ap̱o/ mo be.
40027037	Dhali ap̱o/ ’kup̱ piti mo tani uni ki ’kwar gwo ap̱o/ a’di mo jin deŋu e mo ki: Yansan ta’da Yesus jin ta’da Maliḵ gi ’Kwani Yahuuda/ mo be.
40027038	Dhali ’kwani su/ kun tana ’di/ nyaḵkunu ’kosh ki a’di mo ki cwany’ciṯẖan dhul mo, jan ’de/ ki me’da bim poros piti mo, dhali jaŋ kamu/ ki me’da biny cam piti mo be.
40027039	Dhali uni gwansan kun iikin ki iimpe e bway mo tani uni sorki a’di mo mmopir ’kup̱ buni mo be,
40027040	dhali mmo/o gwo mo ki: /E jin mini ’taki ’kosh gu’b gi mondheleladhelel mo dhali nyaŋ a’di ka cim kwara mo tani woṯẖi is pini mo. Waḵki e ta Ya/ ma Arumgimis mo, ba thulu ka ’cesh ’peni ap̱o/ cwany’ciṯẖan dhul mo.
40027041	Wakan si’da/ igasiis kun can dhali iman’kwar to mo dhali ’kwaniŋ gwanyjaḵa/ mo tani uni miiki a’di ka maḵ mo mmo/o gwo mo ki:
40027042	A’di woṯẖki tiya mo tani is piti mola a’di woṯẖ moyi. Dhalki a’di thulu’d ka ’cesh shwane/ ’peni ap̱o/ cwany’ciṯẖan dhul mo, dhali ana mina gam a’di gwo is mo be.
40027043	A’di gamki’da Arumgimis gwo is mo. Dhalka Arumgimis ’cuḵ a’di mo shwane/ waḵki/ a’di ona bwa ki a’di mo, haali/ a’di o gwo mo ki a’di ta Ya/ ma Arumgimis mo be.
40027044	Dhali unin ’di/ kun nyaḵkunu ’kosh ki cwany’ciṯẖan dhul nyaḵki a’di mo tani uni si’da/ waḵki a’di ki gwon ’de/ yan mo be.
40027045	Dhali shwane/ ka tente/ ta’da tente/ mbwaŋ ’kup̱ mo tani adhan mondhurumi’d p̱u’dki’da p̱o/ mony’ceshi ’baar mo ntaga tente/ mbum ’ban mo be.
40027046	Dhali ka tente/ ta’da tente/ kwara mo tani Yesus gwoki’d ki ’twa/ jin caaca mo ki: Ili, Ili, lama sabaktani, a’di jin ta ’pemen gwo jin onu ki: Arumgimis pem, Arumgimis pem, atinta dhalkina /e aha/ ’pen kan mo?
40027047	Dhali unin tiya kun doshkin ki ’dishe/ ciḵki a’di mo dhali o gwo mo ki: Wathi/ yuḵki’d Iliyya mo be.
40027048	Dhali jan ṯal ’de/ ’peni uni a’di guski’d ki jahanne/ mo dhali a’di ki ḵala lip̱a/ mo dhali ’tu’d a’di ki yiman tom ’pac̱a’d mo dhali kar a’di eya cwahan mo dhali a’di ki c̱iki a’di mo mmop̱i mo be.
40027049	Hili kun tiya o gwo mo ki: C̱ori naskina/ bala/. Dhalki ana p̱ara mo e mo waḵki/ Iliyya midi thulu/ mo mmowoṯẖ a’di mo.
40027050	Dhala Yesus cuu’d ki dhan ’twa/ jin caaca doḵ/e mo dhali a’di ki c̱i shi/in piti mo be.
40027051	Dhali hili mo mo ma, burrinye/ gi gu’b gi mondheleladhelel mo a’di dherkunu bwa mo ka ’ban su/ mo ’peni buŋ’kup̱ mo ntagi bum’pen mo, dhali mony’cesh yiḵinki is mo, dhali aris woshi ’baar mo pwaṯẖkunu bwa mo be.
40027052	Dhali moŋ’kup̱aje si’da/ uni ḵa’dkunu ’twa/ mo, dhali aris buŋgwar is gi uni kun dhunu ki she/ ki dhelel dhelel mo uni gun ishki e mo e mowu mo tani uni cukunu mis mo be.
40027053	Dhali mmopikina uni ka pije/ ’peni jis jwa mo tani ’ko’di mompim piti mo tani uni iikin e ’peŋkuman bampa/ jin ḵogu mo dhali piki ’kwani i is ka ris mo be.
40027054	Dhali ka mancil ma askar iss ’kwanim pa mmudhe’d dhali uni gwansan kun nyaḵ ’ko ki a’di mo tani uni rashkina Yesus tim mo mmop̱ar mony’cesh e mo mmoyiḵin is mo dhali to gwansan kun bu’thki embul mo mo tani uni ’tu’dkunu mo ki moŋḵo/ is mo dhali o gwo mo ki: Ka jiŋ gana/ yansan ta Ya/ ma Arumgimis mo be.
40027055	Wakan si’da/ up̱ ’kokin ka ris mo mmun mmohil mo ’pena dhana/ mo, uni gun baṯẖkina Yesus nsho’k mo ’peni Pany Jaliil mo mmota imanmii a’di to mo be.
40027056	Dhali e bwaman uni mo tani aMariyam Magdaliyya diki’d mo dhala Mariyam jin to Ko Yakuub mo dhala Yuusup̱ mo dhali ko iya/ ma Sabadi mo be.
40027057	Dhali ki mo ta mom’pimpili/ mo tani wathi/ jin ta pa ki pa p̱u’dki’d mo ’peni Pa Arraama jin yuḵkunu gway ka Yuusup̱ mo, a’di si’da/ jin ta’da manciḵa Yesus gwo mo be.
40027058	A’di yaki’d mo eya Bilaaṯus mo dhali doṯ a’di gwo mo gom buŋgwar is ma Yesus mo. Dhali yan’ko’d Bilaaṯus ki ḵan gwo mo ki a’di minu c̱i ki a’di mo be.
40027059	Dhala Yuusup̱ ki bu’th buŋgwar is mo dhali ’tam a’di is ki burrinyen dhelelga/ jin ta’da dhiny e mo be.
40027060	Dhali ’thi a’di e jis pitiŋ gana/ jin ta jis jwan this mo, a’di jin ’kolkina a’di wosh mo. Dhali a’di ki ’daŋkal wosha caaga/ mo mmo’dap̱ ’twaŋkal jis jwa ’twa/ mo, dhali a’di ki ya mo be.
40027061	Mariyam Magdaliyya dhali Mariyama kamu/ nyaḵki ’ko mmun mo mmo’ko ka p̱ar ’twa/ gi moŋ’kup̱aje mo be.
40027062	Dhali ka cim jiŋ ’ko’d mo, a’di jin ta’da cim jiŋ ’ko’d jin Thosonkunu to mo tani igasiis kun can dhali ’Kwani P̱arisiyiin tulki isi bwambor ma Bilaaṯus mo be,
40027063	dhali o gwo mo ki: Tap̱a, am kakina gwo e jin okin ma manhe’k ’kwani e mo ki a’di di’d ki e mo naskina/ mmo/o gwo mo ki: ’Ko’da cim kwara mo tani aha/ mina cuyu mis doḵ/e mo be.
40027064	Wakan ki /e mini ḵan gwo mo ki moŋ’kup̱aje minu mii ji mo ki ’dantar mo ntaga cim kwara mo, isi ciki/ ki imanciḵ a’di gwo mini ’koki ii mo dhali ḵwal is piti mo dhali ṯor ’kwani gwo mo ki: A’di piki’d ’peni mowu mo, dhali gwonthus jin ta jiŋ ’ko’d jin minu o mo tani a’di midi war ki shi/ kagahara mo mmobol jin ṯwa/a/ e mo be.
40027065	Bilaaṯus ki o uni gwo mo ki: Um tan ga askar kun ji mo mo. Iiku/ mo ma, mmoji a’di ki ’dantar mo me’d jin misha um a’di mii mo be.
40027066	Wakan uni iikin mo dhali ji moŋ’kup̱aje mo, dhali uni ki ’dap̱ wosh ’twa/ ka ’diŋkila/ mo dhali dhu imanji mo mo be.
40028001	Dhali ’ko’da cim ma pesu/ mo tani ki mo ḵali kush mo ka cim jin ṯwa/a/ ka dhas mo tani aMariyam Magdaliyya dhala Mariyama kamu/ uni iikin mo mmop̱ar moŋ’kup̱aje e mo be.
40028002	Dhali hili mo mo ma, adhan mony’cesh yiḵinki is mo kagahara haala man’doyu gwo gi tap̱a thulki’d mo ’peni momis mo dhali p̱u’du/ mo dhali ḵa’c wosh ka nyaŋ’ko’d mo dhali a’di ki c̱a’ba po/ a’di mo be.
40028003	Jamas piti jin piyina a’di mo tani a’di wana e ka wara sho’k mo dhali burrinyem piti c̱a’bki bany bany mo me’da wasaŋ gana/ mo be.
40028004	Dhali gom is jin ḵogu a’di mo tani imanji mo mo uni deekina is mo dhali uni wakina e gi ’kwani kun wukin mo be.
40028005	Hila man’doyu gwo ki o up̱ gwo mo ki: Dhalku/ is ki ḵo/ mo ma, haali/ aha/ misha ki um ŋap̱kina Yesus jin ’koshkunu jwa mo ki cwany’ciṯẖan dhul mo be.
40028006	A’di yisa di’di mahana, haali/ a’di cuki mis mo me’d gwo jin ona a’di mo. Iiyu/ mo ma, mmop̱ar mo e mo jin ishkina a’di nycine/ mo.
40028007	Dhali yan’ko’d iiyi ki jahanne/ mo dhali ṯor imanciḵ a’di gwo gwo mo ki a’di cuki mis mo ’peni mowu mo. Dhali hili mo mo ma, a’di midi ya nṯwa/a/ ki um mo e Pany Jaliil mo be. Dhali e mun mo tani um mini gam a’di mo. Hili aha/ ṯorkina um gwo mo be.
40028008	Wakan uni iikin ki jahanne/ mo ’peni mony jis jwa mo ki moŋḵo/ is mo dhali ka dhan bwaŋ ’kunyga/ mo, dhali uni sokin mo mmoṯor imanciḵ a’di gwo gwo mo be.
40028009	Dhali hili mo mo ma, aYesus gamki uni ’kup̱ mo dhali o gwo mo ki: Hayy. Dhali uni p̱u’dkin mo dhali bu’th a’di i sho’k piti mo dhali luŋ a’di mo be.
40028010	Dhali yan’ko’d Yesus ki o uni gwo mo ki: Dhalku/ is ki ḵo/ mo ma. Iiku/ mo ma, dhali ṯor iwaḵ pem gwo mo mmo/ii mo e Pany Jaliil mo dhali uni mini p̱ar aha/ e i mun mo be.
40028011	Ki uni ’kokin mo mmo/ii mo tani hili mo mo ma, kun tiya ’peni uni gun ta imanji mo mo tani uni iikin mo e ’peŋkuman bampa/ mo dhali ṯor igasiis kun can gwo mo goma ris to gwansan kun bu’thki embul mo mo be.
40028012	Dhali ki uni tulki is mo mmonṯal ’de/ mo nyaḵki ’kwaniŋ gwanyjaḵa/ mo dhali gam ’twa/ ’kup̱ mo tani uni ki c̱iya dhana guurush ki i/askar mo be
40028013	mmo/o gwo mo ki: Ṯori ’kwani gwo mo ki: Imanciḵ a’di gwo p̱u’dkin mo mon’thiny mo dhali ḵwal a’di mo ki aman ’kokina mmo/ish e mo be.
40028014	Dhali waḵki/ gwo yansan midi p̱u’du/ mo e bwany’ce ma mudhiir mo tani aman mina lal a’di sho’k ki gwo mo dhali buḵ um ’ba/ mo ’peni monṯo’c bwa mo be.
40028015	Wakan uni bu’thkina guurush mo dhali mii a’di me’d jin ḵankunu uni gwo mo. Dhali gwo lolop̱ yansan a’di ḵalu ki lala’th mo e bwaŋ ’Kwani Yahuuda/ ’baar mo ntaga tee yansan mo be.
40028016	Dhali imanciḵ a’di gwo kun ’koni ’kume’d i’ce’dka ’de/ mo tani uni iikin mo e Pany Jaliil mo e ’kuwosh jin ḵankin ma Yesus uni gwo mo.
40028017	Dhali ki uni p̱arki a’di e mo tani uni luŋki a’di mo. Hili kun tiya ’koni modhaŋ gwo mo be.
40028018	Dhala Yesus p̱u’dki’d mo dhali o uni gwo mo ki: Aris moshirri ’baar mo e momis mo dhali apo/ mony’cesh mo tani uni c̱ikunu aha/ mo be.
40028019	Wakan iiku/ mo ma, dhali waraa ris kal gi ’kwaniny’cesh ki imanciḵ aha/ gwo mo. Miiki uni ki yi’de/ ki gway ma Ababa mo dhali ki gway gi Ya/ mo dhali ki gway gi Shi/in Dheleladhelel mo be.
40028020	Ṯori uni gwo mo ma, mmodhu aris gwo gwansan uni gun ḵankika/ um mo, dhali hili mo mo ma, aha/ mina nyaḵ di e um isa yempa/ mo ntagi yil gi mony’cesh yan midi di ’kup̱ mo be.
41001001	Monṯel ’pen gi gwom ’borga/ ma Yesus Ḵrisṯẖos jin ta Ya/ ma Arumgimis mo be.
41001002	Me’d gwo jin ’kwarkunu eya Ishaya jin ta’da manc̱i gwo ma Arumgimis kadhamo/ mo ki: Hili mo mo ma. Aha/ hashkina agum bway pem ibwambori jis/em pini mo. a’di jin midi thoson /e bway mo.
41001003	’Twa/ gi wathin ’de/ mmocuu gwo em bwaasho ki: Thosoni bway gi Tap̱a mo ma, kari bway piti ka ji sho’k mo.
41001004	Yohaan jin ta’da manmii ’kwani ki yi’de/ a’di piki’d mo e mombwaasho mo mmoc̱i gwo mo gom mo jin minu miiya mii ki yi’de/ mo mmorica du is mo gom gwo gi miinthus kun minu gwam ’kwani mo.
41001005	Dhali aris ’kwani iikin ka pije/ e a’di mo ’peni aris bampa/ gi Pa Yahuudiyya mo dhali ’peni aris ’kwani gi Pa Urushaliim mo. Dhali uni ’kokunu mo mmomii ki yi’de/ ki a’di mo e Yi’deŋ Ḵumma/ Uurdun mo mmopikina uni gwo gom miinthus buni mo be.
41001006	Dhala Yohaan si’da/ hi’thki’da mur kalman e isi a’di mo dhali a’di ta’d gi wac̱kan jin hi’thkina a’di e empa’d piti mo dhali a’di ’ka’da kuuyu/ dhali shwa’da dham eya ḵur mo be.
41001007	Dhali a’di c̱iki gwo mo mmo/o gwo mo ki: Ŋ’ko’di aha/ mo tani jamu/ midi p̱u’du/ mo jin ca’d ki aha/ mo. Dhali wac̱kana p̱p̱am piti mo tani aha/ dinaki ha me’d mo mmoluŋ ki ji luŋ mo dhali ’cuḵ uni mo be.
41001008	Aha/ miikina um ki yi’de/ tani hili a’di midi mii um ki Shi/in Dheleladhelel mo be.
41001009	Dhali ka tee gwansan mo tani Yesus p̱u’dki’d mo ’peni Pa Naasira jin di’d e Pany Jaliil mo dhali a’di miikunu ki yi’de/ ka Yohaan mo e Yi’deŋ Ḵumma/ Uurdun mo be.
41001010	Dhali ki a’di piki’d ka pije/ ’peni yi’de/ mo tani ise/ ki jahanne/ a’di p̱arki momis e mo mmodi ki ḵany dhali Shi/in di’d mmothulu/ i a’di mo me’d gurko/ mo be.
41001011	Dhali ’twa/ ciḵkunu ’peni momis mo ki: /E ta Ya/m pem jin enka/ mo, dhali aha/ ’bora bwa ki ’bor ki /e mo.
41001012	Dhali Shi/in Dheleladhelel a’di urki’da Yesus ka pije/ ise/ mo e mombwaasho mo.
41001013	Dhali a’di diki’d e mombwaasho mo ka cim ma issu/ mo, dhali a’di palkunu ka Seṯaan mo. Dhali a’di nyaḵki di ki tombwaasho mo. Dhali iman’doyu gwo p̱u’dkin mo dhali mii a’di to mo be.
41001014	Dhali ka Yohaan karkunu eya sijin mo tani Yesus p̱u’dki’d mo e Pany Jaliil mo mmoc̱i gwom ’borga/ ma Arumgimis mo
41001015	dhali mmo/o gwo mo ki: Mo thimkunu mo, dhali Bampa/ ma Arumgimis p̱u’dki’d e me’d mo. Rici adu is mo ma dhali gam gwom ’borga/ is mo.
41001016	Dhali me’d jin yakina a’di ki yampe e shemen ma gap̱ ma Al ma Jaliil mo tani a’di p̱arki’da Simaan e mo dhala Andaraawus jin ta’da kam ma Simaan mo mmobiṯkina a’di a’thi/ eya al mo haali/ uni ta ’kwani kun ta imancesh to yi’de/ mo be.
41001017	Dhala Yesus ki o uni gwo mo ki: Baṯẖi aha/ nsho’k mo ma, dhali aha/ mina dhu um mmowar ki imanbu’th ’kwani ki gwo mo be.
41001018	Dhali ki jahanne/ uni dhalkina ’thim buni ’pen mo dhali uni ki baṯẖ a’di nsho’k mo be.
41001019	Dhali mmothoṯẖkina a’di is ari’ceenne/ mo tani a’di p̱arki’da Yakuub e mo jin ta ya/ ma Sabadi dhala Yohaan jin ta’da kam piti mo uni kun ’kokin eya ḵur buni mo mmoshowa ’thi/ mo be.
41001020	Dhali ki jahanne/ a’di ki yuḵ uni mo. Dhali uni dhalkina babam buni ka Sabadi eya ḵur mo nyaḵki c̱iŋkina/ kun miina ṯu’c mo dhali baṯẖ a’di nsho’k mo be.
41001021	Dhali ki uni p̱u’dkin mo e Paŋ Kap̱ranahuum mo tani dhali ki jahanne/ a’di seki gu’b gi montul is buni ka cim ma pesu/ mo dhali a’di ṯorki gwo mo be.
41001022	Dhali uni merkin mo gom gwom piti jin ṯorkina a’di mo haali/ a’di ṯorki uni gwo mo me’d wathi/ jin ta gi moshirr mo dhali yisa me’d iman’kwar to mo.
41001023	Dhali ki jahanne/ wathiŋ kamu/ diki’d e gu’b montul is buni mo a’di jin taki’d ga rum thus jin nyo/o’d mo be.
41001024	Dhali a’di cuuki’d ki dhan ’twa/ caaca mo mmo/o gwo mo ki: Ki /e mini mii atinta ki aman mo, Yesus gi Pa Naasira mo? A/e p̱u’dkin mo mmo’ce’d aman sho’k mo? /E mishka/ ki /e ta a’din ṯal ’de/ ma Arumgimis jin ḵogu mo.
41001025	Hila Yesus ḵucurki a’di ki gwo mo mmo/o gwo mo ki: C̱a’bi ki shwam. Piyu/ ka pije/ ’peni a’di mo.
41001026	Dhala rum thus jin nyo/o’d ki tor a’di ’ko’da ’cesh mo dhali cuu gwo ki dhan ’twa/ jin caaca mo. Dhali a’di ki pi ka pije/ ’peni a’di mo.
41001027	Dhali uni ’baar mo merkin mo. Dhali wakan, uni doṯki gwondoṯ e bwam uni mo mmo/o gwo mo ki: Mii yan ta’da taye? Gwon this jin ṯoru de. Ki moshirr maja sa/ iḵankina a’di arum thus kun nyo/on gwo mo dhali uni ha a’di gwo e mo?
41001028	Dhali ki jahanne/ gwom piti yaki’d ki lala’th mo e mo ’baar mo ki tur mo eya ris bampa/ kun ’kon ki jiŋ ’kam mo e bampa/ gi Pany Jaliil mo be.
41001029	Dhali ki jahanne/ a’di dhalki gu’b gi montul is buni ’pen mo dhali a’di cic̱ki’d mo e gu’b ma Simaan mo dhala Andaraawus mo nyaḵka Yakuub mo dhala Yohaan mo be.
41001030	Dhala mar ma Simaana ’bomi, a’di ’ba’thki’d mo mmo/ish ’ko’da ’cesh ki ’batha thunya/ mo dhali ki jahanne/ uni ki ṯorki a’di ayim mo be.
41001031	Dhali a’di p̱u’dki’d mo mmobutha yim mme’d mo dhali ’deka yim ki mis mo dhala thunya/ dhalki’da yim ’pen mo, dhala yim miiki uni to mo be.
41001032	Dhali ki mo ta mom’pimpili/ mo jin yulkin ma tente/ mo tani uni ḵalki ’kwani e a’di mo, aris uni gun ’ba’thkin mo dhali uni kun bu’thkin ma ruma ’cesh mo be.
41001033	Dhali aris ’kwani gi ’peŋkuman bampa/ ’baar mo tulki is mo mmonṯal ’de/ mo e shan’tamo/ mo be.
41001034	Dhali a’di ki wac̱ uni ka ris mo, uni gun ’ba’thkin mo ki ’ba’th ki she/ ki she/ mo, dhali a’di ki ura ruma ’cesh ka pije/ mo, dhali a’di diki dhala ruma ’cesh bway mo mmowal ’twa/ mo haali/ uni nyiṯẖki a’di mo be.
41001035	Dhali ki mo ta mon’thamo/ ka ’tum gana/ mo ki moŋkush nṯwa/a/ mo tani a’di cuki mis mo dhali ya mo e mo jin p̱ina ’kwani mo, dhali a’di ki ’tho mo be.
41001036	Dhala Simaan dhali uni gwansan kun nyaḵki ’ko ki a’di mo tani baṯẖki a’di nsho’k mo be.
41001037	Dhali uni gamki a’di mo dhali o a’di gwo mo ki: Aris ’kwani ’baar mo ŋap̱ki /e mo be.
41001038	Dhali a’di ki o uni gwo mo ki: Dhalki ana iina mo e bampa/ kun ’dish yan is mo, ki aha/ mina c̱i gwo mmun si’da/ mo. Haali/ gom mii gi wakan mo tani a’di ip̱u’dkika/ mo be.
41001039	Dhali a’di yaki’d ki tur mo e bampa/ gi Pany Jaliili ’baar mo mmoc̱i gwo mo e gu’b gi montul is buni mo dhali mmo/ura ruma ’cesh ka pije/ mo be.
41001040	Dhali wathi/ jin ’kosha monthus p̱u’dki’di a’di mo mmoŋap̱ mowoṯẖ ’peni a’di mo, dhali c̱a’bki jiŋ ’kup̱a’dup̱un mo dhali o a’di gwo mo ki: Waḵki e ona bwa mo tani /e mishi aha/ dhelel mo.
41001041	Mmogukina a’di a’di ki e ma ’thime/ ki mo/en mo tani a’di ki he’th me’d piti mo dhali ta a’di is ki me’d mo dhali o a’di gwo mo ki: Aha/ ona bwa mo be. Dheleli mo ma.
41001042	Dhali ki jahanne/ monthus dhalki a’di ’pen mo dhali a’di dhelelkina is mo be.
41001043	Dhali a’di ki ḵan a’di gwo ki ’bi’th mo dhali hash a’di mo mmoyaku/ mo ki jahanne/ mo
41001044	dhali ṯor a’di gwo mo ki: Hili miim pini i e ki ’bore/ mo ki /e mini diki ṯor jan ṯal ’deŋ kamu/ gwo mo. Hili yaku/ mo dhali ṯora gasiis is pini i e mo dhali c̱i a’di to gom is pini jin dhelelkunu mo me’d gwoŋḵan jin ḵankin ma Musa mo haali/ a’di ta gwo jin nyo/a ’kwani mo.
41001045	Hili a’di yaki’d ka pije/ mo dhali ṯel mii ’pen mo mmobah gwo gom a’di ’baḵany mo dhali mmoḵal gwo ki lala’th mo. Wakan a’di mol ma Yesus cic̱ bampa/ doḵ/e mo eya tente/, hili a’di di’d ka pije/ ’peni bampa/ mo, dhali ’kwani p̱u’dkini a’di mo ’peni aris shemen bampa/ mo be.
41002001	Dhali ki a’di doḵki’d ka nyaŋ’ko’d mo ’peni Paŋ Kap̱ranahuum ’ko’da cim ka hony/e mo tani gwo ṯoru mo ki a’di di’di pa mo be.
41002002	Dhali ’kwani ka ris tulki is mo mmonṯal ’de/ mo. Wakan, mo p̱iyi’d gom uni mo. Moŋkamu/ yisa di’da shan’tamo/ si’da/ mo. Dhali a’di di’d mo mmoc̱i uni gwo mo be.
41002003	Dhali uni p̱u’dkin mo dhali ḵali wathi/ jin muṯṯa/ is mo e a’di mo, jin ḵalkina ’kwaniŋ gwasi doŋon mo be.
41002004	Dhali ki uni mol a’di ’dish is mo goma waambuhany ’kwani mo tani uni ḵa’cki ’kuŋgu’b mo ’peni ’kup̱i a’di mo. Dhali ki uni tup̱ki mo i e mo tani uni ki dhala ci me’d ki wathi/ i e jin muṯṯa/ is mo be.
41002005	Dhali ka Yesus p̱arki moŋgam gwo is buni e mo tani a’di ki o wathi/ jin muṯṯa/ is gwo mo ki: Ya/m pem, miinthus pini gwamkunu /e mo be.
41002006	Dhali iman’kwar ton tiya, uni ’kokin mo mmodoṯ gwo mo eya dum buni mo ki:
41002007	Katinta sa/ i/ona wathi/ yansan gwo gi wakan mo? A’di walki gwo sor mo. Kaja a’di midi mish gwam ’kwani gom miinthus mo, hili jasa Arumgimis a’di ’de/ mo be.
41002008	Dhali ki jahanne/ Yesus nyiṯẖki’d e is piti ki uni tan gi gwondoṯ wakan e is buni mo dhali a’di ki o uni gwo mo ki: Atinta doṯkina um gwondoṯ eya dum bum kan mo?
41002009	Ki ji gi ’ka’da mii mane ti, mmo/o wathi/ jin muṯṯa/ is gwo mo ki: Miinthus pini gwamkunu /e mowa? walla mmo/o gwo mo ki: Cuyi mis mo dhali ’deka cim pini mo dhali yayi mo?
41002010	Hili ki um mini mish ki Ya/ gi ’Kwani ta gi moshirr mo e mony’cesh yan mo mmogwam miinthus gi ’kwani mo, a’di ki o wathi/ jin muṯṯa/ is gwo mo ki:
41002011	Aha/ ona /e gwo mo ki: Cuyi mis mo dhali ḵala cim pini mo dhali yayi bway pa mo.
41002012	Dhali a’di cuki mis mo dhali ki jahanne/ a’di ki ḵala cim piti mo dhali ya ka pije/ mbwambori uni ’baar mo. Wakan aris uni ’baar mo merkin mo dhali karkina Arumgimis ki ca mo mmo/o gwo mo ki: Ana ’konaki p̱ar ji gi wakan e me’d ’de/ ki sule/ mo be.
41002013	A’di yayi’d ka pije/ mo doḵ/e e shemen ma gap̱ ma al mo, dhala dhana buhany wathimpa tulki is i a’di mo, dhali a’di ṯorki uni gwo mo be.
41002014	Dhali ki a’di yaki’d ki yampe mo mbway mo tani a’di p̱arki’da Lawi e mo a’di jin ta ya/ ma Halp̱a mo mmodikina a’di mo e mo jin teruwa thulp̱a/ mo, dhali a’di ki o a’di gwo mo ki: Baṯẖi aha/ nsho’k mo ma. Dhali a’di cuki mis mo dhali baṯẖ a’di nsho’k mo be.
41002015	Dhali ki a’di c̱a’bki’da tharabeesa e gu’b piti mo tani imantera thulp̱a/ ka ris dhali imanmii miinthus ’kokin nyaḵḵa Yesus mo dhali imanciḵ a’di gwo mo, haali/ ’kwani tana ris ka ris kun baṯẖki a’di nsho’k mo be.
41002016	Dhali iman’kwar to dhali ’Kwani P̱arisiyiin ki uni p̱arki a’di e ki a’di shwaki to nyaḵki uni gun ta imanmii miinthus mo dhali imantera thulp̱a/ mo tani uni ki doṯ imanciḵ a’di gwo gwo mo ki: Atinta ishwana a’di to nyaḵki imantera thulp̱a/ mo dhali nyaḵki uni gun ta imanmii miinthus kanni?
41002017	Dhali ka Yesus ciḵki a’di yan mo tani a’di ki o uni gwo mo ki: ’Kwani gwansan kun ’kon ki ’bore/ mo tani uni mini ’koki mii ta ga hakiim mo, hili uni gwansan kun ’ba’thkin mo be. Aha/ p̱u’dkina mo yisa mmoyuḵ ’kwani kun mii miiŋḵar/e hili gom imanmii miinthus mo be.
41002018	Dhali imanciḵa Yohaan gwo dhali ’Kwani P̱arisiyiin uni ga/ki to mo dhali ’kwani p̱u’dkini a’di mo dhali o a’di gwo mo ki: Katinta si’da/ imiina imanciḵa Yohaan gwo mii mo dhali ’Kwani P̱arisiyiin mmoga/ to mo, hili imanciḵ /e gwo uni ’koki ga/ to mo be.
41002019	Dhala Yesus ki thoḵ uni gwo mo ki: Mina ’kwani yilkina/ gwansan, uni kun yuḵu mo e momiimash mo mish to ga/ mo ki wathinyaŋa’b diki’d nyaḵki uni naskina/ mo ’taa? Me’d jin dikina wathinyaŋa’b e bwam uni mo tani uni moli to ga/ mo be.
41002020	Atee midi p̱u’du/ mo ki wathinyaŋa’b minu susu/ ’peni uni mo tani dhali yan’ko’d uni ki ga/ to ka tee c̱aan mo be.
41002021	Wathiŋ kamu/ yisa di’da jin sho burrinyen this ap̱o/ sharkin burrinyen dhamo/ mo. Waḵki/ a’di midi mii kan mo tani mo jin ’dap̱u midi dher bwa ’peni a’di jin ta jin this mo ’peni jin dhamo/ mo, dhali mondhere’d midi war ki shi/ mo.
41002022	Dhali wathiŋ kamu/ yisa di’da jin midi kar yimana mura’th jin ta jin this mmowol a’di e ḵucaŋ jin wolu yimana muratha dhamo/ mo. Waḵki/ a’di midi mii kan mo tani yimana mura’th midi ’twaḵ ḵucaŋ mo dhali yimana mura’th midi gac̱a sho mo. Dhali wakan ḵucaŋ minu dher bwa mo, hili yimana mura’th this minu mii wol mo e ḵucaŋ this jin daḵa ḵucuru/ mo be.
41002023	Ka cim ma pesuŋ kamu/ tani a’di yaki’d ki tur mo e bwam bunto mo. Dhali ki uni ṯanki bway buni mo tani imanciḵ a’di gwo ṯelki mii ’pen mo mmo’ce’d pos mo be.
41002024	Dhali ’Kwani P̱arisiyiin o a’di gwo mo ki: Hili ma, atinta imiina uni to jin dina gwoŋḵan ma cim ma pesu/ ki dhal bway mo?
41002025	Dhali a’di ki thoḵ uni gwo mo ki: ’Kona um ki deŋ gwo e mo gom mii ma Dawuu’d mo ’taa? ki a’di midi mii ta gi to mo dhali ki a’di ’kosha ṯe/ mo tani a’di dhali uni gwansan kun nyaḵki ’ko ki a’di mo.
41002026	A’di cic̱ki gu’b ma Arumgimis mo ka Abi/aṯẖaar di’d jin ta’da gasiis jin ca’d mo, dhali shwa tonṯe/ jin di’di buŋ’kus ma Arumgimis mo, a’di jin dina gwoŋḵan ki dhal bway mo gom ’kwanin tiya mo, hili jasi gom igasiis uni ’cena mmoshwa mo be. Dhali a’di si’da/ ki c̱iki uni gwansan kun nyaḵki ’ko ki a’di mo be.
41002027	Dhali a’di ki o uni gwo mo ki: Acim ma pesu/ karkunu mo gom wathi/ mo, yisa wathi/ goma cim ma pesu/ mo.
41002028	Wakan Ya/ gi ’Kwani si’da/ a’di ta tap̱a goma cim ma pesu/ mo be.
41003001	Doḵ/e a’di cic̱ki gu’b gi montul is mo dhali wathi/ diki’d jin ḵu’thkina me’d guŋkuru/ mo be.
41003002	Dhali uni timki a’di mo mmop̱ar a’di e mo waḵki/ a’di midi ’taki wac̱ a’di ka cim ma pesu/ mo, wakan ki uni mini ’taki ta gi gwo mmoyer a’di is ki gway mo be.
41003003	Dhali a’di ki o wathi/ jin ḵutha me’d guŋkuru/ gwo mo ki: Yayu/ ise mo ma.
41003004	Dhali a’di ki o uni gwo mo ki: A’di ta mii jin dhala gwoŋḵan bway mo mmomii mii jin ’boro’d ka cim ma pesu/ mo ’taa? walla mii jin ta jin thus minu mii mo? mmowoṯẖa/ woṯẖ mo ’taa? walla mmo’kosha ’kosh mo? Hili uni ’kon ki shwam mo be.
41003005	Dhali a’di ki hil mo mo mmo’kar mo ki e mo ka nyor e uni mo mmoḵal bwa diṯ mo goma dum buni kun ’bitha’bi’th mo. Dhali a’di ki o wathi/ gwo mo ki: Hethi me’d pini mo ma. Dhali a’di he’thki a’di mo dhali me’d piti wac̱kunu mo be.
41003006	Dhali ’Kwani P̱arisiyiin iikin ka pije/ mo dhali ki jahanne/ uni ki gam ’twa/ ’kup nyaḵki ’Kwani Hirodusiyiin ap̱o/ a’di mo mmo’ce’d a’di sho’k mo be.
41003007	Yesus a’di yaki’d mo nyaḵki imanciḵ a’di gwo mo e shemen ma al mo dhala dhana buhany wathimpa ’peni Pany Jaliil baṯẖki a’di nsho’k mo. Dhali ’peni Pa Yahuudiyya si’da/ mo be
41003008	dhali ’peni Pa Urushaliim mo dhali ’peni Pa Adumiyya mo dhali ’peni bampa/ jin di’d e bwamp̱o/ Yi’deŋ Ḵumma/ Uurdun mo dhali ’peni Pan Sur mo dhali ’peni Pa Saydaa/ mo, dhana waambuhany ’kwani mmociḵa uni gwo mo goma ris mii kun miikina a’di mo tani, uni p̱u’dkini a’di mo be.
41003009	Dhali a’di ṯorki imanciḵ a’di gwo gwo mo mmothosona ḵur gom a’di mo goma waambuhany ’kwani mo, isi ciki/ ki uni mini ’koki ’taki yap̱ a’di ki is mo.
41003010	Haali/ a’di wac̱ki’da wac̱ ka ris mo, wakan ki aris uni kun ’koshkina ’ba’th ka ris mo gac̱kina gac̱ mo mmota a’di is ki me’d mo.
41003011	Dhali ka rum thus kun nyo/on p̱arki a’di e mo tani uni ṯa’kkina ’cesh mbwambori a’di mo dhali cuu gwo ki dhan ’twa/ kun caaca ki: /E ta Ya/ ma Arumgimis mo be.
41003012	Dhali a’di ki ḵan uni gwo ki ’bi’th mo mmodhalku/ ki dhal a’di ki a’di minu mish mo.
41003013	Dhali a’di yaki’d ka gagamis e moŋ’kuwosh mo dhali a’di ki yuḵ uni gwansan nyaḵki a’di mo, uni kun ona bwa a’di ki sus mo. Dhali uni p̱u’dkini a’di mo be.
41003014	Dhali a’di ki dhu uni kun ’koni ’kume’d i’ce’dka su/ mo mmonyaḵ ’ko ki a’di mo dhali mmohash uni mmoc̱i gwo mo
41003015	dhali mmota gi moshirr mo mmo/ura ruma ’cesh ka pije/ mo.
41003016	Simaan, a’di jin yuḵkunu gway ka Buṯerus mo,
41003017	dhala Yakuub jin ta ya/ ma Sabadi mo dhala Yohaan jin ta’da kam ma Yakuub mo, uni kun yuḵkina a’di gway ka Buwanarjis mo jin ta ’pemen gwo jin onu ki iya/ ma wara sho’k mo.
41003018	Dhala Andaraawus mo dhala P̱ilibbus mo dhala Barṯulamaawus mo dhala Maṯṯa mo dhala Ṯuuma mo dhala Yakuub jin ta ya/ ma Halp̱a mo dhala Ṯaddaawus mo dhala Simaan gi Paŋ Kaana mo,
41003019	dhala Yahuusa Iskariyuuṯi jin ’ciṯẖi/ a’di is ki gwo mo be. Dhali yan’ko’d a’di yaki bway pa mo be.
41003020	Dhala waambuhany ’kwani p̱u’dkin mo dhali tuli isi monṯal ’de/ doḵ/e mo. Wakan uni ’koki ta gi mo mo mmoshwa to mo.
41003021	Dhali ki imugum piti ciḵki gwo gom a’di mo tani uni p̱u’dkin mo dhali ŋap̱ a’di mo mmobu’th mo haali/ uni o gwo mo ki: A’di guski’da du mo be.
41003022	Dhali iman’kwar to pu’dkin mo ka luŋgu’b ’peni Pa Urushaliim mo mmo/o gwo mo ki: A’di bu’thkin ma Baalsebuul mo dhali ki gway gi tap̱a ma ruma ’cesh mo tani a’di urkina a’di aruma ’cesh ka pije/ mo be.
41003023	Dhali a’di ki yuḵ uni i a’di mo dhali ṯor uni gwo mo ki gwom ’bi’th/e mo ki: A/ka Seṯaan mishi is piti ur ka pije/ c̱e Seṯaan mo ’taa?
41003024	Waḵki/ ’peŋkuman bampa/ ḵwa/u bwa mo e is piti mo tani ’peŋkuman bampa/ c̱aan midi mol dosh mo be.
41003025	Dhali waḵki/ gu’b ḵwa/u bwa mo apo/ is piti mo tani gu’b c̱aan midi mol dosh mo be.
41003026	Dhali waḵka Seṯaan midi cu mis ap̱o/ is pitiŋ gana/ mo wakan dhali ḵwa/ bwa mo tani a’di midi mol dosh mo, hili a’di midi daḵ ka bwa i’ba/ mo be.
41003027	Hili wathin ’deŋ kamu/ yisa di’da jin midi mish cic̱ gu’b gi wathi/ jin ’bitha’bi’th mo dhali shi/ tom piti is mo, hili isi ciki/ a’di midi mii deḵ wathi/ jin ’bitha’bi’th ka shi/ nṯwa/a/ mo. Dhali yan’ko’d ka jiŋ gana/ mo tani a’di midi shi/ gu’b piti is mo be.
41003028	Ka jiŋ gana/ aha/ ona um ki, aris miinthusi ’baar mo minu gwam ki iya/ gi ’kwani mo, dhala ris gwo sor gunn kun wala uni mo.
41003029	Hili a’di jin wali gwo sor ap̱o/ Shi/in Dheleladhelel mo tani minu ’koki gwam miinthus piti ki sule/ mo, hili a’di dina mii m’ba/ ki sule/ sule/ e miinthus mo be.
41003030	Haali/ uni oki gwo mo ki: A’di ta’d ga rum thus jin nyo/o’d mo be.
41003031	Dhali kum dhali ikam piti p̱u’dkin mo dhali dosha pije/ mo. Uni ki hash a’di gwo mo dhali yuḵ a’di mo be.
41003032	Dhala dhana waambuhany ’kwani ’kokini ’kam a’di is mo dhali uni ki o a’di gwo mo ki: Kwan dhali ikam pini dhali i’bwahan uni ’kona pije/ mmahan mo mmodoṯ /e mo be.
41003033	Dhali a’di ki thoḵ gwo mo ki: Aja sa/ nta’da ta’dam pem dhali ikam pem mo?
41003034	Dhali a’di ki hil mo mo mmo’kar mo ki e mo gom uni gwansan kun ’kon mmo’kam a’di is mo, dhali a’di ki o gwo mo ki: Ita’dam pem anan be dhali ikam pem anan mo be.
41003035	A’diyin jin mii’d ki bwa ma Arumgimis mo tani a’di ita’da kam pem mo dhali ’bwah pem mo dhali ata’dam pem mo be.
41004001	Doḵ/e a’di ṯelki mii ’pen mo mmoṯor uni gwo e shemen ma gap̱ mo. Dhala dhana waambuhany ’kwani caaca kagahara tulki isi a’di mo. Wakan a’di seki bwaa ḵur mo dhali c̱a’bi cine/ mo e bwaman ma al mo. Dhala dhana waambuhany ’kwani uni ’koni shemen ma gap̱ ma al mo eya ’cesh mo.
41004002	Dhali a’di ṯorki uni gwo ka ris mo ki gwom ’bi’th/e mo, dhali e gwom piti jin ṯora a’di uni mo tani a’di ki o uni gwo mo ki:
41004003	Ba ciḵi gwo mo ma. Amanyeḵa ḵa’bany a’di ya’d ka pije/ mo mmoyeḵ to mo.
41004004	Dhali ki a’di yeḵki to mo tani aḵa’banya tiya ṯa’kkin mo e bway tur jin iinu mo. Dhali ’dii p̱u’dkin mo dhali los uni mo be.
41004005	Dhali aḵa’banya tiya uni ṯa’kkin mo e mo wosh mo dhali uni daran ga ’cesh e embul mo. Dhali ki jahanne/ ki uni ’kana le/ mo haali/ uni dar ga ’cesh mo tani,
41004006	dhali ka tente/ sulki’d ka nyor piti jin ’batha’ba’th mo dhali mmodara uni ka birman mo tani uni la shi’bil mo be.
41004007	Dhali aḵa’banya tiya uni ṯa’kkin mo e bwam ma ’de/ mo dhali ka ’de/ can mo tani a’di c̱okoṯki uni mo dhali a’di moli maman dho’th mo be.
41004008	Dhali aḵa’banya tiya uni ṯa’kkin mo eya ’cesh jin ’bora’bor mo dhali uni ki ḵala dho’th kagahara mo mmocakina uni mo dhali mmomarkina uniya mar is mo, mmogwono’dkina uniya dho’th ki iss ’de/ i’ce’dka ’kume’d eya tora ’de/ mo dhali ki iss ’kwanimpa ikwara mo dhali ki iss ’kwanimpa imudhe’d mo be.
41004009	Dhali a’di ki o uni gwo mo ki: A’di jin ta’d gi gu’ban’ce mo mmociḵ gwo mo tani dhalki a’di ciḵ gwo mo ma.
41004010	Dhali ki a’di di’d a’di ’de/ mo tani dhali uni gwansan kun tulki isi a’di kun tana ’kume’d i’ce’dka su/ mo tani uni doṯki a’di gwo mo isi gom gwom ’bi’th/e yan mo.
41004011	Dhali a’di ki o uni gwo mo ki: Um c̱inu gwo jin c̱inu ki kup̱ mo gom Bampa/ ma Arumgimis mo, hili gom uni gwansan kun ’kona pije/ mo tani uni a’di iminu ṯorki gwo ki gwom ’bi’th/e mo be.
41004012	Wakan ki uni mini mii mish ka jiŋ gana/ dhali ’koki nyiṯẖ a’di mo, dhali uni ka jiŋ gana/ mini ciḵ a’di mo tani dhali ’koki mish a’di ’ban mo be. Hili isi ciki/ ki uni mini ’taki ṯu’k mo doḵ/e dhali uni minu ’taki gwamki miinthus buni mo be.
41004013	Dhali a’di ki o uni gwo mo ki: A/um si’da/ ’koki mish gwom ’bi’th/e yan ’ban mo? Um mini mish a’di ’ban kata aris gwom ’bi’th/e gwansan mo?
41004014	Amanyeḵa ḵa’bany to mo tani a’di yeḵki gwo mo be.
41004015	Dhali uni gwansan uni ita uni kun ṯa’kkin mo e bway tur mo e mo jin yeḵu gwo nycine/ mo. Dhali ki uni ciḵki gwo mo tani aSeṯaan ki jahanne/ p̱u’dki’d mo dhali ḵal gwo jin yeḵu e uni mo be.
41004016	Dhali uni gwansan si’da/ uni ita uni gun yeḵkunu mo e embula ’cesh wosh mo. Uni, ki uni ciḵki gwo mo tani uni la bu’th a’di ki jahanne/ ki bwaŋ ’kunyu’d mo be.
41004017	Dhali uni tan ga birman yisa e is buni mo, hili uni ’kon jasi ari’ceenne/ mo, dhali yan’ko’d ki monṯo’c bwa walla mo gi ’koshuwa ’kosh cuki mis mo gom gway yan mo tani ki jahanne/ uni ṯa’kkin mo be.
41004018	Dhali aḵa’banya tiya uni gun yeḵkunu mo e bwam ma ’de/ mo tani uni ita uni gwansan kun ciḵki gwo mo be.
41004019	Hili uni bala to ga ’cesh is mo dhali ’penkap̱an buni jin el uni e ki el mo dhali bwam buni gun ona uni gom ton tiya mo tani cic̱kina uni nycine/ mo dhali c̱okoṯ gwo mo dhali a’di inyo/i uni mo ki uni moli dho’th mo be.
41004020	Hili uni gwansan kun yeḵu mo eya ’cesha ’borga/ mo tani uni ita uni gun ciḵki gwo mo dhali bu’th a’di mo dhali dho’th maman mo, eya tora ’de/ mo tani a’di dhotho’d ki iss ’de/ i’ce’dka ’kume’d mo, dhali eya tora ’de/ mo tani a’di dhotho’d ki iss ’kwanimpa ikwara mo, dhali eya tora kamu/ mo tani a’di dhotho’d ki iss ’kwanimpa imudhe’d mo be.
41004021	Dhali a’di ki o uni gwo mo ki: Alamba/ ki a’di ḵalkunu bway gu’b mo tani a’di kumkunu ’kup̱ ki toŋ’kul bwa mo ’taa? walla karkunu mo e bwaŋ’kwariny ma aŋgar mowa? dhali a’di dinuki kara p̱o/ ṯirkina/ mo ’taa?
41004022	Haali/ toŋ kamu/ yisa di’da jin minu bag mo isi ciki/ a’di minu mish eya tente/ mo. Walla toŋ kamu/ yisa di’da jin minu mii ka ’di/ mo, hili isi ciki/ uni minu mish ki moŋkush mo be.
41004023	Waḵki/ wathin ’deŋ kamu/ ta’d gi gu’ban’ce mo tani dhalki a’di ciḵ gwo mo ma.
41004024	Dhali a’di ki o uni gwo mo ki: Hili ki ’bore/ a’di jin ciḵa um mo. A’di jin barkina um mo tani a’di minu barki um mo dhali to ki nyanye/ mo tani a’di minu c̱i ki um mo be.
41004025	Haali/ a’di jin ta’d gi to mo tani minu c̱iku/ ki nyanye/ mo. Dhali ’peni a’di jin dara’d mo tani, me’d jin tana a’di gi a’di mo tani a’di minu bu’th ’peni a’di mo be.
41004026	Dhali a’di ki o gwo mo ki: Bampa/ ma Arumgimis a’di wana e ki wathi/ jin midi ’taki pepera ḵa’bany bwa ap̱o/ mony’cesh mo
41004027	dhali ’taki ish e mo dhali cu mis mon’thiny mo dhali montee mo, dhali aḵa’bany midi ’taki ’ka ale/ mo dhali ca mo ki a’di molo’d mo be.
41004028	A’cesh a’di dho’thki to ki is piti mo, ale/ a’di i’ka’di ṯwa/a/ mo dhali yan’ko’d akulp̱e/ mo dhali yan’ko’d maman gana/ mo.
41004029	Hili ki maman iski’d mo tani a’di ki kar mo ma nyerṯẖa/ eya tente/ ki jahanne/ mo haali/ mo gi minu ’ciṯẖ to mo p̱u’dki’d mo be.
41004030	Dhali a’di ki o gwo mo ki: Mina ana kar Bampa/ ma Arumgimis ka p̱ar ’ban kata moye? walla gwom ’bi’th/e gi wakata imina ana i/o mo gom a’di mo?
41004031	A’di wana e ki emena ḵa’bany to jin miinuwa ’tash mo, a’di jin yeḵkunu ap̱owa ’cesh mo. A’di ta ara ḵa’bany to jin c̱a’ba e ki p̱iri’th p̱iri’th ap̱owa ’cesh mo.
41004032	Hili ki a’di yeḵkunu mo tani a’di caki’d mo dhali a’di warki’d ki dhan wurup̱ mo dhali a’di ki pepera adhana bi mo. Wakan ’dii kun p̱en e mis mo tani uni nyaŋki gu’b buni eya lam piti mo be.
41004033	Ka ris gwom ’bi’th/e gi wakan mo tani a’di ki ṯor uni gwo mo me’d jin mina uni ’taki mish a’di mo be.
41004034	A’di diki ṯor uni gwo ki dar gi gwom ’bi’th/e mo. Hili e imanciḵ gwom pitiŋ gana/ mo uni ’cena mo tani a’di ki be’d uni gwo ’baar mo be.
41004035	Ka tee c̱aan ki mo ta mom’pimpili/ mo tani a’di ki o uni gwo mo ki: Dhalki ana iina mo mmo’ciṯẖa/ gap̱ gi ’bana kamu/ mo.
41004036	Dhali mmodhalkina uni awaambuhany ’kwani ’pen mo tani uni suski a’di nyaḵki uni mo me’d jin c̱a’bkina a’di e bwam ma ḵur mo. Dhali aḵura tiya nyaḵki ’ko ki a’di mo be.
41004037	Dhali adhana p̱unthar ’tham poshki’d mo dhali yi’de/ birki bakal mo mmodora ḵur mo. Wakan aḵur a’di ’tu’dkina yi’de/ hila/ mo be.
41004038	Hili a’di diki’d mo e bum ’pen ma ḵur mo mmo/ish e ap̱o/ burrinye/ jin ishu ’ba/ mo. Dhali uni merki a’di e mo dhali o a’di gwo mo ki: Manṯor gwo, ki /e bunya/ dina is ki mer mo ki ana mina ’ce’d sho’k mo?
41004039	Dhali a’di ki mer e mo dhali ḵucur ’tham ki gwo mo dhali o yi’de/ gwo mo ki: Roci sho’k mo dhali doshi muŋgun mo. Dhali ’tham doshki’d mo dhali adhan mo dosh ki biyuu mo be.
41004040	Dhali a’di ki o uni gwo mo ki: Katinta ḵo/ka uma ḵo/ ise? Um dar gi moŋgam gwo is mo ’taa?
41004041	Dhali uni ’kokunu mo mmo’tu’d ki mondee is mo dhali o gwo ka rem ’kup̱ mo ki: Ki wathi/ jana a’dan sa/? ki ’tham dhali yi’de/ haki a’di gwo e mo?
41005001	Dhali uni p̱u’dkin ki ’ban ma gap̱ ma ala kamu/ mo e bampa/ gi Paŋ Gadara mo be.
41005002	Dhali ki a’di piki’d ka pije/ ’peni bwam ma ḵur mo tani a’di gamki ’kup̱ ki wathi/ jin piki’d mo ’peni moŋ’kup̱aje jin taki’d ga rum thus jin nyo/o’d mo be.
41005003	A’di jin c̱a’bki’d e moŋ’kup̱aje mo dhali wathin ’deŋ kamu/ yisa di’da jin mishki a’di deḵ ki sule/ mo isi ka jindhiir ilu/ mo.
41005004	Haali/ a’di deḵkunu me’d ka ris ka maḵḵiya mo dhala jindhiir mo, hila jindhiir bene’dkina a’di bwa mo dhali maḵḵiya si’da/ ’ce’dkina a’di ka ’ci’cimi’th mo. Dhali wathiŋ kamu/ yisa ta gi ’bitha mmo’te a’di mii ’twa/ mo.
41005005	Mon’thiny dhali montee a’di diki’d mo e moŋ’kup̱aje mo dhali e moŋ’kuwosh si’da/ mo a’di cuuki gwo ki ’twa/ jin caaca mo dhali ṯẖa’th is piti ki wosh mo be.
41005006	Dhali ki a’di p̱arki’da Yesus e mo ’pena dhana/ mo tani a’di guski’d mo dhali luŋ a’di mo be
41005007	dhali a’di cuu gwo ki dhan ’twa/ jin caaca mo mmo/o gwo mo ki: Ki /e mini miiya tinta ki aha/, Yesus, /e jin ta Ya/ gi a’di jin Cayaa/ e ki Ca jin ta’da Arumgimis mo? Aha/ ḵana /e gwo mo ka Arumgimis mo ki: Dhalku/ ki ’kosh aha/ is ka nyor mo.
41005008	Haali/ a’di ki o a’di gwo mo ki: Piyi ka pije/ ’peni wathi/ mo, /e jin tana rum thus jin nyo/o’d kan mo.
41005009	Dhala Yesus ki doṯ a’di gway mo mmo/o gwo mo ki: /E yuḵu gway kaja mo? A’di ki thoḵ gwo mo ki: Gway pem yuḵu Karis mo haali/ aman ’kona ka ris mo be.
41005010	Dhali a’di ki doṯ a’di gwo ka daran du mo mmohash uni ka pije/ ’peni bampa/ mo be.
41005011	Dhala dhana waambuhany ḵuthar uni shwakin mo e ’bambala wosh mo be.
41005012	Dhali uni doṯki a’di bway mo mmo/o gwo mo ki: Hashki aman mo e bwaŋ ḵuthar mo ma. Dhalki aman ciḵa e uni mo.
41005013	Wakan a’di ki dhal uni bway mo mmo/ii mo be. Dhala rum thus kun nyo/on p̱u’dkin ka pije/ mo dhali cic̱ mo e bwaŋ ḵuthar mo. Dhala dhana buhany ḵuthar deŋkunu e ka alaap̱i su/ mo, mmosokina uni ka luŋgu’b eya gap̱ yi’deŋ ’kulga/ mo e bwam yi’de/ mo dhali uni loskina yi’de/ mo be.
41005014	Dhali imanhil ḵuthar uni sokin mo dhali ṯor gwo e ’peŋkuman bampa/ mo dhali e pa ’baar mo. Dhali ’kwani p̱u’dkin mo mmop̱ar a’di e mo a’di jin miiki’d mo be.
41005015	Dhali uni p̱u’dkina Yesus mo dhali uni ki p̱ar wathi/ jin bu’thkin ma ruma ’cesh e mo mmoc̱a’b mo ki burrinye/ i is mo dhali ka dum piti jin ’boro’d mo be dhali wathi/ jin taki’d ga ruma ’cesh ka ris mo tani dhali uni ḵo/ki a’di mo be.
41005016	Dhali uni gwansan kun mishki a’di mo tani uni ṯorki gwo mo gom a’di jin miikunu mo gom wathi/ jin bu’th ma ruma ’cesh mo dhali gwo gom ḵuthar mo.
41005017	Dhali uni ṯelki mii ’pen mo mmoyuḵa Yesus mo mmoya mo ’peni mom buni mo be.
41005018	Dhali me’d jin jithirkina a’di mo e bwam ma ḵur mo tani wathi/ jin bu’thkin ma ruma ’cesh a’di doṯki a’di ’twa/ mo ki a’di midi ’taki nyaḵ di ki a’di mo be.
41005019	Hila Yesus ushki’d mo dhali o a’di gwo mo ki: Yaku/ bway pa mo e imugum pini mo ma dhali ṯor uni gwo gom to jin miikina Tap̱a gom /e mo dhali gom momiimii jin miikunu ap̱o e mo be.
41005020	Dhali a’di yaki’d ka pije/ mo dhali ṯel mii ’pen mo mmoṯor gwo eya tente/ e Bampa/ gi Pan Deḵap̱olis mo gom dhan to jin miikin ma Yesus gom a’di mo, dhali aris ’kwani ’baar mo merkin mo be.
41005021	Dhali ka Yesus ’ciṯẖki’da gap̱ doḵ/e eya ḵur ki ’bana kamu/ mo tani awaambuhany ’kwani caaca tulki isi a’di mo. Dhali a’di diki’d e shemen ma gap̱ ma al mo.
41005022	Dhali yan’ko’d tap̱aŋ kamu/ gi gu’b gi montul is pu’dki’d mo, a’di jin yuḵkunu gway ka Yaa/irus mo. Dhali ki a’di p̱arki a’di e mo tani a’di biṯki’da ’ceshi sho’k piti mo be.
41005023	Dhali mmoŋap̱ a’di mo mmo/o gwo mo ki: Ari ’bwa/m pem a’di ’ba’thki’d mo mmomuri wu mo. Yayu/ mo ma dhali kar me’d pini ap̱owa yim mo. Wakan ka yim mina isi ’bor mo dhali di ki e mo be.
41005024	Dhali a’di yaki’d mo nyaḵki a’di mo. Dhala dhana waambuhany ’kwani caaca baṯẖki a’di mo dhali uni ki ’kam a’di ki deḵ mo.
41005025	Dhali a’boma kamu/ diki’d si’da/ mo, a’di jin guskin ma bas ki yil ’kume’d i’ce’dka su/ mo be.
41005026	Dhali a’di ’koshkina is ka nyor kagahara mo gom mii jin yakina a’di i ihakiim ka ris mo. Dhali a’di ki ’baara ris to ’baar mo kun takina a’di mo be dhali isa kamu/ yisa ’borki’da, hili isa nyor ’curki ’pen ki shi/ mo kagahara mo be.
41005027	Dhali ayim ciḵki gwo kun okunu goma Yesus mo dhali a’di p̱u’dki’di ’ko’di a’di mo e bwaman ma waambuhany ’kwani mo dhali ta a’di burrinyem piti is ki me’d mo.
41005028	Haali/ ayim ki o gwo mo ki: Waḵki/ aha/ mina ’taki ta isi burrinyem piti is ki me’d mo tani aha/ mina isi ’bor mo be.
41005029	Dhali ki jahanne/ abas jin guski a’di daḵki’d mo, dhali ayim mishki’d ki is piti mo ka yim wac̱kunu mo ’peni ’ba’th jin ’koshki a’di mo be.
41005030	Dhala Yesus nyiṯẖki’d ki is piti ki mom’bi’th yaki’d ’peni a’di mo dhali ki jahanne/ a’di ki ṯuka bor mo e bwaman ma waambuhany ’kwani mo dhali o gwo mo ki: Kaja ta aha/ burrinye/ is ki me’d mo?
41005031	Dhali imanciḵ a’di gwo ki o a’di gwo mo ki: /E p̱arkina waambuhany ’kwani e yap̱kina yap̱ ki is mo mmo’kam /e mo dhali ata ona /e ki: Kaja ta aha/ is ki me’d mo?
41005032	Dhali a’di ki hil mo ki e mo mmop̱ar a’di jin miiki’d kan e mo be.
41005033	Hila ’bom a’di mishki a’di jin miikunu mo gom a’di mo. A’di p̱u’dki’d ki moŋḵo/ is mo dhali mondee is mo dhali a’di ki biṯa ’cesh ibwambori a’di mo dhali a’di ki ṯor a’di gwoŋ gana/ ’baar mo.
41005034	Dhali a’di ki owa yim gwo mo ki: ’Bwa/m pem, moŋgam gwo is pini a’di wac̱ki /e mo. Yaku/ mo ki moŋḵu’th is mo dhali wac̱i mo ’peni ’ba’th pini jin ’koshki /e mo.
41005035	Dhali ki a’di di’d mmoṯor gwo mo tani ’kwanin tiya p̱u’dkin mo ’peni gu’b gi tap̱a mo, uni gun o gwo mo ki: ’Bwa/m pini wuki’d mo. Atinta ṯu/ulkina /e amanṯor gwo ki gwo ki rash rash kan mo?
41005036	Hili a’di toŋki’d mo gom gwo jin okina uni mo. Dhala Yesus ki o tap̱a gi gu’b gi montul is gwo mo ki: Dhalku/ is ki ḵo/ mo ma. Hili gami jasi gwo is mo.
41005037	Dhali a’di diki dhal jan ṯal ’deŋ kamu/ bway mo mmobaṯẖ a’di mo, hili isi ciki/ jasa Buṯerus mo dhala Yakuub mo dhala Yohaan jin ta’da kam ma Yakuub mo be.
41005038	Ki uni p̱u’dkin mo e gu’b gi tap̱a gi gu’b gi montul is mo tani a’di p̱arki’da dulaṯṯ e mo jin miikunu mo dhali ’kwani mmoko mo dhali mmomiiya c̱inthar kagahara mo.
41005039	Dhali ki a’di cic̱ki gu’b mo tani a’di ki o uni gwo mo ki: Atinta miikina uma dulaṯṯ mo dhali ko mo kan? A’ci a’di yisa wu’d mowa, hili a’di ishki e mo be.
41005040	Dhali uni ki p̱e’th a’di mo. Hili a’di ki dhu uni ’peni ’baar ka pije/ mo dhali a’di ki sus jasi com ma ’ci mo dhali kum mo dhali uni gwansan kun nyaḵki ’ko ki a’di mo dhali ii bway bwaŋ gu’b e mo jin din ma ’ci mo.
41005041	Dhali a’di ki butha yim ki me’d mo dhali a’di ki owa yim gwo mo ki: Ṯaliṯẖa kumi, a’di jin ta ’pemen gwo jin onu ki: Ari nyara/, aha/ ona /e gwo mo ki: cuyi mis mo.
41005042	Dhali ki jahanne/ ari nyara/ cuki mis mo dhali ya ki sho’k mo. Haala yim ’kona yili ’kume’d i’ce’dka su/ mo. Dhali ki jahanne/ uni ’baar mo ’kokunu mo mmotash ki momer mo be.
41005043	Dhali a’di ki ḵan uni gwo ki ’bi’th mo ki wathiŋ kamu/ midi ’taki diki mish mii yan mo. Dhali a’di ki ṯor uni gwo mo mmoc̱i ka yim tonṯe/ mmoshwa mo be.
41006001	A’di yaki’d mo ’peni mun mo dhali p̱u’d mo e bampam piti mo dhali imanciḵ a’di gwo baṯẖki a’di nsho’k mo be.
41006002	Dhali ka cim ma pesu/ mo tani a’di ki ṯel mii ’pen mo mmoṯor uni gwo mo e gu’b gi montul is mo. Dhali ’kwani ka ris kun ciḵki gwom piti mo tani uni ’kokin mo mmomer mo mmo/o gwo mo ki: ’Peni mana sa/ igamkina wathi/ yansan aris mii gwansan mo? Ki moyuḵ jin ta’da ta sa/ ic̱ikunu a’di mo? Dhali adhan mom’bi’th maja sa/ imiikina a’di mii gwahan ki me’d piti mo?
41006003	Dina a’di ki ta amanp̱a/ cwa ’taa? Dhali dina a’di ki ta ya/ ma Mariyam ’taa? Dhali ikam piti ’koki ta iYakuub mo dhala Yusi mo dhali Yahuuda/ mo dhala Simaan ’taa? Dhali ’kona i’bwaham piti ki nyaḵ ’ko ki ana imahana? Dhali uni kolkunu ki a’di mo be.
41006004	Dhala Yesus ki o uni gwo mo ki: Amanc̱i gwo ma Arumgimis yisa dar gi taḵ e mon tiya hili isi ciki/ jasi e bampam pitiŋ gana/ mo dhali e bwaman ma bas ’kwanim piti mo dhali e gu’b pitiŋ gana/ mo be.
41006005	Dhali a’di mol dhan miiny caaga/ mii mo isi ciki/ a’di kar me’d piti ap̱o/ ’kwani kun ’bathan ki daḵa/ mo dhali a’di ki wac̱ uni mo be.
41006006	Dhali a’di merki’d kagahara mo haali/ gom ’kom buni jin ’kona uni ki dar gi moŋgam gwo is mo be. Dhali a’di yaki’d mo e bwaman ’kwani e bampa/ ’baar mo mmoṯor gwo mo be.
41006007	Dhali a’di ki yuḵ ’kwani ’kume’d i’ce’dka su/ nyaḵki a’di mo, dhali a’di ki ṯel mii ’pen mo mmohash uni ka susu/ susu/ mo. Dhali c̱i uni moshirr ap̱owa rum thus kun nyo/on mo be.
41006008	A’di ki ḵan uni gwo mo mmo’koki ’do ton tiya gom iim buni i bway mo hili isi ciki/ jasi cwa mo, walla maa yisa, walla ḵucaŋ yisa, walla guurush yisa eya jisalaan buni mo.
41006009	Hili uni mini hi’th jasa p̱p̱a/ isho’k mo dhali mini ’koki hi’th burrinyem bwamani su/ mo.
41006010	Dhali a’di ki o uni gwo mo ki: E gu’b yin jin mina umi cic̱ mo tani ’koyi mo ntagi um mini dhal mo yan ’pen mo.
41006011	Dhali waḵki/ ’kwani gi mo c̱aan ’koki bu’th um mo, dhali ush gwo ciḵ ’peni um mo tani dhali ki um mini dhal mo yin ’pen mo tani piri abuhany ’peni sho’k bum mo haali/ a’di midi ta gwo jin onu ap̱o/ uni mo be.
41006012	Wakan uni iikin mo dhali c̱i gwo mo ki ’kwani mini ’taki rica du is mo be.
41006013	Dhali uni urkina ruma ’cesh ka pije/ ka ris mo dhali wol uni ayini ’kup̱ ka ris mo, aris uni gun ’ba’thkin mo dhali wac̱ uni mo be.
41006014	Dhala Maliḵ Hirodus ciḵki gwo mo gom a’di mo, gom gway ma Yesus mishkunu e mo ’baar mo. Gom kun tiya o gwo mo ki: A’di ta’da Yohaan jin ta’da manmiiya mii ki yi’de/ mo jin cukunu mis mo ’peni mowu mo. A’di ’bitha wathi/ mii ki ’bi’th e a’di mo be.
41006015	Hili kun tiya o gwo mo ki: A’di ta’da Iliyya mo. Dhali kun tiya o gwo mo ki: A’di ta’da manc̱i gwo ma Arumgimis mo jin wana e gi jin ṯal ’deŋ kamu/ ’peni imanc̱i gwo ma Arumgimis kadhamo/ mo be.
41006016	Hili ka Hirodus ciḵki gwo mo gom a’di mo tani a’di ki o gwo mo ki: AYohaan jin ’ciṯẖka/ ’kup̱ mo a’di cukunu mis mo ’te/ be.
41006017	Haala Hirodus a’di hashki gwo mo dhali butha Yohaan mo dhali deḵ a’di mo mmokara sijin mo gom gway ma Hirodiyya mo jin ta asha kam piti ka P̱ilibbus mo haali/ a’di mashki’da yim mo be.
41006018	Haala Yohaan ki owa Hirodus gwo mo ki: A’di diki ta mii jin dhala gwoŋḵan /e bway mo mmomash asha kan mo be.
41006019	Dhala Hirodiyya a’di dikina gwo ap̱o/ a’di mo mmoruḵ a’di mo dhali ŋap̱ a’di mmo’taki ’kosh jwa mo tani hili ayim diki mish a’di mii mo.
41006020	Haala Hirodus a’di ḵo/ki’da Yohaan mo mmomishkina a’di a’di ki a’di ta wathiŋ ḵar/e mo dhali wathi/ jin ḵogu mo dhali kar a’di ki ’dantar mo. Ki a’di ciḵki gwo ’peni a’di mo tani a’di duŋkurkina ’kup̱ is kagahara mo dhali a’di di’d mmociḵ gwo ’peni a’di ki bwaŋ ’kunyga/ mo be.
41006021	Hili embula ’borga/ p̱u’dki’d mo ka Hirodus p̱u’dkin ma cim jin dhodhu a’di mo tani a’di miiki dhan maa gom ’kwani ma hakuuma gi gu’b piti mo dhali imancil ma askar alip̱ mo dhali ’kwani gwanyjaḵa/ gi Pany Jaliil mo be.
41006022	Dhali ki ’bwa/ ma Hirodiyya p̱u’dki’d mo dhali sa mo tani ayim ’borki’da Hirodus bwa mo dhali yilkinam piti mo, dhali maliḵ ki o nyara/ gwo mo ki: Doṯi aha/ mo ma gom ma to yin jin o /e bwa mo dhali aha/ mina c̱iki a’di /e mo be.
41006023	Dhali a’di ki owa yim gwo is mo mmo/o gwo mo ki: Ma to yin jin mina /e idoṯ aha/ mo tani aha/ mina c̱iki a’di /e mo ntagi ’bwanu’b bampam pema kamu/ mo be.
41006024	Dhala yim yaki’d ka pije/ mo dhali doṯ kum gwo mo ki: Ata miga/ doṯ a’di mo? Dhali kum ki o a’di gwo mo ki: ’Kup̱ ma Yohaan jin ta’da manmiiya mii ki yi’de/ mo be.
41006025	Dhala yim yaki gu’b ki jahanne/ mo mmobumburku/ mo eya maliḵ mo dhali doṯ a’di gwo mo mmo/o gwo mo ki: Aha/ ŋap̱a /e mmoc̱i aha/ ’kup̱ ma Yohaan shwane’dan e bwam ma sahan mo, a’di jin ta’da manmiiya mii ki yi’de/ mo be.
41006026	Dhala maliḵ a’di biṯkina bwa ka luŋgu’b kagahara mo ki bwan diṯi’d mo. Hili haali/ gom gwo jin ona a’di is mo dhali yilkinam piti mo tani a’di ’tena bwa mmo’ce’d gwom piti goma yim mo be.
41006027	Dhali ki jahanne/ a’di hashki’da askar mo, a’di jin ta’da amanji mo mo, dhali ḵan gwo mo ki ’kup̱ piti minu guyu/ mo. Dhali a’di yaki’d mo dhali ’ciṯẖa/ Yohaan ’kup̱ mo eya sijin mo
41006028	dhali guyu/ ’kup̱ piti mo e bwam ma sahan mo dhali c̱iki a’di ki nyara/ mo, dhali nyara/ ki c̱iki a’di ki kum mo be.
41006029	Dhali ki imanciḵ a’di gwo ciḵki gwo mo gom a’di mo tani uni p̱u’dkin mo dhali ḵal buŋgwar is piti mo dhali ’thi a’di e jis wosh mo be.
41006030	Dhali imandhun ma Yesus ki she/ mo uni doḵkin mo ka nyaŋ’ko’d eya Yesus mo dhali ṯor a’di aris gwo ’baar mo kun miikina uni mo dhali aris gwo kun ṯorkina uni mo be.
41006031	Dhali a’di ki ṯor uni gwo mo ki: Iiyi mo um ’cena mo e mo jin p̱ina ’kwani mo dhali siyi is mo ari’ceenne/. Haali/ ’kwani tana ris ka ris p̱u’dkin mo dhali iikin mo, dhali uni ’koki butha tente/ mo mmokar toŋ kamu/ n’twa/ mo mmoshwa mo be.
41006032	Dhali uni iikin mo e bwam ma ḵur mo e mo jin dar gi ’kwani uni ’cena ki is buni mo be.
41006033	Dhali ’kwani ka ris p̱arki uni e mo mmo/ii mo dhali mish uni mo dhali uni sokin ki sho’k mo ’peni aris bampa/ ’baar mo dhali p̱u’di ṯwa/a/ ki uni mo be.
41006034	Ki a’di thulki’d mo tani a’di p̱arki’da dhana buhany wathimpa e mo dhali a’di ki ḵo’c uni e i is mo haali/ uni wakina e gi ḵa’bal kun dar ga manhil uni mo. Dhali a’di ki ṯel mii ’pen mo mmoṯor uni gwo ki to ka ris mo be.
41006035	Dhali ki mo taki’da babalalu/ mo tani imanciḵ a’di gwo p̱u’dkin mo dhali o a’di gwo mo ki: Mo yansan ta mo jin p̱ina ’kwani mo, dhali mo ta’da ’thintha/ mo be.
41006036	Hashki uni mo ma ki uni mini ii bampa/ mo dhali pa kun ’kon gi jiŋ ’kam mo dhali yol tonṯe/ gom is buni mo mmoshwa mo.
41006037	Hili a’di ki thoḵ uni gwo mo ki: Um mini c̱i uni tonṯe/ mmoshwa mo. Dhali uni o a’di gwo mo ki: Mina aman ii mo ’te/ be dhali yol maaŋḵuthu’d ka riyaal iss ’kwanimpa ipe’de/ mo dhali c̱i uni mmoshwa mo ’taa?
41006038	Dhali a’di ki o uni gwo mo ki: Um ’kon ma guraasa ekata mo? Iiku/ mo dhali p̱ar e mo ma. Dhali ki uni gamki a’di mo tani uni ki o a’di gwo mo ki: Imudhe’d mo dhali to yi’de/ ’koni su/ mo be.
41006039	Dhali yan’ko’d a’di ki ḵan uni gwo ’baar mo mmo’ko ’pena ’cesh ka pwaḵ she/ mo ap̱owa shon dhii/i’d mo.
41006040	Wakan uni ’kokina ’cesh ka ŋul ’kup̱ mo ki iss ’kwanimpa ka mummudhe’d mo dhali ki iss su/ i’ce’dka ’kume’d mo be.
41006041	Dhali a’di ki bu’th maaŋḵuthu’di mudhe’d mo dhali to yi’de/ isu/ mo tani dhali a’di ki hil ’kup̱ ki momis mo dhali a’di ki ’bora ’bor bwa i is mo dhali ’ce’d maaŋḵuthu’d bwa mo dhali a’di ki c̱i uni ki imanciḵ a’di gwo mo mmodhu ibwambori ’kwani mo. Dhali a’di ki pwaḵ to yi’de/ isu/ bwa mo mbwaman uni ’baar mo.
41006042	Dhali uni ’baar mo shwakin mo dhali kap̱kunu mo be.
41006043	Dhali uni ’tu’dkina nura/ ka ’kume’d i’ce’dka su/ mo ki ’pisira/ maa mo dhali to yi’de/ mo be.
41006044	Dhali uni gwansan kun shwaki maaŋḵuthu’d mo tani ta ’kwaniŋ gwasi alaap̱i mudhe’d mo be.
41006045	Ki jahanne/ a’di ki ṯor imanciḵ a’di gwo gwo mo mmose bwam ma ḵur mo mmo/ii iṯwa/a/ ki a’di mo e ’bana gap̱a kamu/ mo e Pam Beeṯsayda mo ki a’di midi ’cuḵka waambuhany ’kwani montul is mo be.
41006046	Dhali ŋ’ko’d ki a’di dhalki uni ’pen mo tani a’di seki moŋ’kuwosh mo dhali ’tho mo be.
41006047	Dhali ki mom’pimpili/ p̱u’dki’d mo tani aḵur a’di diki’d isi bwaman ma al mo dhali a’di di’d a’di ’de/ eya ’cesh mo be.
41006048	Dhali a’di di’d mmop̱ar uni e ki uni ’kokin ka c̱is mo e moŋ’kosh yi’de/ is ki cwa mo haala p̱unthar ’tham poshki’da p̱o/ uni mo be. Dhali ki mo ta mon’twash/e mo tani a’di p̱u’dki’di uni mo mmoya ki sho’k e ’kup̱a al yi’de/ mo. A’di ya’d ’taki ya pe uni mo be.
41006049	Hili ki uni p̱arki a’di e mo mmoya ki sho’k ap̱o/ ’kup̱a al yi’de/ mo tani uni ṯoshkin ki a’di ta’da rum mo dhali uni ḵumki cuuwa/ mo be
41006050	haali/ uni ’baar mo p̱arki a’di e mo dhali uni ’kokina isi modee mo. Hili ki jahanne/ a’di ṯorki uni gwo mo dhali o gwo mo ki: Budhi adu mo ma. Aha/ a’dan be. Dhalku/ is ki ḵo/ mo ma.
41006051	Dhali a’di seki’d e bwam ma ḵur mo nyaḵki uni mo dhali ’tham doshki’d mo be. Dhali uni ’kokini momer kagahara mo be.
41006052	Haali/ uni ’koki mish gwo ’ban mo gom maaŋḵuthu’d mo haali/ adum buni ’bitha’bi’th mo be.
41006053	Dhali ki uni ’ciṯẖkina gap̱ mo tani uni p̱u’dkin mo e bampa/ gi Pa Jannisaaraṯ mo dhali uni shi’dkina ḵur iyana gap̱ mo be.
41006054	Dhali ki uni pikin ka pije/ mo ’peni bwam ma ḵur mo tani ki jahanne/ ’kwani nyiṯẖki a’di mo be
41006055	dhali uni sokin mo ’peni aris bampa/ ’baar mo mmokukul mo c̱aan is mo dhali ṯel mii ’pen mo mmoḵal ’kwani kun ’bathan mo eya cim buni mo e mo ’baar mo jin ciḵa uni gwo ki a’di di’di cine/ mo be.
41006056	Dhali e mo yin jin p̱u’da a’di mo eya ris bampa/ mo dhali e ’peŋkuman bampa/ mo walla e bampa/ mo tani uni ki ’thi uni gun ’bathan e mo ma suug mo dhali o bwa ki a’di mo, ki uni mini ’taki ta a’di isi ’twaman burrinyem piti is ki me’d mo. Dhali ka ris uni ka ris kun taki a’di is ki me’d mo tani uni ’kokunu mo mmowac̱ mo be.
41007001	Dhali ki ’Kwani P̱arisiyiin tulki is imonṯal ’de/ mo e a’di mo nyaḵki iman’kwar to mo uni gun p̱u’dkin mo ’peni Pa Urushaliim mo tani
41007002	uni p̱arki imanciḵ a’di gwon tiya e mo mmoshwa to ki me’da nyo/ga/ mo mmo’koki ’thur uni ki yi’de/ mo be.
41007003	(Haali/ ’Kwani P̱arisiyiin dhali aris ’Kwani Yahuuda/ mo tani uni ’koki shwa to wakan mo, hili isi ciki/ uni mini ’thur me’d buni mo mmoboṯki mii gi ’kwani gwanyjaḵam buni kadhamo/ mo be.
41007004	Dhali ki uni p̱u’dkin ’peni mo ma suug mo tani uni si’da/ ’koki shwa to mo hili isi ciki/ uni mini mii nyoŋ is buni mo dhali miin tiya ka ris si’da/ miikina uni mo gom miin dhamo/ kun ṯorkunu uni mo mmomii mii mo mmolama ḵubbaaya mo dhala nos mo dhali toŋ’kul bwa kun ta gurany kush mo. )
41007005	Dhali ’Kwani P̱arisiyiin dhali iman’kwar to mo doṯki a’di gwo mo ki: Katintaye i’kona imanciḵ /e gwo ki baṯẖ mii gi gwoŋ gwanyjaḵan dhamo/ mo, hili uni shwa to ki me’d kun nyo/anyo/ kan mo.
41007006	Dhali a’di ki o uni gwo mo ki: Nye, din ma Ishaya ki o um gwo is ki um tana he’k e ka he’k e mo me’d gwo jin ’kwarkunu mo ki: ’Kwani gwansan uni taḵ aha/ ki ’twam buni mo tani hili adum buni si’dasi’d ’peni aha/ mo be.
41007007	Uni ki luŋ aha/ ki p̱e’th mo gwoŋḵan ’peni ’kwani mo tani ṯora uni me’d gwoŋ gana/ mo be.
41007008	Um dhalki gwoŋḵan ma Arumgimis mo dhali bu’th gwoŋ ’kwanin dhamo/ ki nyeŋ ka bor mo.
41007009	Dhali a’di ki o uni gwo mo ki: Um ’dap̱a’dap̱ kagahara mmo/ush gwoŋḵan ma Arumgimis mo jin mina um dhu gwoŋ ’kwanin dhamom bum mo.
41007010	Haala Musa o gwo mo ki: Taḵi icim dhali ikwan mo, dhali, A’di jin midi o gwon thus ap̱o/ com mo walla kum mo tani dhalki a’di ka jiŋ gana/ iwu’d mo.
41007011	Hili um o gwo mo ki: Waḵki/ wathi/ midi ṯor com gwo mo walla kum ki a’di jin mina /e ’taki gam ’peni aha/ mo tani midi ta Kurbaan mo (a’di jin ta ’pemen jin onu ki: A’di jin c̱ikunu Arumgimis mo be)—
41007012	dhali yan’ko’d um ’koki dhal a’di bway mo mmomii ari toŋ kamu/ ṯal ’de/ gom com mo walla kum mo be.
41007013	Wakan um ki p̱uu gwo ma Arumgimis mo gom gwo gi gwoŋ ’kwanin dhamom bum mo a’di jin luḵa um mo. Dhali um ki miiya ris ton tiya gi wakan mo be.
41007014	Dhali a’di ki yuḵ ’kwani i a’di mo doḵ/e dhali o uni gwo mo ki: Ciḵi gwo ’peni aha/ mo ma, aris umi ’baar mo dhali mishi gwo ’ban mo ma.
41007015	Toŋ kamu/ yisa di’da jin di’d ’pena pije/ jin midi ya bwa wathi/ mo dhali shi/ a’di is mo, hili a’di jin piyi’d ka pije/ ’peni bwa wathi/ mo tani a’di shi/ki a’di is mo be.
41007016	Waḵki/ wathiŋ kamu/ ta gi gu’ban’ce mo mmociḵ gwo mo tani dhalki a’di ciḵ gwo mo ma.
41007017	Dhali ki a’di cic̱ki gu’b mo tani dhali dhal ’kwani mo tani imanciḵ a’di gwo doṯki a’di gwo mo gom gwom ’bi’th/e yan mo be.
41007018	Dhali a’di ki o uni gwo mo ki: A/ki um si’da/ ’kokin kan mo mmo’koki mish gwo ’ban mowa? ’Kona um ki mish ’taa ki ma to yin jin yaki’d e bwa wathi/ ’pena pije/ mo tani midi mol shi/ a’di is mo be
41007019	haali/ a’di diki seya dum piti mo hili e bwam piti mo dhali wakan a’di ki ya ka pije/ mo. (Wakan a’di ṯorki gwo eya tente/ ka ris tonṯe/ ’baar mo ta kun dhelelkin mo be. )
41007020	Dhali a’di ki o gwo mo ki: To jin piyi’d ka pije/ ’peni ’twa/ wathi/ mo tani a’di ishi/ki a’di is mo be.
41007021	Haali/ ’peni bwaman mo, ’peni bwaman ma du wathi/ mo tani a’di p̱u’dkina gwon thus kun kulumu ibwa kun shi/ashi/ mo, kun ta mii gun miinu miinyc̱al mo, dhali mmota ’di/ mo dhali mmo’kosha mee mo dhali mmota c̱al mo
41007022	dhali mmo’thoṯẖ bwa mo dhali mmomii mii kun ’coḵa’coḵ mo dhali mmota he’k e mo dhali mii kun ’kanuwa ḵanthi/ mo dhali miin dhap̱an mo dhali mmota imanthutha thu’th ’pen mo, mmodhu ’ba/ ki ca mo dhali mii jin miinu miim p̱us mo.
41007023	Aris tonthus gwansani ’baar mo kun pikin ka pije/ ’peni bwa wathi/ mo tani uni a’di ishi/ki wathi/ is mo be.
41007024	Dhali a’di cuki mis mo ’peni mun mo dhali ya mo e bampa/ gi Pan Sur mo dhali Pan Saydaa/ mo. Dhali a’di cic̱ki gu’b mo dhali a’di diki dhal jan ’deŋ kamu/ bway mo mmomish a’di mo. Hili a’di molu bag mo be.
41007025	Hili ki jahanne/ a’boma kamu/ a’di jin bu’thkin ma rum thus jin nyo/o’d ’bwa/ mo ciḵki gwo mo gom a’di mo, dhali a’di p̱u’dki’d mo dhali c̱a’bki jiŋ ’kup̱a’dup̱uni shoki a’di mo be.
41007026	A’bom yansan ta’da ’bom gi Paŋ Griḵi mo be, a’di jin dho’thkunu mo e Pam P̱inikiyya ma Suriyya mo. Dhala yim doṯki a’di gwo mo mmo/ura ruma ’cesh ka pije/ ’peni ’bwa/ mo be.
41007027	Dhali a’di ki owa yim gwo mo ki: Dhalki uc̱i c̱inu tonṯe/ mmoshwa nṯwa/a/ mo, haali/ a’di diki ’bor mo mmoḵal tonṯe/ ’peni uc̱i mo dhali ṯa’k a’di ka ’ka mo.
41007028	Hila yim thoḵki a’di gwo mo ki: Nye, Tap̱a, hili a’ka si’da/ uni mini shwa kuluny maa uc̱i kun raskin ’pena tharabeesa mo be.
41007029	Dhali a’di ki owa yim gwo mo ki: Gom gwo jin ona /e wakansan mo tani yaku e mo. Aruma ’cesh dhalki ’bwa/um pini ’pen mo be.
41007030	Dhali ayim yaki pa mo dhali gama ’ci mmo/ish eya ci mo dhali aruma ’cesh dhalki a’di ’pen mo be.
41007031	Dhali yan’ko’d a’di doḵki’d ka nyaŋ’ko’d mo e Pan Sur mo dhali yaki tur mo e Pan Saydaa/ mo eya Al ma Jaliil mo dhali ki tur mo e bampa/ gi Pan Deḵap̱olis mo be.
41007032	Dhali uni ḵalki a’di wathi/ jin ta’da ’diye/ mo dhali ’twam piti jin c̱umpulkina a’di wal mo. Dhali uni ŋap̱ki a’di mo mmokar me’d piti ap̱o/ a’di mo be.
41007033	Dhali uni ki ḵal a’di ’pen ka pije/ mo ’pena waambuhany ’kwani mo, a’di ’de/ mo. A’di ki kar me’d piti e bwany’cem piti mo, dhala Yesus ki ’taḵ manya/ mo dhali ta a’di ale’d piti is ki me’d mo be.
41007034	Dhali a’di ki hil mo ’kup̱ ki momis mo dhali wuwa shure/ mo dhali o a’di gwo mo ki: Ip̱p̱aṯẖa, jin ta ’pemen jin onu gwo mo ki: Dhalki a’di ḵa’du mo ma.
41007035	Dhali ’cem piti ḵa’dkunu mo dhala le’d piti ’cuḵkunu mo dhali a’di ki o ’twa/ eya tente/ mo be.
41007036	Dhali a’di ki ḵan uni gwo mo mmo’koki ṯor jan ṯal ’deŋ kamu/ gwo mo gom gwo yan mo. Dhali hili mmoḵankina a’di uni gwo ki ’bi’th ki nyanye/ mo tani wakan uni ṯorki gwo ki bwa gom a’di ki nyanye/ eya tente/ mo be.
41007037	Dhali uni ’kokin mo mmomer ki mer jin shiyi’d mo mmo/o gwo mo ki: A’di miiki’da ris to gwansan ki ’bore/ mo. A’di ḵa’dki wathi/ jin ta’da nap̱e/ ’ce mo mmociḵ gwo mo dhali uni gun mol ’twa/ wal mishki ’twa/ wal mo be.
41008001	Dhali ka tee gwansan ka dhana waambuhany ’kwani tulki is doḵ/e mo dhali uni dar gi tonṯe/ mo mmoshwa mo tani a’di ki yuḵ imanciḵ a’di gwo mo e a’di mo dhali o uni gwo mo ki:
41008002	Aha/ ḵo’ckina adhana waambuhany ’kwanimpa e i is mo haali/ uni ’koni aha/ shwane/ ka cimi kwara mo dhali dar gi tonṯe/ mmoshwa mo be.
41008003	Dhali waḵki/ aha/ mina hash uni bway pa ki ṯe/ mo e bampam buni mo tani uni mina buye/ i’thi mo i bway mo. Haali/ kun tiya iiyin ’peni pa kun si’dasi’d mo be.
41008004	Dhali imanciḵ a’di gwo thoḵki a’di gwo mo ki: Adhana waambuhany ’kwani minu c̱i tonṯe/ mmoshwa e bwam ma si’b imahan ’peni mana mo?
41008005	Dhali a’di ki doṯ uni gwo mo ki: Um ’kona maaŋḵuthu’d ekata mo? Uni ki thoḵ a’di gwo mo ki: Ipesu/ mo be.
41008006	Dhali a’di ki ḵana dhana waambuhany ’kwani gwo mo mmo’ko ’pena ’cesh mo. Dhali a’di ki bu’th maaŋḵuthu’d ipesu/ mo dhali ki a’di c̱iki mo jin ’boruwa ’bor bwa i is mo tani a’di ki ’ce’d uni mo dhali c̱i uni ki imanciḵ a’di gwo mo mmodhu abori ’kwani mo. Dhali uni dhuki uni ibwambor ma waambuhany ’kwani mo be.
41008007	Dhali uni tan gi ushi to yi’de/ idaḵa/ mo. Dhali ki a’di ’borki’da ’bor bwa i is mo tani a’di ḵanki uni gwo mo ki uni gwansan si’da/ minu ’taki dhu ibwambori uni mo be.
41008008	Dhali uni shwaki uni mo dhali uni ’kokunu mo mmokap̱ mo. Dhali uni tulki kuluny maa is kun urki ’kup̱ mo mmo’tu’da nura/ ipesu/ mo be.
41008009	Dhali uni gwansan kun ’kokin mo mmoshwa a’di mo tani wakina e gi ’kwani alaap̱i doŋon mo be.
41008010	Dhali a’di ki hash uni mo dhali ki jahanne/ a’di seki bwam ma ḵur mo nyaḵki imanciḵ a’di gwo mo dhali uni iikin mo e bampa/ gi Pan Dalmanuṯẖa mo be.
41008011	Dhali ’Kwani P̱arisiyiin p̱u’dkini a’di mo dhali ṯelki mii ’pen mo mmogar a’di gwo ’kusi ’twa/ mo mmoŋap̱ jamas mii ’peni a’di ’peni momis mo mmopal a’di mo be.
41008012	Dhali a’di wuki’da shure/ kagahara mo e shi/in piti mo dhali o gwo mo ki: Atinta ŋap̱ ma nyaḵum yil ’kwani gwansan jamas mii mo? Ka jiŋ gana/ aha/ ṯora um gwo mo ki: Jamas miiŋ kamu/ yisa minu c̱i um ’kwani ma nyaḵum yil gwansan mo.
41008013	Dhali a’di ki dhal uni ’pen mo dhali se i bwam ma ḵur doḵ/e mo. A’di ki ’ciṯẖa gap̱ gi ’bana kamu/ mo be.
41008014	Dhali uni ŋaki maaŋḵuthu’d mo mmo’koki guyu/ mo. Dhali uni tan gi jasi jin ṯal ’deŋ gana/ jin takina uni mo e bwam ma ḵur mo.
41008015	Dhali a’di ki rum uni ki gwo mo mmo/o gwo mo ki: ’Cunycuri miim bum ki ’bore/ mo dhali jiyi acumaṯ gi ’Kwani P̱arisiyiin ki e ki ’bore/ mo dhali acumaṯ gi ’Kwani Hirodusiyiin mo.
41008016	Dhali uni su’kkin ki gwo ka rem ’kup̱ mo mmo/o gwo mo ki: Ana dara gi maaŋḵuthu’d mo be.
41008017	Dhala Yesus nyiṯẖki gwom buni mo dhali o uni gwo mo ki: Atinta su’kkina um ki gwo mo gom maaŋḵuthu’d jin p̱iyi’di um kan mo? ’Kona um ki nyiṯẖ mo ’taa? Walla ’kona um ki mish gwo ’ban mo? Adum bum ’bitha’bi’th mo kana?
41008018	Um tan gi e mo dhali ’kona um ki mish mo mo? Dhali um tan gi ’ce mo dhali ’kona um ki ciḵ gwo mowa? Dhali ’kona um ki ka gwo e mowa?
41008019	Ki aha/ ’ce’dkina maaŋḵuthu’di mudhe’d mo gom ’kwani alaap̱i mudhe’d mo dhala nura/ ekata i’tu’dkina um ki kuluny maa kun uri ’kup̱ mo? Uni ki thoḵ a’di gwo mo ki: I’kume’d i’ce’dka su/ mo be.
41008020	Dhali maaŋḵuthu’di pesu/ gom ’kwani alaap̱i doŋon mo tani anura/ ’tu’dkina um ekata ki kuluny maa kun tulkina um is mo? Dhali uni ki thoḵ a’di gwo mo ki: Ipesu/ mo be.
41008021	Dhali a’di ki o uni gwo mo ki: Dhali ’kona um ki mish gwo ’ban naskina/ mowa?
41008022	Dhali uni p̱u’dkini Pam Beeṯsayda mo. Dhali ’kwanin tiya suski wathi/ i a’di mo, a’di jin ta’da ja’da/ mo dhali ŋap̱ a’di mo mmota a’di is ki me’d mo be.
41008023	Dhali a’di ki sus wathi/ jin ta’da ja’da/ ki me’d mo, dhali a’di ki sus a’di ka pije/ ’peni pa mo. Dhali ki a’di ’taḵki manya/ i em piti mo dhali sus a’di ki me’d piti mo tani a’di ki doṯ a’di gwo mo ki: /E mishi toŋ kamu/ p̱ar e mo ’taa?
41008024	Dhali a’di ki hil ’kup̱ ki mis mo dhali o a’di gwo mo ki: Aha/ mishkina ’kwani mo. Hili uni wakina e gi cwa kun iikin mo ’te/.
41008025	Dhali yan’ko’d doḵ/e a’di ki sus a’di ki me’d piti mo dhali kar me’d piti ap̱o/ em piti mo. Dhali a’di hilki’da hil ki dha’k mo dhali wac̱ mo dhali a’di mishki’da ris to ’baar mo eya tente/ mo be.
41008026	Dhala Yesus ki hash a’di bway gu’b piti mo mmo/o gwo mo ki: Dhalku/ ki cic̱ bampa/ mo.
41008027	Dhala Yesus nyaḵ ya ki imanciḵ a’di gwo mo e bampa/ gi Paŋ Kaysariyya mo e Pam P̱ilibbi mo. Dhali e bway tur jin iina uni mo tani a’di ki doṯ imanciḵ a’di gwo gwo mo ki: Ki ’kwani on ki aha/ tana aja mo sa/?
41008028	Dhali kun tiya ki ṯor a’di gwo mo ki: Ka Yohaan jin ta’da manmiiya mii ki yi’de/ mo ti. Dhali kun tiya o ki: Iliyya mo, dhali kun tiya o ki: Jan ṯal ’de/ ’peni imanc̱i gwo ma Arumgimis kadhamo/ mo be.
41008029	Dhali a’di ki thoḵ uni gwo mo ki: Hili idhali um onki aha/ tana aja mo sa/? Buṯerus ki thoḵ a’di gwo mo ki: /E tana Ḵrisṯẖos mo be.
41008030	Dhali a’di ki ḵan uni gwo mo mmodiki ṯor jan ṯal ’deŋ kamu/ gwo gom a’di mo be.
41008031	Dhali a’di ṯelki mii ’pen mo dhali ṯor uni gwo mo ki Ya/ gi ’Kwani mina isi ’kosh ka nyor mo gom to ka ris mo dhali mina ’kwaniŋ gwanyjaḵa/ iwaḵ mo dhali igasiis kun can mo dhali iman’kwar to mo, dhali a’di minu ’kosh jwa mo, dhali ’ko’da cim kwara mo tani a’di midi cuyi mis doḵ/e mo be.
41008032	Dhali a’di o gwo yansan eya thiṯẖin thiṯẖ gana/ mo. Dhala Buṯerus ki bu’th a’di mo dhali ṯel mii ’pen mo mmoḵucur a’di ki gwo mo be.
41008033	Hili a’di ṯu’kki’da bor mo dhali hil imanciḵ a’di gwo mo tani a’di ki ḵucura Buṯerus ki gwo mo dhali o gwo mo ki: Seṯaan, yaku/ i’ko’di aha/ mmun mo ma. Haali e diki di ki ’ban ma Arumgimis mo hili /e din ka ’ban gi ’kwani mo be.
41008034	Dhali a’di ki yuḵ uni i a’di mo awaambuhany ’kwani nyaḵki imanciḵ a’di gwo mo dhali o uni gwo mo ki: Waḵki/ wathiŋ kamu/ midi yayu/ ibaṯẖ aha/ nsho’k mo tani dhalki a’di non is pitiŋ gana/ mo dhali ’de’k cwany’ciṯẖan dhul piti mo dhali baṯẖ aha/ nsho’k mo.
41008035	Haali/ gom a’diyin jin midi ’taki woṯẖ mondiki/em piti mo tani midi this a’di e mo. Dhali a’diyin jin midi this mondiki/em piti e mo gom gway pem mo tani dhali gom gway gi gwom ’borga/ mo tani midi woṯẖ a’di mo be.
41008036	Haali/ gwo gi wakataye jin nyo/a wathi/ mo waḵki/ a’di midi gam to ’baar mo e mony’cesh mo dhali lo’b mondiki/em piti mii nycine/ mo?
41008037	Haali/ wathi/ midi mish wan mondiki/em piti ’ba/ kata mo?
