41008038	Haali/ a’diyin jin mina isi ’theya’the mo gom aha/ mo dhali gom gwom pem mo e bwaman uni gwansan kun tana nyaḵum yil kun ta imanmii miinyc̱al mo dhali imanmii miinthus mo tani Ya/ gi ’Kwani si’da/ a’di mina isi ’theya’the mo gom a’diyin mo ki a’di midi p̱u’du/ mo e monyca gi com mo dhali nyaḵki iman’doyu gwom piti kun ḵogu ilu/ mo be.
41009001	Dhali a’di ki o uni gwo mo ki: Ka jiŋ gana/ aha/ ṯora um gwo mo ki: Kun tiya ’kokin mo mmodoshi mahan mo kun mini ’koki nyoḵ wu mo nṯwa/a/ ki uni ’koki p̱ar Bampa/ ma Arumgimis e mo mmop̱u’du/ ki mom’bi’th mo be.
41009002	Dhali ’ko’da cim pe’de/ mo tani Yesus ki susa Buṯerus nyaḵki a’di mo dhala Yakuub mo dhala Yohaan mo, dhali sus uni bway ’kuwosh jin turatur uni ’cena mo. Dhali a’di ki war is piti ibwambori uni mo be.
41009003	Dhali burrinyem piti c̱a’bki ’be’d ’be’d mo dhali ki bany bany kagahara mo. Toŋ kamu/ yisa di’da e mony’cesh yan jin midi mish dhagam uni ki kush kush kan mo.
41009004	Dhali e mun mo tani Iliyya piki uni i is mo uni ka Musa mo, dhali uni ṯorkina ṯor ka Yesus mo be.
41009005	Dhala Buṯerus ki owa Yesus gwo mo ki: Tap̱a, a’di ’boro’d gom am ki aman ’kona imahan mo. Dhalki aman nyaŋa c̱iŋa/ ikwara mo, jan ṯal ’de/ gom /e mo dhali jan ṯal ’de/ goma Musa mo dhali jan ṯal ’deŋ kamu/ gom Iliyya mo be.
41009006	Haali/ a’di diki mish gwo jin ona a’di mo haali/ uni ḵo/kina ḵo/ is kagahara mo be.
41009007	Dhali araḵ ’kamki uni is mo dhali ’twa/ p̱u’dki’d ’peni bwam ma raḵ yansan mo mmo/o gwo mo ki: Yansan ta Ya/m pem jin enka/ mo. Ciḵi a’di gwo mo ma.
41009008	Dhali ki jahanne/ ki uni hilki mo mo mmo’kar mo ki e mo tani uni yisa mishki wathiŋ kamu/ mo jin nyaḵ di ki uni mo, hili jasa Yesus a’di ’de/ mo be.
41009009	Dhali ki uni ’kokin mo mmothul ka ’cesh mo ’peni ’kuwosh mo tani a’di ki ḵan uni gwo ki ’bi’th mo mmo’koki ṯor wathiŋ kamu/ ṯal ’de/ gwo gom to jin p̱arkina uni e mo ntagi Ya/ gi ’Kwani minu ’de’k mo ’peni mowu mo be.
41009010	Wakan uni dhuki gwo mo mmokulum gwo ibwa mo uni ’cena mo mmodoṯ eya dum buni gom ’pemen gwo jin okina a’di ki a’di midi cuyu mis mo ’peni mowu mo.
41009011	Dhali uni ki doṯ a’di gwo mo ki: Katinta sa/ i/ona iman’kwar to gwo mo ki Iliyya midi mii p̱u’du/ iṯwa/a/ mo?
41009012	Dhali a’di ki thoḵ uni gwo mo ki: Iliyya p̱u’dki’di ṯwa/a/a mo dhali ṯela ris to ’baar mo sho’k ka nyaŋ’ko’d mo. Dhali ba ki gwo ’kwaru kataye ki Ya/ gi ’Kwani mina isi ’taki ’kosh ka nyor ki nyanye/ mo gom miin tiya ka ris mo dhali minu mii ka jin thus mo dhali minu waḵ mo be.
41009013	Hili aha/ ṯora um gwo mo ki Iliyya p̱u’dki’d mo dhali uni miiki a’diyin jin ’bori uni bwa mo me’d gwo jin ’kwarkunu mo gom a’di mo be.
41009014	Dhali ki uni p̱u’dkin mo e imanciḵ a’di gwo mo tani uni p̱arkina dhana buhany wathimpa e mo kun ’kamki a’di mo dhali iman’kwar to garki uni gwo ’kusi ’twa/ mo.
41009015	Dhali ki jahanne/ adhana buhany wathimpa ki uni p̱arki a’di e mo tani uni ’kokini momer kagahara mo dhali uni sokin ’kup̱ ki a’di mo dhali the a’di me’d mo be.
41009016	Dhali a’di ki doṯ uni gwo mo ki: Gwonta su’kkina um nyaḵki uni mo?
41009017	Dhali jan ṯal ’de/ ’pena buhany wathimpa thoḵki a’di gwo mo ki: Manṯor Gwo, aha/ suskina ya/m pem i /e mo haali/ a’di bu’thkin ma rum thus jin nyo/o’d jin mol a’di ’twa/ wal mo.
41009018	Dhali ki a’di bu’thki a’di mo tani a’di torki a’di ’ko’da ’cesh mo, dhali a’di shwaki’da gabusha/ mo dhali rem shem piti ’kup̱ mo dhali a’di p̱eshki’d mo. Dhali aha/ doṯkina imanciḵ /e gwo gwo mo mmo/ur a’di ka pije/ mo tani dhali uni molki a’di mii mo be.
41009019	Dhali a’di ki thoḵ uni gwo mo ki: Ayy, um ’kwani kun tana nyaḵum yil kun aṯẖa moŋgam gwo is ki aṯẖ mo. Ki aha/ mina di i um ki mo gi wakata mo? Dhali ki mo gi wakata imiga/ i’dim ’kup̱ e um mo sa/? Susi a’di i aha/ mo ma.
41009020	Dhali uni ki susa ’ci i a’di mo. Dhali ka rum thus jin nyo/o’d p̱arki a’di e mo tani dhali ki jahanne/ a’di ki tora ’ci ’ko’da ’cesh mo dhali a’di ki biṯa ’cesh mo dhali ’daŋkal ka gabusha/ i’twa/ mo be.
41009021	Dhala Yesus ki doṯ com gwo mo ki: Kakasja sa/ imiikina a’di mii gi wakan mo? Dhali a’di ki thoḵ a’di gwo mo ki: ’Pena cim jin tana a’di a’ci mo be.
41009022	Dhali me’d ka ris a’di ki biṯ a’di e bwam o’d mo dhali e bwam yi’de/ mo mmo’ce’d a’di sho’k mo tani hili waḵki e mini mish toŋ kamu/ mii mo mmomina /e hila ha’th’ko’d bam mo dhali woṯẖ am mo.
41009023	Dhala Yesus ki o a’di gwo mo ki: Waḵki e ona bwa mo tani aris to mishu mii mo gom a’di jin gamki gwo is mo be.
41009024	Dhali ki jahanne/ com ma ’ci gwoki’d ki jabu’th mo dhali o gwo mo ki: Aha/ gamkina gwo is mo. Woṯẖi/ aha/ mo mmodika/ ki dar gi gwo jin gamu is mo.
41009025	Dhali ka Yesus mishki’da dhana buhany wathimpa p̱u’dkin mo mmosoyu/ mo mmonṯal ’de/ mo tani a’di ḵucurki’da rum thus jin nyo/o’d ki gwo mo mmo/o a’di gwo mo ki: /E jin noni wathi/ ’twa/ wal mo dhali /e jin ta wathi/ ’ceya ’diye/ mo, dhali /e jin tana arum jin nyo/o’d mo tani aha/ ḵankina /e gwo mo ki: Piyi ka pije/ ’peni a’di mo dhali dhalku/ ki se i a’di ki sule/ sule/ mo doḵ/e.
41009026	Dhali ’ko’di cuuwam piti jin cuukina a’di mo tani a’di ki tor a’di ’ko’da ’cesh ki tor jin shiyi’d mo dhali a’di ki pi ka pije/ mo. Dhala ’ci a’di wakina e gi wathi/ jin wuki’d mo. Wakan aris uni ’baar mo oki gwo mo ki: A’di wuki’d mo be.
41009027	Hila Yesus bu’th a’di ki me’d mo dhali ’de’k a’di ki mis mo. Dhali a’di cuki mis mo be.
41009028	Dhali ki a’di cic̱ki bwaŋ gu’b mo tani imanciḵ a’di gwo doṯki a’di gwo mo ka ḵwal is mo mmo/o gwo mo ki: Atinta gara/ i’kona aman ki mish a’di ur ka pije/ mo?
41009029	Dhali a’di ki thoḵ uni gwo mo ki: Ji gi wakansan minu ’koki mish ur ka pije/ ki miiŋ kamu/ mo ba/, hili ki mon’tho mo be.
41009030	Dhali uni iikin ’peni mun mo dhali ii ki tur mo e Pany Jaliil mo. Dhali a’di diki dhal wathin ṯal ’deŋ kamu/ bway mo mmomish a’di mo be.
41009031	Haali/ a’di ṯorki imanciḵ a’di gwo gwo mo mmo/o uni gwo mo ki: Ya/ gi ’Kwani minu c̱i e me’d gi ’kwanin thus mo, dhali uni mini ’kosh a’di jwa mo. Dhali ki a’di minu ’kosh jwa mo tani ’ko’da cim kwara mo tani a’di midi cuyi mis mo be.
41009032	Hili uni ’koki mish gwo ’ban jin ona a’di mo dhali uni ḵo/ki is mo mmodoṯ a’di mo be.
41009033	Dhali uni p̱u’dkin mo e Paŋ Kap̱ranahuum mo. Dhali ki a’di diki’d e bwaŋ gu’b mo tani a’di ki doṯ uni gwo mo ki: Gwonta sa/ isu’kkina um mmo/iiyina um ibway mo?
41009034	Hili uni ’kokin ki shwam mo haali/ e bway jin iiyina uni mo tani uni su’kkin ki gwo ka rem ’kup̱ mo gom gwo gi a’di jin caki’d mo be.
41009035	Dhali a’di c̱a’bki’da ’cesh mo dhali yuḵ uniŋ ’kume’d i’ce’dka su/ mo, dhali a’di ki o uni gwo mo ki: Waḵki/ wathin ṯal ’de/ jin ona bwa ki ta jin ṯwa/a/ mo tani a’di midi mii ta jiŋ ’ko’d mo dhali ta amanmii to gom tiya ’baar mo be.
41009036	Dhali a’di ki budha ’ci mo dhali kar a’di ibwaman uni mo. Dhali mmokara a’di a’di ’ko’da bim piti mo tani a’di ki o uni gwo mo ki:
41009037	A’diyin jin midi budha ’ci gi wakansan ki gway pem mo tani a’di bu’thki aha/ mo, dhali a’diyin jin midi bu’th aha/ mo tani a’di diki bu’th aha/ jasi ’te/ mo, hili a’di bu’thki a’di jin ṯu’cki aha/ ki yayu/ mo be.
41009038	Yohaan ki o a’di gwo mo ki: Amanṯor Gwo, aman mishkina wathiŋ kamu/ jin urki’da rum thus ka pije/ ki gway pini mo dhali a’di diki baṯẖ ana nsho’k mo, dhali aman nonkina a’di mo haali/ a’di diki ta amanbaṯẖ ana nsho’k mo be.
41009039	Hila Yesus ki o gwo mo ki: Dhalki a’di ki non mo ma haali/ a’di jin midi miiya ṯu’c jin eḵa/ eḵ ki gway pem mo tani a’di midi diki mish mmo/o gwon thus ap̱o/ aha/ mo ki jahanne/ ŋ’ko’d mo.
41009040	Haali/ a’di jin diki se ana shoka p̱o/ mo tani a’di ta a’di gom ana mo be.
41009041	Haali/ ka jiŋ gana/ aha/ ṯora um gwo mo ki: A’diyin jin midi c̱i um yi’de/ ki ’kwa mmop̱i mo haali/ um yuḵu ki gway ma Ḵrisṯẖos mo tani a’di yisa midi this tom piti jin ish ḵumma/ e mo.
41009042	A’diyin jin midi raḵ jan ṯal ’de/ ’peni uni gwansan kun gwa’dan kun gam gwo is e aha/ mo mmomii miinthus mo tani a’di midi ’taki ’bor ki ’bor gana/ mo waḵka dhana yo minu deḵ a’di i’bam piti mo dhali a’di minu biṯ mo e ḵumma/ yi’de/ mo.
41009043	Dhali waḵki/ me’d pini raḵ /e mo mmomii miinthus mo mmokol mo tani ’ciṯẖi/ a’di mo ma. A’di ’boro’d ki ’bor gana/ mo gom /e mo mmocic̱ mondiki/e ki ŋul mo ki /e mini ’taki diki ya e mo ma al o’d ki me’d su/ mo be, e mo jin mola o’d us mo.
41009044	E mun mo tani ayish buni ’koki wu mo dhali o’d si’da/ diki us mo be.
41009045	Dhali waḵki/ sho’k pini raḵ /e mo mmomii miinthus mo mmokol mo tani ’ciṯẖi/ a’di mo ma. A’di ’boro’d ki ’bor gana/ mo gom /e mo mmocic̱ mondiki/e ki ŋwol mo ki /e minu i’taki ’koki biṯ ki sho’k su/ e mo ma al o’d mo be.
41009046	E mun mo tani ayish buni ’koki wu mo dhali o’d si’da/ diki us mo be.
41009047	Dhali waḵki/ em pini raḵ /e mo mmomii miinthus mo mmokol mo tani buḵi a’di ka pije/ mo. A’di ’boro’d ki ’bor gana/ mo gom /e mo mmocic̱ Bampa/ ma Arumgimis ki en ṯal ’de/ mo ki /e minu i’taki ’koki biṯ ki e su/ mo e mo ma al o’d mo.
41009048	E mun mo tani ayish buni ’koki wu mo dhali o’d si’da/ diki us mo be.
41009049	Haali/ aris ’kwani ’baar mo ka ’deṯe/ ’deṯe/ mo tani uni minu imii ka ’doŋkoro/ ki mo/o’d mo be.
41009050	A’doŋkoro/ a’di ’bora’bor mo. Hili waḵka ’doŋkoro/ a’di ki this mom’bala’th piti e mo tani um mini gam mon’daŋkari’th gom a’di mmana? Tayi ka ’doŋkoro/ e is bum mo ma dhali tayi ki moŋḵu’th is ka rem ’kup̱ mo ma.
41010001	Dhali a’di dhalki mo yan ’pen mo dhali yaki’d mo e Bampa/ gi Pa Yahuudiyya mo dhali e bwamp̱o/ Yi’deŋ Ḵumma/ Uurdun mo, dhala dhana buhany wathimpa thulki is i a’di mo doḵ/e. Dhali doḵ/e me’d miim piti jin miina a’di isa yempa/ mo tani a’di ki ṯor uni gwo mo be.
41010002	Dhali ’Kwani P̱arisiyiin p̱u’dkin mo mmoŋap̱ bway mo mmopal a’di ki gwondoṯ mo mmo/o gwo mo ki: A’di ta gwoŋḵan jin dhala’da dhal bway mo ’taa? gom wathi/ mmothoson gwo jin dhaluwa dhal ’pen mo mmodhal ash ’pen mo?
41010003	A’di ki thoḵ uni gwo mo ki: Gwo gi wakatinta iḵankin ma Musa um mo?
41010004	Uni thoḵki a’di gwo mo ki: AMusa a’di dhalki wathi/ bway mo mmo’kwara warka/ jin dhaluwa dhal ’pen mo dhali kara yim ’pen ka pije/ mo be.
41010005	Hila Yesus ki o uni gwo mo ki: Haali/ goma dum bum kun ’bitha’bi’th kan mo tani a’di ’kwarki um gwoŋḵan gi wakansan mo be.
41010006	Hili ’peni ka muŋ’kup̱ jin uḵu to mo tani Arumgimis ki uḵ wathiŋ gwaṯẖ mo dhali wathim ’bomi mo be.
41010007	Gom ’kup̱ gwo gi wakan mo tani a’di imina wathi/ idhal com ’pen mo dhali kum mo dhali gam is ki ashim piti mo be.
41010008	Dhali uni su/ mina buŋgwar isi ṯal ’de/ mo be. Wakan uni doḵ/e yisa i’koni su/ doḵ/e yisa, hili uni ṯala buŋgwar isa ’de/ mo be.
41010009	Gom mii gi wakan mo tani uni gun gam ma Arumgimis isi monṯal ’de/ mo tani dhalku/ ki dhal wathiŋ kamu/ bway mo mmoḵwa/ uni bwa mo.
41010010	Dhali e bwaŋ gu’b mo tani imanciḵ a’di gwo doṯki a’di gwo mo gom gwo yansan doḵ/e mo.
41010011	Dhali a’di ki o uni gwo mo ki: A’diyin jin midi dhal ashim piti ’pen mo dhali mash jaŋ kamu/ mo tani a’di miiki miinyc̱al ap̱owa yim mo be.
41010012	Dhali waḵka yim si’da/ dhala’da kaṯẖim piti ’pen mo dhali mashi jaŋ kamu/ mo tani ayim si’da/ miiki miinyc̱al mo be.
41010013	Dhali uni ’kokin mo mmosusi uc̱i i a’di mo ki a’di midi ’taki ta uni is ki me’d mo. Dhali imanciḵ a’di gwo ḵucurki uni ki gwo mo be.
41010014	Hili ka Yesus mishki mii yan mo tani a’di deḵkin ma nyor mo dhali o uni gwo mo ki: Dhalki uc̱i iiyini aha/ mo ma. Dhalki uni ki non mo. Haali/ ku gi wakansan mo tani uni ’kokin mo e Bampa/ ma Arumgimis mo be.
41010015	Ka jiŋ gana/ aha/ ṯora um gwo mo ki a’diyin jin midi diki bu’th Bampa/ ma Arumgimis mo mmowa e ka ’ci yan mo tani a’di midi diki se a’di mo be.
41010016	Dhali a’di ki sus uni mo mmodhu ’ko’da bim piti mo dhali a’di ki ’bor uni mii mo mmokarkina a’di me’d piti ap̱o/ uni mo be.
41010017	Dhali mmomurkina a’di mmoya mo e bway piti mo tani wathin ṯal ’deŋ kamu/ guski’d mo dhali c̱a’bki jiŋ ’kup̱a’dup̱uni bwambori a’di mo dhali o a’di gwo mo ki: Amanṯor Gwo jin ’boro’d mo, ki aha/ mina mii miiya taye mmogam mal gi mondiki/e ki sule/ ya ye ’ba/ mo?
41010018	Dhala Yesus ki thoḵ a’di gwo mo ki: Atinta yuḵa /e aha/ ki jin ’boro’d mo? Jan ṯal ’deŋ kamu/ yisa di’da jin ’boro’d mo, hili jasa Arumgimis a’di ’de/ mo be.
41010019	/E mishki gwoŋḵan kun ’kwarkunu mo ’taa? kun o gwo mo ki: Dhalka ’kosh ki mii ’kosh mo, dhali, Dhalki c̱al ki mii mii mo, dhali, Dhalku/ to ki mii ḵwal mo. dhali, Dhalki gwon thus ki mii aḵ wathiŋ kamu/ i is mo, dhali, Dhalki to ki mii dil mo, dhali, Taḵi cim dhali kwan mo?
41010020	A’di ki thoḵ a’di gwo mo ki: Amanṯor Gwowa, aris to gwansani ’baar mo miikika/ mo ki aha/ tana dhuru’c mo be.
41010021	Dhala Yesus ki hil a’di ki e mo dhali en a’di mo dhali o a’di gwo mo ki: Ton ṯal ’de/ aṯẖa /e mo be. Yaku/ mo dhali yol aris tom pini ’baar mo kun tana /e mo dhali c̱iki uni ki ’kwani kun hatha’ko’d mo, dhali /e mini ta gi to kun mini ish ḵumma/ mo e momis mo, dhali yayu/ mo ma, mmobaṯẖ aha/ nsho’k mo.
41010022	Gom gwo jin onu a’di kan mo tani a’di ki biṯ a’di bwa ka luŋgu’b mo dhali a’di ki ya bway pa mo ki bwa jin diṯadiṯ mo, haali/ a’di ta’d gi dhan to kun eḵa ’pen ki eḵ mo be.
41010023	Dhala Yesus ki hil mo mo dhali ’kar mo ki e mo dhali o imanciḵ a’di gwo gwo mo ki: Mii wa’di diṯa/ gom uni gwansan kun ta pa ki pa mo mmocic̱ Bampa/ ma Arumgimis mo be.
41010024	Dhali imanciḵ a’di gwo merkin gom gwom piti yansan mo be. Hila Yesus ki o uni gwo mo doḵ/e ki: Uc̱iya, a’di wana mii diṯa/ gom uni gun gamki gwo is gom pam buni kun tana uni mo mmocic̱ Bampa/ ma Arumgimis mo.
41010025	A’di ’disha mii ki ’dish gom kalman mo mmoya ki solol e jis ma ’dip̱ira/ mo mmodhal wathimpa e i is mo, a’di jin ta pa ki pa mo mmocic̱ Bampa/ ma Arumgimis mo be.
41010026	Dhali uni ’kokin mo mmomer mo ka daran duŋ gana/ mo dhali o gwo ka rem ’kup̱ mo ki: Ba waḵki/ wakan mo tani ija a’di iminu iwoṯẖ moyi?
41010027	Yesus ki hil uni mo dhali o uni gwo mo ki: Ki ’kwani mo tani a’di molu mii mo, hili ka Arumgimis mo tani aris to ’baar mo mishu mii ka Arumgimis mo be.
41010028	Hila Buṯerus ṯelki mii ’pen mo mmo/o a’di gwo mo ki: Hili, aman dhalkina aris to ’peni ’baar mo dhali baṯẖ /e nsho’k mo be.
41010029	Yesus ki o uni gwo mo ki: Ka jiŋ gana/ aha/ ona um gwo mo ki: wathiŋ kamu/ yisa di’da jin dhalki gu’b piti ’pen mo walla ikam piti mo walla i’bwah piti mo walla kum mo walla com mo walla uc̱i mo walla mo mo gom gway pem mo dhali gom gway gi gwom ’borga/ mo tani
41010030	a’di jin midi diki bu’th to ki me’d iss ’kwanimpa ka mudhe’d mo shwane/ mo ki mo yansan mo, gu’b mina a’di gam mo dhali ikam piti mo dhali i’bwaham piti mo dhali ikum mo dhali uc̱i mo dhali mo mo nyaḵki to kun mini ṯo’c a’di ’kus mo, dhali ki she yil yan jin midi p̱u’du/ mo tani a’di midi gam mondiki/e ki sule/ sule/ ya ye ’ba/ mo be.
41010031	Hili aris uni gun ’koni ṯwa/a/ mo tani uni minu dhu ŋ’ko’d mo dhali uni gun ’koni ’ko’d mo tani uni minu dhu iṯwa/a/ mo be.
41010032	Dhali uni ’kokin mo mmo/ii i bway mo mmo/ii ka gagamis mo e Pa Urushaliim mo dhala Yesus yaki’di shu uni bway mo. Dhali uni ’kokin mo mmomer mo dhali uni gwansan kun baṯẖki a’di nsho’k mo tani ḵo/ki is mo. Dhali a’di ki sus uni gun ’koni ’kume’d i’ce’dka su/ mo doḵ/e dhali a’di ki ṯel mii ’pen mo dhali ṯor uni gwo mo gom to gun minu mii a’di mo be,
41010033	mmo/o gwo mo ki: Hili mo mo ma, ana iina ka gagamis mo e Pa Urushaliim mo, dhali Ya/ gi ’Kwani minu c̱i mo e igasiis kun can mo dhali iman’kwar to mo, dhali uni mini waḵ a’di mo mmo’kosh a’di jwa mo, dhali a’di minu c̱iki ’kwani kun ’koki ta ’Kwani Yahuuda/ ime’d mo be.
41010034	Dhali uni mini mii a’di ka maḵ mo dhali ’taḵ a’di manya/ i is mo dhali dor a’di mo dhali ’kosh a’di jwa mo. Dhali ’ko’da cim kwara mo tani a’di midi piyu/ ka pije/ mo be.
41010035	Dhala Yakuub dhala Yohaan uni gun ta iya/ ma Sabadi mo tani p̱u’dkin kadhoŋ ’kup̱ ki a’di mo dhali o a’di gwo mo ki: Amanṯor Gwo, aman ona bwa ki /e mini dhal aman bway mo gom to jin mina amani doṯ ’peni /e mo be.
41010036	Dhala Yesus ki o uni gwo mo ki: Atinta o um bwa mo jin miga/ mii gom um mo?
41010037	Dhali uni ki thoḵ a’di gwo mo ki: Dhas am bway mo ma mmo’ko mo. Jan ’de/ midi c̱a’b /e ki me’da bim poros pini mo dhali jan ’de/ midi c̱a’b /e ki me’da biny cam pini mo e monycam pini mo be.
41010038	Hila Yesus ki o uni gwo mo ki: Um ’koki mish to jin doṯa um mo. A/um mini p̱iya ḵubbaaya jin p̱ikika/ mo walla a/um minu cuc̱ mo ki mii jin miinuwa mii ki yi’de/ mo jin miikunu aha/ mo?
41010039	Dhali uni ki thoḵ a’di gwo mo ki: Aman mina mish mii mo be. Dhala Yesus ki o uni gwo mo ki: Aḵubbaaya jin p̱ika/ mo tani mina umi p̱i mo dhali mo jin miinu aha/ amii ki yi’de/ mo tani a’di imiinu mii um si’da/ mo be.
41010040	Hili mmo’ko aha/ ki me’da bim poros pem mo walla ki me’da biny cam pem mo tani a’di diki ta miim pem mo mmodhas um bway mo, hili a’di gom uni gwansan kun thosonkunu uni mo be.
41010041	Dhali ki uni gun ’koni ’kume’d ciḵki gwo yansan mo tani uni ṯelki mii ’pen mo mmodeḵa nyor mo goma Yakuub mo dhala Yohaan mo be.
41010042	Dhala Yesus ki yuḵ uni mo i a’di mo dhali o uni gwo mo ki: Um mishki gwo mo gom uni gwansan kun o ki ta tap̱a ap̱o/ ’kwani kun ’koki ta ’Kwani Yahuuda/ mo tani uni mii miin tap̱a ap̱o/ uni mo dhali ’kwanim buni gun eḵa/ eḵ kun ta gi moshirr mo ap̱o/ uni mo be.
41010043	Hili mii yansan minu ’koki mii wakan ap̱o/ um mo. Hili a’diyin jin midi eḵa/ eḵ mo e bwam um mo tani a’di midi mii ta a’di jin midi mii um to mo be.
41010044	Haali/ a’diyin jin midi mii ta jin ṯwa/a/ mbwaman um mo tani a’di midi mii ta c̱iŋkina/ gom umi ’baar mo be.
41010045	Haali/ Ya/ gi ’Kwani si’da/ p̱u’dki’d mo yisa ki a’di minu mii to mo, hili ki a’di midi mii ’kwani to mo dhali c̱i mondiki/em piti mo mmota Amanwan ’Kwani ’Ba/ ka ris mo be.
41010046	Dhali uni p̱u’dkin mo e Pa Ariiha mo. Dhali ki a’di di’d mmodhal Pa Ariiha ’pen mo nyaḵki imanciḵ a’di gwo mo tani adhana waambuhany wathimpa caaca kagahara mo. Dhali wathiny ja’daŋ kamu/ diki’d jin yuḵkunu gway ka Barṯimawuus mo jin ta’da man’tho to mo, a’di jin ta ya/ ma Ṯimawuus mo, a’di c̱a’bki’d mo e shemen bway isa yempa/ mo.
41010047	Dhali ki a’di ciḵki gwo goma Yesus ki Pa Naasira mo tani a’di ṯelki mii ’pen mo mmocuu gwo ki dhan ’twa/ jin caaca mo dhali o gwo mo ki: Yesus, jin ta Ya/ ma Dawuu’d. Miiyi mii ap̱o/ aha/ mo ma.
41010048	Dhali ’kwani ka ris ḵucurki a’di ki gwo mo mmoṯor a’di gwo mo mmoc̱a’b ki shwam mo. Hili a’di cuuki’d kagahara ki nyanye/ ki nyanye/ mo ki: Ya/ ma Dawuu’d. Miiyi mii ap̱o/ aha/ mo ma.
41010049	Dhala Yesus doshki’d mo dhali o gwo mo ki: Yuḵi a’di mo ma. Dhali uni ki yuḵi wathiny ja’da/ mo dhali o a’di gwo mo ki: Budhi adu mo ma. Cuyi mis mo. A’di yuḵki /e mo be.
41010050	Dhali a’di biṯki burrinye/ ma p̱om piti a’cesh mo dhali a’di ki p̱e imis mo dhali ya aYesus mo.
41010051	Dhala Yesus ki o a’di gwo mo ki: Ata o /e bwa jin miga/ mii gom /e mo. Dhali wathiny ja’da/ ki o a’di gwo mo ki: Tap̱a, dhalki aha/ butha momish mom pem mo ma.
41010052	Dhala Yesus ki o a’di gwo mo ki: Yaku/ i bway pini mo. Moŋgam gwo is pini a’di woṯẖki /e mo. Dhali ki jahanne/ a’di ki bu’th momish mo mo dhali baṯẖ a’di nsho’k ibway mo be.
41011001	Dhali ki uni ’dishki Pa Urushaliim is mo e Pam Beeṯp̱aji mo dhali e Pam Beeṯaniya mo e ’Kuwosh Seṯuun mo tani a’di ki hash imanciḵ a’di gwo isu/ mo be
41011002	dhali o uni gwo mo ki: Iiku/ i bampa/ jin di’d ka p̱ar ’twa/ i um mo, dhali ki jahanne/ ki um mini cic̱ a’di mo tani um mini gam ari thuluny jin shi’du/ mo. A’di yisa merkina wathiŋ kamu/ ap̱owa. ’Cuḵi a’di mo dhali guyu/ a’di mo.
41011003	Waḵki/ wathin ’deŋ kamu/ midi o um gwo mo ki: Atinta mina um kan mo tani ṯori a’di gwo mo ki: Tap̱a a’di midi mii ta gi a’di mo dhali midi hashu/ a’di ka nyaŋ’ko’d ki jahanne/ mo imahan mo.
41011004	Dhali uni iikin mo dhali gam ari thuluny jin shi’dkunu mo e ’twaŋkal bway tura beega/ mo. Dhali uni ’cuḵki a’di mo be.
41011005	Dhali uni gwansan kun doshkin mo tani o uni gwo mo ki: Atinta imina um kan mo sa/? Um ’cuḵi ari thuluny gomata?
41011006	Dhali uni ki ṯor uni gwo mo gom gwo jin okin ma Yesus mo, dhali uni ki dhal uni bway mo mmo/ii mo be.
41011007	Dhali uni ki susi ari thulunya Yesus mo dhali uni ki p̱a’d burrinyem buni ap̱o/ a’di mo dhali a’di ki mer a’di ap̱o/ mo be.
41011008	Dhali ’kwani ka ris uni p̱a’dki burrinyem buni e bway tur mo be. Dhali kun tiya p̱a’dkina biny cwa kun ḵwa/kina uni ’peni bwam bunto mo be.
41011009	Dhali uni gwansan kun iikini ṯwa/a/ mo dhali uni gwansan kun baṯẖki uni nsho’k mo tani uni ḵumki cuuwa/ mo ki ’twa/ kun caaca mo ki: Hosanna. Mom’bor mii midi di mo gom a’di jin p̱u’dki’d ki gway gi Tap̱a mo be.
41011010	Mom’bor mii midi di mo gom Bampa/ ma ababam bana ka Dawuu’d a’di jin p̱u’dki’d mo. Hosanna jin di’di mis mo.
41011011	Dhali a’di cic̱ki’d mo e Pa Urushaliim mo dhali a’di seki gu’b gi mondheleladhelel mo be. Dhali ki a’di hilki mo mo dhali ’kara ris to ’baar mo ki e mo tani dhali ŋ’ko’d a’di ki doḵ Pam Beeṯaniya nyaḵki uni gun ’koni ’kume’d i’ce’dka su/ mo haala tente/ yulu’d mo be.
41011012	Dhali ka cim jin baṯẖa’di ’ko’d mo tani ki uni p̱u’dkin mo e Pam Beeṯaniya mo tani a’di ’koshkina ṯe/ mo be.
41011013	Dhali a’di mishki’da p̱u/ ’pena dhana/ mo jin lu/u’d mo. A’di ki ya mo mmop̱ar e mo waḵki/ a’di midi ’taki gam maman ’peni a’di mo. Ki a’di p̱u’dki’di a’di mo tani a’di diki gam toŋ kamu/ mo hili jasi ’cemen gana/ mo haali/ a’di diki ta yil ma p̱u/ mmodho’th mo be.
41011014	Dhali a’di ki o a’di gwo mo ki: Wathin ṯal ’deŋ kamu/ midi diki shwa maman ’peni /e doḵ/e mo ki sule/. Dhali imanciḵ a’di gwo ciḵki gwo yansan mo be.
41011015	Dhali uni p̱u’dkin mo e Pa Urushaliim mo. Dhali ki a’di cic̱ki gu’b gi mondheleladhelel mo tani dhali a’di ṯelki mii ’pen mo mmo/ur uni gwansan ka pije/ kun yoli to mo, dhali uni gwansan kun yolki to mo e gu’b gi mondheleladhelel mo. Dhali a’di ki kuma tharabeesa ’twa/ a’cesh mo gun ta ku gi uni gwansan kun wanki emena guurush mo dhali a’di ki kum to ’twa/ a’cesh mo kun ’kona imanyol gurko/ mo be.
41011016	Dhali a’di diki dhal uni bway mo mmo’do ton tiya mmo’ciṯẖ ki tur mo e gu’b gi mondheleladhelel mo be.
41011017	Dhali a’di ṯorki gwo mo dhali o uni gwo mo ki: A’di diki ta gwo jin ’kwarkunu mo ’taa? ki: Gu’b pem minu yuḵ ki gu’b jin minu ’tho goma ris kal gi ’kwaniny’ceshi ’baar mo? Hili um ki mii a’di me’d gu’b gi ’kwani kun ta imandil to mo be.
41011018	Dhali igasiis kun can dhali iman’kwar to mo uni ciḵki gwo yan mo dhali uni ŋap̱ki bway mo mmo’ce’d a’di sho’k mo haali/ uni ḵo/ki a’di mo haali/ awaambuhany ’kwani caaca kagahara mo merkin mo gom gwom piti jin ṯorkina a’di mo be.
41011019	Dhali ki mom’pimpili/ p̱u’dki’d mo tani a’di dhali imanciḵ a’di gwo uni iikin ka pije/ mo ’peni ’peŋkuman bampa/ mo.
41011020	Me’d jin iikina uni ki iimpe mo mon’thamo/ mo tani uni p̱arkina p̱u/ e mo mmoḵu’thkina a’di hila/ ka birman ilu/ mo be.
41011021	Dhala Buṯerus kakina gwo e mo dhali o a’di gwo mo ki: Tap̱a. Hila p̱u/ mo ma, a’di jin jeekina /e mo tani a’di ḵu’thki’d mo be.
41011022	Dhala Yesus ki thoḵ uni gwo mo ki: Tayi gi moŋgam gwo is mo eya Arumgimis mo.
41011023	Ka jiŋ gana/ aha/ ona um gwo mo ki: A’diyin jin midi o wosh yansan gwo mo ki: Dhalki a’di gunu mo dhali biṯ mo e bwaŋ ḵumma/ yi’de/ mo dhali diki ta ga du jin shi/i gwo ’kup̱ mo tani, hili a’di gamki gwo is gom a’di jin okina a’di mo tani ki a’di midi p̱u’d mo tani a’di minu mii gom a’di mo be.
41011024	Wakan aha/ ṯora um gwo mo ki a’diyin jin mina umi doṯ ki mon’tho mo tani gami gwo is mo ma, ki a’di mina umi bu’th mo dhali um mini bu’th a’di mo be.
41011025	Dhali ma mo yin jin mina umi dosh mo mmo’tho mo tani dhalki a’di ’pen mo waḵki/ um ta gi gwo jin ona um is ap̱o/ cin tiya mo tani wakan si’da/ Ababam bum jin di’d e momis mo midi dhal um gwon dhaŋ bum ’pen mo be.
41011026	Hili waḵki/ um ’koki dhal ’kwani amure/ miinthus buni ’pen mo tani wakan si’da/ Ababam bum jin di’d e momis mo midi diki dhal um amure/ miinthus gi gwon dhaŋ bum ’pen mo be.
41011027	Dhali uni p̱u’dkin doḵ/e mo e Pa Urushaliim mo. Dhali ki a’di diki’d mmoya e gu’b gi mondheleladhelel mo tani igasiis kun can dhali iman’kwar to mo dhali ’kwaniŋ gwanyjaḵa/ mo uni pu’dkini a’di mo be.
41011028	Dhali uni ki o a’di gwo mo ki: Ki moshirr jana sa/ imiikina /e aris to gwansani ’baar mo, walla kaja ic̱iki /e moshirr yansan mo mmomii uni mo?
41011029	Yesus ki thoḵ uni gwo mo ki: Aha/ si’da/ mina doṯ um gwondoṯ mo. Thoḵi aha/ gwo mo ma dhali aha/ mina ṯor um a’di jin c̱iki aha/ moshirr mmomii aris to gwansan mo be.
41011030	Mo jin miin ma Yohaana mii ki yi’de/ mo tani, a’di ’peni momis mo ’taa? walla ’peni ’kwani mo? Thoḵ aha/ gwo mo ma.
41011031	Dhali uni garki gwo ’kusi ’twa/ ka rem ’kup̱ mo mmo/o gwo mo ki: Waḵki/ aman mina o gwo mo ki: ’Peni momis mo tani, a’di midi o am gwo mo ki: Batinta ’kona um ki gam a’di gwo is mo?
41011032	Hili waḵki/ aman mina o ki: ’Peni ’kwani mo tani uni ḵo/ki ’kwani mo haali/ aris ’kwani ’baar mo karkina Yohaan ka manc̱i gwo ma Arumgimis gana/ mo be.
41011033	Wakan uni thoḵkina Yesus gwo mo ki: Aman ’konaki mish mo mo. Dhala Yesus ki o uni gwo mo ki: Wakan si’da/ aha/ mina diki ṯor um gwo mo gom a’di jin c̱iki aha/ moshirr mo mmomii to gwansan mo be.
41012001	Dhali a’di ṯelki mii ’pen mo mmoṯor uni gwo mo ki gwom ’bi’th/e mo mmo/o gwo mo ki: Wathi/ diki’d mo jin siki’da mura’th mo dhali a’di ki nyaŋa goŋ mo mmo’kam a’di is mo dhali a’di ki c̱wany jis gom yimana mura’th mo dhali a’di ki nyaŋ ’kuḵuma/ isi mis mo, dhali a’di ki dhal a’di e imanmii to ka guurush mo dhali a’di ki ya bampaŋ kamu/ jin si’dasi’d mo be.
41012002	Dhali ki mo p̱u’dki’d mo tani a’di ki hash c̱iŋkinaŋ kamu/ e imanmii to ka guurush mo mmo’taki ḵali maman cwan tiya ’peni monsinu mo be.
41012003	Dhali uni bu’thki a’di mo dhali dor a’di mo dhali uni ki hash a’di me’d ’te/ mo be.
41012004	Doḵ/e a’di ki hash ki uni c̱iŋkinaŋ kamu/ i uni mo dhali uni waki a’di ’kup̱ ki jama/ mo dhali uni ki mii a’di ka jin thus ki mon’the is mo be.
41012005	Dhali a’di ki hashki uni jaŋ kamu/ mo dhali a’di si’da/ ’koshkina uni jwa mo. Dhali wakan si’da/ kun tiya ka ris ’koshkina uni mo dhali kun tiya dorkina uni mo dhali kun tiya ’koshkina uni jwa mo be.
41012006	A’di ta’d gi jasi jin ṯal ’deŋ gana/ mo jin di’di a’di mo, a’di jin ta ya/m piti jin ena a’di ki en gana/ mo. Ŋ’ko’d a’di ki uṯẖki uni ya/m piti mo mmohashki a’di e uni mo mmo/o gwo mo ki: Uni mini taḵ ya/m pem mo be.
41012007	Hili uni gwansan kun miiki to ka guurush mo o gwo mo ka rem ’kup̱ mo ki: Amanḵal mala c̱aan p̱u’dki’d mo. Dhalki ana ’kosha a’di jwa mo dhali mal midi ta jim bana mo be.
41012008	Dhali uni bu’thki a’di mo dhali ’kosh a’di mo dhali kar a’di ’pen ka pije/ mo ’peni bwam monsinu mo be.
41012009	Ata mina com gi mo ma mura’th i mii mo sa/? A’di midi p̱u’du/ mo dhali ’ce’d uni gwansan sho’k mo kun miiki to ka guurush mo dhali c̱i mo ma mura’th ki ’kwanin tiya mo be.
41012010	’Kona um ki deŋ Gwo e mo ’taa? Gwo jin ’kwarkunu mo. Ka dhan wosha caaga/ yansan jin waḵkina imannyaŋ gu’b mo tani warki’d ki dhan wosh gi ’kup̱an ma rukun gu’b mo.
41012011	Yansan ta mii gi Tap̱a mo be. Dhali a’di ta dhan mii jin meru em bana mo be.
41012012	Dhali uni palki mii mo mmo’taki cesh a’di mo tani hili uni ḵo/kina waambuhany ’kwani mo haali/ uni nyiṯẖkin ki a’di ṯorki gwom ’bi’th/e yansan ap̱o/ uni mo. Wakan uni dhalki a’di mo dhali ii mo be.
41012013	Dhali uni hashki a’di ’kwanin tiya ’peni ’Kwani P̱arisiyiin mo dhali ’kwanin tiya ’peni ’Kwani ma Hirodusiyiin mo mmo’taki cesh a’di ki gwo jin ona a’di mo.
41012014	Dhali uni p̱u’dkin mo dhali o a’di gwo mo ki: Amanṯor Gwowa, aman misha ki /e ta a’diŋ gana/ mo dhali /e diki mii mii ka gwar ’de/ mo gom wathiŋ kamu/ mo, haali e diki taḵ ’kwani gom monycam buni mo hili ka jiŋ gana e ṯori gwo gi bway ma Arumgimis mo be. A/a’di ta gwoŋḵan jin minu c̱ika Kaysara thulp̱a/ mowa? walla minu dhalku/ mo?
41012015	Mina aman ’taki c̱iya thulp̱a/ mo ’taa? walla mina aman ’taki dhal ’pen mo? Hili mmonyiṯẖa a’di ahe’k em buni mo tani a’di ki o uni gwo mo ki: Atinta palkina um aha/ kan mo? Guyi aha/ nasa guurush mo ma dhali dhalki aha/ p̱ara a’di e mo.
41012016	Dhali uni ki guyi a’di jan ’de/ mo. Dhali a’di ki o uni gwo mo ki: Ki jamas maja a’dan sa/? Dhali a’di ’kwar maja imahan mo? Dhali uni ki thoḵ a’di gwo mo ki: A’di ta jim ma Kaysar mo be.
41012017	Yesus ki o uni gwo mo ki: C̱ika Kaysar to jin ta jim ma Kaysar mo ma dhali c̱ika Arumgimis to jin ta jim ma Arumgimis mo ma. Dhali uni merkin mo gom a’di mo be.
41012018	Dhali ’Kwani Sadukiyiin p̱u’dkini a’di mo, uni gun o gwo mo ki mompinuŋ kamu/ yisa di’da. Dhali uni ki doṯ a’di gwondoṯ mo mmo/o gwo mo ki:
41012019	Amanṯor Gwo, aMusa a’di ’kwarki aman gwo mo mmo/o gwo mo ki: Waḵka kam gi wathi/ midi wu mo dhali dhal ashim piti mo hili diki dhal a’di a’ci mme’d mo tani wathi/ midi mii mash asha kam piti mo dhali c̱is uc̱i goma kam piti mo be.
41012020	Ikam uni ’kokini pesu/ mo be. Jin ṯwa/a/ bu’thki’da ’bom mo dhali ki a’di wuki’d mo tani a’di diki dhal a’di a’ci mo be.
41012021	Dhali jin ’kon mo p̱o/i su/ mo bu’thki’da yim mo dhali wuki’d mo si’da/ mmodiki dhal a’di a’ci mo dhali jin ’kon ma p̱o/i kwara mo nyaḵkina mii gi wakansan mo be.
41012022	Dhali unim pesu/ ’koki dhal a’di a’ci mo. Yan’ko’d mo tani a’bom si’da/ wuki’d mo.
41012023	E mompinu mo tani a’bom midi ta asha ja mo? Haali/ gwaṯẖ ’kokini pesu/ kun bu’thki a’di mo mmota a’bom buni mo be.
41012024	Yesus ki o uni gwo mo ki: A’di diki ta ’kup̱ gwo jin ṯẖu’thkina um mii mo ki um ’koki mish Gwo ma Arumgimis kun ’kwarkunu mo walla mom’bi’th ma Arumgimis mo?
41012025	Haali/ ki uni mini piyu/ mo ’peni mowu mo tani uni mini mash doḵ/e yisa walla minu ’koki c̱i bway mo mmomash mo si’da/. Hili uni mina e waki iman’doyu gwo mo e momis mo be.
41012026	Dhali gom gwo gi uni gun minu cuyi mis mo ’peni mowu mo tani ’kona um ki deŋ gwo e mo e gwo jin ’kwarkin ma Musa mo ’taa? e gwo gi ari cwa me’d jin on ma Arumgimis a’di gwo mo ki: Aha/ tana Arumgimis ma Ibrahiim mo dhali aha/ tana Arumgimis ma Is/hak mo dhali aha/ tana Arumgimis ma Yakuub mo?
41012027	A’di diki ta Arumgimis gom uni gun wukin mo hili gom uni gun ’kon ki e mo. Um wani imanṯẖu’th mii mana?
41012028	Dhali jan ṯal ’deŋ kamu/ ’peni iman’kwar to p̱u’dki’d mo dhali ciḵ gwo jin su’kkina uni ka rem ’kup̱ mo. Dhali mmonyiṯẖa a’di ki a’di thoḵki uni gwo ki ’bore/ mo tani a’di ki doṯ a’di gwo mo ki: Gwoŋḵan jana jin ’kwaru si’da/ jin ta jin ṯwa/a/ ki tiya ’baar mo?
41012029	Yesus ki thoḵ a’di gwo mo ki: Jin ṯwa/a/ a’dihe/ be jin o gwo mo ki: Ciḵi um gwo mo ma. Ayy, um ’Kwani ma Israyiil mo. Tap̱a Arumgimis bana a’di ta Tap̱a Arumgimis jin ṯal ’de/ mo be.
41012030	Dhali /e mini en Tap̱a Arumgimis pini ka dum pini ’baar mo dhali ka ḵashiram pini ’baar mo dhali ki bwam pini ’baar mo dhali ki ’bi’th pini ’baar mo.
41012031	Dhali jiŋ ’ko’da ’dihe/ mo be: /E mini en amannyaḵ c̱a’b pini me’d is piniŋ gana/ mo be. Gwoŋḵana kamu/ jin ’kwarkunu mo yisa di’da jin ca’d mmobol yansan e mo.
41012032	Dhali aman’kwar to mo a’di ki o a’di gwo mo ki: /E o gwoŋ gana/ mo, Amanṯor Gwo. /E ṯori gwo ki ṯor gana/ ki a’di ṯal ’de/ mo, haali/ jaŋ kamu/ yisa di’da, hili a’di ’de/ mo be.
41012033	Mmo/en a’di ka du ’baar mo dhali ka du jin mishi gwo ’bani ’baar mo dhali ki mom’bithi ’baar mo dhali mmo/en amannyaḵ c̱a’b pini me’d is piniŋ gana/ mo tani a’di boli to ’baar mo e gun c̱inu mo mmoc̱i’th ki o’d mo dhali kun ’donu mo mmomiiya bas mo be.
41012034	Dhali ka Yesus mishki’d ki a’di thoḵki a’di gwo ki ’bore/ mo tani a’di ki o a’di gwo mo ki: /E yisa si’dkina ’peni Bampa/ ma Arumgimis mo. Dhali ’peni mo yan mo tani wathin ’deŋ kamu/ yisa di’da jin ro’dki mii mo mmodoṯ a’di gwondoṯa kamu/ mo be.
41012035	Dhali ka Yesus di’d mo mmoṯor uni gwo mo e gu’b gi mondheleladhelel mo tani a’di ki o uni gwo mo ki: Kata i/ona iman’kwar to mo ka Ḵrisṯẖos ta Ya/ ma Dawuu’d moye?
41012036	Haala Dawuu’d ki is piti mmoshi/irrkunu a’di ki Shi/in Dheleladhelel mo tani a’di o gwo eya tente/ mo ki: Tap̱a o Tap̱am pem gwo mo ki: ’C̱a’bi /e aha/ ki me’da bim poros pem mo ntagi aha/ mina dhu ’kup̱ pini mo e bwaŋ ’kwariny cwa jin dhuna /e sho’k mo.
41012037	Dawuu’d ki is piti ki yuḵ a’di ki Tap̱a mo. Wakan a’di midi ta ya/m piti kata mo doḵ/e? Dhali adhana waambuhany ’kwani ciḵki gwo ’peni a’di ki bwaŋ ’kunyga/ mo be.
41012038	Dhali e gwom piti jin ṯora a’di uni mo tani a’di ki o uni gwo mo ki: Jiyi iman’kwar to ki e ki ’bore/ mo uni gun eni momaŋas ki burrinyen turga/ i is mo dhali kun eni mo jin taḵuwa taḵ ka rem ’kup̱ e mo ma suug mo
41012039	dhali mmobu’th mo kun ’boron e gu’b gi montul is mo dhali mo kun taḵuwa taḵ mo e mo jin yuḵuwa yuḵ mo,
41012040	uni gun loski gu’b gi up̱ gun wuna ikaṯẖ ki ’kolo’c mo dhali uni gun miiki mon’tho mo eya p̱or ma pije/ mo ki rash rash mo. Uni mini bu’th dhan miiwaḵ jin bol kun tiya e mo be.
41012041	Dhali a’di c̱a’bki’da ’cesh ka p̱ar ’twa/ e mo jin dhunuwa guurush mo dhali a’di p̱arki’da waambuhany ’kwani e mo mmodhuna uni aguurush e mo jin dhunuwa guurush mo. ’Kwani tana ris ka ris kun ta pa ki pa mo kun dhukina dhana guurush mo.
41012042	Dhala ’bom jin wukin ma kaṯẖim piti mo p̱u’dki’d mo dhali a’di ki dhu ushi emena guurushi su/ mo kun ta gi ’per mo, uni gun wana e ka ṯariip̱an ’de/ mo be.
41012043	Dhali a’di ki yuḵ imanciḵ a’di gwo e a’di mo dhali o uni gwo mo ki: Ka jiŋ gana/ aha/ ona um gwo mo ki, a’boma ha’th’ko’d yansan jin wun ma kaṯẖim piti mo tani a’di dhuki’da ris tom piti ’baar mo mmobol uni gwansan e mo kun ṯa’kki to mo e mo jin dhunuwa guurush mo be.
41012044	Haali/ uni ’baar mo ṯa’kki to mo ’peni tom buni gun ishkin ka enthus mo. Hili ayim ’pena ha’th’ko’d piti mo tani a’di dhuki’da ris to ’baar mo kun tana a’di mo gun mini ’taki kar a’di mo be.
41013001	Dhali me’d jin yakina a’di ka pije/ mo ’peni gu’b gi mondheleladhelel mo tani jan ’deŋ kamu/ ’peni imanciḵ a’di gwo mo o a’di gwo mo ki: Hili mo mo ma, Amanṯor Gwo. Wosh gwahan wani jaro/ jarowa dhali monyaŋgi gu’b gwahan wani jaro/ jaro/ mo!
41013002	Dhala Yesus ki o a’di gwo mo ki: /E mishi dhan mii gi gu’ba caaga/ gwansan kun nyaŋkunu mo? Hili wosha ṯal ’deŋ kamu/ yisa midi di ap̱owa kamuŋ kamu/ mo jin minu ’koki ṯa’k a’cesh mo be.
41013003	Dhali me’d jin c̱a’bkina a’di e ’kuwosh Seṯuun jin di’d ka p̱ar ’twa/ ki gu’b gi mondheleladhelel mo tani Buṯerus dhala Yakuub dhala Yohaan dhala Andaraawus doṯki a’di gwo ka ḵwal is mo ki:
41013004	Ṯori aman gwo mo ma, ki mii gwansan mini p̱u’d kakasja mo? Dhali ki jamas mii kun wakatinta imina to gwansani ’baar mo mmothim mo mo?
41013005	Dhala Yesus ki ṯel mii ’pen mo dhali o uni gwo mo ki: ’Cunycuri mii ki is bum ki ’bore/ mo ma, ki jan ṯal ’deŋ kamu/ midi diki sus um mmodheres mo.
41013006	’Kwani tana ris ka ris mini iiyu/ ki gway pem mo mmo/o gwo mo ki: Aha/ tana a’di mo. Dhali uni mini sus tiya ka ris mmodheres mo be.
41013007	Dhali ki um mini ciḵ gwo gom mo/as mo dhali gom gwo jin ’ce’du ’te/ mo gom mo/as mo tani dhalku/ is ki anan mo. Gom to gwansan mini mii p̱u’du/ mo. Hili ’pemen yisa minu thim naskina/ mo.
41013008	Haali/ kala kamu/ midi cu mis ap̱o/ kala kamu/ mo dhali ’peŋkuman bampaŋ kamu/ midi cu mis ap̱o/ ’peŋkuman bampaŋ kamu/ mo. Dhali adhan mony’cesh midi yiḵin is ki mo ka ris mo dhali ṯe/ midi di mo si’da/. Hili mii gwansan uni ita jasi monṯel ’pen ki isa nyor mo be.
41013009	Hili ’cunycuri mii ki is bum ki ’bore/ mo ma. Haali/ uni mini c̱i um mo e montul is mo dhali um minu dor mo e gu’b gi montul is mo dhali um mini doshi bwambor imudhiir mo dhali imaliḵ mo gom gway pem mo mmoc̱i gwo ibwambori uni mo be.
41013010	Dhali gwom ’borga/ minu mii c̱iki kal gi ’kwaniny’ceshi ’baar mo nṯwa/a/ mo be.
41013011	Dhali ki uni mini sus um mo e mo jin dwallu gwo mo dhali c̱i um wakan mo tani dhalku/ is ki anan mo nṯwa/a/ mo gom gwo jin mina umi o mo. Hili oyi a’diyin jin minu c̱i um ki mo yansan mo haali/ a’di diki ta um kun mini o gwo mo, hili Shi/in Dheleladhelel mo be.
41013012	Dhala kama kamu/ midi c̱i akam piti mmo’kosh jwa mo dhali com midi c̱i ya/ ki ’bwa/ ilu/ mo mmo’kosh mo dhali uc̱i mini cu mis ap̱o/ ikum mo dhali uni mini dhu uni mmowu mo be.
41013013	Dhali um minu shi/i e ki ’kwani ka ris mo gom gway pem mo. Hili a’di jin midi ’dim ’kup̱ mo ntagi ’pemen mo tani a’di iminu iwoṯẖ mo be.
41013014	Hili ki um mini p̱ar a’di jin ta mii jin bulabul e mo, a’di jin thumu mo e mo jin mina a’di ḵa ’taki diki di mo ba/ tani (dhalka mandeŋ gwo e mishi gwo ’ban mo) dhali yan’ko’d uni gwansan kun ’kon e Pa Yahuudiyya mo tani dhalki uni soni ’kuwosh mo ma.
41013015	Dhali dhalki a’di jin di’di ’kuŋgu’b midi diki thul ka ’cesh mo walla cic̱ gu’b piti mo mmogu toŋ kamu/ mo.
41013016	Dhali dhalki a’di jin di’d e bwam bunto midi diki doḵu/ ka nyaŋ’ko’d mo mmogu burrinyem p̱om piti mo be.
41013017	Dhali ayy/ayy/ayy gom uni gwansan kun bwaa uc̱i mo dhali gom uni gwansan kun c̱i uc̱i ako mmop̱i ka tee gwansan mo.
41013018	’Thoyi mo ma ki a’di midi diki p̱u’du/ mondiṯ mo.
41013019	Haali/ ka cim gwansan mo tani monṯo’c bwa midi di jin diki di wakan mo ’peni ka muŋ’kup̱ mo me’d jin uḵ ma Arumgimis to mo ntagi shwane/ mo ba/, dhali midi diki di ki sule/ sule/ mo be.
41013020	Dhali waḵki/ Tap̱a midi ’taki diki ’ciṯẖa/ cim gwansan bwa mo tani buye/ wathimpaŋ kamu/ minu ’taki ’koki woṯẖ mo be. Hili gom gway gi uni gun kwanykunu mo, uni gun kwanykina a’di mo tani a’di i’ciṯẖuwa cim bwa mo be.
41013021	Dhali waḵki/ wathin ’deŋ kamu/ midi o um gwo mo ki: Hili mo mo ma, aḴrisṯẖos a’dan mo, walla, Hili mo mo ma, a’di ac̱iṯṯaan mo tani dhalki gwom piti ki gam is mo.
41013022	Haali/ iḵrisṯẖos kun ’koki ta kuŋ gana/ mo dhali imanc̱i gwonthus mini cu mis mo dhali ṯor dhan jamas mii mo dhali dhan momer mo mmosusa susi dheres mo, waḵki/ a’di mishu mii si’da/ gom uni gun kwanykunu mo be.
41013023	Hili ’cunycuri is bum ki ’bore/ mo. Aha/ ṯorkina um aris to gwansani ’baar mo nṯwa/a/ mo be.
41013024	Hili ka tee gwansan mo ’ko’di monṯo’c bwa mo tani atente/ midi dhurum mo mo dhali appe midi diki c̱i moŋkush piti mo be.
41013025	Dhali arisa culi ’baar mo mini ṯa’k mo ’peni momis mo dhali mom’bi’th kun ’kon e momis mo tani minu pir is mo be.
41013026	Dhali yan’ko’d uni mini p̱ar Ya/ gi ’Kwani e mo mmop̱u’du/ mo e bwaaraḵ ka dhan mom’bi’th mo dhali ki monyca mo be.
41013027	Dhali yan’ko’d a’di midi hash iman’doyu gwom piti mo dhali tul kum piti is kun kwanykunu mo ’peni mony’cesh kun ’kona shem ’pena bi idoŋon mo ’peni mo jin din ma ’cesh ’kup̱ mo ntagi mo jin dina momis ’kup̱ mo be.
41013028	’Peni gwo gi cwamp̱u/ da/ari a’di mo dhali mishi miim piti mo. Me’d jin lu/kina a’di abim piti mo mmo’ta’dama’ta’dam mo dhali dhu jip̱in this mo tani um ki mish mo mo ki moyurantee ’dishi’d mo be.
41013029	Wakan si’da/ waḵki/ um ki p̱ar aris to gwansan e mo mmobu’th mo mo tani um ki mish mo mo ki a’di ’dishki’d mo, e ’twaŋkal hila/ mo be.
41013030	Ka jiŋ gana/ aha/ ṯora um gwo mo ki ’kwani ma nyaḵum yil gwansan mini ’koki pe mo nṯwa/a/, nṯwa/a/ ka ris to gwansan mini bu’th mo mo be.
41013031	Momis dhali mony’cesh mini pe mo tani hili gwom pem midi diki pe mo be.
41013032	Hili ka tente/ c̱aan mo walla ki mo c̱aan mo tani a’di dina wathin ṯal ’deŋ kamu/ ki mish mo walla iman’doyu gwo kun ’kon e momis mo walla Ya/ si’da/ mo, hili jasi Com a’di ’de/ mo be.
41013033	’Cunycuri is bum ki ’bore/ mo ma dhali timi mo mo ma dhali ’thoyi mo ma, haali/ um ’koki mish mo mo atente/ jin mina mo p̱u’du/ mo be.
41013034	A’di mina e waki wathi/ jin ya yilkina/ mo. Me’d jin dhalkina a’di pam piti ’pen mo tani dhali a’di dhu c̱iŋkinam piti mo mmohil mo mo isi ka ṯu’c piti ka ’deṯe/ ’deṯe/ mo. Dhali a’di ki ḵan amantim ’twaŋkal gu’b gwo mo mmotim mo mo be.
41013035	Timi mo mo ma wakan — haali/ um ’koki mish mo mo jin mina com gu’bi p̱u’du/ mo. A’di wari midi ta mom’pimpili/ mo walla mombwam/e mo walla mo kun gwon ma dhoŋgola ŋwa mo walla mon’thamo/ mo.
41013036	Hili isi ciki/ a’di midi p̱u’du/ ki jahanne/ mo dhali gam um ki um mala e mo be.
41013037	Dhali a’di jin ṯorka/ um mo tani miga/ ṯor ki ’kwani ’baar mo ki: Timi mo mo ma.
41014001	Dhali acim boc̱kini su/ nṯwa/a/ ka cim gi Mompe’kup̱anyolos mo dhali ayuḵ jin tulu ’kup̱ mo gi maaŋḵuthu’d jin miinu ki dar ga cumaṯ mo. Dhali igasiis kun can dhali iman’kwar to mo uni ŋap̱ki bway mo mmobu’th a’di ki kup̱ mo dhali ’kosh a’di jwa mo
41014002	haali/ uni o gwo mo ki: Yisa ka tul ’kup̱ yan jin yuḵuwa yuḵ mo yisa hili isi ciki/ adulaṯṯ mina ’kwani ishwa mo be.
41014003	Dhali ki a’di diki’d e Pam Beeṯaniya e gu’b ma Simaan jin ’kosha monthus mo tani ki a’di c̱a’bki’da tharabeesa mo tani a’boma kamu/ p̱u’dki’d mo jin taki’d gi turaŋ gasaas jin ta gi kush mo jin din ma yina p̱i’dnaŋ gana/ nycine/ mo, jin ’bitha yol she/ ki ’bi’th mo. Dhala yim ki ’ce’d tura mo dhali wol a’di e ’kup̱ ma Yesus mo be.
41014004	Hili ’kwanin tiya ’kokini mun mo kun deḵkin ma nyor mo e is buni mo mmo/o gwo mo ki: Atinta shinu ayina p̱i’dnaŋ gana/ yan isa ’cesh kan mo?
41014005	Haali/ ayina p̱i’dna/ yan minu ’taki yol ka riyaal iss ’kwanimpa ka ’kume’d mo dhali c̱iki ’kwani kun hatha’ko’d mo. Dhali uni ki ruḵa yim ki gwo mo be.
41014006	Hila Yesus o gwo mo ki: Dhalka yim mo ma. Atinta ṯoca um ayim bwa mo? Ayim miiki tony jaro/ gom aha/ mo.
41014007	Haali/ um isa yempa/ um tan gi ’kwani kun hatha’ko’d kun nyaḵ ’ko ki um mo, dhali ki yilan tiya jin ona bwa um mo tani um ki mish uni tom ’boron mii mo. Hili um mini ’koki ta gi aha/ isa yempa/ mo.
41014008	Ayim mii a’di jin misha a’di mii mo. Ayim ’koshki aha/ buŋgwar is pem nṯwa/a/ mo gom kan jin minu kan aha/ mo be.
41014009	Dhali ka jiŋ gana/ aha/ ṯora um gwo mo ki: E mo yin jin minu c̱i gwom ’borga/ e mony’ceshi ’baar mo tani a’di jin miikin ma yim mo tani minu ṯor mo mmokaa yim e mo be.
41014010	Dhali yan’ko’d Yahuusa Isḵariyuuṯi a’di jin ’dap̱ tiya ’twa/ ka ’kume’d i’ce’dka su/ mo tani a’di yaki’d mo e igasiis kun can mo mmothoson gwo mo mmo’ciṯẖ a’di is ki gwo mo e uni mo be.
41014011	Dhali ki uni ciḵki gwo mo tani uni ’kunya bwa ki ’kuny mo dhali o gwo is mo mmoc̱iki a’di aguurush mo. Dhali a’di ŋap̱ki embula ’borgaŋ gana/ mo mmo’ciṯẖ a’di is ki gwo mo be.
41014012	Dhali ka cim jin ṯwa/a/ gi maaŋḵuthu’d jin miinu ki dar ga cumaṯ mo ki uni ’ciṯẖki ari ḵa’bal ’kus mo gom Mompe’kup̱anyolos mo tani imanciḵ a’di gwo oki a’di gwo mo ki: Ki mana o /e bwa jin mina aman ii mo dhali thoson to mo gom /e mo mmoshwa ki Mompe’kup̱anyolos mo?
41014013	Dhali a’di hashki imanciḵ a’di gwo isu/ mo dhali o uni gwo mo ki: Iiku/ i dhan ’peŋkuman bampa/ mo dhali wathi/ jin ḵali dhan dhur yi’de/ midi gam um ’kup̱ mo. Baṯẖi a’di nsho’k mo ma.
41014014	Dhali e mo yin jin mina a’di cic̱ mo tani oyi com gu’b gwo mo ki: Amanṯor Gwo o ki: Mane gu’b jin midi ta gu’b yilkina/ gom aha/ mo jin miga/ shwa to ka cim gi Mompe’kup̱anyolos nyaḵki imanciḵ gwom pem mo?
41014015	Dhali a’di midi ṯor um adhan gu’ba beega/ mo jin nyaŋu ka maḵamp̱o/ ap̱owa kamu/ mo, jin isha to ki korom korom mo dhali jin thosonkunu mo. E mun mo tani thosoni to mo ma gom ana mo.
41014016	Dhali imanciḵ a’di gwo iikin mo dhali p̱u’d mo e ’peŋkuman bampa/ mo dhali gam a’di me’d jin ṯorkina a’di uni gwo mo. Dhali uni thosonki to mo gom Mompe’kup̱anyolos mo be.
41014017	Dhali ki mo ta mom’pimpili/ mo tani a’di p̱u’dki’d nyaḵki kum piti kun ’koni ’kume’d i’ce’dka su/ mo.
41014018	Dhali ki uni ’kokina tharabeesa mo mmoshwa to mo tani Yesus ki o gwo mo ki: Ka jiŋ gana/ aha/ ṯora um gwo mo ki: Jan ṯal ’de/ ’peni um midi ’ciṯẖ aha/ is ki gwo mo, a’din ’de/ jin nyaḵki to shwa ki aha/ mo be.
41014019	Dhali uni ṯelki mii ’pen mo mmoḵal bwan diṯi’d mo dhali o a’di gwo mo ka baṯẖ ’pen ka rem ’kup̱ mo ki: A/aha/ ’taa?
41014020	A’di ki o uni gwo mo ki: A’di ta jin ṯal ’de/ ’peni um kun ’koni ’kume’d i’ce’dka su/ mo, a’di jin ’thup̱ki maaŋḵuthu’d nyaḵki aha/ eya sahana ’de/ mo be.
41014021	Haali/ Ya/ gi ’Kwani yaki’d mo me’d gwo jin ’kwarkunu mo gom a’di mo, hili wayyi e wathi/ jin ’ciṯẖki Ya/ gi ’Kwani is ki gwo mo. A’di midi ’taki ’bor ki isi ’bor gana/ mo gom wathi/ yansan mo waḵki/ a’di minu ’taki ’koki dho’th mo be.
41014022	Dhali ki uni ’kokin mo mmoshwa to mo tani a’di ki bu’th maaŋḵuthu’d mo dhali ’bora ’bor bwa i is mo dhali ’ce’d a’di mo dhali c̱iki uni mo dhali o gwo mo ki: Budhi a’di yansan mo ma. A’di ta is pem mo be.
41014023	Dhali a’di ki budha ḵubbaaya mo, dhali ki a’di c̱iki mom’bora ’bor bwa i is mo tani a’di ki c̱iki uni mo dhali uni ’baar mo p̱iki a’di mo be.
41014024	Dhali a’di ki o uni gwo mo ki: A’di yansan ta’da abas pem gi gwo jin gamu me’d jin ta jin this mo a’di jin wolki’d gom ’kwani ka ris mo be.
41014025	Ka jiŋ gana/ aha/ ṯora um gwo mo ki aha/ mina diki p̱i yiman maman cwa doḵ/e mo ntaga tee jin miga/ p̱i a’di jin ta jin this e Bampa/ ma Arumgimis mo be.
41014026	Dhali ki uni yuḵki gway mo tani uni iikin ka pije/ mo e ’kuwosh Seṯuun mo.
41014027	Dhala Yesus ki o uni gwo mo ki: Umi ’baar mo mini ṯa’k mo. Haali/ a’di ’kwarkunu mo ki: Aha/ mina ’kosha manhil ḵa’bal mo dhali ḵa’bal minu c̱eker bwa mo be.
41014028	Hili ŋ’ko’d mo tani ki aha/ minu cuyu mis mo doḵ/e tani aha/ mina ya iṯwa/a/ ki um e Pany Jaliil mo be.
41014029	Buṯerus ki o a’di gwo mo ki: Bahili waḵki/ uni gwansani ’baar mo mini ṯa’k mo tani aha/ mina diki biṯ mo be.
41014030	Dhala Yesus ki o a’di gwo mo ki: Ka jiŋ gana/ aha/ ṯora /e gwo mo ki mon’thiny yansan shwane/ mo nṯwa/a/ ka dhoŋgola ŋwa diki ko e me’di su/ mo naskina/ tani /e mini waṯ aha/ gway me’di kwara mo be.
41014031	Hili a’di oki gwo ka du jin daradar mo ki: Waḵki/ aha/ mina mii wu mo nyaḵki /e mo tani aha/ mina diki waṯ /e gway mo. Dhali uni ’baar mo nyaḵki o ’twan ṯal ’de/ mo be.
41014032	Dhali uni iikin mo e mo jin yuḵu gway ka Jaṯẖsemaani mo. Dhali a’di ki o imanciḵ a’di gwo gwo mo ki: ’Koyi imahan mo ma. Aha/ ki ya mo dhali ’tho mo.
41014033	Dhali a’di ki susa Buṯerus mo dhala Yakuub mo dhala Yohaan mo dhali mii ma c̱is ṯelki a’di ’pen mo mmobu’th a’di kagahara mo dhali bwa jin ṯocu ’kus si’da/ mo be.
41014034	Dhali a’di ki o uni gwo mo ki: Aḵashiram pem diṯa bwa ki diṯ kagahara mo, ma isi kan mmowu moyi. ’Koyi imahan mo ma dhali timi mo mo mmo’ko ki e i’kup̱ mo.
41014035	Dhali mmoyakina a’di mo mmothoṯẖ is ari’ceenne/ mo tani a’di biṯki’da ’cesh mo dhali ’tho mo waḵki/ a’di minu ’taki mish mii mo tani ki mo yan midi ’taki ya pe a’di mo.
41014036	Dhali a’di o gwo mo ki: Abba Ababa. Aris to ’baar mo mishu mii ki /e mo. Ḵalka ḵubbaaya yan ’peni aha/ mo ma. Hili a’di yisa jin oyaa/ bwa, hili a’di jin ta bwam pini mo be.
41014037	Dhali a’di p̱u’dki’d mo dhali gam uni ki uni ishki e mo dhali a’di ki owa Buṯerus gwo mo ki: Simaan, A/e ishki e kan mo? Bunya/ mina /e diki tim mo mo ka tenten ’de/ mmodi ki e i’kup̱ mo?
41014038	Timi mo mo ma dhali ’koyi ki e i’kup̱ mo dhali ’thoyi mo, ki um mini ’koki cic̱ mo e mo jin palu mo. Shi/in ka jiŋ gana/ a’di ona bwa mo tani hili buŋgwar is a’di ihatha’ko’d ki ha’th mo be.
41014039	Dhali doḵ/e a’di yaki’d mo dhali ’tho mo mmorash jasi gwon ṯal ’de/ e mo.
41014040	Dhali doḵ/e a’di p̱u’dki’d mo dhali gam uni ki uni ishki e mo haali/ em buni ṯo’dki uni is mo dhali uni ’koki mish gwo jin mina uni thoḵ a’di mo be.
41014041	Dhali me’di kwara mo doḵ/e tani a’di p̱u’dki’di uni mo dhali o uni gwo mo ki: A/um ’kon mo mmo/ish e kan mo dhali bu’th mosi/is bum mo? A’di ’koshi jwa mo ba/. Mo p̱u’du’d mo. Ya/ gi ’Kwani a’di ’ciṯẖkunu is ki gwo mo e me’d gi ’kwani kun ta imanmii miinthus mo be.
41014042	Cuyi mis mo. Dhalki ana iina mo. Hila uma? Aman’ciṯẖaa/ is ki gwo p̱u’dki’d hila/ mo be.
41014043	Dhali ki jahanne/ ki a’di di’di mmo/o gwo mo naskina/ mo tani Yahuusa p̱u’dki’d mo, a’di jin ’dap̱ tiya ’twa/ ka ’kume’d i’ce’dka su/ mo dhali a’di suski’da waambuhany ’kwani nyaḵki a’di mo ki gandala turga/ ime’d mo dhali cwa mo, ’peni igasiis kun can mo dhali iman’kwar to mo dhali ’kwaniŋ gwanyjaḵa/ mo be.
41014044	Dhali a’di jin ’ciṯẖki a’di is ki gwo mo c̱iki uni jamas mii mo mmo/o gwo mo ki: Jan ṯal ’de/ jin miga/ p̱i ’twa/ mo tani a’di ta wathi/ mo. Budhi a’di mo dhali susi a’di ki ’dantar mo.
41014045	Dhali ki a’di p̱u’dki’d mo tani a’di ki ya a’di ki jahanne/ mo dhali o a’di gwo mo ki: Tap̱a. Dhali a’di ki p̱i a’di ’twa/ mo be.
41014046	Dhali uni ’baar mo ki dhu me’d buni ap̱o/ a’di mo dhali bu’th a’di mo.
41014047	Hili jan ṯal ’deŋ kamu/ ’peni uni gwansan kun doshkin ki ’dishe/ mo tani a’di ki buḵ gandala turgam piti mo dhali ruṯẖun c̱iŋkina/ ma gasiis jin ca’d mo dhali ’ciṯẖ a’di ’cem piti mo be.
41014048	Dhala Yesus ki o uni gwo mo ki: A/um iiyin ka pije/ mmobu’th aha/ ki gandala turga/ ime’d mo dhali ki cwa mo, me’d mii jin miinu ap̱o/ wathin ’di/ mo?
41014049	Ka tee kun baṯẖani ’ko’d mo tani aha/ dikina mo e gu’b gi mondheleladhelel mo mmoṯor um gwo mo dhali um ’koki bu’th aha/ mo be. Hili dhalki Gwo jin ’kwarkunu mo thimu mo.
41014050	Dhali uni ’baar mo dhalki a’di me’d mo dhali so mo be.
41014051	Dhali wathin dhuruca kamu/ baṯẖki a’di nsho’k mo ki dar gi toŋ kamu/ i is mo, jasi burrinyen dhiny e jin ’kamkina a’di i is mo, dhali uni ki bu’th a’di mo.
41014052	Hili a’di dhalki burrinyen dhiny e mo dhali gus is ’te/ mo ki jasi burrinye/ jin hitha a’di i empa’d mo be.
41014053	Dhali uni ki susa Yesus eya gasiis jin ca’d mo. Dhali igasiis kun cani ’baar mo dhali ’kwaniŋ gwanyjaḵa/ mo dhali iman’kwar to mo uni tulki is mo be.
41014054	Dhala Buṯerus baṯẖki a’di nsho’k ’pena dhana/ mo. A’di ki ya ki sule/ e bwaagoŋ ma gasiis jin ca’d mo. Dhali a’di ki nyaḵ c̱a’b ki imanji mo mo dhali sam is piti i o’d mo be.
41014055	Dhali igasiis kun can dhali ’kwani gi montul is buni ’baar mo uni ŋap̱ki gwo mo mmo/o ap̱owa Yesus mo mmokar a’di mmowu mo tani hili uni ’koki gam ton ṯal ’deŋ kamu/ mo be.
41014056	Haali/ ’kwani tana ris ka ris kun ’ce’dki a’di gwo ap̱o/ mo dhali gwom buni gun ’ce’dkina uni a’di i is mo tani uni ’konuki gam me’d mo be.
41014057	Dhali kun tiya doshkin ki mis mo dhali ’ce’d a’di gwo ap̱o/ mo mmo/o gwo mo ki:
41014058	Aman ciḵkina gwo jin ona a’di mo ki: Aha/ mina ’kosh gu’b gi mondheleladhelel yansan mo, a’di jin nyaŋkunu ki me’d mo, dhali ka cim kwara mo tani aha/ mina nyaŋ jaŋ kamu/ jin ’konuki nyaŋ ki me’d mo be.
41014059	Isi gwom buni jin ’ce’da uni kan mo tani yisa gamu me’d mowa.
41014060	Dhala gasiis jin ca’d doshki’d ki mis mo e bwaman uni mo dhali doṯa Yesus gwo mo ki: A/e bunya/ diki ’de’k ’twaŋ kamu/ mo mmothoḵ gwo kana? Gwo gi wakatinta i/ona ’kwani gwansan ap̱o e mo?
41014061	Hili a’di c̱a’bki’d ki shwam mo dhali yisa thoḵ ’twaŋ kamuwa. Dhala gasiis jin ca’d doḵ/e ki doṯ a’di gwo mo ki: A/e tana Ḵrisṯẖos jin ta Ya/ gi A’di jin Maŋu mowa?
41014062	Dhala Yesus ki thoḵ a’di gwo mo ki: Aha/ tana a’di mo, dhali /e mini p̱ar Ya/ gi ’Kwani e mo mmoc̱a’b ka bim poros gi mom’bi’th mo dhali mmodoḵu/ ka nyaŋ’ko’d mo e bwaaraḵ ’peni momis mo be.
41014063	Dhala gasiis jin ca’d dherki burrinyem p̱om piti bwa mo dhali o gwo mo ki: Katinta ic̱orkina ana gwo mo jin minu mii o mo?
41014064	Um ciḵki a’di walki gwo sor mo. Gwo jin gama um me’d mo wakata mo? Dhali uni ’baar mo waḵki a’di mo mmo/o ki a’di ha me’d mmowu mo be.
41014065	Dhali kun tiya ṯelki mii ’pen mo mmo’taḵ a’di manya/ i is mo dhali mmokum a’di bwam/em piti mo dhali dor a’di mo mmo/o gwo mo ki: Oyi gwo is mo ma. Dhali mmodora uniya dor ki me’d buni mo tani uni kun ta imanji mo mo bu’thki a’di mo be.
41014066	Dhala Buṯerus diki’d ka luŋgu’b mo e bwam ma goŋ mo, dhali nyarany c̱iŋkinan ’deŋ kamu/ ’peni jim ma gasiis jin ca’d mo tani a’di p̱u’dki’d mo.
41014067	Dhali mmonyiṯẖkina a’diya Buṯerus mo mmosam is piti i o’d mo tani ayim ḵu’thki a’di ki e mo dhali o gwo mo ki: /E si’da/ nyaḵki di ki wathi/ gi Pa Naasira yan jin ta’da Yesus mo.
41014068	Hili a’di waṯki gwo mo mmo/o gwo mo ki: Aha/ mola a’di mo walla ’pemen gwom pini jin ona /e mo tani a’di molka/ ’ban mo. Dhali a’di ki ya ka pije/ ki ’twaŋkala lambalany mo. Dhala dhoŋgola ŋwa gwoki’d mo be.
41014069	Dhali nyarany c̱iŋkina/ p̱arki a’di e mo dhali ṯel mii ’pen mo mmo/o a’di gwo mo doḵ/e e uni gwansan kun doshkin ki ’dishe/ mo ki: Wathi/ yansan ta jan ṯal ’de/ ’peni uni mo be.
41014070	Dhali doḵ/e a’di waṯki gwo mo. Dhali yan’ko’d doḵ/e ari’ceenne/ mo tani uni gwansan kun doshkin ki ’dishe/ mo tani ona Buṯerus gwo mo ki: Ka jiŋ gana e ta jan ṯal ’de/ ’peni uni mo haali e ta ji gi Pany Jaliil mo be.
41014071	Hili a’di ṯelki mii ’pen mo mmojee is piti jwa mo ki gwo jin thulkina a’di me’da p̱o/ mo, mmo/o gwo mo ki: Aha/ dinaki mish wathi/ yan mo, a’di jin okina um mo.
41014072	Dhali ki jahanne/ adhoŋgola ŋwa gwoki e me’di su/ mo. Dhala Buṯerus kana gwo e mo, ma gwo yin jin on ma Yesus a’di mo ki: Nṯwa/a/ ka dhoŋgola ŋwa diki ko e mo me’di su/ mo tani /e mini waṯ aha/ gway me’di kwara mo. Dhali ki a’di di’d mmoka gwo e ’baar mo ka baṯẖ ’pen mo tani a’di ’tul ma du mo dhali a’di gwoki’d ki jabu’th mo be.
41015001	Dhali ki jahanne/ ki mo ta mon’thamo/ mo tani igasiis kun can mo dhali ’kwaniŋ gwanyjaḵa/ mo dhali iman’kwar to mo dhali aris ’kwani gi montul is buni mo tani uni tulki is mo mmoganan gwo ’kup̱ mo. Dhali uni ki deḵa Yesus mo dhali sus a’di mo mmoc̱ika Bilaaṯus mo be.
41015002	Dhala Bilaaṯus ki doṯ a’di gwo mo ki: Ki /e de itana maliḵ gi ’Kwani Yahuuda/ mo de? Dhali a’di ki thoḵ a’di gwo mo ki: /E si’da/ on wakansan mo be.
41015003	Dhali igasiis kun can uni yerki a’di is ki gway ki to ka ris mo.
41015004	Dhala Bilaaṯus ki doṯ a’di mo doḵ/e ki: /E bunya/ mini diki thoḵ ’twaŋ kamu/ mo ’taa? Hili ma, ama’diny gwo wana risa kun okina uni ap̱o e mo.
41015005	Hila Yesus diki thoḵ a’di gwon ṯal ’deŋ kamu/ mo. Gom mii gi wakan mo tani aBilaaṯus merki’d mo be.
41015006	Dhali ki mii jin tuluwa tul ’kup̱ mo tani miim piti isa yempa/ ta mii mmo’cuḵki uni jan ’de/ ’peni ’kwani habuus mo a’di jin doṯkina uni mo be.
41015007	Dhali wathi/ di’d jin yuḵkunu gway ka Baraabas mo jin diki’di bwam uni eya sijin mo, a’di jin ’koshki’da mee mo e mii jin miinu gom gwo jin onuwa ’cesh gom bampa/ mo be.
41015008	Dhala waambuhany ’kwani p̱u’dkin mo dhali ṯel mii ’pen mo mmodoṯa Bilaaṯus gwo mo mmomii to jin miina a’di isa yempa/ gom uni mo.
41015009	Dhali a’di ki thoḵ uni gwo mo ki: Um ŋap̱ki aha/ mmo’cuḵki um aMaliḵ gi ’Kwani Yahuuda/ mo ’taa?
41015010	Haali/ a’di nyiṯẖki dhap̱an jin takina igasiis kun can mo gom a’di mo mmoc̱i a’di wakan mo.
41015011	Hili igasiis kun can c̱i’thkina waambuhany ’kwani is ki mii mo ki a’di midi ’cuḵki uni aBaraabas mo ’te/.
41015012	Dhala Bilaaṯus ki o uni gwo mo doḵ/e ki: Dhali aha/ mina miiya ta ki wathi/ jin yuḵa um ka Maliḵ gi ’Kwani Yahuuda/ mo?
41015013	Dhali uni cuukin kagahara mo doḵ/e ki: ’Koshi a’di ki cwany’ciṯẖan dhul mo.
41015014	Dhala Bilaaṯus ki thoḵ uni gwo mo ki: Gomatinta sa/? Tonthus gi wakatinta imiikina a’di mo? Hili uni ’baar mo ḵumki cuuwa/ mo ki nyanye/ mo mmo/o gwo mo ki: ’Koshi a’di ki cwany’ciṯẖan dhul mo.
41015015	Wakan Bilaaṯus mmodikina a’di gwo ibwa mo mmoṯeya waambuhany ’kwani ki gwo mo tani a’di ki ’cuḵki uni aBaraabas mo dhali ki a’di dorki’da Yesus ki yis bip̱ mo tani a’di ki c̱iki a’di ki uni mo mmo’kosh ki cwany’ciṯẖan dhul mo be.
41015016	Dhali i/askar ki sus a’di mo e bwam mo ma mudhiir mo, a’di jin ta gu’b jin c̱a’ba a’di nycine/ mo. Dhali uni ki yuḵ i/askari ’baar mo ka tul ’kup̱ mo.
41015017	Dhali uni ki hi’thki a’di burrinyen duḵ is mo jin ta jam p̱o/ mo dhali uni ki ṯo’d toŋ’kup̱ ’pena ’de/ mo mmokar a’di i’kup̱ mo be.
41015018	Dhali uni ki ṯel mii ’pen mo mmothe a’di me’d mo mmo/o gwo mo ki: Hayy Maliḵ gi ’Kwani Yahuuda/ mo.
41015019	Dhali uni ki dor a’di ’kup̱ ki cwa mo dhali ’taḵ a’di manya/ i is mo dhali uni ki luŋ ki jiŋ ’kup̱a ’dup̱uni bwambori a’di mo mmowu is ka ’cesh mo.
41015020	Dhali ki uni miiki a’di ka maḵ mo tani uni ki ’cuḵ a’di burrinyen duḵ is jin ta jam p̱o/ mo dhali uni ki hi’thki a’di burrinyem piti i is mo. Dhali uni ki sus a’di ka pije/ mo mmo’kosh ki cwany’ciṯẖan dhul mo be.
41015021	Dhali uni ki budha Simaan gi Paŋ Kerawaan ki ’bi’th mo a’di jin ta CoAlaksandarus mo dhala Rup̱us mo, a’di jin yaki yampe mo, a’di jin yayi’d ’peni bampa/ mo, mmoḵal cwany’ciṯẖan dhul piti mo.
41015022	Dhali uni suski a’di mo e mo jin yuḵu gway ka Gulguṯẖa mo (jin ta ’pemen gwo jin onu mo ki: mo ma simaŋ ’kup̱ mo be. )
41015023	Dhali uni c̱iki a’di yimana mura’th jin ’koshu e ki yiman cwa jin ta’da murr mo be. Hili a’di diki bu’th a’di mo be.
41015024	Dhali uni ’koshki a’di ki cwany’ciṯẖan dhul mo dhali uni ki ḵwa/ burrinyem piti bwa mo e bwam uni mo mmoṯa’k to mo gom uni mo mmopi gwo ’pen ka pije/ mo, gom to jin mina uni ’baar mo ka ’deṯe/ ’deṯe/ ’taki bu’th mo be.
41015025	Dhali ki mo ta’da tente/ pedoŋon mo tani uni ’koshki a’di ki cwany’ciṯẖan dhul mo be.
41015026	Dhali gwo jin onu ap̱o/ a’di jin ’kwarkunu mo, a’di jin deŋkunu e mo tani o’d ka: Maliḵ gi ’Kwani Yahuuda/ mo be.
41015027	Dhali nyaḵki a’di mo tani uni ki ’kosh ’kwanin ’di/ isu/ ki cwany’ciṯẖan dhul mo, jan ṯal ’de/ ki me’da bim poros piti mo dhali jaŋ kamu/ ki me’da biny cam piti mo be.
41015028	Dhali Gwo ma Arumgimis jin ’kwarkunu mo thimkunu mo, a’di jin o gwo mo ki: A’di karkunu mo nyaḵki imandhaŋ gwo mo.
41015029	Dhali uni gwansan kun iikin ki iimpe mo tani uni c̱iki a’di gura/ mo dhali pir ’kup̱ buni mo dhali o gwo mo ki: Ayy. /E jin mini ’taki ’kosh gu’b gi mondheleladhelel mo dhali nyaŋ a’di ka cim kwara mo tani
41015030	woṯẖi/ is pini mo ma, dhali thulu/ ka ’cesh ’pena p̱o/ cwany’ciṯẖan dhul mo.
41015031	Wakan si’da/ igasiis kun can miiki a’di ka maḵ mo ka rem ’kup̱ nyaḵki iman’kwar to mo mmo/o gwo mo ki: A’di mishi tiya woṯẖ mo tani hili a’di molki is piti woṯẖ moyi.
41015032	Dhalka Ḵrisṯẖos jin ta’da Maliḵ gi ’Kwani ma Israyiil thulu’d ka ’cesh shwane’dan ’pena p̱o/ cwany’ciṯẖan dhul mo ki ana mina p̱ar e mo dhali gam gwo is mo. Dhali uni gwansan kun nyaḵkunu ’kosh ki a’di ki cwany’ciṯẖan dhul mo tani uni si’da/ sorki a’di mo be.
41015033	Dhali ka tente/ p̱u’dki’di bwaŋ ’kup̱ mo tani adhan mondhurumi’d p̱u’dki’d ap̱o/ mony’ceshi ’baar mo ntaga tente/ ibum ’ban mo be.
41015034	Dhali ka tente/ ’koni kwara mo tani Yesus cuuki’d ki dhan ’twa/ jin caaca mo ki: Iluwi, Iluwi, lama sabaktani, a’di jin ta ’pemen gwo jin onu ka: Arumgimis pem, Arumgimis pem, atinta dhalkina /e aha/ ’pen kan mo?
41015035	Dhali unin tiya kun doshkin ki ’dishe/ ciḵki a’di mo dhali o gwo mo ki: Hili mo mo ma. A’di yuḵki’da Iliyya mo be.
41015036	Dhali jan ṯal ’deŋ kamu/ guski’d mo dhali ’tu’da lip̱a/ ki yiman tom ’pac̱a’d mo mmokar a’di e cwa mo dhali c̱iki a’di mmop̱i mo mmo/o gwo mo ki: C̱ora ma. Dhalki ana p̱ara e mo waḵki/ Iliyya midi p̱u’du/ mo mmo’cuḵ a’di ka ’cesh mo.
41015037	Dhala Yesus cuuki’d kagahara mo dhali a’di ki c̱i shi/in piti jiŋ ’ko’d mo be.
41015038	Dhali burrinye/ jin di’d e gu’b gi mondheleladhelel mo tani a’di dherkunu bwa mo ka ’ban su/ mo ’peni buŋ’kup̱ mo ntagi bum’pen mo be.
41015039	Dhali ka mancil ma askar iss ’kwanimpa imudhe’d, a’di jin doshki’d ka ḵarambuye/ i a’di mo tani p̱arki a’di e mo mmoko wakan mo dhali mmoc̱i shi/in piti jiŋ ’ko’d mo tani a’di ki o gwo mo ki: Ka jiŋ gana/ wathi/ yansan ta Ya/ ma Arumgimis mo be.
41015040	Dhali up̱ ’kokin mo mmun si’da/ mo kun hilki mo mo ’pena dhana/ mo. Uni gun ’koni bwaman uni mo tani ta iMariyam Magdaliyya mo dhala Mariyam jin ta KoYakuub mo jin ta a’di jin ta dhuru’c mo dhala Yusi mo dhala Saluuma mo be.
41015041	Uni gun baṯẖki a’di nsho’k mo me’d jin dikina a’di e Pany Jaliil mo dhali mii a’di to mo. Dhali up̱ tana ris ka ris si’da/ kun p̱u’dkin mo kun nyaḵki ii ki a’di mo e Pa Urushaliim mo be.
41015042	Dhali ki mom’pimpili/ p̱u’dki’d mo me’d jin tana a’di atee jin Thosonkunu to mo tani a’di jin ta’da tee jin ṯwa/a/ ka cim ma pesu/ mo tani
41015043	aYuusup̱ gi Pa Arraama a’di jin taḵu mo jin ta jan ṯal ’de/ gi montul is buni mo, a’di ki is piti si’da/ jin c̱orki Bampa/ ma Arumgimis mo, a’di bu’thki’da du mo dhali yaa Bilaaṯus mo dhali doṯ a’di gwo mo gom buŋgwar is ma Yesus mo be.
41015044	Dhala Bilaaṯus merki’d mo waḵki/ a’di midi ’taki wu ki jahanne/ kan mo. Dhali a’di ki yuḵa mancil ma askar iss ’kwanimpa imudhe’d mo mmodoṯ a’di gwo mo waḵki/ a’di wuki’d hila/ mo walla a’di kap̱ki wu mo.
41015045	Dhali ki a’di da/arki gwo ’pena mancil ma askar iss ’kwanimpa imudhe’d mo gom jwa jin wukina a’di mo tani a’di ki dhala Yuusup̱ bway mo mmoḵal buŋgwar is piti mo be.
41015046	Dhali a’di yolki burrinyen dhiny e jin kanuwa kan mo dhali a’di ki thul a’di ka ’cesh mo dhali ’tham a’di is ki burrinyen dhiny e jin kanuwa kan mo dhali ’thi a’di mo e jis wosh jin ’kolkunu mo dhali ’daŋkal dhan wosha caaga/ mo mmomu’th ’twaman jis jwa ’twa/ mo be.
41015047	Mariyam Magdaliyya dhala Mariyam jin ta KoYusi p̱arki mo e mo, mo jin ’thikunu a’di nycine/ mo be.
41016001	Dhali ka cima pesu/ peki’d mo tani aMariyam Magdaliyya dhala Mariyam jin ta KoYakuub mo dhala Saluuma mo uni yolki to kun ḵuyi mo ki ḵuy mo, wakan ki uni mini ii mo dhali ’koshki a’di i is mo be.
41016002	Dhali ki mo ta mon’thamo/ ka tee jin ṯwa/a/ ga dhas mo tani uni iikin mo e moŋ’kup̱aje mo ka tente/ sulki’d mo be.
41016003	Dhali uni ’kokin mo mmo/o gwo ka rem ’kup̱ mo ki: Kaja sa/ imidi ḵa’cki ana wosh ’peni ’twaman jis jwa mo?
41016004	Dhali uni hilki mo ’kup̱ ki mis mo dhali uni p̱arki wosh e mo mmo’daŋkalkunu a’di ka nyaŋ’ko’d mo haali/ a’di caaca mo be.
41016005	Dhali uni cic̱ki bwaman jis jwa mo dhali uni p̱arki wathin dhuruca kamu/ e mo mmoc̱a’bki me’da bim poros mo mmohi’th burrinye/ jin c̱a’bki bany bany mo dhali uni merkin mo.
41016006	Dhali a’di ki o uni gwo mo ki: Dhalku/ ki mer mo. Um ŋap̱kina Yesus gi Pa Naasira mo, a’di jin ’koshkunu jwa mo ki cwany’ciṯẖan dhul mo. A’di cuki mis mo be. A’di diki di imahan mo be. Hili mo mo ma, mo jin karkina uni a’di nycine/ mo.
41016007	Hili iiku/ mo dhali ṯor imanciḵ a’di gwo gwo mo dhala Buṯerus si’da/ ki a’di midi ya iṯwa/a/ ki um e Pany Jaliil mo. Dhali e mun mo tani um mini p̱ar a’di e mo me’d gwo jin ṯorkina a’di um mo be.
41016008	Dhali uni iikin mo dhali so ka ŋwac̱a/ ’peni moŋ’kup̱aje mo haali/ mo jin deenu is mo dhali momer mo p̱u’dki’d ap̱o/ uni mo be, dhali uni ’koki o gwoŋ kamu/ ṯal ’de/ mo ki wathiŋ kamu/ mo haali/ uni ḵo/ki is mo be.
41016009	Dhali ki a’di cukunu mis mo ka’tum ka cim jin ṯwa/a/ ka dhas yan mo tani a’di piki’da Mariyam Magdaliyya i is nṯwa/a/ mo a’di jin urkina a’di aruma ’cesh thusi pesu/ ka pije/ mo be.
41016010	Ayim yaki’d mo dhali ṯor to gwansan ki uni gwansan kun nyaḵki ’ko ki a’di mo ki uni ’kokin mo mmo’ko ki bwan diṯin mo dhali mmoko mo be.
41016011	Hili ki uni ciḵki gwo ki a’di diki’d ki e mo dhali mish ma yim mo tani uni ’koki gam gwom piti is mo be.
41016012	Dhali yan’ko’d mo tani a’di piki unin sun tiya i is mo ki jamasa kamu/ mo me’d jin iikina uni ibway mo mmo/ii bampa/ mo.
41016013	Dhali uni iikin ka nyaŋ’ko’d mo dhali ṯor aris to gwansan ki ’kwani ’baar mo. Hili uni ’koki gam gwom buni is mo be.
41016014	Dhali yan’ko’d mo tani a’di ki pi uni ’kume’d i’ce’dka ’de/ i is uni ’cena mo me’d jin ’kokina uni eya tharabeesa mo mmoshwa to mo. Dhali a’di ki ḵucur uni ki gwo mo gom gwom buni gun ’kona uni ki gam is mo dhali goma dum buni kun ’bitha’bi’th mo haali/ uni ’koki gam gwo gi uni gwansan is mo uni kun p̱arki a’di e mo ’ko’di pim piti jin piyunu a’di mo be.
41016015	Dhali a’di ki o uni gwo mo ki: Iiku/ mo e mony’ceshi ’baar mo dhali c̱i gwom ’borga/ eya ris ’kwani ’baar mo kun uḵkunu mo.
41016016	I/a’di jin midi gam gwo is mo dhali minu mii ki yi’de/ mo tani a’di iminu iwoṯẖ mo be. Hili a’di jin diki gam gwo is mo tani a’di minu waḵ mo be.
41016017	Dhali jamas mii gwansan mini baṯẖ uni gwansan kun gam gwo is mo: Ki gway pem mo tani uni mini ura ruma ’cesh ka pije/ mo dhali uni mini wal ’twa/ ki ’twan thisa tiya mo be.
41016018	Uni mini bu’th tasha/ mo. Dhali waḵki/ uni mini p̱i ton tiya kun ’kon ma ṯi’di cine/ mo tani a’di midi diki shi/ uni is mo be. Uni mini dhu me’d buni ap̱o/ uni gun ’ba’thkin mo, dhali uni minu wac̱ mo be.
41016019	Dhali yan’ko’d wakan Tap̱a Yesus ’ko’di a’di ṯorki gwo e uni mo tani a’di bu’thkunu mo bway momis mo dhali di’d mo mmoc̱a’b ka bim poros ma Arumgimis mo.
41016020	Dhali uni iikin mo mmoc̱i gwo mo eya ris mo ’baar mo dhali Tap̱a diki’d mo mmonyaḵka ṯu’c mii ki uni mo dhali mmo’da/ki uni gwo kun c̱ina uni sho’k mo ki jamas mii kun baṯẖkunu mo be. Amen
42001001	Haali/ me’d ’kwani ka ris kun bu’thki gwo mo mmotul gwo ’kup mo ka baṯẖ ’pen mo, gwo jin thimkunu mo e bwam ana mo,
42001002	jasi me’d uni kun c̱ikunu ana mo ki uni gwansan ’peni ka muŋ’kup̱ mo kun ta iman/o gwo ki e mo dhali imanmii gwo mo tani
42001003	a’di ṯoshka/ ki a’di ’boro’d gom aha/ si’da/ mo mmobaṯẖa aris to gwansan ki ’dishe/ mo haali/ goma cim gunn isa gush mo mmo’kwar uni ka roṯẖam p̱o/ mo gom /e mo /e jin tana Ṯẖawup̱iilus jin ta jim ’borga/ mo
42001004	ki /e mini mish gwoŋ gana/ mo gom gwo gi to gwansan kun ṯorkunu /e mo be.
42001005	Dhali ka tee ma Hirodus jin ta’da maliḵ gi Pa Yahuudiyya mo tani agasiisa kamu/ diki’d mo jin yuḵu gway ka Sakariyya mo. A’di ta’da awaḵ ’peni ’kwani ma Abiyya mo. Dhali a’di ta’d gi ashim piti ’peni i’bwa/ ma Haruun mo dhali gway ma yim yuḵu ka Ilisabaaṯ mo be.
42001006	Dhali uni su/ mmonṯal ’de/ mo tani ta kuŋ ḵar/e mo ibwambor ma Arumgimis mo mmomii gwoŋḵan jin ’kwarkunu ’baar mo dhali a’di jin ona gwoŋḵan gi Tap̱a mo ki dar gi miiwaḵ mo be.
42001007	Hili uni dar ga ’ci mo haali/ Ilisabaaṯ a’di ta’da burum mo dhali uni su/ cakin ki yil mo be.
42001008	Dhali ki a’di di’d mo mmomiiya ṯu’c ma gasiis ibwambor ma Arumgimis mo ka waḵ piti ’kon aṯu’c mo tani
42001009	isi me’d mii ma gasiis mo tani to biṯki’da p̱o/ a’di mo, to jin biṯu mo jin mina a’di cic̱ e gu’b gi mondheleladhelel gi Tap̱a mo dhali duḵa ’bicajwahar mo be.
42001010	Dhali awaambuhany ’kwani ’baar mo ’kokina pije/ mo mmo’tho mo ka tente/ jin duḵuwa ’bicajwahar mo be.
42001011	Dhali aman’doyu gwo gi Tap̱a piki a’di i is mo mmodosh ki ’bana bim poros ma gwaṯa/ jin duḵuwa ’bicajwahar mo.
42001012	Dhala Sakariyya mur ma du mo mmop̱arkina a’di a’di e mo dhali moŋḵo/ is biṯki’da po/ a’di mo be.
42001013	Hili aman’doyu gwo ki o a’di gwo mo ki: Dhalki is ki ḵo/ mo ma, Sakariyya, haala ’thom pini ciḵkunu mo be dhali ashim pini ka Ilisabaaṯ midi dho’th /e ya/in mo dhali gway piti mina /e iyuḵ ka Yohaan mo be.
42001014	Dhali /e mina bwa ’kuny mo dhali ’bor bwa mo be, dhali ’kwani ka ris mina bwa ’kuny mo gom mondho’th piti mo be.
42001015	Haali/ a’di midi eḵa/ eḵ mo mbwambori Tap̱a mo, dhali a’di midi diki p̱i yimana mura’th jin ḵa/u ki ŋah ŋah mo walla tomp̱inum ’bi’thga/ mo, dhali a’di minu ’tu’d mo ki Shi/in Dheleladhelel mo. me’d jin dikina a’di ’peni bwaŋ kum mo be.
42001016	Dhali a’di midi ṯu’k iya/ ma Israyiil ka ris mo e Tap̱a Arumgimis buni mo be,
42001017	dhali a’di midi ya mbwambori a’di ki shi/in mo dhali gi mom’bi’th ma Iliyya mo, mmoṯuka du gi icom ki uc̱i mo, dhali uni gun ushi gwo ha e mo e moyuḵ gi uni gun miin ka ḵar/e mo, mmothoson ’kwani is mo gom Tap̱a mo, ’kwani kun thosonkunu mo be.
42001018	Dhala Sakariyya thoḵki’da man’doyu gwo gwo mo ki: Yan miga/ mish kata mo? Haali/ aha/ si’da/ tana wathin dhan mo dhali ashim pem si’da/ a’di ca’d ki yil mo be.
42001019	Dhali aman’doyu gwo ki o a’di gwo mo ki: Aha/ tana Jibra/iil, a’di jin doshki’d e buŋ’kus ma Arumgimis mo, dhali aha/ hashkunu mo mmoc̱i /e gwo mo dhali mmoḵal /e gwom ’boro’d yansan mo.
42001020	Dhali hili mo mo ma, /e mini ta a’diye/ mo dhali mol gwo o mo ntaga tee ki to gwansan minu p̱u’d mo haali e diki gam gwom pem is mo, a’di jin minu thim ki mom buni mo be.
42001021	Dhali ’kwani ’kokin mo mmoc̱ora Sakariyya mo dhali uni merkin mo mmotayina a’di adiiṯe/ mo e gu’b gi mondheleladhelel mo be.
42001022	Dhali ki a’di yayi’d ka pije/ mo tani a’di diki mish ’twa/ walki uni mo dhali uni nyiṯẖkin ki a’di p̱arki tonyjan e mo e gu’b gi mondheleladhelel mo, dhali a’di ki mii jamas mii mmoṯor uni mo dhali a’di di’d ka ’diye/ mo naskina/.
42001023	Dhali ki mo ma cim piti jin miikina a’diya ṯu’c ’baarki’d mo tani a’di doḵki bway pam piti mo be.
42001024	Dhali ’ko’da tee gwansan mo tani ashim piti ka Ilisabaaṯ bwaaki’d mo dhali ka ppe ’kona ’kup̱i mudhe’d mo tani ayim bagki is piti mo mmo/o gwo mo ki:
42001025	Tap̱a a’di mii’d kan e aha/ mo ka tee jin hila a’di ap̱o/ aha/ mo mmoḵal mowaḵ pem jin waḵu aha/ e bwaman ’kwani mo.
42001026	Dhali ka ppe ’kona ’kup̱i pe’de/ mo tani aman’doyu gwo jin ta’da Jibra/iil mo a’di hashkunu mo ’peni Arumgimis mo e ’peŋkuman bampa/ gi Pany Jaliil mo jin yuḵu gway ka Naasira mo be,
42001027	eny nyaraŋ gana/ jin karkunu mo gom wathi/ jin yuḵu gway ka Yuusup̱ mo ’peni gu’b ma Dawuu’d mo, dhali nyaraŋ gana/ yan yuḵu gway ka Mariyam mo be.
42001028	Dhali a’di p̱u’dki’da yim mo dhali o gwo mo ki: Hayy, ayy, /en ’de/ jin gamkina ’the mo. Tap̱a a’di di’d e /e mo be.
42001029	Hili a’di yim mur ma du kagahara mo, gom gwo yan jin okunu mo, dhali kulum a’di e bwam piti mo gom monthe me’d yan midi ta atinta mo.
42001030	Dhali aman’doyu gwo ki o a’di yim gwo mo ki: Dhalku/ is ki ḵo/ mo ma, Mariyam, haali e gamkina ’the ’peni Arumgimis mo be.
42001031	Dhali hili mo mo ma. /e mini bwaa e bwam pini mo dhali dho’th ya/in mo dhali /e mini yer a’di gway ka Yesus mo be.
42001032	Dhali a’di midi eḵ mo dhali minu yuḵ ki Ya/ gi a’di jin Cayaa/ e ki Ca mo. Dhali Tap̱a Arumgimis midi c̱i a’di aḵursi ma ababam piti ka Dawuu’d mo be.
42001033	Dhali a’di midi ta tap̱a apo/ gu’b ma Yakuub ki sule/ mo, dhali bampam piti midi di kan ki dar gi ’pemen mo be.
42001034	Dhali aMariyam thoḵki’da aman’doyu gwo gwo mo ki: Yan minu mish mii kata mo ki aha/ mola wathiŋ gwaṯẖ kan mo?
42001035	Dhali aman’doyu gwo thoḵki’da yim gwo mo ki: Shi/in Dheleladhelel midi yayu/ apo e mo, dhali mom’bi’th gi a’di jin Cayaa/ e ki Ca mo midi ’kam /e ka la mo be. Wakan a’ci jin minu dho’th mo tani a’di minu yuḵ ki jiŋ ḵogu mo, a’di jin ta Ya/ ma Arumgimis mo be.
42001036	Dhali hili mo mo ma, abas pini ka Ilisabaaṯ si’da/ bwaaki’da ’ci ki yil jin can ma yim mo, dhali yansan ta’da ppe ’kup̱i pe’de/ mo ka yim jin yuḵu gway ka yima burum mo be.
42001037	Haali/ ka Arumgimis mo tani to p̱iyi’d jin molu mii mo be.
42001038	Dhala Mariyam o gwo mo ki: Hili mo mo ma. Aha/ tana c̱iŋkina/ nyara/ gi Tap̱a mo. Dhalki a’di miinu mo gom aha/ mo isi ki gwom pini mo. Dhali aman’doyu gwo yaki’d mo ’pena yim mo be.
42001039	Dhali ka tee gwansan mo tani aMariyam cuki mis mo dhali ya mo ki jahanne/ mo e bampa/ gi paŋ ’kuwosh mo e ’peŋkuman bampa/ gi Pa Yahuudiyya mo.
42001040	Dhali ayim cic̱ki gu’b ma Sakariyya mo dhali theka Ilisabaaṯ me’d mo be.
42001041	Dhali ka Ilisabaaṯ ciḵki monthe me’d ma Mariyam mo tani a’ci p̱eki’d mo e bwa ma yim mo be. Dhali Ilisabaaṯ ’tu’dkunu mo ki Shi/in Dheleladhelel mo be,
42001042	dhali ayim ’terki cuuwa/ mo ka dhan ’twa/ jin caaca mo ki: Mom’bor mii gom /e e bwaman up mo dhali mom’bor mii gom maman gi bwam pini mo!
42001043	Dhali a’di yan c̱ikunu aha/ mo gomata mo? ka ta’da gi Tap̱am pem midi ’taki yayu/ i aha/ mo?
42001044	Haali/ hili mo mo ma. Ki ’twa/ jin thekina /e aha/ me’d mo p̱u’dki’d e bwany’cem pem mo tani a’ci p̱eki’d mo e bwam pem mo gom moŋ’kuny bwa mo be.
42001045	Dhali mom’bor mii goma yim, a’di jin gamki gwo is mo ki a’di minu thim mo, a’di jin okunuwa yim mo ’peni Tap̱a mo.
42001046	Dhala Mariyam o gwo mo ki: Aḵashiram pem eḵki Tap̱a mo,
42001047	dhali shi/in pem ’kunykina bwa mo eya Arumgimis jin ta’da Amanwoṯẖ pem mo,
42001048	haali/ a’di ki hil monyc̱a’b piti jin hatha nyarany c̱iŋkinam piti ’ko’d mo. Haali/ hili mo mo ma. ’Peni shwane/ mo tani aris ’kwani ma nyaḵum yil mo mini yuḵ aha/ gway ki a’di jin ’boru mii mo be.
42001049	Haali/ a’di jin ta gi mom’bi’th mo tani miiki’da dhan to jin eḵki’d e aha/ mo, dhali gway piti ḵogu mo be.
42001050	Dhali momiimiim piti di’d ap̱o/ uni gwansan kun ḵo/ a’di mo, ’peni uni gun tana nyaḵum yil ka nyaḵum yil mo be.
42001051	A’di ṯor ’bi’th piti ka bim piti mo be. A’di ḵwa/ki uni gun dhu is ki ca mo e gwalal buni kun kuluma uni eya dum buni mo be.
42001052	A’di ki thul uni gun ta gi ’bi’th ka ’cesh mo ’pena ḵursin tap̱am buni mo. Dhali a’di ki dhu uni gwansan ki ca mo kun hatha ’ko ’ko’d mo be.
42001053	A’di ki ’tu’d uni gun ’kosha ṯe/ mo ki tom ’boron mo, dhali uni kun ta pa ki pa mo tani dhukina a’di ’pen bwa ’te/ mo be.
42001054	A’di woṯẖki c̱iŋkinam piti ka Israyiil mo, mmoka momiimiim piti e mo be,
42001055	me’d gwo jin okina a’di ibabam bana mo be, eya Ibrahiim dhali iya/m piti ki sule/ mo.
42001056	Dhala Mariyam c̱a’bki’d mo nyaḵki a’di me’da ppe ’kup̱i kwara mo dhali doḵ pam piti ka nyaŋ’ko’d mo be.
42001057	Dhali mo p̱u’dki’d mo goma Ilisabaaṯ mmodho’th mo be dhali a’di ki dhodha ’ci jin ta ya/ mo.
42001058	Dhali imannyaḵ ’kom piti dhala bas piti ciḵki gwo ki Tap̱a ṯorki dhan miim piti e a’di yim mo dhali uni ’kunykina bwa mo nyaḵka yim mo be.
42001059	Dhali ka cim ’koni pekwara mo tani uni p̱u’dkin mo mmo’ciṯẖa/ ’ciya munyjal yis mo, dhali uni mini ’taki yer a’di gway ka Sakariyya ’ko’di gway gi com mo,
42001060	hili kum piti o gwo mo ki: Yisa wakana. A’di minu yuḵ gway ka Yohaan mo be.
42001061	Dhali uni o a’di yim gwo mo ki: Abas piniŋ kamu/ yisa yuḵu ki gway gi wakan mo be.
42001062	Dhali uni c̱i a’di jamas mii mo gom com mo mmo/o ki a’di minu yuḵ kata mo?
42001063	Dhali a’di doṯki uni cwam ba’d is mo jin gwaju ka ’diŋkilan dham mo mmo’kwar to mo dhali a’di ’kwarki’d ki: Gway piti ka Yohaan mo be. Dhali uni ’baar mo merkin mo be.
42001064	Dhali ki jahanne/ ’twam piti ḵa’dki’d mo dhala le’d piti ’cuḵki’d mo dhali a’di oki gwo mo mmo’bora Arumgimis bwa i is mo be.
42001065	Dhali moŋḵo/ is p̱u’dki’d ap̱owa ris imannyaḵ ’kom buni mo. Dhali aris to gwansan ’kokunu mo mmo/o ki lala’th mo e bampa/ ’baar mo gi paŋ ’kuwosh gi Pa Yahuudiyya mo be.
42001066	Dhali aris uni kun ciḵki uni mo tani dhuki uni eya dum buni mo dhali o gwo mo ki: A’ci yan midi ta ata mo? Haali/ me’d gi Tap̱a di’d e a’di mo be.
42001067	Dhali ababam piti ka Sakariyya ’tu’dkunu mo ki Shi/in Dheleladhelel mo dhali o gwo is mo mmo/o ki:
42001068	Mom’bor mii e Tap̱a Arumgimis gi ’Kwani ma Israyiil mo, haali/ a’di yayi’d mo mmobuṯ mo dhali mmowan ’kwanim piti ’ba/ mo be.
42001069	Dhali a’di ki ’de’k ce gi mowoṯẖ gom ana mo, e gu’b gi c̱iŋkinam piti ka Dawuu’d mo.
42001070	Me’d gwo jin okina a’di ki ’twa/ gi imanc̱i gwo ma Arumgimis kadhamo/ mo kun ḵogu mo ’peni kadhamo/ mo,
42001071	ki ana minu woṯẖ mo ’peni ’kup̱ bana mo, dhali ’peni me’d ga ris uni gun shi/i ana i e mo,
42001072	mmo’baar momiimiim piti gun onu is mo gom ibabam bana mo, dhali mmoka gwom piti e jin gamu me’d jin ḵogu mo.
42001073	Gwo yan jin ona a’di is jin thula a’di ababam bana ka Ibrahiim me’da p̱o/ mo,
42001074	mmoc̱i ana mony’cuḵ mo ’peni me’d gi uni gun ta ’kup̱ ki ana mo, ki ana mina mii a’di to mo ki dar gi moŋḵo/ is mo be,
42001075	e mo gi ḵo/uwa ḵo/ mo dhali e mo ma ḵar/e mo ibwambori a’di mo ka cimi ’baar mo gi moŋ’koki/em bana mo.
42001076	Dhali /e jin tana ’ci mo, /e minu yuḵ ka manc̱i gwo ma Arumgimis jin Cayaa/ e ki Ca mo, haali e mini ya ibwambori Tap̱a mo dhali thoson a’di bway mo be,
42001077	mmoc̱i mo jin mishu mowoṯẖ bana mo e ’kwanim piti mo, dhali e modhal miinthus buni ’pen mo be.
42001078	Ka du gi momiimii ma Arumgimis bana mo, ka tee mini kush mo mo ap̱o/ ana ’peni momis mo,
42001079	mmoc̱i moŋkush e uni gwansan gun ’kokin mo e mondhurumi’d mo dhali eya la gi mowu mo, mmoshu sho’k bana bway mo e bway gi moŋḵu’th is mo be.
42001080	Dhali a’ci ca’d mo dhali a’di ’bitha is mo e shi/in mo dhali a’di diki’d e mombwaasho mo ntaga tee jin ṯoru a’di eya tente/ e ’Kwani ma Israyiil mo be.
42002001	Dhali ka cim gwansan tani gwoŋḵan hashu mo ’pena Ughusthus Kaysar ki aris ’kwaniny’ceshi ’baar mo minu mii ’kwar gway buni mo.
42002002	A’di ta mo gi ’kwaru gway jin ṯwa/a/ jin miikunu ka Kiriniyuus ta’da mudhiir gi Pan Suriyya mo be.
42002003	Dhali uni ’baar mo iiki bway pu buniŋ gana/ mo ki she/ ki she/ mo mmo’kwar gway buni mo be.
42002004	Dhala Yuusup̱ yaki’d mo si’da/ ’peni Pany Jaliil mo. A’di yaki’d mo ’peni Pa Naasira em Bampa/ Yahuudiyya mo em Pan Dawuu’d jin yuḵu ka Beeṯlaham si’da/ haali/ a’di ta ’kwani gi gu’b ma Dawuu’d mo dhali awaḵ ma Dawuu’d mo be.
42002005	A’di yaki’d mo mmo’kwar gway ki is piti mo uni ka Mariyam jin ta a’di jin onu a’di ki bu’th mo, dhali a’di si’da/ cana bwa mo be.
42002006	Dhali ki uni ’kokin mo imun mo tani acim p̱u’dki’d mo jin mina a’di dho’th mo.
42002007	Dhali ayim dho’thki’da bwa nyaram piti jin ta ya/ mo. Dhali a’di ki ’tam a’di is ki burrinye/ dhali ’thi a’di eya kaḵ bip̱ mo haali/ mo p̱iyi’d gom uni e gu’b yilkina/ mo be.
42002008	Dhali e bampa/ yansan ki mon’thiny mo tani imanhil ḵa’bal ’kona pije/ mmohil ḵa’bal buni mo be.
42002009	Dhala man’doyu gwo gi Tap̱a piki uni i is mo dhali monyca gi Tap̱a ’twaḵi mo mo e isi uni mo dhali uni ḵo/kina ḵo/ is kagahara mo be.
42002010	Dhala man’doyu gwo ki o uni gwo mo ki: Dhalku/ is ki ḵo/ mo ma, haali/ aha/ guyina um gwom ’boro’d dhali gwo mmo’bor um bwa kagahara mo jin midi di goma ris ’kwani ’baar mo.
42002011	Haali/ ka tee yansan mo tani Amanwoṯẖ jin ta Tap̱a Ḵrisṯẖos a’di dho’thkunu mo gom um e Pan Dawuu’d mo be.
42002012	Dhali ki jamas mii yan mo tani a’di mina umi nyiṯẖ a’di mo be. Um mini gama ŋa/ ’tamkunu is ki burrinye/ mo dhali mmo/isha kaḵ bip̱ mo be.
42002013	Dhali ise/ iman’doyu gwon tiya ka ris ris ’peni momis nyaḵki ’ko ka man’doyu gwo mo be. Uni maŋana Arumgimis mo dhali o gwo mo ki:
42002014	Monyca ma Arumgimis isi momis mo, dhali moŋḵu’th is e mony’cesh e bwaŋ ’kwani gun ’bora a’di bwa i is mo.
42002015	Dhali ki iman’doyu gwo doḵkin mo ’peni uni imomis ka nyaŋ’ko’d mo tani imanhil ḵa’bal o gwo ka rem ’kup̱ ki: Dhalki ana iina mo shwane/ e Pam Beeṯlaham dhali p̱ar to yan e jin yayi’d jin ṯora Tap̱a ana mo.
42002016	Dhali uni iikin mo ise/ tani gamkina Mariyam dhala Yuusup̱ dhali ara ŋa/ mmo/isha kaḵ bip̱ mo be.
42002017	Dhali ki uni p̱arki a’di e mo tani uni ṯori gwo jin ciḵkina uni mo goma ’ci yan mo be.
42002018	Dhala ris ’kwani gun ciḵki a’di mo tani meren ki gwo gwansan gun ona imanhil ḵa’bal uni mo be.
42002019	Hila Mariyam a’di di’d mo mmodhu gwo gwansan mo mmokulum uni eya dum piti mo be.
42002020	Dhali imanhil ḵa’bal doḵkin ka nyaŋ’ko’d mo mmokara Arumgimis ki ca mo, dhali maŋki a’di mo goma ris to gun ciḵkina uni mo dhali kun mishkina uni mo me’d ji gi onu uni mo be.
42002021	Dhali ki mo thimi’d mo ka cim pekwara mo tani ki a’di ’ciṯẖkunuwa munyjal yis piti mo tani a’di yerkunu gway ka Yesus mo, gway jin c̱ikin ma man’doyu gwo mo nṯwa/a/ ki a’di ’kokunu mo mmobwaa mo e bwa mo be.
42002022	Dhali ki mo p̱u’dki’d mo gom mondhelel is buni mo isi ki gwoŋḵan ma Musa jin c̱inu mo tani uni suski a’di mo e Pa Urushaliim mo mmoc̱i a’di ki Tap̱a mo
42002023	(me’d gwo jin ’kwarkunu mo e gwoŋḵan gi Tap̱a jin c̱inu mo ki: Aris uniŋ gwaṯẖ ka ’deṯe/ ’deṯe/ kun ḵa’dki bwan dho’th mo tani uni minu yuḵ gway ki uni kun dhelelin mo gom Tap̱a mo. )
42002024	Dhali uni suski a’di mo si’da/ mmomii to mmo’ciṯẖa/ basa ’cesh mo isi me’d gwo jin okina gwoŋḵan gi Tap̱a jin c̱inu mo ki bimbir gurko/ su/ walla gurko/ kun bap̱ani su/ mo be.
42002025	Dhali wathi/ diki’d mo e Pa Urushaliim jin yuḵu gway ka Simaan dhali wathi/ yan ta a’diŋ ḵar/e mo dhali ta a’diŋ gayiin mo a’di jin c̱orki momalas gi ’Kwani ma Israyiil mo dhali Shi/in Dheleladhelel diki’da po/ a’di mo be.
42002026	Dhali a’di ṯorkunu a’di eya tente/ mo ki Shi/in Dheleladhelel mo ki a’di midi ’taki diki wu mo nṯwa/a/ ki a’di diki p̱ar Tap̱a jin ta’da Ḵrisṯẖos e mo be.
42002027	Dhali a’di shi/inkunu mo ki Shi/in mo tani a’di p̱u’dki’d mo e gu’b gi mondheleladhelel mo. Dhali ki com dhali kum suskina ’ci jin ta’da Yesus mo tani mmomii a’di me’d isi mii gi gwoŋḵan jin c̱inu mo tani
42002028	a’di bu’th a’di mo ’ko’da bim piti mo dhali ’bora Arumgimis bwa i is mo dhali o gwo mo ki:
42002029	Tap̱a, dhalki c̱iŋkinam pini ya’d mo ki moŋḵu’th is mo ma, isi ki gwom pini mo,
42002030	haali/ em pem p̱arki bway gi mowoṯẖ pini e mo
42002031	a’di jin thosonkina /e mo e buŋ’kus gi ’kwani ’baar mo,
42002032	moŋkush yan mmo’cee eya tente/ gom ’kwani kun ’koki ta ’Kwani Yahuuda/ mo dhali gom monyca gom ’Kwanim pini ma Israyiil mo.
42002033	Dhali com dhali kum uni merkin mo gom gwo yan jin okina a’di gom a’di mo.
42002034	Dhala Simaan ’bor uni mii mo dhali owa Mariyam jin ta kum gwo mo ki: Hili mo mo ma, a’ci yan karkunu mo gom ku gi ṯa’kkin mo dhali mmocu ’Kwani ma Israyiil ka ris mo, dhali gom jamas mii c̱aan jin okunu gwo mo ap̱o/ a’di mo tani
42002035	(dhali gandala turga/ midi suka ḵashiram pini mo si’da/) ki gwo kun kulumu ka ris eya du mo minu ṯor eya tente/ mo.
42002036	Dhali ayima ’bomiŋ kamu/ diki’d mo jin ta’da Hanna mo. A’di ta ’bwa/ ma P̱anu/iil mo ’pena waḵ ma Ashiir mo. Ayim a’di caki’d ki yil kagahara mo dhali a’di c̱a’bki’d mo nyaḵka kaṯẖim piti mo ki yil pesu/ mo ’peni yil jin dina a’di ki nyaraŋ gana/ mo
