42022052	Yan’ko’d Yesus ki o igasiis kun can gwo mo dhali tap̱a kun can ki imanhil gu’b gi mondheleladhelel mo dhali ’kwaniŋ gwanyjaḵa/ mo, uni gun iiyin ka pije/ ap̱o/ a’di mo ki: Um iiyina p̱o/ wathi/ me’d wathin ’di/ ki gandala turga/ dhali ki cwa kan mo ’taa?
42022053	Ki aha/ dikina ka tee jin baṯẖa’di ’ko’d isa yempa/ e gu’b gi mondheleladhelel mo tani um ’koki dhu me’d bum ap̱o/ aha/ mo. Hili yaase ta mom bum mo be dhali mom’bi’th gi mondhurumi’d mo.
42022054	Dhali yan’ko’d uni ki bu’th a’di mo dhali uni ki shu a’di bway mo mmosusi a’di mo e gu’b ma gasiis jin ca’d mo. ABuṯerus di’d mmobaṯẖ a’di isho’k isa dhana/ mo.
42022055	Dhali ki uni ’thaki o’da ’cila’th mo e bwaman mo gi dwallu gwo mo dhali ’kowa ’cesh mmonṯal ’de/ mo tani Buṯerus c̱a’bki’di bwam uni mo be.
42022056	Yan’ko’d ari nyara/ hilki a’di mo mmodina a’di mo mmoc̱a’b ka le’dan o’d mo dhali tor a’di ki e mo mmo/o gwo mo ki: Wathi/ yansan si’da/ nyaḵ di ki a’di mo be.
42022057	Hili a’di waṯ a’di gwo mo mmo/o ki: A’boma, aha/ dinaki mish a’di mo be.
42022058	Dhali yan’ko’d ari’ceenne/ mo tani jan ’deŋ kamu/ si’da/ p̱arki a’di e mo dhali o a’di gwo mo ki: /e si’da/ ta jan ṯal ’de/ ’peni uni mo be. Hila Buṯerus o gwo mo ki: Wathi/, aha/ tana a’di yisa.
42022059	Dhali yan’ko’d ki ari mo ta mo mo tani jan ṯal ’deŋ kamu/ di’d si’da/ mo mmo’cece’b gwo mo mmo/o ki: Ka jiŋ gana/ wathi/ yansan si’da/ nyaḵ di ki a’di mo, haali/ a’di ta wathi/ gi Pany Jaliil mo.
42022060	Hila Buṯerus ki o a’di gwo mo ki: Wathi/, aha/ mola gwo ’ban jin ona /e mo. Dhali ki jahanne/ ki a’di di’d mmo/o gwo mo tani adhoŋgola ŋwa gwo e mo be.
42022061	Dhali Tap̱a ṯu’kki’d mo dhali hila Buṯerus mo dhala Buṯerus kakina gwon Tap̱a e mo, gwo jin okina a’di a’di mo ki: Nṯwa/a/ ka dhoŋgola ŋwa diki ko e shwane/ mo tani /e mini waṯ aha/ gway me’di kwara mo be.
42022062	Dhali a’di yaki’d ka pije/ mo dhali ko ki jabu’th ki ḵu’bu/ ḵu’bu/ mo be.
42022063	Dhali ’kwani kun ’kokin mo mmobudha Yesus mo tani uni mii a’di ka maḵ mo dhali dor a’di mo be.
42022064	Uni si’da/ kum a’di e mo mmota ja’da/ mo dhali doṯ a’di gwo mo ki: C̱iyi gwo mo ma. Kaja ’dunn idorki /e mo?
42022065	Dhali uni oki gwon tiya ka ris ap̱o/ a’di mo mmosor a’di mo be.
42022066	Dhali ka tee p̱u’dki’d mo tani ’kwaniŋ gwanyjaḵa/ tulki is mo mmonṯal ’de/ mo nyaḵki igasiis kun can mo dhali iman’kwar to mo. Dhali uni ki shu a’di bway ka pije/ e montul is buni mo, dhali uni ki o gwo mo ki:
42022067	Waḵki e tana Ḵrisṯẖos mo tani ṯori aman gwo mo ma. Hili a’di ki o uni gwo mo ki: Waḵki/ aha/ mina ṯor um gwo mo tani um mini ’koki gam gwo is mo be.
42022068	Dhali waḵki/ aha/ mina doṯ um gwo mo tani um mini ’koki thoḵ aha/ gwo mo be.
42022069	Hili ’peni mo yansan shwane/ mo tani Ya/ gi ’Kwani minu kar mo mmoc̱a’b ka bim poros gi mom’bi’th ma Arumgimis mo be.
42022070	Dhali uni ’baar mo o gwo mo ki: /e ta Ya/ ma Arumgimis de? Dhali a’di ki thoḵ uni gwo mo ki: Um oki aha/ tana a’di mo be.
42022071	Dhali uni ki o a’di gwo mo ki: Gwonta mina ana imii ita ki nyanye/ mmo/o mo? Haali/ ana ciḵa gwo ki is bana ’peni ’twam pitiŋ gana/ mo be.
42023001	Yan’ko’d aris uni ’baar mo kun tulki is mo uni cuki mis mo dhali susi a’di mo mbwambor ma Bilaaṯus mo.
42023002	Dhali uni ṯelki mii ’pen mo mmoyer a’di is ki gway mo mmo/o gwo mo ki: Aman gamkina wathi/ yansan mmo/o gwo ap̱o/ bampam bana mo dhali non am ’kup̱ mo si’da/ mmoc̱iya Kaysara thulp̱a/ mo dhali o gwo ki a’di ki is piti ta’da Ḵrisṯẖos jin ta’da Maliḵ mo.
42023003	Dhala Bilaaṯus ki doṯ a’di gwo mo ki: Ki /e de ntana Maliḵ gi ’Kwani Yahuuda/ mo de? Dhali a’di ki thoḵ a’di gwo mo ki: Ona /e wakan si’da/ mo be.
42023004	Dhala Bilaaṯus ki o igasiis kun can gwo mo dhala waambuhany ’kwani mo ki: Aha/ dinaki gam miiŋ kamu/ e wathi/ yansan jin ṯẖutha a’di mii mo be.
42023005	Hili uni ’cece’bki gwo mo mmo/o ki: A’di cuki ’kwani is mo mmoṯor gwo ki tur mo e Bampa/ Yahuudiyya ’baar mo ’peni Pany Jaliil itagi mahansan mo be.
42023006	Ka Bilaaṯus ciḵki gwo yan mo tani a’di doṯki gwo mo waḵki/ a’di ta wathi/ gi Pany Jaliil mo.
42023007	Dhali ki a’di da/arki gwo mo ki a’di cila mo ma Hirodus gi moshirr mo tani a’di hashki a’di ka Hirodus mo, a’di jin di’d ki is piti e Pa Urushaliim ki mo c̱aan mo be.
42023008	Ka Hirodus p̱arki’da Yesus e mo tani a’di ’kunya bwa kagahara mo haali/ a’di dina gwo ibwa mo isa gush mo mmop̱ar a’di e mo, haali/ a’di ciḵki gwo mo gom a’di mo dhali a’di ṯoshki p̱ar miimera kamu/ e mo jin miikina a’di mo.
42023009	Wakan a’di doṯki a’di gwon tiya ka ris mo, hili a’di diki ’de’k ’twaŋ kamu/ mo be.
42023010	Dhali igasiis kun can mo dhali iman’kwar to mo doshkin ki ’dishe/ mo mmo’cwara ’cwar mo mmoyer a’di is ki gway mo be.
42023011	Dhala Hirodus nyaḵka askar piti mo tani uni kar a’di ki mon’the is mo dhali mmomii a’di ka maḵ mo. Yan’ko’d uni ki hi’th a’di burrinye/ jin c̱a’bki ’be’d ’be’di is mo dhali a’di ki hash a’di ka nyaŋ’ko’d eya Bilaaṯus mo be.
42023012	Dhala Hirodus dhala Bilaaṯus uni warkin ka mugu ka rem ’kup̱ mo ka teeŋ gana/ c̱aan mo haali/ ki mii yansan nṯwa/a/ mo tani uni ta ’kup̱ ka rem ’kup̱ mo be.
42023013	Yan’ko’d Bilaaṯus ki tul igasiis kun can is mo dhali ’kwani kun tana ’kaŋ’kup̱ pa mo dhali ’kwani mmonṯal ’de/ mo be.
42023014	Dhali a’di ki o uni gwo mo ki: Um suski wathi/ yansan i aha/ mo me’d wathin ’de/ jin o gwo ap̱o/ ’kwani mo. Dhali ŋ’ko’d aha/ palkina a’di mo mbwambori um mo. Dhali hili mo mo ma aha/ dinaki gam wathi/ yansan ’peni ton ṯal ’deŋ kamu/ jin ṯẖutha a’di mii mo jin ona um a’di gwo ap̱o/ mo.
42023015	Walla Hirodus si’da/ haali/ a’di hashki a’di ka nyaŋ’ko’d e ana mo. Dhali hili mo mo ma. Toŋ kamu/ yisa di’da jin ha me’d ki mowu mo jin miikina a’di mo be.
42023016	Dhali gom mii gi wakan mo tani aha/ mina c̱i a’di monṯo’k mo dhali ’cuḵ a’di mo be.
42023017	Dhali a’di midi mii ta mii mo jin mina a’di mii ’cuḵ wathin ’de/ gom uni ka cim gun ’boron mo be.
42023018	Hili uni ’baar mo cuukin ki nyanye/ mo mmonṯal ’de/ mo ki: Ka bor ’deŋ gana/ e wathi/ yansan mo, dhali ’cuḵi amana Baraabas mo —
42023019	wathi/ jin biṯkunu mo eya sijin mo gom gwo gi onuwa ’cesh e ’peŋkuman bampa/ mo dhali haali/ a’di ta’da man’kosha mee mo.
42023020	Dhala Bilaaṯus ṯorki uni gwo mo doḵ/e mmodina gwo a’di i bwa mo mmo’cuḵa Yesus mo be.
42023021	Hili uni cuukin ki dhan ’twa/ kun caaca mo ki: ’Koshi a’di ki cwany’ciṯẖan dhul mo ma. ’Koshi a’di ki cwany’ciṯẖan dhul mo ma.
42023022	Me’di kwara a’di ki o uni gwo mo ki: Goma tinta? tonthus wakata imiikina a’di mo? Aha/ dinaki gam miiŋ kamu/ jin ṯẖutha a’di mii mo jin midi ha me’d ki mowu mo. Gom mii gi wakan mo tani aha/ mina c̱i a’di monṯo’k mo dhali ’cuḵ a’di mo be.
42023023	Hili uni ’kokin mo mmo’cece’b gwo mo mmodoṯ gwo ki cuuwa/ kun caaca mo ki a’di minu ’taki ’kosh ki cwany’ciṯẖan dhul mo. Dhali ’twam buni p̱iki gwo jip̱i/ mo be.
42023024	Wakan Bilaaṯus a’di dhalki gwon dwall me’d mo ki gwom buni kun doṯa uni minu mii mo be.
42023025	A’di ’cuḵki uni wathi/ jin biṯu eya sijin mo gom gwo gi onuwa ’cesh mo dhali goma mee jin ’kosha a’di mo, a’di jin doṯkina uni mo, hila Yesus a’di c̱ikunu uni mo gom gwo gi bwam buni mo be.
42023026	Dhali me’d jin suskina uni a’di i bway mo tani uni bu’thki wathin ’de/ jin ta’da Simaan gi Paŋ Kerawaan mo, a’di jin yayi’d ’peni pa mo dhali uni ki ’thiḵ a’di cwany’ciṯẖan dhul piti m’ba/ mo mmoḵal a’di ŋ’ko’da Yesus mo be.
42023027	Dhali adhana waambuhany ’kwani baṯẖki a’di isho’k mo dhali ki up̱ ilu/ mo uni gun miikina c̱inthar mo dhali ko kagahara gom a’di mo be.
42023028	Hila Yesus ṯu’kki ’ban mo dhali o uni gwo mo ki: I’bwa/ gi ’Kwani gi Pa Urushaliim, dhalku/ ki ko gom aha/ mo ma, hili koyi gom is bum mo dhali gom uc̱im bum mo.
42023029	Haali/ hili mo mo ma, atee mini p̱u’du/ mo jin mina uni o gwo mo ki: Mom’bor mii gom uni gun tana burum mo dhali bwa kun molona dho’th ki sule/ mo dhala bor kun ’koki c̱iya ko mmop̱i ki sule/ mo.
42023030	Dhali yan’ko’d uni mini ṯel mii ’pen mo mmo/o wosha turga/ gwo mo ki: Biṯi ap̱o/ am mo ma, dhali e wosh kun boc̱a/ she/ ki: Kumi aman is mo ma.
42023031	Haali/ waḵki/ uni mii to yansan mo ki cwa yathaya’th mo tani atinta midi di mo ŋ’ko’d ki a’di midi ḵu’th mo?
42023032	’Kwanin tiya ’koni su/ si’da/ uni kun ṯẖu’thki mii mo, uni suskunu ka pije/ mo mmo’kosh jwa mo nyaḵki a’di mo be.
42023033	Dhali ki uni p̱u’dkin mo e mo jin yuḵu ka Simaŋ ’Kup̱ mo tani uni ki ’kosh a’di ki cwany’ciṯẖan dhul mmun mo. Dhali uni gun ṯẖuthi mii mo, jan ṯal ’de/ ki ’bana bim poros piti mo dhali jan ṯal ’de/ ki ’bana biny cam piti mo be.
42023034	Dhala Yesus ki o gwo mo ki: Ababa, dhalki uni miinthus buni ’pen mo ma, haali/ uni ’koki mish to jin miina uni mo be. Dhali uni ṯa’kki to mo mmoḵwa/ burrinyem piti bwa mo.
42023035	Dhali ’kwani doshkin ki ’dishe/ mo mmohil mo mo, hili ’kwani kun tana ’kaŋ’kup̱ pa mo waḵki a’di mo mmo/o gwo mo ki: A’di woṯẖki kun tiya mo tani dhalki a’di woṯẖ is pitiŋ gana/ mo ma, waḵki/ a’di ta’da Ḵrisṯẖos ’peni Arumgimis mo, a’di jin ta jim pitin ’de/ jin kwanykunu mo.
42023036	Dhali i/askar si’da/ mii a’di ka maḵ mo. Uni iikin mo dhali c̱i a’di tom’pac̱a’d mo,
42023037	dhali mmo/o gwo mo ki: Waḵki e tana Maliḵ gi ’Kwani Yahuuda/ mo tani woṯẖi/ is pini mo ma.
42023038	Dhali gwo si’da/ ’kwarkunu mo ŋ’kup̱i a’di mo ki: Yansan ta’da Maliḵ gi ’Kwani Yahuuda/ mo be.
42023039	Dhali jan ’de/ jin ṯẖuthi mii mo jin shirkunu ap̱o/ cwany’ciṯẖan dhul mo tani o a’di gwo mo mmo/o ki: Dina /e ki ta Ḵrisṯẖos ’taa? Woṯẖi is pini mo ma dhali aman mo.
42023040	Hili jaŋ kamu/ ḵucurki a’di ki gwo mo mmo/o gwo mo ki: Dina /e ki ḵo/ka Arumgimis mo ’taa? Haali e dikin ’ko’di me’d gi gwon dwall gi miiwaḵ jin nyaḵa’d mo.
42023041	Dhali ana ka jiŋ gana/ miinu ka ḵar/e kan mo. Haali/ ana bu’thkina a’di jin minu mii c̱i ana mo gom mii gun miikina ana mo, hili wathi/ yansan diki ṯẖu’th toŋ kamu/ mii mo be.
42023042	Dhali a’di ki o gwo mo ki: Yesus, kayi aha/ e mo ma, ki /e mini p̱u’dku/ mo e mom’bi’th gi bampam pini mo.
42023043	Dhali a’di ki o a’di gwo mo ki: Ka jiŋ gana/ aha/ ona /e gwo mo ki: Shwane e mini nyaḵ di ki aha/ mo e monyjaro/ e momis mo.
42023044	Dhali mo wana e ka tente/ bwaŋ ’kup̱ mo tani dhali mondhurumi’d p̱u’dki’d mo ap̱o/ mony’ceshi ’baar mo ntaga tente/ mbum ’ban mo be.
42023045	Ka tente/ uski moŋkush piti mo tani dhali burrinye/ jin di’d e gu’b gi mondheleladhelel mo tani a’di dherkunu bwa mo ka ’ban su/ mo be.
42023046	Dhali yan’ko’d Yesus ki cuu ki dhan ’twa/ jin caaca mo mmo/o gwo mo ki: Ababa, e me’d pini mo tani aha/ c̱ikina /e shi/in pem mo be. Dhali ki a’di oki gwo yansan mo tani a’di ki c̱i shi/ir piti jiŋ ’ko’d mo.
42023047	Dhali ka mancil ma askar iss ’kwanimpa imudhe’d p̱arki a’di jin bu’thki mo e mo tani a’di maŋki’da Arumgimis mo dhali o gwo mo ki: Ka jiŋ gana/ wathi/ yansan a’di di’d ka p̱o/ mo be.
42023048	Dhali awaambuhany ’kwani ’baar mo kun tulki is mo mmop̱ar mo e mo tani ki uni p̱arki a’di jin bu’thki mo e mo tani uni doḵki bway pa mo mmodora bor buni ki me’d mo be.
42023049	Dhali aris ’kwani kun mishki a’di mo dhali up̱ mo, uni gun baṯẖki a’di nsho’k mo ’peni Pany Jaliil mo tani doshkin isa dhana/ mo dhali p̱ar to gwansan e mo be.
42023050	Dhali wathiŋ kamu/ di’d jin yuḵu gway ka Yuusup̱ mo, a’di ’peni pa gi ’Kwani Yahuuda/ mo jin yuḵu ka Arraama mo. A’di ta jan ’de/ ’peni montul is gi ’kwaniŋ gwanyjaḵa/ gi ’Kwani Yahuuda/ mo jin ta wathim ’boro’d mo dhali wathiŋ ḵar/e mo be.
42023051	A’di diki gam gwo me’d ki gwom buni gun ’ko uni mbwa mo dhali mii mo hili a’di c̱orki’da c̱or mo gom Bampa/ ma Arumgimis mo.
42023052	Wathi/ yansan yaki’d eya Bilaaṯus mo dhali doṯ a’di gwo mo gom is ma Yesus mo be.
42023053	Dhali yan’ko’d a’di ki bu’th a’di ka ’cesh mo dhali a’di ki ’tam a’di is ki burrinyen dhiny e mo dhali kar a’di e jis wosh jin c̱wanyu gom jis jwa mo jin dinuki kar jan ṯal ’deŋ kamu/ nycine/ naskina/ mo.
42023054	A’di ta’da tee jin Thosonkunu to mo dhali acim ma pesu/ ṯelkunu ’pen mo be.
42023055	Dhali up̱ kun nyaḵki ii ki a’di ’peni Pany Jaliil mo tani baṯẖkina baṯẖi sho’k mo dhali uni p̱arki moŋ’kup̱aje e mo dhali mo jin karkunu is piti nycine/ mo.
42023056	Dhali yan’ko’d uni ki doḵ bway pa mo dhali uni ki thoson to kun ḵuyi mo mo dhala yina p̱i’dna mo. Dhali ka cim ma pesu/ mo tani uni siki is mo isi ki gwoŋḵan jin ’kwarkunu mo be.
42024001	Hili ka tee jin ṯwa/a/ ka dhas mon’thamo/ ka’tum mo tani uni iikin mo e moŋ’kup̱aje mo mmoḵal to kun ḵuyi/ mo mo kun thosonkina uni mo be.
42024002	Dhali uni gamki wosh ḵa’ckunu mo ’peni ’twaman jis jwa mo.
42024003	Hili ki uni iiki bwaman mo tani uni ’koki gam buŋgwar is gi Tap̱a Yesus mo be.
42024004	Ki uni ’kokin mo mmodumbul gom mii yansan mo tani hili mo mo ma, ’kwani su/ doshkini uni mo kun shwakina burrinye/ ka wara sho’k mo.
42024005	Dhali me’d jin ḵo/kina uni is mo tani uni luŋki bwam/em buni a’cesh mo dhali ’kwani ki o uni gwo mo ki: Atinta ŋap̱kina um a’di jin di’d ki e ’peni bwam mowu kan mo? A’di diki di mmahan mo. Hili a’di piki’d mo be.
42024006	Kayi gwo e mo ma, a’di jin ṯorkina a’di um mo ki a’di di’d naskina/ e Pany Jaliil mo
42024007	ki Ya/ gi ’Kwani minu mii c̱i ’kwanin thusi me’d mo dhali minu mii ’kosh jwa mo ki cwany’ciṯẖan dhul mo dhali ka cim kwara mo tani a’di midi cu mis mo be.
42024008	Dhali uni kaki gwom piti e mo be
42024009	dhali doḵ ka nyaŋ’ko’d ’peni moŋ’kup̱aje mo mmoṯor uni aris to gwansan ki uni gun ’koni ’kume’d i’ce’dka ’de/ mo dhali aris ’kwanin tiya si’da/ mo be.
42024010	Dhala Mariyam Magdaliyya dhala Yuwanna dhala Mariyam jin ta KoYakuub dhali up̱a tiya mo nyaḵki ’ko ki uni mo uni gun ṯori to gwansan e uni gun dhunu ki she/ mo.
42024011	Hili gwo gwansan kun onu mo tani wa uni e ki gwo gi ’kwani kun sona du mo dhali uni ’koki gam uni gwo is mo be.
42024012	Hila Buṯerus cuki mis mo dhali gus mo e moŋ’kup̱aje mo dhali tu mo mo dhali p̱ar bwaman e mo. Dhali a’di ki p̱ar burrinyen dhiny e e mo mmo’ko e mom buni mo dhali a’di doḵ bway pa mo dhali a’di merki’d mo gom to gun miikin mo be.
42024013	Dhali ka tee yansan gana/ mo tani ’kwani su/ ’peni bwam uni ’kokin mo mmo/ii bway Pa jin yuḵu gway ka Imwaas mo, a’di jin wana e ki ŋaṯgini pesu/ ’peni Pa Urushaliim mo be.
42024014	Dhali uni ’kokin mo mmoṯora ṯor ka rem ’kup̱ mo goma ris to gwansan kun miikin mo be.
42024015	Ki uni ’kokin mo mmoṯora ṯor mo dhali mmodhaŋ gwo n’twa/ mmonṯal ’de/ mo tani Yesus ki is piti ’dishki uni is mo dhali nyaḵ ya ki uni mo be.
42024016	Hili em buni ’kokunu mo mmodiḵ mo ’peni monyiṯẖ a’di mo be.
42024017	Dhali a’di ki o uni gwo mo ki: Gwon tinta ’kona um mo mmoburushi ’twa/ mo ka rem ’kup̱ mo mmo/iina um kan mo? Dhali uni doshkin mo naskina/ mmohil mo ki bwan diṯi’d mo.
42024018	Dhali jan ’de/ ’peni uni mo tani yuḵkunu gway ka Kilyubaas mo, thoḵki a’di gwo mo ki: /e ta jasi wathi/ yilkinan ’de/ e Pa Urushaliim mo jin diki mish to gwansan kun miikin ka tee gwansan mo ’taa?
42024019	Dhali a’di ki o uni gwo mo ki: Ton tinta mo? Dhali uni ki thoḵ a’di gwo mo ki: Isi gwo goma Yesus gi Pa Naasira mo, a’di jin ta’da manc̱i gwo mo, a’di jin ta gi mii gun ’bitha’bi’th mo dhali gwo ibwambor ma Arumgimis mo dhali eya ris ’kwani ’baar mo.
42024020	Dhali hili igasiis kun can bana mo dhali ’kwaniŋ ’kaŋ’kup̱ pa mo tani uni c̱iki a’di mo ki a’di minu waḵ mo mmowu mo dhali mmo’kosh a’di jwa mo ki cwany’ciṯẖan dhul mo.
42024021	Hili aman takina ga ’teŋ kap̱e/ ki a’di ta jan ’de/ mmowan ’Kwani ma Israyiil ’ba/ mo be. Nye, dhali ka ris to gwahan ka roṯẖam p̱o/ mo tani a’di ta’da tee kun ’koni kwara mo shwane/ ki to gwansan miikin mo be.
42024022	Dhali up̱a tiya ’peni bampam bam mo tani merki aman e mo. Uni ’kokin e moŋ’kup̱aje mo e mon’thamo/ ka’tum mo
42024023	dhali uni ’koki gam is piti mo. Dhali uni doḵkin ka nyaŋ’ko’d mo mmo/o gwo mo ki uni hilki jasi tonyjan jin wana e ki iman’doyu gwo mo, a’di jin o gwo mo ki a’di di’d ki e mo be.
42024024	’Kwanin tiya ’peni ’kwani gwansan, uni gun nyaḵki ’ko ki am mo tani uni iikin mo e moŋ’kup̱aje mo dhali gam a’di mo me’d jasi gwo jin ona up̱ mo, hili a’di mo tani ’kona uni ki p̱ar e mo be.
42024025	Dhali a’di ki o uni gwo mo ki: Ayy um ’kwani kun ta p̱us mo dhali kun gwa’d ma du ki gwa’d mo mmo’koki gam aris gwo ’baar is mo kun okina imanc̱i gwo ma Arumgimis kadhamo/ mo.
42024026	A’di diki ta mii jin minu mii mii mo ka Ḵrisṯẖos mina is ’taki diki mii ’kosh ka nyor gom to gwansan mo dhali cic̱ mo e monycam piti mo ’taa?
42024027	Dhali mmoṯel ’pen ’pena Musa mo dhali imanc̱i gwo ma Arumgimis kadhamo/ mo tani a’di ki ṯor uni aris ’pemen gwo kun ’kwarkunu mo e Gwo ma Arumgimis mo goma ris to gi isi gom is piti mo be.
42024028	Wakan uni ’dishki pa is mo e mo jin iikina uni mo. A’di wana e ki a’di ya’di ya gi yam piti mo.
42024029	Hili uni woṯẖki a’di ’kup̱ mo mmo/o gwo mo ki: C̱a’bi nyaḵki am mo ma haali/ mo ta mom’peŋḵaskum mo be haala tee ’baara ’pen mo be. Wakan a’di seki bwaman mo mmonyaḵ c̱a’bki uni mo be.
42024030	Dhali ki a’di diki’da tharabeesa nyaḵki uni mo tani a’di bu’thki maaŋḵuthu’d mo dhali ’bora ’bor bwa i is mo dhali ’ce’d a’di mo dhali c̱i a’di ki uni mo be.
42024031	Dhali em buni ḵa’dkunu mo dhali uni nyiṯẖki a’di mo dhali a’di p̱iki’d mo ’peni bwam/em buni mo be.
42024032	Dhali uni o gwo ka rem ’kup̱ mo ki: ’Kon ma dum bana ki su’kka war mo mmo’kona ana mmoṯora/ ṯor e bway tur mo? mmoḵa’dkina a’di ana Gwo ma Arumgimis kun ’kwarkunu mowa?
42024033	Dhali uni cuki mis mo ka tenteŋ gana/ yansan mo dhali doḵ ka nyaŋ’ko’d mo e Pa Urushaliim mo. Dhali uni ki gam uniŋ ’kume’d i’ce’dka ’de/ mo tulki is mo mmonṯal ’de/ mo dhali uni gwansan kun nyaḵki ’ko ki uni mo
42024034	dhali uni kun o gwo mo ki: Tap̱a, ka jiŋ gana/ a’di cuki mis mo dhali a’di piki’da Simaani is mo.
42024035	Dhali yan’ko’d uni ki ṯor uni to kun miikin e bway tur mo dhali mmonyiṯẖkina uni a’di mo mmo’ce’d maaŋḵuthu’d mo be.
42024036	Dhali ki uni ’kon mo mmo/o gwo yansan mo tani Yesus ki is piti doshki’d mo mbwam uni mo dhali o uni gwo mo ki: Moŋḵu’th is e um mo.
42024037	Hili uni dherkina is bwa mo mmoḵo/ is mo dhali ṯoshki uni p̱arkina arum e mo be.
42024038	Dhali a’di ki o uni gwo mo ki: Atinta murkina uma du kan mo? Dhali gwondoṯa tinta cuki’d mo eya dum bum kan?
42024039	Hili me’d pem dhali sho’k pem mo ma. Aha/ ki is pem tana a’di mo be. Budhi aha/ is ki me’d mo ma dhali p̱ar e mo, haala rum diki ta gi buŋgwar is mo dhala sima/ mo me’d jin p̱arkina um e mo kun taka/ mo be.
42024040	Dhali ki a’di oki gwo yansan mo tani a’di ki ṯor uni me’d piti i e mo dhali sho’k piti mo be.
42024041	Dhali ki uni ’kokin mo mmothis gwo ’koki gam is naskina/ mo gom moŋ’kuny bwa mo dhali momer mo tani a’di ki o uni gwo mo ki: Um tan gi toŋ kamu/ mmoshwa mmahan mo ’taa?
42024042	Dhali uni ki c̱i a’di ushi kuluny shum wa’c mo jin ’thosu mo
42024043	dhali a’di ki bu’th a’di mo dhali ’ka ibwambori uni mo be.
42024044	Dhali yan’ko’d a’di ki o uni gwo mo ki: Gwo gwansan ta gwom pem kun oka/ um mo ki aha/ dina um naskina/ mo, ka ris to gwansan kun ’kwarkunu mo gom aha/ mo e gwoŋḵan ma Musa jin c̱inu mo dhali e gwo gi imanc̱i gwo ma Arumgimis kadhamo/ mo dhali eya Masamiir mo tani minu mii thim mo be.
42024045	Yan’ko’d a’di ki ḵa’d uni adum buni e mo mmomish gwo ’ban mo gom Gwo kun ’kwarkunu mo be.
42024046	Dhali a’di ki o uni gwo mo ki: Wakan a’di ’kwarkunu mo ka Ḵrisṯẖos minu mii ’kosh is ka nyor mo dhali ka cim kwara mo tani a’di midi cu mis mo ’peni mowu mo.
42024047	Dhali ki gwo gom mo gi rijuwa du is mo dhali gom gwo gi minu dhal miinthus gi ’kwaniny’cesh ’pen mo tani minu mii c̱i ki gway piti mo e kal gi ’kwaniny’ceshi ’baar mo mmoṯel ’pen ’peni Pa Urushaliim mo be.
42024048	Um ta iman/o gwo gom to gwansan mo be.
42024049	Dhali hili mo mo ma aha/ mina hash gwo jin on ma Babam pem is mo ap̱o/ um mo be. Hili ’koyi e ’peŋkuman bampa/ mo ntagi um minu shum mo ki mom’bi’th mo ’peni momis jin eḵa/ eḵ mo be.
42024050	Dhali yan’ko’d a’di ki shu uni bway ka pije/ mo ntagi Pam Beeṯaniya mo. Dhali a’di ki ’de’k me’d piti ki mis mo dhali ’bor uni mii mo be.
42024051	Ki a’di di’d mmo’bor uni mii mo tani a’di ki ḵwa/ is piti ’peni uni mo dhali a’di bu’thkunu bway momis mo be.
42024052	Dhali uni luŋki a’di mo mmodoḵ ka nyaŋ’ko’d mo e Pa Urushaliim mo ka dhan bwaŋ ’kunyga/ mo be
42024053	dhali uni ’kokin mo mmorash ’ko mo e gu’b gi mondheleladhelel mo mmo’bora Arumgimis bwa i is mo be.
43001001	Ka muŋ’kup̱ tani Gwo diki’d dhali Gwo di’d eya Arumgimis mo dhali Gwo ta’da Arumgimis mo be.
43001002	A’di diki’d ’peni ka muŋ’kup̱ nyaḵka Arumgimis mo be.
43001003	Aris to ’baar mo ’kokunu mo mmo/uḵ ki a’di mo dhali ton ṯal ’deŋ kamu/ yisa di’da jin uḵu ki dar gi a’di mo.
43001004	E a’di mo tani mondiki/e diki’d mo dhali mondiki/e a’di ta moŋkush gi ’kwani mo be.
43001005	Dhali moŋkush a’di ’twaḵki mondhurumi’d bwa mo dhali mondhurumi’d diki p̱i a’di e mo be.
43001006	Wathi/ diki’d jin ṯu’ckin ma Arumgimis ki yaku/ mo, a’di jin yuḵu gway ka Yohaan mo be.
43001007	A’di p̱u’dki’d mo gom gwo mmoṯor mo, mmoṯor gwo mo gom moŋkush mo, ka ris ’kwani ’baar mo mini gam gwo is e a’di mo be.
43001008	A’di diki ta moŋkush ki is piti mo. Hili a’di p̱u’dki’d mo mmoṯor gwo gom moŋkush mo be.
43001009	Dhali moŋkush gana/ a’di diki’d mmoyayu/ i ’kwaniny’cesh mo be, a’di jin ta moŋkush gana/ mmokusha ris ’kwaniny’ceshi ’baar mo ka ’deṯe/ ’deṯe/ mo be.
43001010	A’di diki’d e mony’cesh mo dhali ’kwaniny’cesh uḵkunu ki a’di mo tani hili a’di ’kona ’kwaniny’cesh ki nyiṯẖ mo be.
43001011	A’di p̱u’dki’d e kum piti tani dhali ’kwanim piti ’koki bu’th a’di mo be.
43001012	Hili aris uni ’baar mo kun bu’thki a’di kun gam gway piti is mo tani a’di c̱iki uni mom’bi’th mo mmowar ki uc̱i ma Arumgimis mo be.
43001013	Uni gun dhodhu ’pena bas yisa, walla ’peni bwa gi buŋgwar is yisa, walla ’peni bwa wathi/ yisa, hili ’peni Arumgimis mo be.
43001014	Dhali Gwo warki’d ki buŋgwar mo dhali shurki c̱a’b mo e bwam ana mo, ’tu’du/ ka ’the dhali ki gwoŋ gana/ mo. Ana mishkina cam piti mo, monyca gi Ya/ jin di’d ṯal ’de/ ’peni Com mo be.
43001015	(Yohaan a’di ṯorki gwo gom a’di mo dhali cuu gwo mo ki: Wathi/ yansan a’di ta jin ṯorka/ um gwo mo ki: A’di jin midi p̱u’du/ i’ko’di aha/ mo tani a’di icaki’d ki aha/ mo haali/ a’di diki’di ṯwa/a/ ki aha/ mo be. )
43001016	Dhali ’pena ’tu’d piti mo tani ana ’baar bu’thkina ’the mo mmomara ’the is mo be.
43001017	Haali/ gwoŋḵan jin c̱inu mo tani a’di c̱ikunu ka Musa mo. Hili a’the dhali gwoŋ gana/ p̱u’dkin ’pena Yesus Ḵrisṯẖos mo be.
43001018	Wathin ṯal ’deŋ kamu/ yisa di’da jin p̱arki’da Arumgimis e ki sule/ sule/ mo be, hili jasi Ya/m pitin ṯal ’de/ a’di jin diki’da bor gi com mo, a’di jin ṯorki a’di eya tente/ mo be.
43001019	Dhali yansan ta gwo jin ṯor ma Yohaan mo ki ’Kwani Yahuuda/ hashki igasiis mo dhali ’Kwani Lawi ’peni Pa Urushaliim mo mmodoṯ a’di gwo mo ki: Ki /e tana ajaye?
43001020	A’di ki pi gwo mo. A’di diki ur gwo mo. Hili a’di piki gwo mo mmo/o gwo mo ki: Aha/ dinaki ta Ḵrisṯẖos mo be.
43001021	Dhali uni ki doṯ a’di gwo mo ki: Ba /e tana ja sa/? /E tana Iliyya ’taa? A’di ki o gwo mo ki: Aha/ tana a’di yisa. Dhali uni ki o a’di gwo mo ki: I/e tana manc̱i gwo de? Dhali a’di ki thoḵ uni gwo mo ki: Yisa.
43001022	Dhali yan’ko’d uni ki o a’di gwo mo ki: Ba ki /e tana jaye? Dhalki aman mina mii tagi gwon thoḵ gom uni gun hashki aman mo. Ata ona /e gwo gom is pini kan mo sa/?
43001023	A’di ki o gwo mo ki: Aha/ tana ’twa/ wathin ṯal ’de/ mo mmocuu gwo mo e mombwaasho ki: Kari bway Tap̱a ka ji sho’k mo ma, me’d gwo jin okin ma manc̱i gwo ma Arumgimis kadhamo/ mo jin yuḵu gway ka Ishaya mo.
43001024	Dhali uni hashkunu mo ’peni ’Kwani P̱arisiyiin mo be.
43001025	Dhali uni doṯki a’di gwo mo ki: Katinta imiikina /e ’kwani ki yi’de/ mo waḵki e diki ta aḴrisṯẖos mo walla Iliyya mo walla amanc̱i gwo mo?
43001026	Dhala Yohaan ki thoḵ uni gwo mo ki: Aha/ miikina mii jin miikunu ki yi’de/ mo tani hili wathi/ doshki’di bwam um mo jin molkina um mo be.
43001027	Isi a’diyini jin midi yayu/ i’ko’di aha/ mo, dhali wac̱kana p̱p̱am piti mo tani aha/ dinaki ha me’d mo mmo’cuḵ uni mo be.
43001028	Mii yansan a’di bu’thki mo mo e Pam Beeṯaniya mo e bwamp̱o/ Yi’deŋ Ḵumma/ Uurdun mo e mo jin miikin ma Yohaana mii ki yi’de/ mo be.
43001029	Dhali ka cim jiŋ ’ko’d mo tani a’di p̱arki’da Yesus e mo mmoyayu/ ’kup̱ kadhoŋ mo i a’di mo dhali o gwo mo ki: Hili mo mo ma, Ari Ḵa’bal ma Arumgimis a’di jin midi ḵal miinthus gi ’kwaniny’cesh mo be.
43001030	Wathi/ yansan a’di ta a’di jin ṯorka/ um gwo mo ki: ’Ko’di aha/ tani wathi/ midi p̱u’du/ mo a’di jin caki’d ki aha/ nṯwa/a/ mo haali/ a’di diki’di ṯwa/a/ ki aha/ mo be.
43001031	Aha/ ki is pem dinaki mish a’di mo. Hili gom mii yan mo tani aha/ p̱u’dkina mo mmomiiya mii jin miinu ki yi’de/ mo ki a’di minu ṯor eya tente/ e ’Kwani ma Israyiil mo be.
43001032	Dhala Yohaan ṯorki gwo mo mmo/o gwo mo ki: Aha/ p̱arkina Shi/in Dheleladhelel e mo mmothulu/ me’d gurko/ ’peni momis mo mmoc̱a’ba p̱o/ a’di mo be.
43001033	Aha/ ki is pem dinaki mish a’di mo. Hili a’di jin hashki aha/ mo mmomiiya mii jin miinu ki yi’de/ mo tani a’di o aha/ gwo mo ki: A’di jin mina /e p̱ar Shi/in e mmothulu/ mo dhali c̱a’ba p̱o/ a’di mo tani a’di ta a’di yansan jin mii’da mii jin miinu ki Shi/in Dheleladhelel mo be.
43001034	Dhali aha/ mishkina mo mo dhali ta aman/o gwo ki a’di yansan ita Ya/ ma Arumgimis mo be.
43001035	Dhali ka cim jiŋ ’ko’d mo tani aYohaan a’di doshki’d mo nyaḵki imanciḵ a’di gwo isu/ mo be.
43001036	Dhali a’di ki p̱ara Yesus e mo me’d jin yayina a’di mo dhali o gwo mo ki: Hili mo mo ma. A’di ta Ari Ḵa’bal ma Arumgimis mo be.
43001037	Dhali imanciḵ a’di gwo su/ ciḵki gwo mo mmo/ona a’di gwo yansan mo dhali uni baṯẖkina Yesus nsho’k mo be.
43001038	Yesus ki ṯuka bor mo dhali p̱ar uni e mo mmobaṯẖkina uni a’di nsho’k mo dhali o uni gwo mo ki: Atinta ŋap̱a um mo? Dhali uni ki thoḵ a’di gwo mo ki: Rabbi, (a’di jin ta ’pemen gwo jin onu ka Manṯor Gwo mo) ki /e dini mana mo?
43001039	A’di ki thoḵ uni gwo mo ki: Iiyu/ mo ma dhali p̱ar mo e mo. Uni p̱u’dkin mo dhali p̱ar mo e mo jin c̱a’bkina a’di mo dhali uni nyaḵki ’ko ki a’di ka tee c̱aan mo haali/ atente/ ta’da tente/ idoŋon mo be.
43001040	Jan ṯal ’de/ ’peni uni su/ jin ciḵ gwo ma Yohaan jin ṯora a’di mo dhali jin baṯẖ a’di nsho’k mo tani a’di ta’da Andaraawus mo, jin ta’da kam ma Simaan Buṯerus mo be.
43001041	A’di gamki’da kam piti nṯwa/a/ mo jin ta’da Simaan mo dhali o a’di gwo mo ki: Aman gamkina aMasiyya (jin ta ’pemen gwo jin onu ka Ḵrisṯẖos mo be).
43001042	A’di suski’da kam piti eya Yesus mo dhala Yesus p̱arki a’di e mo dhali o a’di gwo mo ki: Hayyiye /e tana Simaan jin ta ya/ ma Yohaan mo. /E minu yuḵ gway ka Sap̱a mo (a’di jin ta ’pemen gwo ka Buṯerus mo).
43001043	Dhali ka cim jiŋ ’ko’d mo tani Yesus p̱u’da/ bwa ka pije/ mo mmoya Pany Jaliil mo. Dhali a’di gamki’da P̱ilibbus mo dhali o a’di gwo mo ki: Baṯẖi aha/ nsho’k mo ma.
43001044	Dhala P̱ilibbus a’di ta wathi/ gi Pam Beeṯsayda mo jin ta ’peŋkuman bampa/ ma Andaraawus dhala Buṯerus mo be.
43001045	Dhala P̱ilibbus a’di gamki’da Naṯẖana/iil mo dhali o a’di gwo mo ki: Aman gamkina wathi/ yin jin okin ma Musa mo e gwoŋḵan jin c̱inu mo dhali imanc̱i gwo ma Arumgimis kadhamo/ mo, uni si’da/ ’kwarki gwo mo goma Yesus gi Pa Naasira mo, a’di jin ta Ya/ ma Yuusup̱ mo.
43001046	Dhala Naṯẖana/iil ki thoḵ a’di gwo mo ki: A/mina tom ’boro’da kamu/ piyu/ mo ’peni Pa Naasira mowa? P̱ilibbus ki thoḵ a’di gwo mo ki: Yayu/ mo ma dhali p̱ar e mo.
43001047	Dhala Yesus mishki’da Naṯẖana/iil mo mmop̱u’du/ e a’di mo dhali o a’di gwo mo ki: Hili mo mo ma. Wathi/ ’peni ’Kwani ma Israyiil ka jiŋ gana/ jin dar ga maḵ mo.
43001048	Dhala Naṯẖana/iil ki thoḵ a’di gwo mo ki: /E mishi aha/ kata moye? Yesus ki thoḵ a’di gwo mo ki: Nṯwa/a/ ka P̱ilibbus diki yuḵ /e mo ki /e dina lamp̱u/ mo tani aha/ p̱arkina /e e mo be.
43001049	Dhala Naṯẖana/iil ki thoḵ a’di gwo mo ki: Rabbi, /e ta Ya/ ma Arumgimis mo. /E tana Maliḵ gi ’Kwani ma Israyiil mo be.
43001050	Dhala Yesus ki thoḵ a’di gwo mo ki: Haali/ gom gwo jin oka e ki aha/ p̱arkina /e e eya lamp̱u/ mo tani a’di igama /e gwo is mowa? /E mini p̱ar dhan to kun caaca e mo mmobol gwansan e mo.
43001051	Dhali a’di ki o a’di gwo mo ki: Ka jiŋ gana/ ka jiŋ gana/ aha/ ṯora /e gwo mo ki um mini p̱ar momis e mo mmodi ki ḵany mo, dhali iman’doyu gwo ma Arumgimis mo mmoseku/ mo dhali mmothulu/ mo ap̱o/ Ya/ gi ’Kwani mo be.
43002001	Dhali ka cim kwara mo tani momiimash diki’d e Paŋ Kaana gi Pany Jaliil mo. Dhali KoYesus diki’d imun mo be.
43002002	Dhala Yesus si’da/ yuḵkunu mo e momiimash yan mo nyaḵki imanciḵ a’di gwo mo be.
43002003	Ki yimana mura’th bolu ki is mo tani KoYesus p̱u’dki’d mo dhali o a’di gwo mo ki: Uni dar gi yimana mura’th mo be.
43002004	Dhala Yesus ki owa yim gwo mo ki: Ayy a’boma. A’di midi mii /e katinta dhali aha/ mo? Haali/ mom pem diki p̱u’d naskina/ mo be.
43002005	Dhali kum ki o imanmiiya ṯu’c gwo mo ki: Miiyi a’diyin jin mina a’di iṯor um mo.
43002006	Dhali dhur wosh ’kokini pe’de/ mo kun caaca mo kun dhukunu mo gom ’Kwani Yahuuda/ mo mmolam to mo me’d mii gi gwoŋḵan jin c̱inu mo be. Jin ṯal ’de/ ḵalki’da jaluun bwamani iss ’de/ mo walla jaluun bwamani iss ’de/ i’ce’dka ’kume’d mo be.
43002007	Yesus ki o uni gwo mo ki: ’Tu’di dhur gwansan ki yi’de/ mo ma. Dhali uni ki ’tu’d uni ki sheŋgolu/ ilu/ mo be.
43002008	Dhali a’di ki o uni gwo mo ki: Pashi mo ma dhali ha’bki a’di eya mancila to gi mo jin yuḵuwa yuḵ mo. Wakan uni ha’bki a’di mo be.
43002009	Dhali ka mancila to gi mo jin yuḵuwa yuḵ mo nyoḵki yi’de/ jin warki’d ki yimana mura’th mo tani dhali a’di diki mish mo jin ha’bkunu a’di ’peni nycine/ mo (bahili jasi imanmiiya ṯu’c uni mishki mo jin ha’bkunu yi’de/ ’peni cine/ mo) dhala mancila to gi mo jin yuḵuwa yuḵ gom montul ’kup̱ mo tani a’di ki yuḵ wathinyaŋa’b mo be.
43002010	Dhali a’di ki o a’di gwo mo ki: Aris ’kwani ’baar mo ka ’deṯe/ ’deṯe/ c̱iki ’kwani yimana mura’th jin ’boro’di ṯwa/a/ mo, dhali ki ’kwani p̱ikini kap̱ mo tani yimana mura’th jin thap̱athap̱ mo c̱iyunu ’kwani mo be. Hili /e karki yimana mura’th gana/ mo ntagi shwanesan mo be.
43002011	Mii yansan a’di ta miimer jin ṯwa/a/ jin miikin ma Yesus e Paŋ Kaana gi Pany Jaliil mo dhali a’di ki ṯor monycam piti eya tente/ mo, dhali imanciḵ a’di gwo gamki gwo is e a’di mo be.
43002012	Dhali ’ko’di mii yan mo tani a’di yaki’d ka luŋgu’b e Paŋ Kap̱ranahuum nyaḵki kum mo dhali ikam piti mo dhali imanciḵ a’di gwo mo dhali uni ki ’ko imun ka cim ka hony/e mo be.
43002013	Dhali Mompe’kup̱anyolos gi ’Kwani Yahuuda/ dishki’d mo dhala Yesus yaki’d ka gagamis e Pa Urushaliim mo be.
43002014	Dhali e gu’b gi mondheleladhelel mo tani a’di gamki uni gwansan kun ’kokin mo mmoyola morbip̱ mo dhali ḵa’bal mo dhali gurko/ mo, dhali uni kun ta imanwan emena guurush mo eya ṯu’c buni mo be.
43002015	Dhali a’di ki ṯo’d guluca ’ci’d mo dhali a’di ki ur uni ’baar ka pije/ mo ki ḵa’bal ilu/ mo dhali ka morbip̱i lu/ mo ’peni gu’b gi mondheleladhelel mo, dhali a’di ki wol emena guurush ’pera ’cesh mo dhali a’di ki kuma tharabeesam buni ’twa/a ’cesh mo.
43002016	Dhali a’di ki ṯor uni gwansan gwo mo, uni gun yolki gurko/ mo ki: ’Doyi to gwansan mo. Um mini ’koki mii gu’b ma Babam pem me’d gu’b gi moyol mo.
43002017	Imanciḵ a’di gwo kakina gwo e mo jin ’kwarkunu mo jin o gwo mo ki: Anyor gom gu’b pini mo tani a’di miga/ shwa mo be.
43002018	Dhali yan’ko’d ’Kwani Yahuuda/ ki o a’di gwo mo ki: Jamas mii gi wakatinta imina /e imii mo mmoṯor am mmomiina /e to gwansan mo.
43002019	Yesus ki thoḵ uni gwo mo ki: ’Koshi gu’b gi mondheleladhelel yansan mo dhali ka cim kwara mo tani aha/ mina ’de’k a’di imis mo be.
43002020	Dhali ’Kwani Yahuuda/ ki o a’di gwo mo ki: Gu’b gi mondheleladhelel yansan a’di bu’thki yil issu/ i’ce’dka pe’de/ ap̱o/ mmonyaŋ a’di mo dhali /e mini ’de’k a’di imis ka cim kwara mmanakan?
43002021	Hili a’di oki gwo mo gom gu’b gi mondheleladhelel jin ta buŋgwar is piti mo be.
43002022	Dhali wakan ki a’di cuyunu mis mo ’peni mowu mo tani imanciḵ a’di gwo kana gwo e mo jin okina a’di wakansan mo dhali uni gamki Gwo jin ’kwarkunu is mo dhali gwo jin okin ma Yesus mo be.
43002023	Dhali ki a’di diki’d e Pa Urushaliim ka cim gi Mompe’kup̱anyolos jin yuḵuwa yuḵ mo tani ’kwani ka ris gamki gwo is e gway piti mo mmomishkina uni jamas miim piti kun miikina a’di mo.
43002024	Hila Yesus ki is piti diki’d naskina/ mmowo’d uni mo
43002025	haali/ a’di mishki’da ris ’kwani ’baar mo dhali midi mii diki ta gi jan ṯal ’deŋ kamu/ mmoṯor a’di gwo ap̱o/ ’kwani mo haali/ a’di ki is piti mishki to kun ’kon e bwaŋ ’kwani mo be.
43003001	Dhali wathiŋ kamu/ diki’d ’peni ’Kwani P̱arisiyiin jin yuḵkunu gway ka Nikudimus mo a’di jin ta tap̱a gi ’Kwani Yahuuda/ mo be.
43003002	Wathi/ yansan p̱u’dki’da Yesus mon’thiny mo dhali o a’di gwo mo ki: Rabbi, aman misha ki /e tana Manṯor Gwo jin p̱u’dki’d ’peni Arumgimis mo. Haali/ jan ṯal ’deŋ kamu/ yisa di’da jin midi mish jamas mii gwansan mii mo kun miina /e mo, hili isi ciki/ Arumgimis midi nyaḵ di i a’di mo be.
43003003	Yesus ki thoḵ a’di gwo mo ki: Ka jiŋ gana/, ka jiŋ gana/, aha/ ṯora /e gwo mo ki: Isi ciki/ waḵki/ jan ṯal ’deŋ kamu/ dinuki dho’th ki dho’th this ’peni momis mo tani a’di midi mol se Bampa/ ma Arumgimis mo be.
43003004	Nikudimus ki thoḵ a’di gwo mo ki: Ki wathi/ jin ca’d minu mish dho’th kata mo? Mina a’di mish se bwaŋ kum doḵ/e ki a’di minu dho’th mowa?
43003005	Yesus ki thoḵ a’di gwo mo ki: Ka jiŋ gana/, ka jiŋ gana/, aha/ ṯora /e gwo mo ki: Isi ciki/ waḵki/ jan ṯal ’deŋ kamu/ dinuki dho’th ’peni yi’de/ dhali ’peni Shi/in mo tani a’di midi mol cic̱ Bampa/ ma Arumgimis mo be.
43003006	C̱aan jin dhodhu ’peni buŋgwar is mo tani ta buŋgwar is mo dhali c̱aan jin dhodhu ’peni Shi/in mo tani a’di ta shi/in mo be.
43003007	Dhalku/ ki mer mo gom gwo jin oka e mo ki: Um minu mii dho’th ki dho’th this ’peni momis mo.
43003008	’Tham poshki’d ki bwam piti mo dhali /e ciḵki is jin gwona a’di mo, hili /e diki mish mo jin yayina a’di mo walla mo jin yakina a’di mo. A’di ta mondho’th gi wakan be jin dhodhuwa ris ’kwani ’baar mo ka ’deṯe/ ’deṯe/ kun dhodhu ki Shi/in mo be.
43003009	Dhala Nikudimus ki thoḵ a’di gwo mo ki: Yan minu mish mii kataye?
43003010	Dhala Yesus ki thoḵ a’di gwo mo ki: /E tana manṯor ’Kwani ma Israyiil gwo mo dhali /e din naskina/ mmodiki mish gwo yansan ’ban mowa?
43003011	Ka jiŋ gana/, ka jiŋ gana/, aha/ ṯora /e gwo mo ki: Haali/ aman ṯora gwo gi to jin misha aman mo dhali ṯor gwo gi to jin p̱ara aman e mo. Hili um ’koki bu’th gwo jin ṯora aman mo be.
43003012	Waḵki/ aha/ ṯora um gwo gom to ga ’cesh mo dhali um ’koki gam gwo is mo tani ba um mini mish gwo gam is kata mo waḵki/ aha/ ṯora um gwo gom to gi momis mo?
43003013	Wathin ṯal ’deŋ kamu/ yisa di’da jin seki momis mo, hili a’di jin thulki’d ’peni momis mo, a’di jin ta Ya/ gi ’Kwani mo, a’di jin diki’d e momis mo be.
43003014	Dhali me’d jin ’de’k ma Musa tasha/ e mombwaasho mo tani wakan si’da/ Ya/ gi ’Kwani minu mii ’de’k mo be,
43003015	ki a’diyin jin midi gam a’di gwo is mo tani midi ta gi mondiki/e ki sule/ sule/ ya ye ’ba/ mo be.
43003016	Haali/ Arumgimis enki ’kwaniny’cesh kagahara tani a’di c̱ikina a’di Ya/m piti jin di’d ṯal ’de/ mo, ki a’diyin jin midi gam a’di gwo is mo tani midi ’taki diki this e mo hili midi ta gi mondiki/e ki sule/ sule/ ya ye ’ba/ mo.
43003017	Haali/ Arumgimis hashki Ya/m piti i mony’cesh yansan yisa mmowaḵ ’kwaniny’cesh mo, hili ki ’kwaniny’cesh minu woṯẖ ki a’di mo be.
43003018	A’diyin jin gam a’di gwo is mo tani yisa waḵuwa, hili a’diyin jin diki gam gwo is mo tani a’di waḵkunu hila/ mo be haali/ a’di diki gam gway gi Ya/ ma Arumgimis jin di’d ṯal ’de/ is mo.
43003019	Dhali miiwaḵ a’dan be ki moŋkush p̱u’dki’d e ’kwaniny’cesh mo tani dhali ’kwaniny’cesh enki mondhurumi’d mo, mmodhal moŋkush e i is mo haali/ miim buni kun miikina uni mo tani ta thus ki thus mo be.
43003020	Haali/ aris uni ’baar mo kun miiki to kun ta thus ki thus mo tani shi/ki moŋkushi e mo dhali ’koki iiyu/ imoŋkush mo isi ciki/ ki miim buni minu ’taki be’d mo be.
43003021	Hili a’di jin boṯki’d mmomii gwoŋ gana/ mo tani a’di p̱u’dki’d mo e moŋkush mo, ki a’di minu ṯor eya tente/ mo ki miim piti kun miikina a’di mo tani uni wagaskin ma Arumgimis mo be.
43003022	Dhali yan’ko’d ki mii yansan mo tani Yesus dhali imanciḵ a’di gwo uni iikin e Bampa/ Yahuudiyya mo, dhali nyaḵki c̱a’b ki uni imun mo dhali mmomiiya mii ki yi’de/ mo be.
43003023	Dhala Yohaan si’da/ a’di miiki’da mii ki yi’de/ e Pa Enuun jin ’dish Pa Saliim is mo haali/ yi’de/ caaca imun mo. Dhali ’kwani p̱u’dkin mo dhali ’kokunu mo mmomiiya mii ki yi’de/ mo be.
43003024	Haala Yohaan dinuki kara sijin naskina/ mo be.
43003025	Dhali gwo jin sugu mo cuki’d mo ibwaman imanciḵa Yohaan gwo mo dhali Wathi/ Yahuudaŋ kamu/ mo gom mii jin miinu mmolam to mo me’d mii gi gwoŋḵan jin c̱inu mo be.
43003026	Dhali uni p̱u’dkina Yohaan mo dhali o a’di gwo mo ki: Rabbi, a’di jin nyaḵki di ki /e e bwamp̱o/ Yi’deŋ Ḵumma/ Uurdun mo tani a’di jin ṯorkina /e gwo mo tani a’di a’dani, miiki’da mii jin miinu ki yi’de/ mo, dhali aris ’kwani ’baar mo iikini a’di mo be.
43003027	Yohaan ki thoḵ uni gwo mo ki: Wathin ṯal ’deŋ kamu/ yisa di’da jin midi bu’th toŋ kamu/ mo hili isi ciki/ a’di c̱ikunu a’di ’peni momis mo be.
43003028	Um ki is bum ta iman/o gwo gom aha/ mo, gwo jin oka/ um ki aha/ dinaki ta Ḵrisṯẖos mo, hili aha/ hashkunu nṯwa/a/ mo gom a’di mo be.
43003029	A’diyin jin ta gi nyaranyaŋa’b mo tani a’di ta wathinyaŋa’b mo, dhali amugu gi wathinyaŋa’b jin doshki’d mo dhali ciḵ a’di ’twa/ mo tani a’di ’kunya bwa ki ’kuny kagahara mo mmociḵ ’twa/ gi wathinyaŋa’b mo. Dhali wakan si’dayi a’di ’kunyka/ bwa ki ’kuny mo shwane/ jin ta bwaŋ ’kunyu’d pem mo.
43003030	A’di midi mii eḵa/ eḵ mo, hili aha/ mina mii wa she/ is kan mo be.
43003031	A’di jin p̱u’dki’d ’peni momis kan mo tani a’di ta ji gi di’d ap̱o/ ’kwani ’baar mo. A’di jin yayi’d ’peni mony’cesh mo tani ta ji jin cil ma ’cesh mo dhali ki ’twany ’cesh mo tani a’di ki o gwo mo. A’di jin p̱u’dki’d ’peni Momis mo tani a’di ta ji gi di’d ap̱o/ ’kwani ’baar mo be.
43003032	A’di ṯorki gwo gom a’di jin p̱arkina a’di e mo dhali gwo jin ciḵkina a’di mo, dhali wathiŋ kamu/ yisa di’da naskina/ jin bu’thki gwo jin ṯora a’di mo be.
43003033	A’diyin jin bu’thki gwo jin ṯora a’di mo tani ’dap̱ka’d ki a’di yansan mo ka Arumgimis ta jiŋ gana/ mo be.
43003034	Haali/ a’di jin hashkin ma Arumgimis mo tani a’di ṯorki gwo ma Arumgimis mo haali/ a’di diki c̱i a’di Shi/in me’d jin baru to mo.
43003035	Haali/ a’di jin ta Com enki Ya/m piti mo dhali c̱iya ris to ’baar mo e me’d piti mo be.
43003036	A’diyin jin gamki gwo is e Ya/m piti mo tani a’di ta’d gi mondiki/e ki sule/ sule/ ya ye ’ba/ mo be. A’diyin jin diki ha gwo gi Ya/ e mo tani a’di midi diki p̱ar mondiki/e e mo, hili anyor ma Arumgimis c̱a’bki’d ap̱o/ a’di mo be.
43004001	Dhali ki Tap̱a nyiṯẖki’d ki ’Kwani P̱arisiyiin ciḵki gwo ka Yesus diki’d mmomar imanciḵ a’di gwo is mo dhali mmomiiya mii jin miinu uni ki yi’de/ si’da/ mmobol kum ma Yohaan e mo
43004002	(ba Yesus yisa imii uni ki yi’de/ ki is piti mo hili jasi imanciḵ a’di gwo mo be).
43004003	Dhali a’di dhalki Pa Yahuudiyya ’pen mo dhali doḵki’d ka nyaŋ’ko’d e Pany Jaliil mo be.
43004004	A’di midi mii ya ki tur mo e Pan Saamira mo be.
43004005	Wakan a’di p̱u’dki’d e ’peŋkuman Bampa/ gi Pan Saamira, a’di jin yuḵkunu gway ka Suḵar mo, a’di jin ’dishki mo ma ’cesh ma Yakuub is jin c̱ikina a’di ya/m piti ka Yuusup̱ mo be.
43004006	Dhali jis yi’de/ ma Yakuub si’da/ diki’di mun mo be. Dhali wakan aYesus si’da/ a’di wukina is e mo gom ya jin yayina a’di nyaḵki imanciḵ a’di gwo mo. Dhali a’di c̱a’bki’da ’cesh nshemen jis yi’de/ mo. Haali/ mo ta’da tente/ mbwaŋ ’kup̱ mo be.
43004007	Dhala ’bom gi Pan Saamira p̱u’dki’d mo mmomush yi’de/ mo. Yesus ki owa yim gwo mo ki: C̱iyi aha/ mmop̱i mo ma.
43004008	Haali/ imanciḵ a’di gwo mo uni iikin e ’peŋkuman bampa/ mo mmoyolu/ tonṯe/ mo be.
43004009	Dhala ’bom gi Pan Saamira ki thoḵ a’di gwo mo ki: Ki /e jin ta Wathi/ Yahuuda/ ’tho aha/ yi’de/ ip̱i manakan? aha/ jin tana ’bom gi Pan Saamira mo? Haali/ ’Kwani Yahuuda/ usha gwo me’d nyaḵki ’Kwani Samiriyiin mo be.
43004010	Dhala Yesus ki thoḵa yim gwo mo ki: Waḵki e mini nyiṯẖ to jin c̱in ma Arumgimis ki me’d mo dhali gom gwo gi a’di yansan jin o /e gwo mo ki: C̱iyi aha/ yi’de/ aha/ p̱ina mo tani /e mini ’taki doṯ a’di mo dhali a’di midi ’taki c̱i /e yi’de/ jin di ki e. mo be.
43004011	Dhala ’bom ki thoḵ a’di gwo mo ki: Tap̱a, /e dar gi to mmomush yi’de/ mo dhali jis yi’de/ ’kula’kul mo ba/. Yi’de/ jin di ki e mina /e igam ’peni mana mo?
43004012	A/ki /e can ka babam bam ka Yakuub ’taa? a’di jin c̱iki aman jis yi’de/ yansan mo? Dhali a’di ki is piti p̱iki’d si’da/ mo ’peni jis yi’de/ yansan mo dhali iya/m piti mo dhali to/em piti mo be.
43004013	Yesus ki thoḵa yim gwo mo ki: Aris uni ’baar mo ka ’deṯe/ ’deṯe/ kun p̱i yi’de/ yansan mo tani mina yi’de/ doḵ/e bu’th mo be.
43004014	Hili a’diyin jin midi p̱i yi’de/ jin miga/ c̱i a’di mo tani mina yi’de/ diki doḵ/e bu’th ki sule/ sule/ mo. Yi’de/ jin miga/ c̱i a’di mo tani midi war mo e a’di mmokash mo dhali mmodu’d mo ntagi mondiki/e ki sule/ sule/ ya ye ’ba/ mo be.
43004015	Dhala ’bom ki thoḵ a’di gwo mo ki: Tap̱a, c̱iyi aha/ yi’de/ yansan mo ma, ki aha/ mina yi’de/ diki doḵ/e bu’th mo walla mmodiki yayu/ imahan mmoha’b yi’de/ mo be.
43004016	Yesus ki owa yim gwo mo ki: Yaku/ mo ma. Yuḵa kaṯẖim pini mo dhali yayu/ imahan mo.
43004017	Dhala ’bom ki thoḵ a’di gwo mo ki: Aha/ dara ga kaṯẖim pem mo. Yesus ki thoḵa yim gwo mo ki: Gwom pini ’boro’d mo jin ona /e gwo mo ki: Aha/ dara ga kaṯẖim pem mo be.
43004018	Haali e ’dap̱kina gwaṯẖ ’twa/ ka mudhe’d mo dhali a’di jin di’di /e shwane/ mo tani yisa ta’da kaṯẖim piniya. Gwo yan ona /e ki oŋ gana/ mo be.
43004019	Dhala ’bom ki o a’di gwo mo ki: Tap̱a, aha/ nyiṯẖkina ki /e tana manc̱i gwo ma Arumgimis mo be.
43004020	Haali/ ibabam bam uni iluŋkin e ’kuwosh yansan mo be dhali um o gwo ki mo gi Pa Urushaliim a’di ta mo jin mina ’kwani ḵa mii iluŋ mo ba/.
43004021	Yesus ki thoḵa yim gwo mo ki: A’boma, gami aha/ gwo is mo ma. Mo midi p̱u’du/ mo ki um mini ’koki luŋa Baba e ’kuwosh yan mo walla e Pa Urushaliim mo be.
43004022	Um luŋki to jin ’kona um ki mish mo. Aman luŋkina a’di jin misha aman mo haali/ mowoṯẖ piyi’d mo ’peni ’Kwani Yahuuda/ mo be.
43004023	Hili, mo midi p̱u’du/ mo dhali a’di a’dan shwane/ mo ki uni gun luŋkina luŋ ki bwaŋ gana/ mo tani mini luŋa Baba ki shi/in mo dhali ki gwoŋ gana/ mo haala Baba ŋap̱ki ku gi wakansan mmoluŋ a’di mo be.
43004024	Arumgimis ta shi/in be dhali uni gwansan kun luŋki a’di mo tani mini mii luŋ a’di ki shi/in dhali ki gwoŋ gana/ mo be.
43004025	Dhala ’bom ki thoḵ a’di gwo mo ki: Aha/ misha ka Masiyya midi p̱u’du/ mo (a’di jin yuḵu gway ka Ḵrisṯẖos mo tani), dhali ki a’di midi p̱u’du/ mo tani a’di midi ṯor aman aris to ’baar mo be.
43004026	Yesus ki thoḵa yim gwo mo ki: Aha/ jin ṯora /e gwo mo tani aha/ a’dan be jin tana a’di mo be.
43004027	Dhali yan’ko’d ki ’ta’b mo tani imanciḵ a’di gwo p̱u’dkin mo. Dhali uni merkin mo mmoṯorkina a’di aṯor ka ’bom mo. Hili jan ṯal ’deŋ kamu/ yisa ḵa’d ’twa/ mo mmo/o gwo mo ki: Atinta ŋap̱a /e mo, walla, Atinta ṯorkina /e aṯor nyaḵka yim mo?
43004028	Wakan a’bom dhalki dhur yi’dem piti ’pen mo dhali ya ’peŋkuman bampa/ mo dhali ṯor ’kwani gwo mo ki:
43004029	Iiyu/ mo ma dhali p̱ar wathiŋ kamu/ e mo jin ṯorki aha/ aris tom pemi ’baar mo kun miikika/ mo. Yansan diki ta Ḵrisṯẖos ’teya?
43004030	Dhali uni iikin ka pije/ mo ’peni bampa/ mo dhali p̱u’dku/ i a’di mo be.
43004031	Ki embul mo yan mo tani imanciḵ a’di gwo ŋap̱ki a’di mo mmo/o a’di gwo mo ki: Rabbi, shwayi to mo ma.
43004032	Hili a’di ki thoḵ uni gwo mo ki: Aha/ takina gi tonṯe/ mmoshwa mo a’di jin molkina um mo be.
43004033	Wakan imanciḵ a’di gwo o gwo ka rem ’kup̱ mo ki: Ki wathiŋ kamu/ ḵalki a’di tonṯe/ mmoshwa mo ’taa?
43004034	Yesus ki thoḵ uni gwo mo ki: Tonṯem pem jin shwaka/ mo tani ta bwa gi a’di jin hashki aha/ mo dhali mmothima ṯu’c piti mo be.
43004035	’Kona um ki o gwo mo ki: Appe boc̱a ’kup̱i doŋon mo naskina/ dhali yan’ko’d mo gi ’ciṯẖu/ to midi p̱u’du/ mo. Dhali aha/ ṯora um gwo mo ki: ’Deki em bumi mis mo dhali hili mombunto mo, a’di kusha to mo mo hila/ mmo/is mo gom mo jin minu ’ciṯẖ a’di to mo be.
43004036	A’di jin ’ciṯẖki to mo tani midi bu’th jin mina a’di gam mo dhali tul maman is gom mondiki/e ki sule/ mo. Wakan amanyeḵa ḵa’bany to mo dhali aman’ciṯẖ to mo uni ’kunykina bwa mo mmonṯal ’de/ mo be.
43004037	E mii yan mo tani gwo jin onu mo gama gam ki gwoŋ gana/ mo jin o gwo mo ki: Wathin ṯal ’de/ ki si to mo dhali jaŋ kamu/ ki ’ciṯẖ to mo be.
43004038	Aha/ hashkina um mo mmo’ciṯẖ a’di, a’di jin ’kokina um ki miiya ṯu’c mo. Kun tiya uni miikina ṯu’c mo dhali um cic̱kin e mo ma ṯu’c buni mo be.
43004039	’Kwani Samiriyiin ’peni ’peŋkuman bampa/ c̱aan mo tani gamki a’di gwo is mo haali/ gom gwo jin ṯor ma ’bom mo mmo/o gwo mo ki: A’di ṯorki aha/ gwo mo goma ris to ’baar mo kun miikika/ mo be.
43004040	Wakan ki ’Kwani Samiriyiin p̱u’dkin e a’di mo tani uni doṯki a’di mo mmonyaḵ c̱a’b e uni mo, dhali a’di c̱a’bki’di mun ka cim su/ mo be.
43004041	Dhali uni ka ris ris gamki gwo is mo gom gwom piti mo be.
43004042	Dhali uni ki owa ’bom gwo mo ki: A’di yisa di’d mmota gwom pini jin gama aman gwo is mo yisa haali/ aman ciḵkina gwo ki is bam mo, dhali aman misha a’di yansan ka jiŋ gana/ a’di ita’da Manwoṯẖ gi ’kwaniny’cesh mo be.
43004043	Dhali ’ko’da cim su/ mo tani a’di yaki’d e Pany Jaliil mo be.
43004044	Haala Yesus ki is piti ṯorki gwo ka manc̱i gwoŋ kamu/ yisa taḵu e bampam pitiŋ ganaa.
43004045	Wakan ki a’di p̱u’dki’d e Pany Jaliil mo tani ’Kwani gi Pany Jaliil hanki a’di mo mmomishkina uniya ris to gun miikina a’di mo e Pa Urushaliim e mo ma yuḵ jin yuḵu mo haali/ uni si’da/ iikin e mo jin yuḵuwa yuḵ mo be.
43004046	Wakan a’di p̱u’dki’d ka nyaŋ’ko’d e Paŋ Kaana gi Pany Jaliil e mo jin warkina a’di yi’de/ ki yimana mura’th mo. Dhali e Paŋ Kap̱ranahuum mo tani wathi/ ma maliḵa kamu/ diki’d jin ’ba’thkina ya/m piti mo be.
43004047	Ki a’di ciḵki gwo ka Yesus p̱u’dki’d ’peni Pa Yahuudiyya e Pany Jaliil mo tani a’di yaki’d mo dhali yuḵ a’di mo mmoyayu/ ka luŋgu’b mo dhali wac̱ ya/m piti mo haali/ a’di ’disha ’twa/ mmowu mo be.
43004048	Dhali wakan aYesus ki o a’di gwo mo ki: Isi ciki/ ki um ’koki p̱ar jamas mii e mo dhali momer mo tani um mini ’koki gam gwo is mo be.
43004049	Dhali wathi/ ma maliḵ ki o a’di gwo mo ki: Tap̱a, yayu/ ka luŋgu’b mo ma nṯwa/a/ ka ’cim pem diki wu mo.
43004050	Yesus ki o a’di gwo mo ki: Yaku/ mo ma. Ya/m pini midi di ki e mo. Dhali wathi/ gamki gwo is jin ṯorkin ma Yesus a’di mo dhali a’di yaki bway pa mo be.
43004051	Dhali ki a’di diki’d mmoyaku/ ka luŋgu’b mo tani imanmiiya ṯu’c piti gamki a’di ’kup̱ mo dhali ṯor a’di gwo mo ki: Ya/m pini a’di di’d ki e mo be.
43004052	Wakan a’di ki doṯ uni atente/ mo jin ṯelkina a’di mii ’pen mo mmowac̱ mo. Dhali uni ki thoḵ a’di gwo mo ki: Katili/ ka tente/ joc̱ is ’peni bwaŋ ’kup̱ mo mmota atenten ’de/ mo tani athunya/ ki dhal a’di ’pen mo be.
43004053	Dhali com ki misha tente/ jin okin ma Yesus a’di gwo mo ki: Ya/m pini midi di ki e mo. Dhali a’di ki is piti gamki gwo is mo dhali ’kwani gi gu’b piti ’baar mo be.
43004054	Dhali mii yansan a’di ta miimer kun ’kon ma p̱o/i su/ mo jin miikin ma Yesus mo me’d jin p̱u’dkina a’di ’peni Pa Yahuudiyya e Pany Jaliil mo be.
43005001	Dhali ’ko’di mii yan mo tani ayuḵ jin yuḵu mmotul ’kup̱ gi ’Kwani Yahuuda/ ’dishki’d mo dhala Yesus ya’d ka gagamis e Pa Urushaliim mo be.
43005002	Dhali ara al yi’de/ diki’d e Pa Urushaliim e ’twaŋkala goŋ ḵa’bal mo jin yuḵkunu ki ’twaŋ ’Kwani Ibraniyiin ka Beeṯ/hisda mo, a’di jin ’kokin ma lambalanyi mudhe’d mo be.
43005003	Dhali mo yansan a’di ta mo jin ishkin ma waambuhany ’kwani kun aṯẖa mom’bi’th mo dhali kun takina ja’da/ mo dhali kun ta ŋwol mo dhali kun ḵu’thkina is guŋkuru/ mo, mmoc̱or yi’de/ mmobaŋgal is mo,
43005004	haala man’doyu gwo gi Tap̱a thulki’d ki me’da tiya eya al mo dhali mmobaŋgal yi’de/ is mo. Dhali a’diyin jin thulki yi’de/ nṯwa/a/ ’ko’di yi’de/ baŋgalkunu is mo tani a’di wac̱ki’d ’peni ’ba’th yin jin ’koshki a’di mo be.
43005005	Wathin ṯal ’de/ diki’d, a’di jin ’ba’thki’d ki yil iss ’de/ i’ce’dka ’kume’d mo dhali pekwara mo.
43005006	Dhali ka Yesus p̱arki a’di e mo mmo/isha a’di ’ko’da ’cesh ki rash rash mo tani a’di ki o a’di gwo mo ki: /E ŋap̱an ki /e minu wac̱ mowa?
43005007	Dhali wathi/ jin ’batha’d a’di ki thoḵ a’di gwo mo ki: Tap̱a, aha/ dara gi wathi/ mmokar aha/ eya al mo ki yi’de/ baŋgalki is mo, dhali ki aha/ dina mmoya mo tani jaŋ kamu/ thulki’di ṯwa/a/ ki aha/ mo be.
43005008	Dhala Yesus ki o a’di gwo mo ki: Cuyi mis mo dhali ’deka cim pini dhali yayi mo.
43005009	Dhali ki jahanne/ wathi/ wac̱kunu mo dhali a’di ’de’kki’da cim piti mo dhali ya bway pa mo be. Dhali acim yansan a’di ta’da cim ma pesu/ mo be.
43005010	Dhali wakan ’Kwani Yahuuda/ ki o wathi/ jin wac̱kunu gwo mo ki: A’di ta’da cim ma pesu/ mo. A’di diki ta mii jin dhala gwoŋḵan /e bway mo mmoḵala cim pini mo be.
43005011	Hili a’di ki thoḵ uni gwo mo ki: Wathi/ jin wac̱ki aha/ mo tani a’di ki o aha/ gwo mo ki: ’Deki acim pini mo ma dhali yayi mo.
43005012	Dhali uni ki thoḵ a’di gwo mo ki: Ki wathi/ jana i/o /e gwo kan mo? mmo/o gwo mo ki: ’Deki acim pini dhali yayi mo?
43005013	Dhali wathi/ jin wac̱kunu mo tani a’di diki mish wathi/ mo haala Yesus borki is piti mo haala dhana waambuhany ’kwani caaca mo e mo c̱aan mo be.
43005014	Dhali yan’ko’d Yesus ki gam a’di e gu’b gi mondheleladhelel mo dhali o a’di gwo mo ki: Hili mo mo ma. /E ’borkina is mo. Dhalku/ miinthusa kamu/ ki mii mii doḵ/e mo jin mina jiŋ kamu/ jin shi/ashi/ mmobol yansan e mo diki ’kosh /e mo.
43005015	Dhali wathi/ yaki’d mo dhali ṯor ’Kwani Yahuuda/ gwo mo ka Yesus a’di iwac̱ki a’di mo be.
43005016	Dhali gom mii yan kan mo tani a’di ṯoca ’Kwani Yahuuda/ aYesus ’kus mo haali/ a’di miiki mii yansan ka cim ma pesu/ mo be.
43005017	Hila Yesus thoḵ uni gwo mo ki: Ababam pem di’d naskina/ mmomiiya ṯu’c mo. Dhali aha/ si’da/ dina mmomiiya ṯu’c mo.
43005018	Dhali gom gwo yan kan mo tani ’Kwani Yahuuda/ ’baar mo ŋap̱kina ŋap̱ mo ka dun dara’d mo mmo’kosh a’di mo haali/ a’di ilu/ yisa ’ce’dki jasa cim ma pesu/ yisa, hili si’da/ a’di yuḵki’da Arumgimis ki Com mo mmokar is piti mmonyaḵa nyaḵ ka Arumgimis mo be.
43005019	Dhali Yesus ki thoḵ uni gwo mo ki: Ka jiŋ gana/ ka jiŋ gana/ aha/ ṯora um gwo mo ki: Ya/ moli toŋ kamu/ mii ki bwam piti mo hili jasi a’di jin p̱arkina a’di Com e mo mmomii mo. Haali/ to yin jin miikina a’di mo tani wakan si’da/ Ya/ a’di miiki uni mo be.
43005020	Haali/ Ababa a’di enki Ya/m piti mo dhali ṯor a’di aris to ’baar mo a’di jin miikina a’di ki is piti mo. Dhali adhan mii kun can kun boli gwansan e mo tani mina a’di iṯor a’di i e mo ki um mini mer mo be.
43005021	Haali/ me’d jin ’de’kkin ma Baba uni kun wukin mo dhali c̱i uni moŋ’koki/e mo tani wakan si’da/ Ya/ c̱iki uni moŋ’koki/e mo uni gun ona bwa a’di mo be.
43005022	Dhala Baba diki dwall jan ṯal ’deŋ kamu/ gwo mo, hili aris gwon dwalli ’baar mo tani c̱ikina a’di Ya/ mo be ka ris ’kwani ’baar mo mini taḵ Ya/ mo,
43005023	ma me’dyin si’da/ taḵkina uniya Baba mo. A’di jin diki taḵ Ya/ mo tani diki taḵa Baba mo a’di jin hashki a’di mo be.
43005024	Ka jiŋ gana/, ka jin gana/ aha/ ona um gwo mo ki: A’diyin jin ciḵki gwom pem mo dhali gam a’di is mo a’di jin hashki aha/ mo tani a’di ita’d gi mondiki/e ki sule/ sule/ ya ye ’ba/ mo be. A’di midi diki yayu/ e miiwaḵ gi gwon dwall mo hili a’di ’ciṯẖki’d mo ’peni mowu mo ntagi moŋ’koki/e ki sule/ sule/ ya ye ’ba/ mo be.
43005025	Ka jiŋ gana/, ka jiŋ gana/ aha/ ṯora um gwo mo ki: Mo midi p̱u’du/ mo dhali a’di diki’d shwane/ mo, ki uni kun wukin mo mini ciḵ ’twa/ gi Ya/ ma Arumgimis mo, dhali uni gwansan kun ciḵkin mo tani mini ’ko ki e mo be.
43005026	Haali/ me’d jin tan ma Baba gi mondiki/e e is piti mo tani wakan si’da/ a’di c̱iki a’di Ya/m piti mo mmota gi mondiki/e e is piti mo be.
43005027	Dhali a’di c̱iki a’di moshirri ’baar mo mmotor mii ’twa/a ’cesh gi gwon dwall mo haali/ a’di ta Ya/ gi ’Kwani mo be.
43005028	Dhalku/ ki mer gom gwo yansan mo haali/ mo midi p̱u’du/ mo ka ris ’kwani ’baar mo kun ’kokin mo e jis jwa mo tani mini ciḵ ’twam piti mo be
43005029	dhali uni mini piyu/ ka pije/ mo uni gwansan kun miiki miim ’boron mo e mo jin pinu e moŋ’koki/e mo dhali uni gwansan kun miiki tonthus mo tani uni mini piyu/ e momiiwaḵ mo be.
43005030	Aha/ mola toŋ kamu/ mii ki moshirr pem mo. Me’d gwo jin ciḵkika/ mo tani aha/ ki dwall gwo mo. Dhali gwon dwall pem kun dwallka/ mo tani ta kuŋ ḵar/e mo haali/ aha/ dinaki ŋap̱i mmomii ki bwam pem mo, hili jasi ki bwa gi a’di jin hashki aha/ mo be.
43005031	Waḵki/ aha/ ona gwo gom is pem mo tani gwo jin ṯorka/ gom is pem mo tani diki ta jiŋ gana/ mo be.
43005032	Jamu/ diki’d jin ta’da man/o gwo gom aha/ mo dhali aha/ misha ki gwo jin ṯora a’di mo gom aha/ mo tani ta gwoŋ gana/ mo be.
43005033	Um hashki ’kwani eya Yohaan mo dhali a’di ta’da man/o gwo mo gom gwoŋ gana/ mo be.
43005034	Hili aha/ dinaki bu’th gwo jin ṯoru ’peni ’kwani mo, hili aha/ ona gwo yansan ki um minu woṯẖ mo be.
43005035	A’di ta o’d jin shwaki’d mo dhala lamba/ jin ’twaḵki mo mo, dhali um okina bwa mo mmo’kuny bwa mo mmo’ko ari’ceenne/ mo e moŋkush piti mo be.
43005036	Hili gwo jin okunu mo gom aha/ mo a’di ica’d mo mmobol gwo ma Yohaan e mo. Haali/ aṯu’c jin c̱ikin ma Baba aha/ mo mmothim a’di mo, aṯu’c gwansan gana/ kun dika/ mmomii mo tani uni ta iman/o gwo gom aha/ mo ka Baba a’di hashki aha/ mo be.
43005037	Dhali Ababa a’di jin hashki aha/ mo tani a’di ki is piti ta’da man/o gwo gom aha/ mo. ’Twam piti ’kona um ki ciḵ ki sule/ sule/ mo dhali ayir/em piti ’kona um ki p̱ar e ki sule/ sule/ mo be.
43005038	Dhali um ’kon kan ki dar gi gwom piti mmodi e um mo haali/ um ’koki gam a’di gwo is mo a’di jin hashkina a’di mo be.
43005039	Um ŋap̱kin ki burbur e bwaŋ Gwo ma Arumgimis kun ’kwarkunu mo haali/ um ṯoshkin ki um ta gi moŋ’koki/e ki sule/ sule/ ya ye ’ba/ mo e uni mo. Dhali uni itana man/o gwo gom aha/ mo be.
43005040	Dhali um ’kokin mo mmo/ush ki ’tash mo mmo/iiyu/ i aha/ mo ki um mini ta gi moŋ’koki/e mo.
43005041	Aha/ dinaki bu’th monyca ’peni ’kwani mo.
43005042	Hili aha/ misha ki mo/en jin mina umi ’taki ena Arumgimis mo tani p̱iyi’d e um mo be.
43005043	Aha/ p̱u’dkina ki gway ma Babam pem mo dhali um ’koki bu’th aha/ mo. Waḵki/ jan ṯal ’deŋ kamu/ midi ’taki p̱u’du/ ki gway piti mo tani a’di imina umi se ’twa/ ap̱o/ mo mmobu’th mo be.
43005044	Ba gwo mina umi mish gam is kata mo? um kun buthi monyca ka rem ’kup̱ mo dhali ’koki ŋap̱ monyca jin p̱u’dki’d ’peni Arumgimis jin di’d ṯal ’de/ mo?
43005045	Dhalku/ ki ṯosh ki aha/ mina yer um is ki gway eya Ababa mo. A’di ta’da Musa jin midi yer um is ki gway mo a’di jin karkina um ka ’teŋ kap̱em bum mo be.
43005046	Waḵki/ um mini ’taki gama Musa gwo is mo tani um si’da/ mini ’taki gam aha/ gwo is mo haali/ a’di ’kwarki gwo gom aha/ mo be.
43005047	Hili waḵki/ um ’koki gam gwo jin ’kwarkina a’di is mo tani ba um mini mish gwom pem gam is kata moye?
43006001	Dhali ’ko’di mii yansan mo tani Yesus yaki’d mo mmo’ciṯẖa/ gap̱ ma Al ma Jaliil mo a’di jin ta’da Al ma Thabariyya mo be.
43006002	Dhala waambuhany ’kwani baṯẖki a’di nsho’k mo haali/ uni mishki miimer kun miikina a’di gom uni gwansan kun ’koshkina ’ba’th mo be.
43006003	Dhala Yesus a’di yaki’d e ’kuwosh mo dhali a’di ki c̱a’ba ’cesh nyaḵki imanciḵ a’di gwo mo be.
43006004	Dhali Mompe’kup̱anyolos jin yuḵuwa yuḵ gi ’Kwani Yahuuda/ ’dishki’d mo be.
43006005	Dhali yan’ko’d mmo’deka a’di em piti ki mis mo dhali mmomisha a’diya waambuhany ’kwani mmop̱u’du/ i a’di mo tani Yesus ki owa P̱ilibbus gwo mo ki: ’Peni mana imina ana iyol maa mo jin mina ’kwani gwansan wakan i’taki shwa mo?
43006006	Gwo yansan okina a’di mo mmopal a’di mo haali/ a’di mishki’d ki is piti gom to jin mina a’di ’taki mii mo be.
43006007	P̱ilibbus ki thoḵ a’di gwo mo ki: Ariyaal iss ’kwanimpa ipe’de/ midi ’taki diki yol maaŋḵuthu’d mmo’kosh jwa mo gom uni ’baar mo ka ’deṯe/ ’deṯe/ mmo’ceṯẖ bwa ime’d ki gwa’d gwa’d mo.
43006008	Jan ṯal ’deŋ kamu/ ’peni imanciḵ a’di gwo jin yuḵkunu gway ka Andaraawus mo jin ta’da kam ma Simaan Buṯerus mo o a’di gwo mo ki:
43006009	A’ciŋ kamu/ di’di mahan jin ta’d gi maaŋḵuthu’di mudhe’d ’peni emen posa kamu/ mo dhali to yi’de/ isu/ mo. Hili uni gwansan minu miiya tinta ibwaman ’kwani ka ris kun wakan mo?
43006010	Yesus ki o gwo mo ki: Ṯuci ’kwani mmo’ko ’pena ’cesh mo. Dhali asho ’bina e ki ’bi mo. Wakan ’kwaniŋ gwas uni ’kokina ’cesh mo dhali mondeŋ jin deŋkunu uni e mo tani wana e ka alaap̱i mudhe’d mo be.
43006011	Yan’ko’d Yesus ki bu’th maaŋḵuthu’d mo dhali ki a’di ’borki’da ’bor bwa i is mo tani a’di ki c̱iki uni gwansan kun ’kokina ’cesh mo. Dhali to yi’de/ si’da/ miikunu wakansan mo me’d jin ŋap̱kina uni a’di mo be.
43006012	Dhali ki shwam buni jin shwakina uni a’di ikap̱ mo tani a’di ki ṯor imanciḵ a’di gwo gwo mo ki: Tuli kuluny maa kun uru ’kup̱ is mo ki jan ṯal ’deŋ kamu/ minu ’taki diki this e mo be.
43006013	Wakan uni tulki uni is mo dhali ’tu’dkina nura/ ka ’kume’d i’ce’dka su/ ki kuluny maa ’peni maaŋḵuthu’di mudhe’d ’peni emen posa kamu/ mo, kun dhalkina uni gwansan kun shwakin mo be.
43006014	Dhali ki ’kwani p̱arki miimer e mo jin miikina a’di mo tani uni o gwo mo ki: Wathi/ yansan ka jiŋ gana/ ta’da manc̱i gwo mo a’di jin midi yayu/ i mony’cesh mo be.
43006015	Dhali yan’ko’d mmonyiṯẖkina a’di uni mo ki uni muruni iiyu/ mo dhali bu’th a’di ki ’bi’th mo mmokar a’di ka maliḵ mo tani Yesus yaki’d mo doḵ/e e ’kuwosh mo a’di ’de/ mo be.
43006016	Ki mom’pimpili/ p̱u’dki’d mo tani imanciḵ a’di gwo uni iikin ka luŋgu’b eya al mo,
43006017	mmosekina uni e bwam ma ḵur mo dhali mmoṯel ii ’pen mo mmo’ciṯẖa/ gap̱ ma al e Paŋ Kap̱ranahuum mo. Dhali mo dhuruma/ dhurum mo be dhala Yesus diki yayu/ i uni naskina/ mo be.
43006018	Dhali yi’de/ birki bakal mo haali/ ’tham poshki’d kagahara mo be.
43006019	Dhali ki uni ’koshki cwa is me’d ŋaṯgini kwara mo walla idoŋon mo tani uni p̱arkina Yesus e mo mmoya ki sho’k e ’kup̱a al mo dhali a’di ’dishki’da ḵur is mo be. Dhali uni ḵo/kina ḵo/ is kagahara mo.
43006020	Hili a’di ki o uni gwo mo ki: Aha/ a’dan be. Dhalku/ is ki ḵo/ mo ma.
43006021	Dhali yan’ko’d uni ’kunykina bwa mo dhali bu’th a’di e bwam ma ḵur mo, dhali ki jahanne/ aḵur a’di p̱u’dki’d e mo jin ’kokina uni mmo/ii mo be.
43006022	Dhali ka cim jiŋ ’ko’d mo tani ’kwani kun ’kokina ’bana gap̱a kamu/ mo tani mishki mo mo ka ḵur diki’d jasi ṯal ’de/ imun mo, dhala Yesus diki se aḵur mo nyaḵki imanciḵ a’di gwo mo, hili imanciḵ a’di gwo uni iikin uni ’cena mo be.
43006023	Bahili jasa ḵur ’peni Pan Thabariyya mo tani p̱u’dkin mo mmo’dish mo is mo e mo jin shwakina uni maaŋḵuthu’d mo ’ko’di Tap̱a ’borki’da Arumgimis bwa i is mo be.
43006024	Wakan ki ’kwani mishkin ka Yesus diki di imun mo tani walla imanciḵ a’di gwo mo tani uni ki is buni seki bwam ma ḵur mo dhali ii e Paŋ Kap̱ranahuum mo mmoŋap̱a Yesus mo be.
43006025	Dhali ki uni gamki a’di e ’bana gap̱a ala kamu/ mo tani uni ki o a’di gwo mo ki: Rabbi, /e yayini mahan kakasja mo?
43006026	Dhala Yesus ki thoḵ uni gwo mo ki: Ka jiŋ gana/, ka jiŋ gana/ aha/ ṯora um gwo mo ki: Um ŋap̱i aha/, yisa mmop̱arkina um miimer e mo yisa, hili mmoshwakina um maaŋḵuthu’d ikap̱ mo be.
43006027	Dhalku/ ki miiya ṯu’c gom tonṯe/ mo jin midi ’ce’d sho’k mo hili gom tonṯe/ jin midi ’dim ’kup̱ ntagi moŋ’koki/e ki sule/ sule/ ya ye ’ba/ mo, a’di jin mina Ya/ gi ’Kwani ic̱i um mo. Haali/ e a’di mo tani Arumgimis jin ta Com mo a’di ’dap̱ki gwom piti ’twa/ ki a’di mo be.
43006028	Dhali yan’ko’d uni ki o a’di gwo mo ki: Aman mina mii miiya ta mo mmomii mii ma ṯu’c ma Arumgimis mo?
43006029	Yesus ki thoḵ uni gwo mo ki: Mii yaase a’di ta mii jin minu mii goma Arumgimis mo ba/ ki um mini gam a’di gwo is mo, a’di jin hashkina a’di ki yayu/ mo be.
43006030	Wakan uni ki o a’di gwo mo ki: Ki miimer wakata imina /e imii mo jin mina aman i’taki p̱ar e mo dhali gam /e gwo is mo? Mii gi wakata imiikina /e mo?
43006031	Ibabam bam shwakina manna mo e mombwaasho mo me’d Gwo ma Arumgimis jin ’kwarkunu mo jin o ki: A’di c̱iki uni maaŋ gana/ ’peni momis mmoshwa mo be.
43006032	Dhali yan’ko’d Yesus ki o uni gwo mo ki: Ka jiŋ gana/, ka jiŋ gana/ aha/ ṯora um gwo mo ki: AMusa, yisa a’di ic̱iki um maa yan ’peni momis yisa. Ababam pem a’di c̱iki um maaŋ gana/ yan ’peni momis mo be.
43006033	Haali/ maa ma Arumgimis a’di ta a’di jin p̱u’dki’da ’cesh ’peni momis mo dhali c̱i mondiki/e e ’kwaniny’cesh mo.
43006034	Uni ki o a’di gwo mo ki: Tap̱a, c̱i am maa yansan isa yempa/ mo ma.
43006035	Yesus ki o uni gwo mo ki: Aha/ tana maa gi mondiki/e mo be. A’diyin jin yayi’di aha/ mo tani mina ṯe/ diki bu’th mo, dhali a’di jin gam aha/ gwo is mo tani mina yi’de/ diki bu’th ki sule/ mo be.
43006036	Hili aha/ ṯora um gwo mo ki: Um p̱arki aha/ e mo tani dhali um ’koki gam aha/ gwo is naskina/ mo be.
43006037	Aris uni ’baar mo kun c̱ikin ma Baba aha/ mo tani uni mini iiyu/ i aha/ mo, dhali a’di jin midi yayu/ i aha/ mo tani aha/ mina diki ur a’di ka pije/ mo be.
43006038	Haali/ aha/ p̱u’dkina i mony’cesh yansan ’peni momis mo, yisa mmomii ki bwam pem yisa, hili ki bwa gi a’di jin hashki aha/ mo be.
43006039	Dhali a’di yansan ita bwam piti jin hashki aha/ mo, ki aha/ mina diki this jan ṯal ’deŋ kamu/ e mo ’pena ris uni gwansan kun c̱ikina a’di aha/ mo, hili aha/ mina ’de’k uni ka cim jiŋ ’ko’d mo be.
43006040	Haali/ a’di yansan ita bwa ma Babam pem mo, ki aris ’kwani ’baar mo ka ’deṯe/ ’deṯe/ kun p̱arki Ya/ e mo dhali gam gwo is e a’di mo tani mini ’taki ta gi moŋ’koki/e ki sule/ sule/ ya ye ’ba/ mo. Dhali aha/ mina ’de’k uni ka cim jiŋ ’ko’d mo be.
43006041	Dhali yan’ko’d ’Kwani Yahuuda/ uni miikina gumgum ap̱o/ a’di mo haali/ a’di oki gwo mo ki: Aha/ tana maa jin thulki’d ’peni momis mo be.
43006042	Uni o gwo mo ki: Wathi/ yan diki ta aYesus mo? a’di jin ta Ya/ ma Yuusup̱ mo. ’Kona ana ki mish com dhali kum mowa? Ba ata ona a’di gwo mo shwane/ ki: Aha/ thulkina ’peni momis mo?
43006043	Yesus ki thoḵ uni gwo mo ki: Dhalka gumgum ki mii e bwam um um ’cena kan mo.
43006044	Wathin ṯal ’deŋ kamu/ yisa di’da jin midi yayu/ i aha/ isi ciki/ Ababa jin hashki aha/, a’di dirki a’di mo. Dhali aha/ mina ’de’k a’di ka cim jiŋ ’ko’d mo be.
43006045	A’di ta gwo jin ’kwarkina imanc̱i gwo ma Arumgimis kadhamo/ mo ki: Dhali uni ’baar mo min ma Arumgimisi ṯor mo. Ki aris uni ’baar mo ka ’deṯe/ ’deṯe/ kun mini ciḵ gwo mo dhali da/ar ’pena Baba mo tani uni mini i/iiyu/ i aha/ mo be.
43006046	Wathin ṯal ’deŋ kamu/ yisa di’da jin p̱arki’da Baba e mo, hili isi ciki/ jasi a’di jin ta ji ’peni Arumgimis mo, a’di mishki’da Baba mo be.
43006047	Ka jiŋ gana/, ka jiŋ gana/ aha/ ṯora um gwo mo ki: A’diyin jin gamki gwo is mo tani ta’d gi mondiki/e ki sule/ sule/ ya ye ’ba mo be.
43006048	Aha/ tana maa gi mondiki/e mo be.
43006049	Ibabam bum shwakina manna e mombwaasho mo dhali uni wukin mo be.
43006050	A’di yansan ta maa jin thulki’d ’peni momis mo jin mina wathi/ ’taki shwa mo tani dhali a’di midi diki wu mo be.
43006051	Aha/ tana maa jin di’d ki e jin thulki’da ’cesh ’peni momis mo. Waḵki/ wathin ṯal ’deŋ kamu/ jin midi shwa maa yansan mo tani a’di midi di ki e ki sule/ sule/ mo. Dhali maa jin miga/ c̱i gom moŋ’koki/e gi ’kwaniny’cesh mo tani a’di ta buŋgwar is pem mo be.
43006052	Dhali yan’ko’d ’Kwani Yahuuda/ uni su’kkin ki gwo e bwaman c̱em buni mo mmo/o gwo mo ki: Ki wathi/ yansan midi c̱i ana buŋgwar is piti mmo’ka manakan?
43006053	Dhali wakan aYesus ki o uni gwo mo ki: Ka jiŋ gana/, ka jiŋ gana/ aha/ ṯora um gwo mo ki: Isi ciki/ waḵki/ um ’koki ’ka shuman is gi Ya/ gi ’Kwani mo dhali p̱i abas piti mo tani um mini ’koki ta gi moŋ’koki/e e is bum mo be.
43006054	A’diyin jin ’ka buŋgwar is pem mo dhali p̱iya bas pem mo tani a’di ta’d gi mondiki/e ki sule/ sule/ ya ye ’ba/ mo dhali aha/ mina ’de’k a’di ka cim jiŋ ’ko’d mo be.
43006055	Haali/ buŋgwar is pem a’di ta tonṯeŋ gana/ mo be dhali abas pem a’di ta to jin minu p̱i jin ta jiŋ gana/ mo be.
43006056	A’diyin jin ’ka buŋgwar is pem mo dhali p̱iya bas pem mo tani a’di nyaḵki c̱a’b e aha/ mo dhali aha/ e a’di mo be.
43006057	Dhali me’da Babam pem jin di’d ki e mo dhali hash aha/ mo tani dhali aha/ dina ki e mo goma Baba mo, wakan a’diyin jin midi ’ka aha/ mo tani midi di ki e mo gom aha/ mo be.
43006058	Yansan ta maa jin thulki’da ’cesh ’peni momis mo, yisa waki jin shwakina icim dhali wu mowa. A’di jin midi shwa maa yansan mo tani midi di ki e ki sule/ sule/ ya ye ’ba/ mo be.
43006059	Gwo yansan okina a’di e gu’b gi montul is buni mo me’d jin ṯorkina a’di uni gwo mo e Paŋ Kap̱ranahuum mo be.
43006060	Imanciḵ a’di gwo ka ris ki uni ciḵki gwo yansan mo tani uni o gwo mo ki: Gwo yansan ’bitha’bi’th mo be. Aja a’di imidi mish a’di ciḵ mo?
43006061	Hila Yesus a’di nyiṯẖki’d ki is piti mo ki imanciḵ a’di gwo miiki’da gumgum mo isi gom gwo yan mo tani dhali o uni gwo mo ki: Um si’da/ kolkunu mo gom gwo yansan mo de?
43006062	Waḵki/ wakan mo tani gwo midi wakataye waḵki/ um ki p̱ar Ya/ gi ’Kwani e mmoseku/ e mo jin dina a’di ’thissa/ mo?
43006063	A’di ta shi/in jin c̱i moŋ’koki/e mo. Buŋgwar is a’di aṯẖa/aṯẖ mo. Gwo jin ṯorka/ um mo tani uni ta shi/in dhali moŋ’koki/e mo be.
43006064	Hili unin tiya ’kokini bwam um mo kun ’koki gam gwo is mo. Haala Yesus mishki’d ’peni ka muŋ’kup̱ nṯwa/a/ mo uni gwansan kun mini ’koki gam gwo is mo dhali a’diyin jin midi ’taki ’ciṯẖ a’di is ki gwo mo be.
43006065	Dhali a’di ki o gwo mo ki: Gom gwo gi wakan mo tani a’di iṯorka/ um gwo mo ki jan ṯal ’deŋ kamu/ midi moli yayu/ i aha/ mo, hili isi ciki/ a’di imin ma Babam pemi c̱i a’di mo be.
43006066	’Ko’di mii yansan mo tani imanciḵ a’di gwo ka ris yeki gwo is mo dhali ’koki nyaḵ ii ki a’di mo be.
43006067	Yesus ki o uni gun ’koni ’kume’d i’ce’dka su/ gwo mo ki: I/um si’da/ mini ii mo ’taa?
43006068	Simaan Buṯerus ki thoḵ a’di gwo mo ki: Tap̱a, ki am mina ii aja mo? Ki /e a’di ita gi gwo gi mondiki/e ki sule/ sule/ ya ye ’ba/ mo.
43006069	Dhali aman gamkina gwo is mo dhali shorkina is mo dhali mish mo mo ki /e ta jan ṯal ’de/ jin ḵogu mo ’peni Arumgimis mo be.
43006070	Dhala Yesus ki thoḵ uni gwo mo ki: Dika/ ki kwany umi ’kume’d i’ce’dka su/ mo dhali jan ṯal ’deŋ kamu/ ’peni bwam um mo tani ta tap̱a ma ruma ’cesh mowa?
43006071	A’di oki gwo kan goma Yahuusa jin ta ya/ ma Simaan Isḵariyuuṯi, haali/ a’di ta jan ṯal ’de/ ’peni uniŋ ’kume’d i’ce’dka su/ mo jin midi ’ciṯẖ a’di is ki gwo mo.
43007001	’Ko’di mii yan mo tani Yesus yaki’d e Pany Jaliil mo. A’di ushki ya Pa Yahuudiyya mo haali/ ’Kwani Yahuuda/ uni ŋap̱ki a’di mmo’kosh jwa mo be.
43007002	Dhali ayuḵ gi ’Kwani Yahuuda/ jin yuḵuwa yuḵ mo gom Gu’b C̱iŋa/ mo tani ’dishki’d mo be.
43007003	Wakan ikam piti o a’di gwo mo ki: Dhali mo yan mo dhali yayi e Pa Yahuudiyya mo ki imanciḵ /e gwo mini ’taki p̱ar miim pini e jin miikina /e mo.
43007004	Haali/ wathiŋ kamu/ yisa di’da jin miiki’da ṯu’c ka ’di/ mo waḵki/ a’di ona bwa ki miim piti minu mish eya tente/ mo. Waḵki e mii to gwansan mo tani ṯori is pini eya tente/ e ’kwaniny’cesh mo.
43007005	Haali/ ikam piti si’dayi ’koki gam a’di gwo is mo be.
43007006	Dhala Yesus ki o uni gwo mo ki: Mom pem diki p̱u’d naskina/ mo be, hili mom bum uni ’kokin isa yempa/ mo.
43007007	’Kwaniny’cesh ’koki shi/ umi e mo, hili uni shi/ki aha/ i e mo haali/ aha/ ṯorkina uni gwo ki miim buni kun miikina uni mo tani ta thus ki thus mo be.
43007008	Iiku/ um mo ma eya yuḵ jin yuḵu ka tul ’kup̱ ki is bum mo. Aha/ mina diki ya eya yuḵ jin yuḵu mo haali/ mom pem diki p̱u’d mo mmothim mo naskina/ mo.
43007009	Gom gwo jin ona a’di kan mo tani a’di c̱a’bki’d e Pany Jaliil mo be.
43007010	Hili ŋ’ko’d ki ikam piti iikin ka gagamis e mo ma yuḵ jin yuḵu mo tani yan’ko’d a’di si’da/ yaki’d ka gagamis mo, yisa ya’d eya tente/ yisa, hili ka ḵwal is mo be.
43007011	Dhali ’Kwani Yahuuda/ ’kokin mo mmoŋap̱ a’di ka cim jin yuḵuwa yuḵ mo dhali o gwo mo ki: Mane a’di sa/?
43007012	Dhala dhana gumgum miikin ma waambuhany ’kwani mo gom a’di mo. Kun tiya o gwo mo ki: A’di ta wathi/ jin ’boro’d mo be. Dhali kun tiya o gwo mo ki: Yisa. A’di suski ’kwani mmodheres mo be.
43007013	Bahili gom ’Kwani Yahuuda/ mo tani wathin ṯal ’deŋ kamu/ yisa di’da jin oki gwo eya tente/ gom a’di mo be.
43007014	Dhali ibwaman ma yuḵ jin yuḵu mo tani Yesus yaki’d ka gagamis mo e gu’b gi mondheleladhelel mo dhali ṯor gwo mo be.
43007015	Dhali ’Kwani Yahuuda/ merkin mo gom gwom piti mo dhali o gwo mo ki: Ki wathi/ yansan mishki gwo ’peni mana kan mo ki a’di diki di mo naskina/ mmomish gwo deŋ e mo?
43007016	Wakan aYesus ki thoḵ uni gwo mo ki: Gwom pem jin ṯorka/ mo tani diki ta jim pem mo, hili ta ji gi a’di jin hashki aha/ mo be.
43007017	Waḵki/ wathiŋ kamu/ ona bwa ki mii bwam piti mo tani a’di midi mish mo mo waḵki/ gwo jin ṯoru ta jim ma Arumgimis mo walla waḵki/ aha/ ṯora gwo ki moshirr pem gana/ mo be.
43007018	A’diyin jin oki gwo ki moshirr pitiŋ gana/ mo tani a’di ŋap̱ki monyca ki is piti mo. Hili a’diyin jin ŋap̱ki monyca gi a’di jin hashki a’di mo tani ta jiŋ gana/ mo dhali mii kun ’koki ta kuŋ ḵar/e yisa ’kona e a’di mo be.
43007019	Din ma Musa ki c̱i um gwoŋḵan jin c̱inu mowa? Dhali jan ṯal ’deŋ kamu/ ’peni um yisa di’da jin dhuki gwoŋḵan jin c̱inu mo. Ata iŋap̱kina um aha/ mmo’kosh mo?
43007020	Dhali ’kwani ki thoḵ a’di gwo mo ki: /E tan ga ruma ’cesh mo. Aja iŋap̱ki /e mmo’kosh jwa mo?
43007021	Yesus ki thoḵ uni gwo mo ki: Aha/ miikina jasi ton ṯal ’de/ mo dhali umi ’baar mo merkin mo gom a’di mo be.
43007022	AMusayi ic̱iki um gwo mo gom mo jin minu ’ciṯẖa/ munyjal yis mo (dhali a’di yisa jasi ’pena Musa, hili ’peni ibabam bum mo) dhali um ki ’ciṯẖ wathiŋ gwaṯẖa munyjal yis piti ka cim ma pesu/ mo be.
43007023	Waḵki/ ka cim ma pesu/ wathiŋ gwaṯẖ ki bu’th mo jin ’ciṯẖuwa munyjal yis mo tani wakan gwoŋḵan jin c̱in ma Musa mo tani minu ’koki ’taki ’ce’d mo. A/um mii aha/ ka nyor mmowac̱ka/ buŋgwar is gi wathi/ ka ’bimpil mmo’bor mo ka cim ma pesu/ mowa?
43007024	Dhalku/ gwo ki dwall eya p̱or ma pije/ kan mo, hili dwalli gwo ki dwall gana/ ka ḵar/e mo.
43007025	’Kwanin tiya ’peni Pa Urushaliim oki gwo wakan mo ki: Ki a’di diki ta wathi/ a’dana jin ŋap̱kina uni mmo’kosh mowa?
43007026	Dhali a’di di’di mahan shwane/ mmoṯor gwo eya tente/ mo dhali uni ’koki o gwoŋ kamu/ e a’di mo. A/mina uni gwansan kun ta gi moshirr imish ki a’di yansan ta’da Ḵrisṯẖos ’te/sana?
43007027	Bahili aman mishkina mo jin yayina wathi/ yansan ’peni cine/ mo dhali ka Ḵrisṯẖos minu piyu/ ’kwani i is mo tani wathin ṯal ’deŋ kamu/ yisa di’da jin midi mish mo jin yayina a’di ’peni cine/ mo be.
43007028	Wakan Yesus ki ṯor uni gwo mo eya tente/ mo me’d jin ṯorkina a’di gwo e gu’b gi mondheleladhelel mo mmo/o gwo mo ki: Um mishi aha/ mo dhali mo jin yayika/ ’peni cineyi? Hili aha/ dinaki yayu/ ki bwam pem mo. A’di jin hashki aha/ mo tani ta a’diŋ gana mo, dhali a’di tani ’kona um ki mish mo be.
43007029	Aha/ misha a’di mo haali/ aha/ yayina ’peni a’di mo dhali a’diyi ihashki aha/ mo be.
43007030	Wakan uni ŋap̱ki bway mo mmobu’th a’di mo, hili wathin ṯal ’deŋ kamu/ diki kar me’d piti ap̱o/ a’di mo haali/ mom piti diki p̱u’d naskina/ mo be.
43007031	Dhali hili ’kwani ka ris gamki a’di gwo is mo dhali uni o gwo mo ki: A/ki me’d jin minu piya Ḵrisṯẖos ’kwani i is mo tani a/mina a’di mii miimer ki nyanye/ mmobol ku gi miina wathi/ yansan e mowa?
43007032	Dhali ’Kwani P̱arisiyiin ciḵkina waambuhany ’kwani mmomiikina uni agumgum kan mo gom a’di mo, dhali igasiis kun can mo dhali ’Kwani P̱arisiyiin hashka iboliish mo mmobu’th a’di mo be.
43007033	Dhali yan’ko’d Yesus ki o uni gwo mo ki: Aha/ mina di e um ari’ceenne/ mo dhali yan’ko’d aha/ mina ya e a’di jin hashki aha/ mo be.
43007034	Um mini ŋap̱ aha/ mo dhali um mini ’koki gam aha/ mo haali/ mo jin miga/ ya mo tani mina um moli iiyu/ mo be.
43007035	Dhali ’Kwani Yahuuda/ oki gwo ka rem ’kup̱ mo ki: Ki mana dina wathi/ yansan gwo ibwa mo mmoya mo jin mina ana ’koki gam a’di mo? A’di dina gwo ibwa mo mmoya mo e bwaman ’Kwani Yahuuda/ kun c̱ekerkunu bwa mo e bwaŋ ’Kwaniŋ Griḵi mo dhali ṯor ’Kwaniŋ Griḵi gwo mo ’taa?
43007036	Ki ’pemen gwo yan jin ona a’di ta’da taye? jin ona a’di ki: Um mini ŋap̱ aha/ mo tani dhali um mini ’koki gam aha/ mo, dhali, Mo jin dika/ nycine/ mo tani mina um mol iiyu/ icine/ mo be.
43007037	Dhali ka cim jiŋ ’ko’d ki mo ma yuḵ jin yuḵu ka tul ’kup̱ mo tani a’di jin ta’da cim jin caaca mo tani Yesus doshki’d ki mis mo dhali ṯor gwo eya tente/ mo mmo/o gwo mo ki: Waḵki/ wathin ṯal ’deŋ kamu/ budha yi’de/ mo tani dhalki a’di yayi’di aha/ mo dhali p̱i mo.
43007038	A’diyin jin gamki aha/ gwo is mo tani dhalki a’di yayi’di aha/ mo, dhali dhalki a’diyin jin gamki aha/ gwo is mo tani p̱i a’di mo, me’d Gwo ma Arumgimis jin ’kwarkunu mo jin o gwo mo ki: ’Peni bwam ma dum piti mo tani a’di mina yi’deŋ ḵumma/ jin di ki e igusu/ mo be.
43007039	Dhali gwo yansan jin okina a’di mo tani okina a’di gom Shi/in mo, jin mina a’di c̱i gom uni gwansan kun gamki a’di gwo is mo kun muruni bu’th a’di mo be. Haali/ Shi/in a’di dinuki c̱iyu/ naskina/ mo haala Yesus naskina/ dinuki kar cam piti eya tente/ mo be.
43007040	Ki uni ciḵki gwo gwansan mo tani ’kwanin tiya o gwo mo ki: Wathi/ yansan ta’da manc̱i gwo ma Arumgimis ka jiŋ gana/ mo be.
43007041	Dhali kun tiya ki o gwo mo ki: Wathi/ yansan a’di ta’da Ḵrisṯẖos mo. Hili kun tiya o gwo mo ki: A/Ḵrisṯẖos midi piyu/ mo ’peni Pany Jaliila?
43007042	Dina Gwo ma Arumgimis jin ’kwarkunu mo ki o gwo mo ka Ḵrisṯẖos midi pi ’peni emen ma Dawuu’d mo? dhali minu piyu/ ’peni Pam Beeṯlaham, a’di jin ta pa jin din ma Dawuu’d nycine/ mo?
43007043	Wakan mondher bwa di’di bwaman ’kwani gom a’di mo be.
43007044	Unin tiya ona bwa ki bu’th a’di mo, hili wathin ṯal ’deŋ kamu/ yisa di’da jin karki me’d ap̱o/ a’di mo be.
43007045	Dhali iboliish uni doḵkin ka nyaŋ’ko’d mo e igasiis kun can mo dhali ’Kwani P̱arisiyiin mo, uni gun oki uni gwo mo ki: Atinta ’kona um ki guyu/ a’di mo?
43007046	Dhali iboliish ki thoḵ uni gwo mo ki: Wathiŋ kamu/ yisa di’da jin ṯorki gwo me’d wathi/ yansan mo be.
43007047	Dhali ’Kwani P̱arisiyiin ki thoḵ uni gwo mo ki: A/ki um si’da/ suskunu idheres mo de?
43007048	A/kun tiya ’peni ’kwani kun ta gi moshirr walla ’Kwani P̱arisiyiin gamki a’di gwo is mowa?
43007049	Hili awaambuhany ’kwani gwahan uni molki gwoŋḵan jin c̱inu mo dhali um jeekunu jwa mo be.
43007050	Dhala Nikudimus a’di jin yaki’di a’di mon’thiny nṯwa/a/ mo tani dhali a’di jin ta jan ṯal ’de/ ’peni uni mo jin oki uni gwo mo ki:
43007051	A/gwoŋḵan bana jin c̱inu mo midi dwall wathi/ gwo ka wuny isa, nṯwa/a/ mo ki uni ’koki dhu ’ce mo mmociḵ a’di mo dhali da/ar a’di jin miikina a’di mowa?
43007052	Dhali uni ki thoḵ a’di gwo mo ki: /E si’da/ ta wathi/ ’peni Pany Jaliil ’taa? Aggi. Ŋap̱i mo ma dhali /e mini p̱ar e mo haala manc̱i gwo ma Arumgimisa kamu/ yisa di’da jin midi piyu/ mo ’peni Pany Jaliil mo.
43007053	Uni iikin e gu’b buni ki she/ ki she/ mo be.
43008001	Hila Yesus yaki’d mo e ’Kuwosh Seṯuun mo be.
43008002	Dhali mon’thamo/ ka ’tum mo tani a’di p̱u’dki’d e gu’b gi mondheleladhelel doḵ/e mo. Aris ’kwani ’baar mo p̱u’dkini a’di mo. Dhali a’di c̱a’bki’da ’cesh mo dhali ṯor uni gwo mo be.
43008003	Dhali iman’kwar to mo dhali ’Kwani P̱arisiyiin uni suskina ’bomi a’di mo jin bu’thkunu mo e momii miinyc̱al mo, dhali uni ki kara yimi bwaman mo be.
43008004	Dhali uni ki o a’di gwo mo ki: Manṯor Gwowa, a’bom yansan a’di bu’thkunu mo e mo jin miina a’di miinyc̱al mo be.
43008005	Dhali gwoŋḵan jin c̱in ma Musa mo ḵanki aman gwo mo mmo’kosh wathi/ gi wakansan ki wosh mo be. Gwom pini wakatintaye jin mina /e i/o mo goma yim mo?
43008006	Mii yansan miikina uni mmopal a’di mo ki uni mini ’taki ta gi gwo mmo/o ap̱o/ a’di mo. Dhala Yesus c̱a’bki’d ki ji luŋ mo dhali ’kwara ’cesh ki me’d piti mo be.
43008007	Dhali ki uni ’kon mo mmoṯirrish a’di ki gwondoṯ mo tani a’di doshki’d ki mis mo dhali o uni gwo mo ki: Dhalki a’di jin dara’d gi miinthus e bwam um mo tani iyip̱i woshi ṯwa/a/ mo mmo’kosha yim mo.
43008008	Dhali ki jahanne/ a’di c̱a’bki’d ki ji luŋ mo dhali ’kwara ’cesh ki me’d piti mo be.
43008009	Hili ki uni ciḵki a’di mo tani uni iikin ka pije/ ka ’deṯe/ ’deṯe/ mo mmoṯel ’pen ’peni a’di jin ca’d mo, dhala Yesus dhalkunu a’di ’de/ mo nyaḵka ’bom jin doshki’di bwambori a’di mo be.
43008010	Dhala Yesus ki hil mo mo dhali owa yim gwo mo ki: A’boma, mane uni mane? Dina wathin ṯal ’deŋ kamu/ ki waḵ /eya?
43008011	Ayim ki thoḵ gwo mo ki: Wathi/ yisa di’da Tap̱a. Dhala Yesus ki o a’di gwo mo ki: Wakan si’da/ aha/ dinaki waḵ /e mo be. Yaku/ mo ma dhali dhalku/ miinthus ki mii doḵ/e mo.
43008012	Doḵ/e Yesus ki ṯor uni gwo mo mmo/o ki: Aha/ tana moŋkush gi ’kwaniny’cesh mo be. A’di jin midi baṯẖ aha/ nsho’k mo tani midi diki ya e mondhurumi’d mo. Hili a’di midi ta gi moŋkush gi mondiki/e mo be.
43008013	Dhali yan’ko’d ’Kwani P̱arisiyiin ki o a’di gwo mo ki: /E ṯori gwo ki is pini ba/. Gwom pini jin ṯora /e mo tani diki ta gwoŋ gana/ mo be.
43008014	Yesus ki thoḵ uni gwo mo ki: Ba isi waḵki/ gwo jin ṯorka/ gom is pem mo tani gwom pem jin ṯorka/ mo tani ta gwoŋ gana/ mo haali/ aha/ misha mo jin yayika/ ’peni cine/ mo dhali mo jin yaka/ iya mo si’da/ hili um ’koki mish mo jin yayika/ ’peni cine/ mo walla mo jin yaka/ iya mo be.
43008015	Um dwalli gwo isi gom buŋgwar is mo. Aha/ dinaki dwall jan ṯal ’deŋ kamu/ gwo mo be.
43008016	Ba isi waḵki/ gwo jin dwallka/ mo tani gwon dwall pem ta gwoŋ gana/ mo haali/ aha/ yisa dina aha/ ’de/ mo jin dwalli gwo mo, hili aha/ dhali Ababam pem jin hashki aha/ mo be.
43008017	E gwoŋḵan bum jin c̱inu mo, a’di jin ’kwarkunu mo mmo/o gwo mo ki: Gwo jin c̱ina ’kwani su/ mo tani ta gwoŋ gana/ mo be.
43008018	Aha/ ṯora gwo gom is pem mo dhali Ababam pem a’di jin hashki aha/ mo tani a’di ṯorki gwo gom aha/ mo be.
43008019	Wakan uni ki thoḵ a’di gwo mo ki: Mane Cim mane? Yesus ki thoḵ uni gwo mo ki: Um ’koki mish aha/ mo walla Ababam pem mo. Waḵki/ um mishi aha/ mo tani um mini ’taki misha Babam pem si’da/ mo be.
43008020	Gwo gwansan okin ma Yesus e mo jin dhunuwa guurush mo me’d jin ṯorkina a’di ’kwani gwo e gu’b gi mondheleladhelel mo. Hili wathin ṯal ’deŋ kamu/ yisa di’da jin bu’thki a’di mo haali/ mom piti diki p̱u’d naskina/ mo be.
43008021	Doḵ/e a’di ki o uni gwo mo ki: Aha/ yana ya mo dhali um mini ŋap̱ aha/ mo dhali um mini wu mo e miinthus bum mo. Dhali mo jin yaka/ iya icine/ mo tani um mini mol iiyu/ mo be.
43008022	Dhali yan’ko’d ’Kwani Yahuuda/ ki o gwo mo ki: Mina a’di ’kosh is piti jwa mo ’taa? me’d jin ona a’di gwo mo ki: Mo jin yaka/ iya mo tani mina um moli iiyu/ mo be.
43008023	Dhali a’di ki thoḵ uni gwo mo ki: Um ’pena ’cesh yan mo. Aha/ ’peni momis mo. Um ita ku gi mony’cesh yan mo. Aha/ dinaki ta ji gi mony’cesh yan mo be.
43008024	Aha/ ṯora um gwo mo ki um mini wu mo e miinthus bum mo, haali/ um mini wu mo e miinthus bum mo isi ciki/ um mini ’taki gam aha/ gwo is mo ki aha/ tana a’di mo be.
43008025	Dhali uni ki o a’di gwo mo ki: /E sa/ tana ja mo? Yesus ki thoḵ uni gwo mo ki: Ma isi gwo yin jin ṯorka/ um mo ’peni ka muŋ’kup̱ mo tani a’di iṯorkika/ umi ’baar mo be.
43008026	Aha/ tana gi gwon tiya ka ris mmo’taki o gom um mo dhali mmo’taki dwall si’da/ mo tani hili a’di jin hashki aha/ mo tani ta a’diŋ gana/ mo, dhali aha/ ṯorkina a’di i’kwaniny’cesh mo gwo jin ciḵka/ ’peni a’di mo be.
43008027	Dhali uni ’koki mish gwom piti ’ban mo jin okina a’di uni mo gom gwony Com mo be.
43008028	Dhali wakan aYesus ki o uni gwo mo ki: Ki um mini ’de’k Ya/ gi ’Kwani mo tani yan’ko’d um mini mish mo mo ki aha/ tana a’di be dhali ki aha/ dinaki mii ton ṯal ’deŋ kamu/ ki moshirr pem ki is pem mo, hili jasi uni kun okika/ kun ṯorkin ma Baba aha/ mo be.
43008029	Dhali a’di jin hashki aha/ mo tani a’di di’d e aha/ mo. A’di diki dhal aha/ ’pen mo haali/ aha/ miina to isa yempa/ kun ’borki a’di bwa mo be.
43008030	Me’d jin ṯorkina a’di gwo wakan mo tani ’kwani ka ris gamki a’di gwo is mo be.
43008031	Dhali yan’ko’d Yesus ki o ’Kwani Yahuuda/ gwo mo, uni kun gamki a’di gwo is mo ki: Waḵki/ um mini ṯikir ’ko mo e gwom pem mo tani um ka jiŋ gana/ mini ta imanciḵ aha/ gwo mo be.
43008032	Dhali um mini mish gwoŋ gana/ mo. Dhali gwoŋ gana/ midi dhu um ki ’kus mo be.
43008033	Uni thoḵki a’di gwo mo ki: Aman tana emen ma Ibrahiim mo dhali aman ’konaki ta c̱iŋkina/ gi ’kwanin tiya mo. Ba ata i/ona /e gwo mo ki: Um minu dhu ki ’kus mo?
43008034	Yesus ki thoḵ uni gwo mo ki: Ka jiŋ gana/, ka jiŋ gana/ aha/ ona um gwo mo ki: Aris ’kwani ’baar mo ka ’deṯe/ ’deṯe/ kun miiki miinthus mo tani uni ta c̱iŋkina/ gi miinthus mo be.
43008035	Dhali c̱iŋkina/ yisa mishi ṯikir c̱a’b e gu’b ki sule/ ki sule/ mo, hili ya/ a’di ṯikirki c̱a’b ki sule/ sule/ mo be.
43008036	Wakan waḵki/ Ya/ dhu um ki ’kus mo tani um ka jiŋ gana/ mini ’ko ki ’kus mo be.
