47012010	Gom gway ma Ḵrisṯẖos kan mo tani aha/ c̱a’bkina ka this mo i e mo e is jin ’ka’da’ka’d mo, eya waḵ jin waḵu mo, e miiny c̱iŋkina/ jin shwa’da nyor ki thiṯẖ mo, e mo gun ṯojuwa ṯo’c bwa mo, dhali e mii ma c̱is mo. Haali/ ki aha/ ’ka’da is kan mo tani aha/ ’bi’thkina is ki ’bi’th mo be.
47012011	Aha/ takina p̱us mo. Um ḵankaa/ ki ’bi’th mo gom a’di mo haali/ aha/ ḵa ba/ imina ’taki ha me’d ki haŋ gana/ ki um mo. Haali/ aha/ dinaki kar ari sheŋ kamu/ mo gom uni gwansan kun dhunu ki she/ mo kun bolona bol e mo, isi kani ba aha/ tana toŋ kamuwa.
47012012	Jamas mii goma mankaru ki she/ jin ta jiŋ gana/ mo tani uni thimkunu mo e bwam um mo eya ris bwa ’baar mo kun ’kuc̱kunu mo ki ’kari’th mo dhali ki jamas mii mo dhali ki momer mo dhali ki miiny caaga/ mo.
47012013	Haali/ ’peni shi/ miim ’boro’d jana nonu um mo jin tan ma ḵaniisan tiya mo, isi ciki/ aha/ ki is pem dinaki kar tondiṯi’da p̱o/ um mo. Dhalki aha/ ’peni mii yan jin ṯẖu’thka/ mo ma.
47012014	Mmahan gom me’d kun ’koni kwara mo tani aha/ thosonkina is pem mo mmoyaku/ i um mo. Dhali aha/ mina diṯ um mii ki diṯ yisa, haali/ aha/ dinaki simm to gun tana um e mo, hili aha/ simma jasi um e mo. Haali/ ushi uc̱i ḵa ba/ imini ’koki mii dhu to mo gom icom buni mo, hili icom gom uc̱im buni mo be.
47012015	Aha/ mina bwa ’kuny mo ki ’kuny gana/ mo mmo’baar tom pem mo dhali mmo’baaru is pem mo gom gway ma ḵashiram bum mo. Waḵki/ aha/ ena um kagahara mo tani a/dhali aha/ minu en ki gwa’d gwa’d mowa?
47012016	Hili ’boro’d be ki aha/ ki is pem dinaki diṯ um mii ki diṯ mo. Dhali um o gwo mo ki aha/ miikina ka maḵ mo dhali aha/ he’kkina um e mo ka gany pem mo.
47012017	A/aha/ bu’thkina shi/ miim ’boro’d ’peni um ki unin tiya gwan gun hashkika/ e um mowa?
47012018	Aha/ ḵankina Tiithus gwo mo mmoyaku/ mo dhali mmohasha kam mmonyaḵ ya ki a’di mo. A/dhala Tiithus bu’thki shi/ miim ’boro’d ’peni um mowa? A/’kona am ki mii mii jin nyaḵa’d e shi/ina ’de/ mowa? A/’kona aman ki nyaḵ ŋaṯgin gun nyaḵkan mowa?
47012019	A/um ’kon mmoṯosh isa yempa/ ki aman ’ce’dkina gwo she/ mo gom buŋgwar is bam mo ibwambori um mowa? A’di ibwambori jis/e ma Arumgimis mo ba/ ki aman ṯorkina gwo goma Ḵrisṯẖos mo dhali a’di ’baar mo gom mmonyaŋ bum kun minu nyaŋ um is mo, um gun enu mo be.
47012020	Haali/ aha/ ḵo/kina is mo ki aha/ wari mina ’taki p̱u’dku/ mo dhali gam um me’d jin dika/ ki o bwayi, dhali ki um mini ’taki gam aha/ me’d jin mina um i’koki o bwa moyi. Wakan wari ki mo jin waluwa wal midi di mo walla bwan dhap̱an mo walla mo ma nyor mo walla mii jin miinu ka ham ’kus mo walla mo jin thudhuwa thu’th ’pen mo walla mo ma le’d jin tanu mo walla mo jin ’theḵu ’ba/ mmis mo walla mo ma dulaṯṯ jin miinu mo.
47012021	Aha/ ḵo/kina is mo ki me’d jin miga/ p̱u’dku/ mo doḵ/e mo tani Arumgimis pem a’di midi ’taki kar aha/ ki is jin gwa’da’d mo ibwambori um mo dhali aha/ mina ’taki mii ko mo goma ris uni gwansan kun miiki miinthus iṯwa/a/ mo dhali ’koki rica du is mo ’peni mon’dap̱ em buni mo dhali mii gun miinu miinyc̱al mo dhali mii kun ’kanuwa ḵanthi/ mo, a’di jin boṯkina uni mo mmomii mo be.
47013001	Yansan ta me’di kwara mo jin murka/ p̱u’dku/ i um mo. E mii gunn kun yera yer is ki gway mo tani minu mii ṯe mo ki te’b ki ’twaŋ ’kwani su/ mo walla ki ’twaŋ ’kwani ikwara mo kun mini mii ta iman/o gwo mo.
47013002	Aha/ rumkina uni gwansan kun mii miinthus nṯwa/a/ ki gwo mo dhali aris unin tiya si’da/ mo, dhali aha/ rumkina uni ki gwo mo shwane/ me’d jin p̱ikika/ mo me’d jin miikika/ mo ki aha/ dikina i buŋ’kus mo eya p̱om buṯ pem jin ’kon ma p̱o/i su/ mo ki aha/ mina diki ’tash uni ’twa/ mo waḵki/ aha/ mina p̱u’dku/ doḵ/e mo
47013003	haali/ um ’kokina gwo ibwa mo mmonyo/ mii mo ka Ḵrisṯẖos a’di ṯorki gwo e aha/ mo. A’di yisa ’ka’da is ki ’ka’da e mo jin ṯu’ba a’di um mo, hili a’di ta gi mom’bi’th e um mo be.
47013004	Haali/ a’di ’koshkunu jwa mo ki cwany’ciṯẖan dhul mo e mo jin ’ka’da a’di is ki ’ka’d mo, hili a’di di’d ki e mo doḵ/e ki mom’bi’th ma Arumgimis mo. Haali/ aman ’ka’da is e a’di mo, hili mo jin ṯu’bu/ um mo tani aman mina nyaḵ ’ko ki a’di mo ki mom ’bi’th ma Arumgimis mo be.
47013005	Nyiṯẖi/ is bum mo ma, mmop̱ar e waḵki/ um shurkin mo e moŋgam gwo is bum mo. Pali is bum mo ma. ’Kona um ki nyiṯẖa ka Yesus Ḵrisṯẖos a’di diki’d e um mo – isi ciki/ ka jiŋ gana/ um ushki me’d mo mmogam mompal ’kup̱ mo be.
47013006	Aha/ ona bwayi ki um mini gam gwo ki aman ’konaki ta ku gun ush me’d mo be.
47013007	Hili aman ’thokina Arumgimis mo ki um mini ’koki mii a’di jin ta thus ki thus mo – yisa ki aman wana e gi uni gun gam mompal ’kup̱ mo ’te/, hili ki um mini mii a’di jin ta jiŋ ḵar/e mo, ba am a’di iwana e ki uni gun ushi me’d mo be.
47013008	Haali/ aman mina mol toŋ kamu/ mii ap̱o/ gwoŋ gana/ mo, hili jasi gom gwoŋ gana/ mo be.
47013009	Haali/ aman ’kunykina bwa mo ki aman ’ka’dkina is mo dhali um a’di i’bi’thkin ki ’bi’th mo. A’di jin ’thokina am mo tani ta gom miim bum jin minu nyo/ shoka ’cesh mo be.
47013010	Aha/ ’kwarkina gwo yansan ki aha/ si’da ’peni um mo, ki mii gi wakan ki aha/ mina p̱u’dku/ mo tani aha/ mina diki mii o gwo jin ’bitha’bi’th mo mmobu’thka/ moshirr mo a’di jin c̱ikina Tap̱a aha/ mo gom mo jin nyaŋuwa nyaŋ is mo dhali yisa mmop̱or to bwa mo.
47013011	Ḵwalany ’te/ ba/, iwaḵ mo. ’Koku/ ma. Ṯoki miim bum ma. C̱iya hirdhe/ ki gwom pem mo ma. Gami gwo me’d ka rem ’kup̱ mo ma. ’Koyi e moŋḵu’th is mo ma. Dhali Arumgimis gi mo/en dhali ji gi moŋḵu’th is mo a’di midi di e um mo be.
47013012	Theka the me’d ka rem ’kup̱ mo ma ki ’twa/ jin ḵogu jin p̱inu mo.
47013013	Aris uni ’baar mo kun dhunu ki she/ ki dhelel dhelel mo tani theki um me’d mo be.
47013014	A’the gi Tap̱a Yesus Ḵrisṯẖos mo dhali mo/en ma Arumgimis mo dhali anyaḵ jin nyaḵku to mii gi Shi/in Dheleladhelel mo tani mini ’ko e umi ’baar mo be.
48001001	ABuulus jin ta a’di jin karu ki she/ mo — yisa ’peni ’kwani mo walla ki wathiŋ kamu/ mo, hili ka Yesus Ḵrisṯẖos mo dhali Arumgimis jin ta’da Baba mo, a’di jin ’de’kki a’di mo ’peni mowu mo be —
48001002	dhali arisa waḵ pemi ’baar mo, uni kun nyaḵki ’ko ki aha/ mo. Eya risa ḵaniisa gi Paŋ Galathiyya mo be.
48001003	A’the e um mo dhali moŋḵu’th is ’peni Arumgimis jin ta’da Baba mo dhali Tap̱a Yesus Ḵrisṯẖos bana mo be,
48001004	a’di jin c̱iki is piti mo gom miinthus bana mo mmo’cuḵ ana mo ’peni she/ yil jin ta jin thus yan mo isi ki bwa ma Arumgimis bana mo dhali a’di jin ta Com mo.
48001005	E a’di mo tani imina monyca icil mo gom mo jin minu ’ko ki sule/ mo dhali ki sule/ ya ye ’ba/ mo be. Amen.
48001006	Aha/ merkina mo ki um ki jahanne/ kan aḵki a’di e mo a’di jin yuḵki um mo eya ’the ma Ḵrisṯẖos mo dhali ṯu’k mo e gwom ’borgaŋ kamu/ mo —
48001007	yisa e gwom ’borga/ jin ta jiŋ kamuwa, hili haali/ kun tiya ’kokin mo kun ṯo’cki um bwa mo dhali kun ona bwa ki aḵ gwom ’borga/ ma Ḵrisṯẖos e mo be.
48001008	Hili isi kani waḵki/ aman walla aman’doyu gwo ’peni momis mo mini ’taki c̱i um gwom ’borgaŋ kamu/ ki c̱a’ckon mo ki a’di jin c̱ikina aman e um mo tani dhalki a’di jeenu mo.
48001009	Me’d gwo jin okina aman iṯwa/a/ mo wakan shwane/ mo tani aha/ ona gwo doḵ/e mo ki: Waḵki/ a’din ’deŋ kamu/ c̱i um gwom ’borga/ ki c̱a’ckon mo ki a’di jin bu’thkina um mo tani dhalki a’di jeenu mo ma.
48001010	A/aha/ shwane/ simmkina ’the gi ’kwani eya, walla ’the ma Arumgimis mo? Walla aha/ palkina mii mo mmo’bor ’kwani bwa mowa? Waḵki/ aha/ dina mo naskina/ mo mmo’bor ’kwani bwa mo tani aha/ mina ’taki diki ta c̱iŋkina/ ma Ḵrisṯẖos mo be.
48001011	Haali/ aha/ mina ’taki dhal um imish mo moyi, iwaḵ mo, ki gwom ’borga/ a’di jin c̱inu ki aha/ mo tani diki ta gwo ’peni isi gwo gi wathi/ en’thi/ mo.
48001012	Haali/ aha/ dinaki bu’th a’di ’peni wathi/ en’thiŋ kamu/ mo, walla si’da/ aha/ dinuki ṯor a’di mo, hili a’di p̱u’dki’d mo ki gwo jin ’ceen ma Yesus Ḵrisṯẖos mo be.
48001013	Haali/ um ciḵki gwo mo gom mondiki/em pem jin ta jin dhamo/ jin ta ji gi mii gi ’Kwani Yahuuda/ mo, a’di iṯo’ckika/ ḵaniisa ma Arumgimis bwa mo ki mombujur mo dhali pal mii mo mmo’ce’d a’di sho’k mo be.
48001014	Dhali aha/ bolkina uni e mo ki miiŋ ’Kwani Yahuuda/ mo, mmo’ce’d uni ka ris ap̱o/ mo uni gun ta ku gi yil pem gana/ mo e bwaman ’kwanim pem mo haali/ aha/ shwakina nyor ki thiṯẖ mo gom gwon dhamo/ gun luḵu ’peni ’kwani gwanyjaḵam pem mo be.
48001015	Hili ki a’di jin karki aha/ ki she/ mo nṯwa/a/ ki aha/ dinuki dho’th mo dhali yuḵ aha/ mo goma ’them piti mo tani,
48001016	a’di ’borkina bwa mo mmoṯor Ya/m piti eya tente/ e aha/ mo. Ki mii gi wakan mo tani ki aha/ mina c̱i gwo gom a’di e bwaman ’kwani kun ’koki ta ’Kwani Yahuuda/ mo. Ki a’di wakan mo tani aha/ dinaki ṯora ṯor ki a’diŋ kamu/ jin ta buŋgwar is mo walla abas mo,
48001017	walla aha/ si’da/ dinaki ya ka gagamis e Pa Urushaliim mo e uni gwansan kun ’kokunu mo mmodhu ki she/ mo nṯwa/a/ ki aha/ mo, hili aha/ yakina mo e Bampa/ gi Pa Arabiyya mo be dhali doḵ/e aha/ doḵkina ka nyaŋ’ko’d mo e Pan Dimashk mo be.
48001018	Dhali yan’ko’d ’ko’di yili kwara mo tani aha/ yakina ka gagamis e Pa Urushaliim mo mmobuṯa Sap̱a mo dhali nyaḵ c̱a’b ki a’di ka cim ma ḵarpa’c mo be.
48001019	Hili aha/ dinaki p̱ar unin tiya e kun dhunu ki she/ mo isi ciki/ jasa Yakuub jin ta’da kam gi Tap̱a mo be.
48001020	(Dhali gwo jin ’kwarkika/ e um mo tani ibwambor ma Arumgimis mo aha/ dinaki ta aṯor mo be. )
48001021	Dhali yan’ko’d aha/ yakina e Bampa/ gi Pan Suriyya mo dhali Paŋ Kilikiyya mo be.
48001022	Dhali aha/ ’konu mo mmomol mo naskinayi ki jis/e ma risa ḵaniisa ma Ḵrisṯẖos e Bampa/ Yahuudiyya mo be.
48001023	Uni ciḵki jasi gwo jin onu mo ki: A’di jin ṯo’cki ana bwa mo ’thissa/ a’di di’d shwane/ mmoc̱i gwo gi moŋgam gwo is mo, a’di jin palkina a’di mmo’ce’d sho’k mo be.
48001024	Dhali uni karkina Arumgimis ki ca mo gom aha/ mo be.
48002001	Dhali yan’ko’d ’ko’di yili ’kume’d i’ce’dka doŋon mo tani aha/ yakina ka gagamis mo doḵ/e e Pa Urushaliim mo nyaḵka Barnaaba mo mmosusa Tiithus nyaḵki aha/ mo be.
48002002	Aha/ yakina mo ki gwo jin ’ceenu mo, dhali aha/ karkina a’di ibwambori uni mo (hili ki kup̱ mo e bwambori uni gwansan kun dhunu ki uni gun tana shu/um bway mo) gom gwom ’borga/ mo a’di jin c̱ika/ mo e bwaman ’kwani kun ’koki ta ’Kwani Yahuuda/ mo, isi ciki/ ki aha/ mina ’taki gus mo walla ki aha/ guskina ’te/ ki p̱e’th mo.
48002003	Hili isi kani aTiithus a’di jin nyaḵki ya ki aha/ mo, a’di yisa ṯucu mo mmo’ciṯẖa/ munyjal yis piti mo, ba a’di ta Wathiŋ Griḵi mo be.
48002004	Hili haali/ gom iwaḵ kun ta thus mo kun susu mo ibwaman mo ki kup̱ mo tani uni kun hurki bwaman mo mmo’kar mom bam jin ’kona am ki ’kus e mo, a’di jin takina aman eya Ḵrisṯẖos jin ta’da Yesus mo, ki uni mini ’taki sus am e mo jin deḵuwa deḵ mo be.
48002005	E uni mo tani aman ’konaki dhas is bam bway mo isi kan gom ari mo mo, ki gwoŋ gana/ gi gwom ’borga/ minu dhu mo gom um mo be.
48002006	Dhali ’peni uni gwansan si’da/ kun onu ki uni tana shu/um bway mo gom toŋ kamu/ mo (A’di jin tana uni mo tani midi diki mii toŋ kamu/ gom aha/ mo. Arumgimis diki ṯor mii ma gwar ’de/ mo). Uni gwansan, aha/ ona gwo mo, e uni kun onu ki uni tana shu/um bway mo tani mini ’koki mar toŋ kamu/ is gom aha/ mo be.
48002007	Hili ki gwony c̱a’ckon mo, ki uni p̱arki mii e mo ki aha/ karkunu mo mmoc̱i gwom ’borga/ ki ’kwani kun ’kon ka munyjal yisi e mo me’d jin karkunu aBuṯerus mo mmota amanc̱i gwom ’borga/ gom uni gun ’ciṯẖuwa munyjal yis mo be.
48002008	(Haali/ a’di jin miiki’da ṯu’c mo ka Buṯerus mo gom gwo gi hashu mo e uni gun ’ciṯẖuwa munyjal yis mo tani miiki’da ṯu’c mo e aha/ si’da/ mo gom ’kwani kun ’koki ta ’Kwani Yahuuda/ mo. )
48002009	Dhali ki uni nyiṯẖkina ’the jin c̱ikunu aha/ mo tani aYakuub dhala Sap̱a dhala Yohaan uni gun onu ki uni tana atiŋkiliŋ mo tani c̱iki aha/ bway mo dhala Barnaaba mo abim poros gi mmonyaḵ to mii mo, ki aman mina ’taki ii mo e ’kwani kun ’koki ta ’Kwani Yahuuda/ mo, dhali uni e ’kwani kun ’ciṯẖuwa munyjal yis mo be.
48002010	Jasi uni ona bwayi ki aman mina ka uni gun hatha’ko’d e mo, a’di jin ta to yan gana/ jin gananka/ ’ba/ mo ka daran du mo mmomii mo be.
48002011	Hili ka Sap̱a p̱u’dki’d mo e Pa Anthaakiya mo tani aha/ ceshkina a’di mo ka ḵarambuye/ mo ki jis/em piti mo haali/ a’di doshki’d mo mmowaḵkunu a’di mo be.
48002012	Haali/ nṯwa/a/ mo, ki ’kwanin tiya p̱u’dkin mo ’pena Yakuub mo tani a’di nyaḵki to shwa ki ’kwani kun ’koki ta ’Kwani Yahuuda/ mo. Hili ki uni p̱u’dkin mo tani a’di guki is piti ka nyaŋ’ko’d mo dhali ḵwa/ is piti bwa mo mmoḵo/kina a’di ’kwani kun ’ciṯẖuwa munyjal yis mo be.
48002013	Dhali nyaḵki a’di mo tani ’Kwani Yahuudan tiya kun boc̱kin mo tani nyaḵki mii yan mii mo ki mii washila/ mo. Wakan ka Barnaaba si’da/ a’di ḵalkunu shoki mis ki miim buni jin miikina uni ki washila/ mo be.
48002014	Hili ki aha/ mishkina ki uni ’konuki dosh ka ji sho’k mo gom gwoŋ gana/ gi gwom ’borga/ yan mo tani aha/ okina Sap̱a ibwambori uni ’baar mo ki: Waḵki e ba ta ji Yahuuda/ mo tani dhali diki mii me’d wathi/ jin diki ta Wathi/ Yahuuda/ mo tani dhali diki mii me’d Wathi/ Yahuuda/ mo tani /e mini mish ’kwani kun ’koki ta ’Kwani Yahuuda/ dhu me’d ’Kwani Yahuuda/ kata mo?
48002015	Ana ki is bana ana kun tana ’Kwani Yahuuda/ ka dho’th mo dhali yisa ’kwani kun ’koki ta ’Kwani Yahuuda/ kun ta imanmii miinthus mo,
48002016	dhali ana gun misha mo mo ki wathi/ dinuki kar ki mo ma ḵar/e ki mii gi gwoŋḵan jin c̱inu mo, hili ki moŋgam gwo is eya Yesus Ḵrisṯẖos mo, isi kani ana gamkina gwo is eya Ḵrisṯẖos jin ta’da Yesus mo. Ki mii gi wakan mo mmodhuwa dhu ki mo ma ḵar/e mo ki moŋgam gwo is eya Ḵrisṯẖos mo dhali yisa ki mii gi gwoŋḵan jin c̱inu mo haali/ ki mii gi gwoŋḵan jin c̱inu mo tani jan ṯal ’deŋ kamu/ yisa di’da jin minu kar ki mo ma ḵar/e mo be.
48002017	Hili waḵki/ miim bana jin pala ana ki ana minu dhu ki mo ma ḵar/e eya Ḵrisṯẖos mo tani ana ki is bana minu gam mo ki ana tana imanmii miinthus mo a/aḴrisṯẖos a’di karu mo mmomii miinthusa? Dhalku/ ki ṯosh kan mo.
48002018	Hili waḵki/ aha/ ki nyaŋ to gwansan is doḵ/e mo, uni gun ’tuḵka/ mo tani yan’ko’d aha/ nyo/a is pem mo ka mandhaŋ gwo mo be.
48002019	Haali/ ki gwoŋḵan jin c̱inu mo tani aha/ wuna mo e gwoŋḵan jin c̱inu mo ki aha/ mina di mo goma Arumgimis mo be.
48002020	Aha/ nyaḵkunu ’kosh ki cwany’ciṯẖan dhul nyaḵka Ḵrisṯẖos mo. Dhali a’di yisa ta aha/ jin dina ki eya, hili aḴrisṯẖos a’di jin diki’d ki e e aha/ mo. Dhali mondiki/e jin dika/ ki e e buŋgwar is mo shwane/ tani aha/ dina ki e ki moŋgam gwo is mo e Ya/ ma Arumgimis mo, a’di jin enki aha/ mo dhali c̱i is piti mo gom aha/ mo be.
48002021	Aha/ dinaki p̱uuwa ’the ma Arumgimis mo. Haali/ waḵki/ mo jin dhunuwa dhu ka ḵar/e diki’d mo e gwoŋḵan jin c̱inu mo tani, kan, Ḵrisṯẖos wuki’d mo ki dar gi ’kup̱ miiŋ gana/ mo be.
48003001	Ayy um ’Kwani gi Paŋ Galathiyya kun ta p̱us mo. Um gun ṯorkunuwa Yesus Ḵrisṯẖos eya tente/ mo ibwambori jis/em bum mo a’di jin ’koshkunu ki cwany’ciṯẖan dhul mo tani aja iceshki um ki en dhathu/ mo?
48003002	Dhalki aha/ doṯa um jasi gwo gom gway yansan mo. A/ki um bu’thki Shi/in ki mii gi gwoŋḵan jin c̱inu mowa? Walla ki gwo jin ciḵkina um ki moŋgam gwo is mo?
48003003	Ayy, um ’kona isi p̱usi mana? Mmoṯelkina um mii ’pen mo ki Shi/in mo, a/dhali um shwane/ daḵki ’kup̱ mo ki buŋgwar is mowa?
48003004	A/ki gwo gi wana um kani bwa imiikina um aris to ki p̱e’th mo kana? — ba a’di ’te/ wari ka jiŋ gana/ ita jim p̱e’th mo.
48003005	Dhali a’di si’da/ jin thip̱ki’da thip̱ ki Shi/in e um mo dhali mii miimer e bwam um mo tani a/a’di ki mii a’di ki gwoŋḵan jin c̱inu mo walla ki gwo jin ciḵu ki moŋgam gwo is mo?
48003006	Wakan a/Ibrahiim gamki’da Arumgimis gwo is mo, dhali a’di karkunu mo gom a’di ki mo ma ḵar/e mo.
48003007	Wakan um mini hil mii i e ki a’di ta mii gi ’kwani gi moŋgam gwo is mo kun ta iya/ ma Ibrahiim mo be.
48003008	Dhali Gwo ma Arumgimis kun ’kwarkunu mo, mmonyiṯẖkina a’di nṯwa/a/ mo ka Arumgimis midi dhu ’kwani kun ’koki ta ’Kwani Yahuuda/ ki mo ma ḵar/e ki moŋgam gwo is mo tani a’di c̱iki gwo ki gwom ’borga/ nṯwa/a/ ka Ibrahiim mo mmo/o gwo mo ki: E /e mo tani aris kal gi ’kwaniny’ceshi ’baar mo tani minu ’bor mii mo be.
48003009	Wakan mo, ’kwani gwansan kun ta ku gi gami gwo is mo tani uni ’boru mii mo nyaḵka Ibrahiim mo a’di jin ta’d gi moŋgam gwo is mo be.
48003010	Haali/ aris uni ’baar mo kun ’ko ’ko’d e mii gi gwoŋḵan jin c̱inu mo tani uni ’kon e bwaŋ’kwariny monyjee mo. Haali/ a’di ’kwarkunu mo ki: Monyjee midi di mo goma ris ’kwani ’baar ka ’deṯe/ ’deṯe/ mo, uni gun ’koki ’ko ’ko’d eya ris to ’baar mo kun ’kwarkunu mo e gwoŋḵan jin c̱inu mo dhali mii uni mo be.
48003011	Dhali a’di di’d eya tente/ be ki wathi/ en’thiŋ kamu/ yisa di’da jin minu kar ki mo ma ḵar/e mo ibwambor ma Arumgimis ki gwoŋḵan jin c̱inu mo. Haali/ a’di ’kwarkunu mo ki: A’di jin karu ki mo ma ḵar/e ki moŋgam gwo is mo tani a’di midi di ki e mo be.
48003012	Hili gwoŋḵan jin c̱inu mo tani diki di ap̱o/ mo jin gamu gwo is mo, haali/ gwo ’kwarkunu mo ki: A’di jin mii uni mo tani a’di midi di ’ko’di uni mo be.
48003013	AḴrisṯẖos a’di wanki ana ’ba/ mo ’peni monyjee gi gwoŋḵan jin c̱inu mo mmowarkina a’di ki monyjee gom ana mo — haali/ a’di ’kwarkunu mo ki: Monyjee midi di goma ris ’kwani ’baar ka ’deṯe/ ’deṯe/ mo, uni kun shirki is buni ap̱o/ cwa mo —
48003014	Ki eya Ḵrisṯẖos jin ta’da Yesus mo tani mo jin ’boruwa Ibrahiim mii mo midi ’taki p̱u’du/ ap̱o/ ’kwani kun ’koki ta ’Kwani Yahuuda/ mo ki ana mina ’taki bu’th gwo jin onu is mo gom Shi/in e moŋgam gwo is mo be.
48003015	Aha/ mina c̱i um mii gi wathi/ en’thi/ gom she/mm mii mo, iwaḵ mo. Wathiŋ kamu/ yisa di’da jin midi p̱uu gwo gom mal gi wathi/ mo walla mar gwom piti is mo ’ko’di a’di ṯekunu shoka ’cesh mo.
48003016	Dhali gwo kun okunu is mo dhukunu mo goma Ibrahiim mo dhali gom emen piti mo. A’di diki o gwo mo ki: Dhali e emen piti mo, mmo/o gwo goma ris mo. Hili mmo/o gwo mo gom a’din ’de/ mo ki: Dhali gom emen pini mo, a’di jin ta’da Ḵrisṯẖos mo be.
48003017	A’di ta ’pemen gwo jin oka/ mo. Ki gwoŋḵan jin c̱inu mo jin p̱u’dki’d ki yil kun ’koni iss ’kwanimpa i/iss ’de/ i’ce’dki iss ’de/ i’ce’dka ’kume’da p̱o/ mo ŋ’ko’d mo tani a’di diki kar gwo mmop̱uu mo, gwo jin gamu me’d mo ’thissa/, a’di jin ṯen ma Arumgimis shoka ’cesh mo. Wakan ki gwo jin onu is mo minu kar ki jim p̱uu mo be.
48003018	Haali/ waḵki/ mal ta ji gi gwoŋḵan jin c̱inu mo tani a’di yisa di mo ’ko’di gwo jin onu is mo, hili Arumgimis ki c̱i a’di ka Ibrahiim ki gwo jin onu is mo be.
48003019	Kata c̱inu gwoŋḵan jin c̱inuye? A’di karkunuwa p̱o/ mo gom gwon dhaŋ mo ntagi emen midi ’taki p̱u’du/ mo e a’di jin okunu gwo is mo. Dhali a’di karkunu ’pen ka pije/ mo ki iman’doyu gwo mo ki a’di jin doshki’di bwaman mo mmowoṯẖa/ woṯẖ mo.
48003020	Dhali a’di jin doshki’d e bwaman mo mmowoṯẖa/ woṯẖ mo tani a’di diki ta ’pemen mmodi jasi ’de/ mo. Hili Arumgimis a’di ṯal ’de/ mo be.
48003021	A/dhali gwoŋḵan jin c̱inu mo a’di di’da p̱o/ gwo jin on ma Arumgimis is mowa? Dhalku/ ki ṯosh kan mo. Haali/ waḵki/ gwoŋḵan jin c̱inu mo minu ’taki c̱i mo mmokar mo jin ’konu ki e mo tani yan’ko’d mo ma ḵar/e midi ’taki di mo ka jiŋ ganayi ki gwoŋḵan jin c̱inu mo be.
48003022	Hili Gwo jin ’kwarkunu mo tani tulki’da ris to ’baar mo ’twa/ mo e miinthus mo, ki gwo jin onu is mo e moŋgam gwo is eya Yesus Ḵrisṯẖos mo tani minu ’taki c̱iki uni gwansan kun gami gwo is mo be.
48003023	Dhali nṯwa/a/ ki moŋgam gwo is diki p̱u’d mo tani ana ’kokunu mo mmohem mo e bwaŋ’kwariny gwoŋḵan jin c̱inu mo, mmodhukunu ana e bwaŋ’kwariny mo jin ’tashuwa ’tash ’twa/ mo ntagi moŋgam gwo is minu ṯor eya tente/ mo be.
48003024	Wakan gwoŋḵan jin c̱inu mo tani a’di ta’da mansus bana mo ntaga Ḵrisṯẖos p̱u’dki’d mo, ki ana minu dhu ki mo ma ḵar/e ki moŋgam gwo is mo be.
48003025	Hili shwane/ moŋgam gwo is a’di p̱u’dki’d mo, i/ana doḵ/e yisa i’kona mmo’ko mo e bwaŋ’kwariny a’di jin suski’da sus mo
48003026	haali/ eya Ḵrisṯẖos jin ta’da Yesus mo tani umi ’baar mo ta iya/ ma Arumgimis mo ki moŋgam gwo is mo be.
48003027	Haali/ aris umi ’baar mo kun miikunu ki yi’de/ mo eya Ḵrisṯẖos mo tani hi’thkina Ḵrisṯẖos i’ba/ mo be.
48003028	Wakan walla Wathi/ Yahuuda/ yisa di’da walla Wathiŋ Griḵi mo, walla wathi/ jin ta c̱iŋkina/ jin yolu mo yisa di’da walla moŋ’ko ki ’kus mo, walla kun tana gwaṯẖ yisa di’da walla iyima ’bomi mo. Haali/ umi ’baar mo ṯal ’de/ mo eya Ḵrisṯẖos jin ta’da Yesus mo be.
48003029	Dhali waḵki/ um ta ku ma Ḵrisṯẖos mo tani um ta emen ma Ibrahiim mo, mmota gi mal isi ki gwo jin onu is mo be.
48004001	Gwo jin oka/ mo gom mal mo a’dihe/ be. Me’d jin tana a’di a’ci mo tani a’di jin midi ḵal mal mo diki bol mii jin tanu c̱iŋkina/ e ki ’bor mo, ba a’di ita a’di jin cila mali ’baar mo.
48004002	Hili a’di diki’d mo e bwaŋ’kwariny imanhil a’di jin aṯẖa she/ mo dhali imandhu tom piti mo ntaga tee jin karkina com a’di mo be.
48004003	Wakan gom ana mo. Ki ana takina uc̱i mo tani ana takina c̱iŋkina/ gi gwo ma bwa nyara/ gom gwoŋḵan gi mony’cesh yan mo.
48004004	Hili ka tee p̱u’dki’d mo mmothimkunu a’di mo tani Arumgimis hashki Ya/m piti mo, a’di jin dhodhu ’pena ’bom mo dhali a’di jin dho’thkunu mo e bwaŋ’kwariny gwoŋḵan jin c̱inu mo be, mmowan uni gwansan ’ba/ mo, uni kun ’kokin mo e bwaŋ’kwariny gwoŋḵan jin c̱inu mo,
48004005	wakan ki ana mina bu’th mo jin thip̱uwa thip̱ me’d iya/ mo be.
48004006	Dhali haali/ um ta iya/ mo tani Arumgimis hashki Shi/in gi Ya/m piti eya dum bana mo mmocuu gwo mo ki: Abba. Ababa.
48004007	Wakan eya Arumgimis mo tani um yisa ’koni mmo’ko mo mmota c̱iŋkina/ mo, hili um ta iya/ mo, dhali waḵki/ um ta iya/ mo tani um ta gi mal mo be.
48004008	Kadhamo/ ki um ’koki mish Arumgimis mo tani um ’kokin mo ki mondeḵ is mo e moŋ’ko gi uni gun ’koki ta gi buyempa ma rum kun luŋu mo.
48004009	Hili shwane/ mmop̱u’dkina um mo mmomisha Arumgimis mo tani, walla ki mii jin dhalu e i is mo ki um mishu ka Arumgimis mo tani um mini mish doḵ ka nyaŋ’ko’d kata mo e gwo ma bwa nyara/ gom gwoŋḵan gi mony’cesh gwansan kun ’ka’da is ki ’ka’d mo dhali kun hatha’ko’d ki ha’th kan mo? Um ona bwa mmota c̱iŋkinam buni mo doḵ/eya?
48004010	Um ’kon mmodhuwa tee mo dhala ppe mo dhali yir jin aḵka’da aḵ mo dhali yil mo be.
48004011	Aha/ ḵo/ka is mo ki aha/ miikina ṯu’c ap̱o/ um ki p̱e’th mo.
48004012	Iwaḵa, aha/ yuḵa um mo, wayi e ki aha/ mo ma haali/ aha/ si’da/ wana e ki um mo. Um ’koki ṯẖuthaa/ mii mo be.
48004013	Haali/ um mishkin mo ki mo jin ’ba’thka/ mo e buŋgwar is pem mo tani a’di c̱ikika/ um gwo gom gwom ’borga/ yani ṯwa/a/ mo be.
48004014	Dhali ba mondim pem yin a’di ta mompal gom um mo tani um yisa ushi aha/ mo walla waḵ aha/ mo, hili um bu’thki aha/ mo me’da man’doyu gwo ma Arumgimis mo dhali me’da Ḵrisṯẖos jin ta’da Yesus mo be.
48004015	Mane monṯem bum jin surki’d ki um mo be ’te/? Haali/ aha/ tana man/o gwo gom um mo ki um mini ’taki buḵ aha/ em bum ka pije/ mo dhali c̱iyu/ uni ki aha/ mo waḵki/ a’di mishu mii mo be.
48004016	A/ki aha/ wara ka manta ’kup̱ gi um mmoṯorka/ um gwoŋ gana/ mo?
48004017	Uni ta malgin ki malgin gom um mo, dhali hili yisa gom ’kup̱ miiŋ gana/ mo. Uni ona bwa mmomu’th um ’twa/ mo ’peni aha/ mo ki um mini ’taki ta malgin gom uni mo be.
48004018	Haali/ gom ’kup̱ miim ’borga/ mo tani a’di ’boro’d mmoc̱i gwo maŋ ki shem ’boro’d mo isa yempa/ mo dhali yisa ki aha/ dikina nyaḵki um mo ’te/.
48004019	Ushi uc̱im pema, aha/ shwana bwan dho’th mo doḵ/e ntaga Ḵrisṯẖos minu uḵ mo e um mo be.
48004020	Aha/ ona bwayi mmo’taki di nyaḵki um mo ishunsan dhali aḵ ’twam pem e jin ṯorka/ gwo mo haali/ aha/ duŋkurkunuwa du is mo gom um mo be.
48004021	Ṯori aha/ gwo mo ma, um gun ona bwa mmo’ko mo e bwaŋ’kwariny gwoŋḵan jin c̱inu mo. A/’kona um ki ciḵ gwoŋḵan jin c̱inu mowa?
48004022	Haali/ me’d gwo jin ’kwarkunu mo ka: Ibrahiim ta gi iya/i su/ mo, jan ’de/ ta ji gi c̱iŋkina/ mo dhali jan ’de/ ta ji ma ’bom jin di’d ki ’kus mo be.
48004023	Hili ya/ ma ’bom jin ta c̱iŋkina/ mo tani a’di dho’thkunu mo me’d isi gwo gom buŋgwar is mo dhali ya/ ’pena ’bom jin di ki ’kus mo tani a’di e gwo jin onu is mo be.
48004024	Dhali a’di yansan ibe’dki gwo gi ’pemena kamu/ mo. Ki up̱ su/ gwansan ita gwo gun gamu me’d mo. Jan ’de/ ’peni Wosh Sinaa/ mo mmodho’th uc̱i gom miiny c̱iŋkina/ mo. Ayim jin ta’da Haagar mo be.
48004025	Dhala Haagar a’di ta Wosh Sinaa/ e Pa Arabiyya mo. Ayim a’di nyaḵka’d ki Pa Urushaliim jin di’d shwane/ mo, haali/ a’di ta c̱iŋkina/ jin yolu nyaḵki uc̱i ma yim mo be.
48004026	Dhali hili Urushaliim jin di’di momis mo tani a’di di ki ’kus mo dhala yim a’di ta’da ata’dam bana mo be.
48004027	Haali/ me’d gwo jin ’kwarkunu mo ki: ’Kunyi bwa mo ma, ayy /en ’de/ yin jin tana burum mo jin diki dho’th mo. C̱eyi ’twa/ mo ma dhali cuuyi mo, /e jin dina bwa ma dho’th ki shwa mo. Haali/ ayim ma’du/ a’di ta’d gi uc̱i ki nyanye/ mo mmobola yim e, a’di jin ta’d ga kaṯẖ mo be.
48004028	Dhali ana iwaḵ mo, wana e ga Is/hak mo mmota uc̱i gi gwo jin onu is mo be.
48004029	Hili ki me’d c̱aan a’di jin dho’thkunu isi ki gwo gi buŋgwar is mo tani ṯo’cki a’di bwa mo a’di jin dho’thkunu mo isi ki gwo gi Shi/in mo. Dhali a’di wakan shwane/ mo be.
48004030	Hili Gwo ma Arumgimis kun ’kwarkunu mo o gwo kataye? O ki ura yim c̱iŋkina/ ka pije/ mo dhali ya/ ma yim mo haali/ ya/ ’pena yim jin ta c̱iŋkina/ jin yolu mo tani a’di midi diki gam mal mo nyaḵki ya/ ma ’bom jin di ki ’kus mo be.
48004031	Wakan iwaḵa, ana ’konaki ta uc̱i gi c̱iŋkina/ jin yolu mo, hili ana tana uc̱i ma ’bom jin di ki ’kus mo be.
48005001	Haali/ gom mo jin ’konu ki ’kus mo tani aḴrisṯẖos a’di dhu ana ki ’kus mo. Gom gwo gi wakan mo tani doshi ma dhali ṯeli sho’k mo. Dhali dhalku/ ’ba/ ki mii ’ce’d mo doḵ/e mmonyaḵ dhaŋḵa’b ’ba/ bu’th ki mii jin tanu c̱iŋkina/ mo.
48005002	Aha/ jin tana Buulus ona gwo yan e um mo. Waḵki/ um bu’thki mo ma munyjal yis jin ’ciṯẖu/ mo tani aḴrisṯẖos midi mii diki mii ta gi shi/ miim ’boro’d gom um mo.
48005003	Aha/ baha gwo mo doḵ/e eya ris ’kwani ’baar ka ’deṯe/ ’deṯe/ mo uni gun bu’thki mo ma munyjal yis jin ’ciṯẖu/ mo ki a’di minu deḵ mo mmodhu gwoŋḵan jin c̱inu mo ka ’bimpil mo be.
48005004	Um kun minu dhu ki mo ma ḵar/e gi gwoŋḵan jin c̱inu mo tani um minu ’ciṯẖ ’twa/ ’pena Ḵrisṯẖos mo be. Um ṯa’kkin mo ’peni bway ma ’the mo be.
48005005	Haali/ ki Shi/in mo tani dhali ki moŋgam gwo is mo tani ana c̱orkina c̱or mo gom mo ma ’teŋ kap̱e/ gi mo ma ḵar/e mo be.
48005006	Haali/ eya Ḵrisṯẖos jin ta’da Yesus mo walla e mo ma munyjal yis jin ’ciṯẖu/ mo walla e mo ma munyjal yis jin ’konuki ’ciṯẖ mo tani a’di midi mii toŋ kamuwa? Hili moŋgam gwo is mmomiina a’di to mo ki mii gi mo/en mo be.
48005007	Um ’kokin mo mmoso ki ’bore/ mo. Kaja nonki um ’kup̱ mo ’peni moha gwoŋ gana/ e mo?
48005008	Mii yansan jin laluwa lal sho’k mo tani a’di diki di ’peni a’di jin yuḵki um mo.
48005009	Ara cumaṯa gwa’dga/ tani a’di seki’da gana’th jin ta’da gabul ka ’bimpil mo.
48005010	Aha/ wukina Tap̱a jwa i is mo ki um mini ’koki budha yisaŋa kamu/ mmodhal jim pem mo. Dhali a’di jin ṯo’c um bwa mo tani a’di midi mii bu’th gwon dwall jin minu mii tor ’twa/a ’cesh gom a’di mo, ma a’di yin jin tana a’di mo.
48005011	Hili waḵki/ aha/ iwaḵ mo, dina mmoc̱i gwo mo gom mo jin ’ciṯẖuwa munyjal yis mo tani atinta iṯo’ckunu aha/ bwa mo naskina/? E mii yan mo tani mo jin goluwa gol mo jin ta cwany’ciṯẖan dhul mo tani a’di joc̱kunu mo be.
48005012	Aha/ onayi ki uni gun ’kon mmoduŋkur um mii is mo mini uṯẖ is buniŋ gana/ ki ṯollo’k mo.
48005013	Haali/ um yuḵkunu mo mmo’ko ki ’kus mo iwaḵ mo. Dhali dhalku/ ki bu’th mom bum jin ’kona um ki ’kus mo mmota shi/ embula ’borga/ mo gom buŋgwar is mo. Hili e mo/en mo tani tayi imanmii to ka rem ’kup̱ mo ma.
48005014	Haali/ gwoŋḵan jin c̱inu ka ’dan’dap̱ mo tani a’di thimkunu mo e gwon ’de/ mo, jin o gwo mo ki: /E mini en amannyaḵ c̱a’b pini jin ’dish /e is mo me’d is piniŋ gana/ mo be.
48005015	Waḵki/ um ki shila shil ki she/ mo dhali losa los ka rem ’kup̱ mo tani hil ki ’bore/ ki um minu ’koki ’ce’d sho’k ka rem ’kup̱ mo be.
48005016	Hili aha/ ona gwo mo ki: Iiyi mo e Shi/in mo dhali dhalku/ ki ṯe bwa en’dap̱ kun o um ki buŋgwar is mo.
48005017	Haali/ bwa en’dap̱ kun onki buŋgwar is mo tani a’di miinu ap̱o/ Shi/in mo, dhali bwa jin o’dki Shi/in mo tani ap̱o/ buŋgwar is mo, haali/ uni gwansan ita gwo kun thanyi ’twa/ ka rem ’kup̱ mo mmonon um ’peni mii gun o um bwa moyi.
48005018	Hili waḵki/ um shuna Shi/in bway mo tani um yisa i’kokin mo e bwaŋ’kwariny gwoŋḵan jin c̱inu mo.
48005019	Dhali hili mii gi buŋgwar is mo tani uni ’kon eya tente/ ki ṯẖorony mo: mo jin miinu miinyc̱al mo, dhali mo jin ’dap̱uwa ’dap̱ e mo, dhali mii kun ’kanuwa ḵanthi/ mo,
48005020	dhali mo jin luŋu tomp̱inycon mo, dhali mii kun miinu mii ŋaari/ mo, dhali mii kun tanu ’kup̱ ki ’kup̱ mo, dhali mii kun biruwa bir mo, dhali mii kun tanuwa ṯacum bwa mo, dhali mii kun miinuwa nyor mo, dhali mii kun tanuwa ham ’kus ka ham ’kus mo, dhali mii kun ushu gwo gam me’d mo, dhali mii kun ’konu ka non she/ mo
48005021	dhali mii kun tanu dhap̱an mo dhali mii kun ’kosh ma suwa ’kosh mo, dhali mii kun waluwa wal e moŋ’kup̱a su mo, dhali mii gi wakansan mo. Aha/ ruma um ki gwo mo, me’d jin rumkika/ um iṯwa/a/ mo, ki uni gwansan kun miiki to gi wakansan mo tani mini ’koki gam mal gi Bampa/ ma Arumgimis mo.
48005022	Hili maman gi Shi/in a’di ta mo/en mo dhali moŋ’kuny bwa mo dhali mo ma ḵu’th is mo dhali mombwa jin ’kuc̱u ki ’kari’th mo dhali mii jin tanu ki bwaŋkush mo, dhali mombwam ’borga/ mo dhali mombwa kun tanu ku isiŋ gana/ mo,
48005023	dhali mombwa kun ’thup̱u e ki ’thup̱ mo dhali mombwa ma du jin ’timu/ mo. Ap̱o/ mii gi wakan mo tani gwoŋḵana kamu/ jin c̱inu mo yisa di’da.
48005024	Dhali uni gwansan kun ta ku ma Ḵrisṯẖos jin ta’da Yesus mo tani uni ’koshki buŋgwar is buni mo nyaḵki e kun dhuna uni ki ’thir ’thir mo dhali bwa en’dap̱ buni mo be.
48005025	Waḵki/ ana ’kona e Shi/in mo tani dhalki ana si’da/ iina e Shi/in mo.
48005026	Dhalki ana nona is bana mo ki c̱oṯ c̱oṯ mo walla rukunya rukuny ’kup̱ ka rem ’kup̱ mo walla ta dhap̱an ka rem ’kup̱ mo.
48006001	Iwaḵa, waḵki/ wathiŋ kamu/ bulu ’twa/a ’cesh e gwon dhaŋa kamu/ mo tani um gun ta gi to gi shi/in mo mini mii wari a’di is ka nyaŋ’ko’d mo e shi/in jin ’thup̱u e ki ’thup̱ mo. Hili ’kup̱, ’kup̱ki is pini mo isi ciki/ ki /e minu pal mo gara/.
48006002	Ḵali ton diṯin ka rem ’kup̱ mo, dhali ki mii gi wakan mo tani um mini thim gwoŋḵan ma Ḵrisṯẖos mo be.
48006003	Haali/ waḵki/ jan ṯal ’deŋ kamu/ midi kulum gwo ibwa mo ki a’di ta a’di mo tani ki a’di diki ta toŋ kamu/ mo tani a’di he’kki isi is pitiŋ gana/ e mo be.
48006004	Hili dhalki ’kwani ’baar ka ’deṯe/ ’deṯe/ pali miim buniŋ gana/ mo, dhali gwo jin di a’di a’diŋ kamu/ ibwa mo mmokar ’ba/ ki ca mo tani midi di gom is piti a’di ’de/ mo dhali yisa eya mannyaḵ c̱a’b jin ’dish a’di is mo be.
48006005	Haali/ ’kwani ’baar ka ’deṯe/ ’deṯe/ mini ḵal is kom mo gom tom buniŋ gana/ jin ḵala uni mo be.
48006006	Dhalki a’di jin ṯoru gwo mo nyaḵka’da ris tom ’boron pwaḵ bwa mo ki a’di jin ṯorki gwo mo.
48006007	Dhalku/ ki ta ku gi hegu e mo. Arumgimis yisa ta ji gi minu mii ka maḵa. Haali/ ma to yin jin mina wathi/ si mo tani a’di si’da/ imina a’di i’ciṯẖ mo be.
48006008	Haali/ a’di jin siki to gom buŋgwar is piti mo tani a’di midi ’ciṯẖ to ’peni buŋgwar is jin midi p̱u/ mo. Dhali hili a’di jin midi si to gom Shi/in mo tani a’di midi ’ciṯẖ mondiki/e ki sule/ ya ye ’ba/ mo ’peni Shi/in mo be.
48006009	Dhali dhalki ana daḵa mii is jin wu e mo mmomii miim ’borga/ mo, haali/ ki she/ yil mo mo tani ana mina ’ciṯẖ to mo waḵki/ ana ’kona bwa ki biṯ ka luŋgu’b mo be.
48006010	Dhali wakan mo tani me’d jin takina ana ki embula ’borga/ mo tani dhalki ana miina miim ’boron e ’kwani ’baar mo dhali isi kan ki jim mum mo gom uni gwansan kun ’kokin eya ṯa/ gi moŋgam gwo is mo be.
48006011	Misha uma adhan toŋ gwo gun ’kwarkika/ um ki me’d pem gana/ mowa?
48006012	A’di ta uni gwansan kun ona bwa ki ṯor eya tente/ eya p̱or ma pije/ ’te/ gom buŋgwar is mo kun mini ṯu’c um ki um minu ’ciṯẖa/ munyjal yis mo, dhali ki jasi mii gi wakan mo tani uni ti, iminu ’koki ṯo’c bwa mo gom cwany’ciṯẖan dhul ma Ḵrisṯẖos mo be.
48006013	Haali/ isi kani uni gwansan kun bu’thki mo ma munyjal yis jin ’ciṯẖu/ mo tani uni yisa ki is buni idhuki gwoŋḵan jin c̱inuwa. Hili uni ona bwa mo ki ta gi mo ma munyjal yis jin ’ciṯẖu/ mo ki uni mini ’tash miinyca mo ’te/ e buŋgwar is bum mo.
48006014	Hili mii gi wakan midi diki thoṯẖaa/ is mo mmokar ’ba/ ki ca mo isi ciki/ e cwany’ciṯẖan dhul gi Tap̱a Yesus Ḵrisṯẖos bana mo. Ki a’di mo tani mony’cesh ’koshkunu jwa mo gom aha/ mo dhali aha/ gom mony’cesh mo be.
48006015	Haali/ walla mo ma munyjal yis jin ’ciṯẖu/ mo tani yisa ’dap̱a’dap̱ ki toŋ kamuwa walla mo ma munyjal yis kun ’konu i e mo si’da/, hili a’di jin minu uḵ jin midi ta jin this mo be.
48006016	Moŋḵu’th is dhali momiimii mini ’ko ap̱o/ umi ’baar mo, um gun iikin mo e gwoŋḵan yansan mo, ap̱o/ um gun ta ’Kwani ma Israyiil kun ta ku ma Arumgimis mo be.
48006017	’Peni shwane/ mo tani dhalku/ ki dhal wathin ṯal ’deŋ kamu/ bway mo mmoṯo’c aha/ bwa mo, haali/ aha/ ḵalkina adu’d gi doru aha/ goma Yesus e buŋgwar is pem mo be.
48006018	A’the gi Tap̱a Yesus Ḵrisṯẖos bana mo midi di e shi/in bum mo, iwaḵ pem mo. Amen.
49001001	ABuulus jin ta a’di jin karu ki she/ mo goma Ḵrisṯẖos jin ta’da Yesus ki bwa ma Arumgimis mo be. E uni gwansan gun dhunu ki she/ ki dhelel dhelel mo, uni si’da/ kun ta ku isiŋ gana/ eya Ḵrisṯẖos jin ta’da Yesus mo be.
49001002	A’the e um mo dhali moŋḵu’th is ’peni Arumgimis jin ta’da Babam bana mo dhali Tap̱a Yesus Ḵrisṯẖos mo be.
49001003	Mom’bor mii midi di mo goma Arumgimis mo dhali Ababa gi Tap̱a Yesus Ḵrisṯẖos bana mo, a’di jin ’borki ana mii mo eya Ḵrisṯẖos ka ris mii kun ’boruwa ’bor mii mo e to gi shi/in mo e mo kun ’kon e momis mo be.
49001004	Isi kani me’d jin kwanykina a’di ana mo e a’di mo nṯwa/a/ ki mony’cesh yan ’konuki ḵa’b mo, ki ana mina ta ku gun ḵogu mo dhali ta ku gun mini ta kun dar gi thalkin ibwambori a’di mo be.
49001005	A’di ’kawurki ana mo e mo/en mo mmota iya/m piti mo eya Yesus Ḵrisṯẖos mo isi ki gwoŋ ’kup̱ bwam ’borgam piti mo
49001006	gom momaŋ ma ’the gi monycam piti mo a’di jin c̱ikina a’di ana ki me’d mo e A’di jin Enu mo be.
49001007	E a’di mo tani ana tana gi mo jin wanuwa wan ’ba/ ka bas piti mo dhali amure/ gi gwon dhiŋ bana kun dhalkunu ana ’pen mo, isi ka ’them piti jin tana a’di pa ki pa mo
49001008	a’di jin karkina a’di mmogus ap̧o/ ana mo be.
49001009	Haali/ a’di ṯorki ana a’di i e eya tente/ mo eya ris moyuḵ mo dhali mmonyiṯẖ gwo jin c̱inu mo ki jim bag mo jin ta bwam piti mo, isi ki gwoŋ ’kup̱ bwam ’borgam piti mo, a’di jin karkina a’di eya Ḵrisṯẖos mo be
49001010	me’d gwo jin ’kawurkina a’di mo gom mo jin minu thim mo, mmogama ris to ’baar mo me’d e a’di mo, to gun ’kon e momis mo dhali to gun ’kon e mony’cesh mo be.
49001011	E a’di mo isi ki gwoŋ ’kup̱ bwam ’borgam piti mo a’di jin thimki’da ris to ’baar mo isi ki bwaŋ gwom piti jin ’kawurkina a’di mo be.
49001012	Ana kun takina gi mo ma ’teŋ kap̱e/ eya Ḵrisṯẖos nṯwa/a/ mo tani ana ’kawurkunu mo dhali dhu ’pen ka pije/ mo mmo’ko mo gom montaḵ mo gom monycam piti mo be.
49001013	E a’di mo um si’da/ kun ciḵki gwoŋ gana/ mo dhali gwom ’borga/ mo gom bway gi mowoṯẖ bum mo dhali gam gwo is mo e a’di mo tani um ’kokunu mo mmo’dap̱ ’twa/ ki a’di jin okunu is mo a’di jin ta Shi/in Dheleladhelel mo be.
49001014	A’di jin -ta to jin woṯẖu/ ’twa/ mo gom mal bana mo ntagi ana mina bu’th a’di mo e montaḵ gi monycam piti mo be.
49001015	Gom ’kup̱ gwo yan mo tani haali/ aha/ ciḵkina gwo mo gom moŋgam gwo is bum mo e Tap̱a Yesus mo dhali mo/en bum ’kup ki uni kun dhunu ki she/ ki dhelel dhelel mo tani
49001016	aha/ yisa daḵa mo mmoc̱i mo jin ’boruwa ’bor bwa i is mo gom um mo mmoka um e mo e mon’thom pem mo
49001017	ka Arumgimis jin ta a’di gom Tap̱a Yesus Ḵrisṯẖos bana mo dhali Ababa gi Monyca mo midi c̱i um shi/in gi moyuḵ mo dhali gwo jin ’ceenu e monyiṯẖ jin nyiṯẖa um a’di mo,
49001018	mmotana um gi e ma du kun ’twaḵki mo ki ’twaḵ jin shi/i’d mo, ki um mini mish mo ma ’teŋ kap̱e/ yan mo jin yuḵkina a’di um icine/ mo dhali mom piti jin tana a’di pa ki pa mo gi mal gi monycam piti e uni kun dhunu ki she/ ki dhelel dhelel mo,
49001019	dhali mom’bi’th piti yan jin eḵki’d ki eḵ jin shi/i’d jin molu bar mo e ana kun gama gwo is mo isi me’d miim piti jin miina a’di ka dhan ’bi’th jin ta’da dem dem mo,
49001020	a’di jin thimkina a’di eya Ḵrisṯẖos mo me’d jin ’de’kkina a’di a’di mo ’peni mowu mo dhali kar a’di mmoc̱a’b ki me’da bim poros piti mo e mo kun ’kon e momis mo be,
49001021	isi mis gana/ mo ap̱owa ris gwoŋḵan kun c̱inu ki ’bi’th mo dhali moshirr mo dhali mom’bi’th mo dhali mo jin tanu tap̱a mo, dhali ap̧owa ris gwayi ’baar mo kun yerkunu mo, yisa jasi e she/ yil yana, hili si’da/ e yil jin midi p̧u’du/ mo be.
49001022	Dhali a’di dhuki’da ris to ’baar mo e bwaŋ’kwariny sho’k piti mo dhali a’di karki a’di ki a’di jin ta’da ’kaŋ’kup̱ ap̱owa ris to ’baar mo goma ḵaniisa mo,
49001023	a’di jin ta buŋgwar is piti mo, gom mon’tu’d piti jin ’tu’dkina a’di a’tu’di ’baar mo be.
49002001	Dhali a’di dhuki um ki e mo, ki um kun ’kokin mo mmowu mo gom gwon dhaŋ mo dhali miinthus mo,
49002002	e uni kun iikina um ’thissa/ mo mmobaṯẖkina um ya gi mony’cesh yan mo dhali mmobaṯẖkina um miin tap̱a gi mom’bi’th kun p̱wanu/ e mis mo, jin ta shi/in c̱aan jin di’d mmo/um mo e iya/ gi iman/ush gwo ha e mo be.
49002003	Ibwaman uni gwansan mo tani ana ’baar mo ’kokina mo nṯwa/a/ mo e em bana mo kun dhuna ana ki ’thir ’thir mo gom buŋgwar is bana mo, mmobaṯẖ bwa en’dap̱ mo gom buŋgwar is mo dhali bwa mo, dhali wakan ana ’kokina mo ki buyem pa mmota uc̱i ma nyor mo me’d ’kwanin tiya kun ta ’kwani en’thi/ mo be.
49002004	Hili Arumgimis a’di jin ta pa ki pa e momiimii mo, ’peni dhan mo/en jin enkina a’di ana mo tani
49002005	isi kani ki ana ’kokina mo mmowu mo e gwon dhaŋ bana mo tani a’di ki dhu ana mo mmo’ko ki e mo mmonṯal ’de/ mo nyaḵka Ḵrisṯẖos mo (Ka ’the mo tani um woṯẖkunu mo be),
49002006	dhali a’di ki cu ana mis mo nyaḵki a’di mo dhali a’di ki dhu ana mmonyaḵ ’ko ki a’di mo e mo kun ’kon e momis mo eya Ḵrisṯẖos jin ta’da Yesus mo be
49002007	ki she/ yil gunn kun mini p̧u’du/ mo tani a’di midi ṯor dhan pam piti jin tana a’di ka ’them piti jin molu bar mo e bwaŋkush piti mo ’kup̱ ki ana mo eya Ḵrisṯẖos jin ta’da Yesus mo be.
49002008	Haali/ ka ’the mo tani um woṯẖkunu mo ki moŋgam gwo is mo be. Dhali yansan ta mii jin miina um ki is bum mo yisa. A’di ta to jin c̱in ma Arumgimis ki me’d mo be.
49002009	Yisa, haali/ gom to jin miinu mowa, isi ciki/ jin mina wathin ’deŋ kamu/ diki kar ’ba/ ki ca mo.
49002010	Haali/ ana tana kuma ṯu’c piti mo kun uḵkunu mo eya Ḵrisṯẖos jin ta’da Yesus mo gom mii ma ṯuca ’borga/ mo, uni gun thosonkin ma Arumgimis nṯwa/a/ mo ki ana mina ’taki ii e uni mo be.
49002011	Wakan kayi gwo e mo ki um ’thissa/ ta ’kwani kun ’koki ta ’Kwani Yahuuda/ e buŋgwar is mo kun yuḵkunu gway ki ku gi ’kon ka munyjal yis i e mo ki uni gun yuḵkunu ki uni gun ’ciṯẖuwa munyjal yis mo, a’di jin miikunu e buŋgwar is ki me’d gi ’kwani mo be.
49002012	Kayi gwo e mo ki um ’thissa/ me’dyin um ḵwa/kunu bwa mo ’pena Ḵrisṯẖos mo, dhali um ta ku gi ’kon ka pije/ ’peni ’peŋkuman bampa/ ma Israyiil mo dhali um ta ’kwani kun moli gwo jin gamu me’d mo jin onu is mo. Um daran gi mo ma ’teŋ kap̧e/ mo dhali um daran ga Arumgimis gana/ mo e mony’cesh mo be.
49002013	Hili shwane/ eya Ḵrisṯẖos jin ta’da Yesus mo tani um kun ’thissa/ si’dkin mo kagahara mo tani um suskunu mo mmo’dish mii is mo ka bas ma Ḵrisṯẖos mo be.
49002014	Haali/ a’di ta moŋḵu’th is bana mo, a’di jin dhuki ana mmonṯal ’de/ mo dhali jin ’tuḵki mo ma goŋ jin ḵwa/u bwa mo ’peni mo jin tanu ’kup̧ mo
49002015	mmop̧uukina a’di e buŋgwar is piti mo gwoŋḵan jin c̱inu mo dhali jin ’kwarkunu mo, dhali jin onu mo ki a’di midi ’taki uḵa uḵ e is pitiŋ gana/ mo wathin ṯal ’de/ jin ta jin this mo e mo gi unin su/ mo, wakan a’di karki mo ma ḵu’th is mo.
49002016	Dhali wakan si’da/ a’di midi ’taki mii mii jin gwamkunuwa gwam mo gom am mo dhali um mo eya Arumgimis mo e buŋgwar isa ’de/ mo ki cwany’ciṯẖan dhul mo. Wakan a’di ki dil mo jin tanu ’kup̧ sho’k mo ntagi ’pemen mo be.
49002017	Dhali a’di p̧u’dki’d mo dhali c̱i gwo gom moŋḵu’th is e um mo, um gun ’thissa/ si’dkin mo ki si’d thus mo dhali moŋḵu’th is e uni gwansan kun ’dishkina ’dish is mo be.
49002018	Haali/ e a’di mo tani aman dhali um takina gi bway mo e Shi/ina ’de/ mo eya Baba mo be.
49002019	Wakan um doḵ/e yisa ’kokin mo mmota ’kwani kun ’kon ka pije/ mo walla ’kwani kun ’kon ki ’kus mo ’peni bampa/ mo, hili um ta ku gi ’peŋkuman bampa/ mo nyaḵki uni kun dhunu ki she/ ki dhelel dhelel mo dhali um ṯal ma waḵa ’de/ mo eya ṯa/ ma Arumgimis mo
49002020	jin nyaŋkunu mo ap̱o/ mo jin ḵa’bkunu mo jin ta uni kun dhunu ki she/ mo dhali imanc̱i gwo ma Arumgimis kadhamo/ mo. AḴrisṯẖos jin ta’da Yesus mo, a’di ki is pitiŋ gana/ a’di ta’da ’kaŋ’kup̱ gi dhan wosh gi ’penabi mo be.
49002021	E a’di mo tani aris mo ’baar mo kun re’du mo tani gam me’d imonṯal ’de/ mo dhali cu mo mmota gu’b gi mondheleladhelel e Tap̱a mo be.
49002022	E a’di mo tani um si’da/ inyaŋkunu mo e a’di jin ta monyc̱a’b ma Arumgimis e Shi/in mo be.
49003001	Gom ’kup̱ mii yansan mo aha/ jin tana aBuulus mo, aha/ jin tana habuus goma Ḵrisṯẖos jin ta’da Yesus mo gom gway bum mo um kun ’koki ta ’Kwani Yahuuda/ mo.
49003002	Ṯoshka/ ki um ciḵ gwo mo gom mo jin dhunuwa ’the ma Arumgimis mo a’di jin c̱ikunu aha/ mo gom um mo,
49003003	mmoṯorkunu aha/ gwo mo jin c̱inu ki jim bag mo mmomish mo ki gwo jin ’ceenu mo, me’d gwo jin ’kwarkika/ ki e ’pe’pere/ mo.
49003004	Ki um mini deŋ yansan e mo tani um mini nyiṯẖ a’di jin nyiṯẖka/ mo e gwo ma Ḵrisṯẖos jin c̱inu ki jim bag mo,
49003005	a’di jin dinuki ṯor iya/ gi ’kwanin tiya ka nyaḵum yil buni mo me’d jin ṯorkunu a’di mo shwane/ e unim piti kun dhunu ki she/ ki jiŋ ḵogu mo dhali imanc̱i gwo ma Arumgimis kadhamo/ mo ki Shi/in mo.
49003006	Ba kani a’di ita gwo gom ’kwani kun ’koki ta ’Kwani Yahuuda/ mo mmonyaḵ mal mo, mmota waḵa ’de/ mo e buŋgwar is mo dhali mmonyaḵ gwo pwaḵ bwa jin onu is eya Ḵrisṯẖos jin ta’da Yesus ki gwom ’borga/ mo be.
49003007	Gom gwom ’borga/ yan mo tani aha/ karu ka manmii to mo isi ki to jin c̱in ma Arumgimis ki me’d ka ’the mo, a’di jin c̱ikunu aha/ mo ki mo/um ki mom’bi’th piti mo be.
49003008	E aha/ mo tani ba aha/ itana a’di jin p̱isap̱is mo eya ris uni kun dhunu ki she/ mo tani a’the yansan c̱ikunu aha/ mo mmoc̱i gwo e ’kwani kun ’koki ta ’Kwani Yahuuda/ mo, mo jin tan ma Ḵrisṯẖos pa ki pa mo jin molu deŋ e mo
49003009	dhali mmodhala ris ’kwani ’baar mo mmop̱ar e mo a’di yan jin ṯi’thkunu mo ki jim bag mo mmoba’kkunu a’di ki yil ka ris mo eya Arumgimis jin uḵki’da ris to ’baar mo be.
49003010	Dhali wakan mo ka ḵaniisa mo tani ’ban ka ris gi moyuḵ ma Arumgimis mo minu ’taki ṯor mo e mom’bi’th kun molu gadhir mo dhali mom’bi’th mo kun ’kon e mo kun ’kon e momis mo be.
49003011	A’di yansan ta isi ’kup̱ gwo ibwaŋ gwom piti ki mo jin ta ji ma sule/ mo a’di jin torkina a’di ’twa/a ’cesh mo eya Ḵrisṯẖos jin ta’da Yesus Tap̱am bana mo be.
49003012	E a’di mo tani ana dara gi monyju/ mo dhali wu a’di jwa i is mo gom bway yan e moŋgam gwo is bana e a’di mo be.
49003013	Wakan aha/ yuḵkina um mo mmodhalka du ki biṯ ka luŋgu’b mo ap̱o/ is pem jin ’koshki aha/ ka nyor mo gom um mo, a’di jin ta montaḵ bum mo be.
49003014	Gom ’kup̱ mii yansan mo tani aha/ biṯkina ki jiŋ ’kup̱a’dup̱uni bwambor ma Baba mo.
49003015	’Peni a’di mo tani arisa waḵ kun ’kon e momis mo dhali kun ’kon e mony’cesh mo tani yerkunu gway mo,
49003016	ki isi pam piti jin tana a’di mo gom monycam piti mo tani a’di midi ’taki c̱i um mom’bi’th is ki dem dem ki Shi/in piti jin di isi bwaman wathi/ mo.
49003017	Dhali ka Ḵrisṯẖos midi ’taki di eya dum bum mo ki moŋgam gwo is mo dhali ki um mmotakina um ka birman mo dhali mo jin ḵa’bu/ mo e mo/en mo
49003018	mini ’taki ta gi mom’bi’th mo mmobu’th nyaḵka ris uni ’baar mo kun dhunu ki she/ ki dhelel dhelel mo a’di jin ta mombeega/ mo dhali mo kun tana luc̱ mo dhali monturga/ mo dhali moŋ’kulga/ mo
49003019	dhali mmomish mo/en ma Ḵrisṯẖos mo, a’di jin bolki mo jin nyiṯẖuwa nyiṯẖ e mo ki um minu ’taki ’tu’d mo ka ris mo ma Arumgimis jin ’tu’da a’di a’tu’d mo be.
49003020	Dhali e a’di mo, a’di jin ta gi mom’bi’th mo mmo/um mo e bwam ana mo, a’di jin mishki to mii mo ki nyanye/ mmobola ris to ’baar mo e kun doṯkina ana mo walla kun ṯoshkina ana mo,
49003021	e a’di mo tani monyca midi di mo eya ḵaniisa mo dhali eya Ḵrisṯẖos jin ta’da Yesus mo ntaga risa nyaḵum yil gi ’kwani mo gom mii ki sule/ mo dhali ki sule/ mo. Amen.
49004001	Wakan aha/ jin tana habuus gom Tap̱a mo yuḵkina um mo mmoshuwa shum bway ki mii kun ha me’d mo ka yuḵ jin yuḵkunu um mo be
49004002	ka ris mii kun dhunu is ki gwa’d mo dhali ki mii ma ’thup e mo, ki bwa jin ’kuc̱u ki ’kari’th mo, mmothonkina uma thon me’di ’ko’d ka rem ’kup mo e mo/en mo
49004003	mmoganankina um ’ba/ mo mmohal mo jin gamu gwo me’d e Shi/in mo eya deḵ jin deḵu/ gi mo ma ḵu’th is mo.
49004004	Buŋgwar isi ṯal ’de/ mo dhali Shi/ini ṯal ’de/ mo jasi me’d jin ’kokunu mo mmoyuḵ um mo e mo ma ’teŋ kap̱en ’de/ mo, a’di jin ta’da yuḵ bum jin yuḵkunu mo,
49004005	ki Tap̱an ṯal ’de/ mo dhali moŋgam gwo isa ’de/ mo dhali monṯal ’de/ jin cuc̱uwa cuc̱ mo,
49004006	ka Arumgimis ’de/ mo dhali Ababa gi ana ’baar mo, a’di jin diki’da p̱owa ris mo ’baar mo dhali eya ris to ’baar mo dhali e bwaman ana ’baar mo.
49004007	Hili a’the c̱ikunu ana ka ’deṯe/ ’deṯe/ mo isi ki mombar to jin c̱in ma Ḵrisṯẖos ki me’d mo.
49004008	Wakan a’di okunu gwo mo ki: Ki a’di shinki bway momis mo tani a’di suski’da risa buhany uni gun bu’thkunu mo dhali a’di c̱iki to kun c̱inu ki me’d mo e ’kwani mo.
49004009	(E gwo jin onu mo ki: A’di shinki bway momis mo, a’di ta ’pemen gwo gi wakata moye? Jasi ki a’di si’da/ thulki’d mo ka luŋgu’b isi moŋ’kulga/ gi mony’cesh mo.
49004010	A’di jin thulki’d mo tani ta a’di si’da/ jin shinki bway momis mo ap̱owa ris mo gun si’dasi’d mo ki a’di midi ’taki ’tu’da ris to ’baar mo. )
49004011	Dhali tom piti kun c̱ina a’di ki me’d mo annihe/ be. Ki kun tiya mini ’taki ta uni kun dhunu ki she/ mo dhali kun tiya mmota imanc̱i gwo ma Arumgimis jin onu is mo dhali kun tiya mmota imanc̱i gwom ’borga/ mo dhali kun tiya mmota imanhila hil eya ḵaniisa mo dhali kun tiya mmota imanṯor gwo mo
49004012	gom to gun ’tumu ’pen mo gom ’kwani kun dhunu ki she/ ki dhelel dhelel mo goma ṯu’c jin minu mii mo, dhali goma nyaŋ jin minu nyaŋ buŋgwar is ma Ḵrisṯẖos mo,
49004013	ntagi ana ’baar mo mina ḵu’th is mo e mo jin gamu is me’d mo gi moŋgam gwo is mo dhali monyiṯẖ Ya/ ma Arumgimis mo eya ’bap̱ jin ’bap̱u/ mo ntagi mom bar gi tur piti jin ’tu’dkunuwa Ḵrisṯẖos mo.
49004014	Wakan ki ana mina ’taki ’koki ’ko mo mmota uc̱i naskina/ mo ki ana minu ’koki ’dash mo dhali wuṯul mo dhali ḵal mo ka ris ’tham gi gwon thus ki eŋ ’kwani kun korakor mo ka maḵ buni kun takina uni mo eya he’k e jin he’kkina uni ka gany mo.
49004015	Dhali mii gwan e i is mo mmoṯor gwoŋ gana/ e mo/en mo ki ana mina mii ca mo eya ris ’twaŋkal kuku/ mo e a’di mo, a’di jin ta’da ’kaŋ’kup̱ mo, a’di jin ta’da Ḵrisṯẖos mo be.
49004016	’Peni a’di mo tani buŋgwar ka ’bimpil gamki is mo dhali c̱u’th ’kup̱i monṯal ’de/ mo ka ris gwocor mo, uni kun thip̱kina thip̱ gom a’di mo, ka ris yilsaŋ gi buŋgwar is ka ’deṯe/ ’deṯe/ mo ’kon mo mmomiiya ṯu’c ki ’dantar mo mmoca buŋgwar is mo dhali mmonyaŋa nyaŋ ki is piti e mo/en mo be.
49004017	Shwane/ aha/ karkina gwom pem mo dhali bah gwom pem mo e Tap̱a mo ki um mini mii ’koki ’ko mo me’d jin ’kona ’kwani kun ’koki ta ’Kwani Yahuuda/ mo e mii ma dum buni gun ’kona uni ki p̱e’th mo.
49004018	Uni tan ma dum buni a’tum ka ’tum mo mmo’ko ki dar gi momish gwo ’ban mo, mmo’ko ka pije/ ’peni mondiki/e ma Arumgimis mo haali/ gom miim p̱us buni kun ’kokin e uni mo goma dum buni gun ’bi’thkin ki ’bi’th mo.
49004019	Uni warkin ki enthus mo dhali uni c̱iki is buniŋ gana/ mo e mii kun ’kanuwa ḵanthi/ mo, mmopur bwa mo mmoboṯka ris mii gun ’dap̱u/ e ki she/ ki she/ mo be.
49004020	Wakan um ’koki da/ara Ḵrisṯẖos mo be.
49004021	Ṯoshka/ ki um ciḵ gwo gom a’di mo dhali ki um ṯorkunu gwo mo gom a’di mo me’d gwoŋ gana/ jin di’d eya Yesus mo.
49004022	Dhuyi aris miin dhamom bum ’pen ka pije/ mo, uni gun cila miim bum kun miina um kadhamo/ mo dhali kun p̱u/kin mo e mo ma he’k e ki e kun ’dap̱u/ mo
49004023	dhali tayi this mo e shi/in gi bwam bum mo
49004024	dhali hithi miin this mo, a’di jin uḵkunu mo mmowa e ka Arumgimis e mo ma ḵar/eŋ gana/ mo dhali moŋḵogu mo be.
49004025	Wakan dhalki ana dhuna ris gwon thus ’pen ka pije/ mo, dhali dhalka ris ’kwani ’baar mo ka ’deṯe/ ’deṯe/ o gwoŋ gana/ e uni gun nyaḵa uni ’ko mo haali/ ana tana to isa ’de/ ka rem ’kup mo be.
49004026	Ka nyor di’d mo tani hili dhalku/ miinthus ki mii mo. Dhalku/ ki dhala tente/ iya jis mo ka nyor buma du mo.
49004027	Dhali dhalku/ embula ’borga/ ki c̱i mo gom tap̱a ma ruma ’cesh mo.
49004028	Dhalku/ ki dhal a’din ’di/ bway mo mmodi mo mmoḵwal to mo, hili dhalki a’di dhal mii e i is mo mmomiiya ṯu’c mo, mmomiiya ṯu’c ki isi miim pa ki me’d piti mo, wakan ki a’di midi ’taki mish to c̱i mo gom uni gwansan kun mini mii ta gi to mo.
49004029	Dhalku/ ki dhal gwon thus bway mo mmop̱u’du/ ’peni ’twam bum mo, hili jasi a’di jin ’boro’d gom gwo jin yedhuwa ye’th sho’k mo, a’di jin midi ha me’d ki embul yan mo ki a’di midi ’taki c̱iya ’the ki uni gwansan kun ciḵki gwo mo be.
49004030	Dhali dhalku/ ki jwakaṯ Shi/in Dheleladhelel ma Arumgimis mo e a’di jin ’dap̱kunu um ’twa/ mo goma tee gi wanuwa wan ’ba/ mo be.
49004031	Dhalka ris mii kun ḵa/aḵa/ ’pen mo dhala nyor jin deḵki’da deḵ mo dhala nyor jin miinu mo dhali cuuwa/ jin ’theru/ mo dhali mo ma thu’th ’pen jin thudhu mo mmodhu ’pen ka pije/ mo ’peni um mo nyaḵka ris mii kun dup̱a dup̱i e mo,
49004032	dhali tayi gi bwaŋkush ka rem ’kup̱ mo ka du kun ’ka’da’ka’d mo mmodhala mure/ gi miinthus ’pen ka rem ’kup̱ mo me’d mii jin dhalkin ma Arumgimis uma mure/ miinthus bum ’pen mo eya Ḵrisṯẖos mo be.
49005001	Wakan tayi imanthoḵa Arumgimis mii mo me’d uc̱i gun enu mo be.
49005002	Dhali iiyi e mo/en mo me’da Ḵrisṯẖos enki ana mo dhali c̱i is pitiŋ gana/ mo gom ana mo mmota to jin ḵuyaḵuy mo jin c̱inu mo dhali jin ’ciṯẖu/ ’kus mo goma Arumgimis mo.
49005003	Hili mo jin miinu miinyc̱al mo dhala ris mii kun ta en’dap mo walla mo jin tanuwa ’thoṯẖum bwa mo minu ’koki mii yer gway mo isi bwaman um kani me’d jin hana mii me’d mo e bwaman uni kun dhunu ki she/ ki dhelel dhelel mo.
49005004	Dhalku/ ki dhal miiŋ kamu/ jin nyo/anyo/ bway mo mmodi mo, walla gwom p̱us jin onu mo walla miin salkin mo, uni gun ’koki ha me’d mo. Hili mmodhal mii gwansan e i is mo mmoc̱i mo jin ’boruwa ’bor bwa i is mo.
49005005	Mishi ki ’bore/ gom gwo yan mo ma. Wathin ’deŋ kamu/ jin mii miinyc̱al jin haku ’pen c̱eŋ gwas mo walla jin ’dap̱a’da ’dap̱ e mo walla jan ’deŋ kamu/ jin ta’da ’thoṯẖum bwa mo (a’di jin ta mii jin luŋu to mo) midi diki gam ari mal e Bampa/ ma Ḵrisṯẖos mo dhali Arumgimis mo be.
49005006	Dhalku/ ki dhal wathin ’deŋ kamu/ bway mo mmohe’k um e mo ki gwo kun ’ko bwa ’te/ mo haali/ gom to gi wakansan mo tani a’di ip̱u’dkin ma nyor ma Arumgimis ap̱o/ iya/ gi uni gun ush gwo ha e mo.
49005007	Wakan dhalku/ ki ce e ki uni mo
49005008	haali/ ’thissa/ um ’kokin mo e mondhurumi’d mo, hili shwane/ um ta ku gi moŋkush e Tap̱a mo. Iiyi um mo me’d uc̱i gi moŋkush mo
49005009	(haali/ maman ’peni moŋkush mo a’di gamkunu mo eya ris miim ’borga/ mo dhali mii kun tana ḵar/e mo dhali mii gi gwoŋ gana/ mo).
49005010	Dhali pali mii mo mmoda/ar a’di jin midi ’bor Tap̱a bwa mo.
49005011	Dhalku/ mii ki nyaḵ mii ki mondhurumi’d mo jin moli maman dho’th mo, hili dhali mii e i is mo mmodhu uni eya tente/ mo.
49005012	Haali/ a’di ta mii jin ’thenu is mo isi kani mmo/o gwo gom to gwansan kun miina uni ka ḵwal is mo.
49005013	Hili waḵki/ toŋ kamu/ ṯal ’de/ ṯoru eya tente/ ki moŋkush mo tani a’di wara’d ki to jin mishu mo haali/ ton ’deŋ kamu/ jin wara’d ki to jin mishu mo tani a’di ta moŋkush mo be.
49005014	Wakan a’di okunu gwo mo ki: Meri is mo, ayy /e jin ishki e mo, dhali cuyi mis mo ’peni mowu mo dhala Ḵrisṯẖos midi c̱i /e moŋkush mo be.
49005015	Hili ki thoson mo gom ii jin mina umi ii mo, yisa me’d ’kwani kun dar gi moyuḵ mo, hili me’d ’kwani kun ta gi moyuḵ mo,
49005016	mmowar mo is mo haala tee ta thus ki thus mo be.
49005017	Wakan dhalku/ ki ta p̱us mo, hili mishi gwo ’ban mo gom bwa gi Tap̱a jin wa cikise/ mo be.
49005018	Dhali dhalku/ ki ta uni kun ’kosh ma su mo, gom mii ma dhor piti mo. Hili ’tu’di mo ki Shi/in mo
49005019	mmoṯora ṯor ka rem ’kup̱ mo e gway kun yuḵu mo mmoka mo jin miinuwa mii e mo dhali e gway jin maŋuwa maŋ mo dhali e gway jin yuḵu mo gom to gi shi/in mo mmoyuḵ gway mo dhali mmomii ko ’pena dum bumi ’baar mo gom Tap̱a mo,
49005020	isa yempa/ mo dhali goma ris to ’baar mo mmoc̱i mo jin ’boruwa ’bor bwa i is mo ki gway gi Tap̱am bana ka Yesus Ḵrisṯẖos mo eya Arumgimis jin ta’da Baba mo be.
49005021	’Dap̱i ki me’d ka rem ’kup̱ mo ki moŋḵo/ ma Ḵrisṯẖos mo.
49005022	Up, ’dap̱i ki me’d ki gwo gi ikaṯẖim bum mo me’d mii jin miina um e Tap̱a mo be.
49005023	Haali/ wathiŋ gwaṯẖ a’di ta’da ’kaŋ’kup̱ gom ash mo me’da Ḵrisṯẖos mmotana a’di a’kaŋ’kup̱ goma ḵaniisa mo, a’di jin ta buŋgwar is piti mo dhali mmotana a’di a’di ki is piti Amanwoṯẖ a’di mo be.
49005024	Me’d jin ’dap̱ ma ḵaniisa ki me’d ka Ḵrisṯẖos mo tani wakan dhalka ris up si’da/ ’dap̱an ki me’d ka ris to gi ikaṯẖim buni mo.
49005025	Kwaniŋ gwaṯẖa, eni up̱ bum mo ma me’da Ḵrisṯẖos mmo/enkina a’diya ḵaniisa mo dhali c̱i is pitiŋ gana/ mo goma yim mo
49005026	ki a’di midi dhagama yim mo ki mo jin dhelelkina a’di ayim mo ki gwo mo me’d mo jin lamu ki yi’de/ mo
49005027	ka ḵaniisa minu kari bwambori a’di mo ki ra/ ra/ mo ki dar gi monyo/o’d mo walla mo jin dudup̱a dudup̱ mo walla ma to gi wakan mo, ka yim midi dheleladhelel mo dhali dar gi monthalkin mo.
49005028	Isi kani gwaṯẖ si’da/ mini mii en up̱ buni mo me’d is buniŋ gana/ mo. A’di jin eni ashim piti mo tani eni is pitiŋ gana/ mo be.
49005029	Haali/ wathiŋ kamu/ yisa di’da jin shi/i buŋgwar is piti i e mo, hili a’di ki thip̱ a’di mo dhali ŋa/ a’di mo me’d mii jin miikin ma Ḵrisṯẖos goma ḵaniisa mo,
49005030	haali/ ana tana tom buŋgwar is piti mo be.
49005031	Haali/ gom ’kup̱ gwo gi wakan mo tani wathi/ midi mii ḵwa/ bwa mo ’peni com mo dhali kum mo dhali gam is ki ashim piti mo dhali uni su/ mo tani mini ṯal ’de/ mo be.
49005032	Gwo yansan ta dhan gwo jin bagu mo dhali aha/ butha ’pemen yan kan mo mmotana a’diya Ḵrisṯẖos mo dhala ḵaniisa mo be.
49005033	Bahili dhalka ris umi ’baar ka ’deṯe/ ’deṯe/ mo eni up̱ bum mo me’d is bum gana/ mo, dhali dhalki up̱ si’da/ hilin ki ’bore/ mo ki uni mini taḵ ikaṯẖim buni mo be.
49006001	Uc̱iya, hayi gwo gi ibabam bum e mo dhali ikwan mo e Tap̱a mo, haali/ a’di yansan ta miim ’boro’d mo be.
49006002	Taḵi ibabam bum mo dhali ikwan mo (Gwo yansan ta gwoŋḵan jin ’kwarkunu mo jin ta jin ṯwa/a/ mo jin ta gi gwo jin onu is mo. ),
49006003	ki a’di midi ’taki ’bor mo gom um mo dhali ki um mini ’taki ’ko ki ’kom ’pempaŋ gana/ e mony’cesh mo.
49006004	Ibaba, dhalku/ ki rukuny uc̱i ka nyor mo, hili thip̱i uni mo e mo jin ’dap̱uwa bora ’cesh mo dhali e mo jin yedhuwa ye’th sho’k ki gwon Tap̱a mo.
49006005	Um c̱iŋkina/ gun yolu mo, hayi gwo gi uni gwansan e mo kun ta tap̱am bum e mony’cesh mo ki moŋḵo/ is mo dhali ki mondee mo ka dun ṯal ’de/ mo me’d mii jin miina um goma Ḵrisṯẖos mo,
49006006	yisa e bway gi jis/e jin miina ’kwani to mo, mmo’bor ’kwani bwa mo ’te/ yisa, hili me’d uni kun ta c̱iŋkina/ kun mii to goma Ḵrisṯẖos mo mmomii bwa ma Arumgimis ’pena du mo,
49006007	mmomii to ki bwaŋ gana/ mo me’d mii jin miina um gom Tap̱a mo, dhali yisa gom ’kwaniya,
49006008	mmomisha um ki ma to gunn kun miina kun tiya ki ’bore/ mo tani a’di midi bu’th to jin nyaḵa’d kan doḵ/e mo ’peni Tap̱a mo waḵki/ a’di ta c̱iŋkina/ jin yolu mo walla ta a’di jin di ki ’kus mo be.
49006009	Itap̱a, miiyi to kun nyaḵan gom uni mo ma, dhali ’doyi bwa ka ’kany’cesh mo ’peni mo jin shwanuwa ’cesh ki sho’k mo, mmomisha um ki a’di jin ta Tap̱am buni dhali Tap̱am bum mo tani a’di di’d e momis mo, dhali mo jin miinuwa mii ka gwar ’de/ yisa di’da e a’di mo be.
49006010	Ḵwalany ’te/ be. ’Bithi um is mo e Tap̱a mo dhali e mom’bi’th ma dem dem piti mo.
49006011	Hithi agoŋgoro/ ma Arumgimis ka ’bimpil mo ki um mini mish dosh mo ap̱owa ’kanyco/ gi tap̱a ma ruma ’cesh mo.
49006012	Haali/ ana ’konaki ’thir mo ap̱o/ buŋgwar is mo dhala bas mo, hili ap̱o/ mom’bi’th kun molu gadhir mo dhali ap̱o/ mom’bi’th mo, dhali ap̱o/ itap̱a kun ji mony’cesh yan mo jin ta mondhurumi’d mo shwane/, dhali ap̱owa risa buhany shi/in thus kun ’koki ta gi buŋgwar is ga ’cesh mo e mo kun ’kon e momis mo.
49006013	Wakan budhi agoŋgoro/ ma Arumgimis ka ’bimpil mo ki um mini mish dosh mo mmoroc̱ mo ka tee jin ta thus mo dhali mmothimkina um a’di mo tani mmodosh mo be.
49006014	Doshi um wakan mo mmodeḵ wac̱kan gi gwoŋ gana/ mo e empa’d bum mo dhali hithi arac̱pa/ gi mii ma ḵar/e mo
49006015	dhali mmo’kamu’thkina um sho’k bum ki mo jin thosonkunu mo ki gwom ’borga/ mo gi mo ma ḵu’th is mo be.
49006016	Ap̱owa ris mii gwansani ’baar mo tani budhi agoŋgoro/ me’d bum mo, a’di jin ta moŋgam gwo is mo, haali/ e a’di mo tani um mini mish usa ris shemen toŋ kan kun ’bathan kun shina a’dinthus ’de/ yin mo.
49006017	Dhali budhi toŋ’kup̱ ki bway mowoṯẖ mo dhali gandala turga/ gi Shi/in mo, a’di jin ta gwo ma Arumgimis mo be.
49006018	Thoyi isa yempa/ e Shi/in ka risa ’tho mo dhali ka di’b is jin di’bu/ mo, ki um mini ’dim ’kup̱ mo ki montim mo mo mmodi’ba di’b is goma ris uni ’baar mo kun dhunu ki she/ ki dhelel dhelel mo be.
49006019	Dhali gom aha/ si’da/ ki mo jin bahkunu gwo mo minu ’taki c̱i aha/ mo e ’twam pem jin miga/ c̱ee mo ki dar gi monyju/ mo mmobah gwo jin c̱inu ki jim bag mo, a’di jin ta gwom ’borga/ mo.
49006020	Haali/ aha/ tana amanya eya jindhiir mo gom a’di mo jin miga/ ’taki bah a’di eya tente/ ki dar gi monyju/ mo me’d jin miga/ ḵa ’taki ṯor gwo mo ba/.
49006021	Dhali ki um si’da/ mini ’taki mish mo mo gom mondim pem mo dhali mii jin miga/ mo tani Tiḵikus, a’di jin ta’da kam bana jin enu mo dhali a’di jin ta isiŋ gana/ mo e miin to gi Tap̱a mo tani midi ṯor um gwo mo goma ris to ’baar mo be.
49006022	Aha/ hashkina a’di i um mo gom ’kup̱ gwom bwam ’boro’d yan mo, ki um mini ’taki mish mo mo ki aman anann be, dhali ki a’di midi ’taki ’bitha dum bum is mo be.
49006023	Moŋḵu’th is midi di mo gom iwaḵ mo dhali mo/en nyaḵki moŋgam gwo is mo ’peni Arumgimis jin ta’da Baba mo dhali Tap̱a Yesus Ḵrisṯẖos mo be.
49006024	A’the midi di mo gom umi ’baar mo, um gun enki Tap̱a Yesus Ḵrisṯẖos bana mo ki mo/en jin midi diki wuwa mashira/ mo be.
50001001	ABuulus dhala Ṯimuṯẖawuus kun ta c̱iŋkina/ goma Ḵrisṯẖos jin ta’da Yesus mo. E uni ’baar mo kun dhunu mo ki she/ ki dhelel dhelel eya Ḵrisṯẖos jin ta’da Yesus mo, e uni gun ’kon mo e Pam P̱ilibbi nyaḵki ’kwaniŋ gwanyjaḵa/ ma ḵaniisa dhali uni gun cila to hil mo.
50001002	A’the e um mo dhali moŋḵu’th is ’peni Arumgimis jin ta’da Babam bana dhali Tap̱a Yesus Ḵrisṯẖos mo.
50001003	Aha/ ’bora Arumgimis pem bwa i is mo ap̱owa ris mom pem jin kaka/ um e mo be.
50001004	Isa yampa/ eya ’thom pem mo gom umi ’baar mo mmomii mon’thom pem ki bwaŋ ’kunyga/ mo.
50001005	Mmo’bora ’bor bwa i is mo gom gwom ’borga/ jin nyaḵu um pwaḵ ki aha/ ’pena tee jin ṯwa/a/ ntagi shwane/ mo be.
50001006	Dhali aha/ misha ka jiŋ gana/ ki a’di jin ṯelki’da ṯu’c jin ’boro’d ’pen e um mo tani midi ’baar a’di mo ka tee ma Yesus Ḵrisṯẖos mo be.
50001007	A’di ’boro’d ki ’bor gana/ mo gom aha/ mmokulum gwo i bwa mo gom umi ’baar mo kansan mo haali/ aha/ dhuna um eya dum pem mo haali/ aris umi ’baar mo nyaḵu/ a’the pwaḵ ki aha/ mo me’d jin dika/ eya sijin mo dhali mmo’ce’d gwo she/ mo dhali mmoṯel gwom ’borga/ sho’k mo.
50001008	Haali/ Arumgimis ta’da man/o gwo gom aha/ mo mmo’kosha ṯe/ aha/ mo gom umi ’baar mo ka du ma Ḵrisṯẖos jin gama gam mo jin ta’da Yesus mo.
50001009	Dhali a’di ita mon’thom pem ki mo/en bum mini ish ki nyanye/ ki nyanye/ mo nyaḵki yuḵ ilu/ mo dhali mmonyiṯẖa ris to ’baar mo.
50001010	Wakan ki um mini ṯes to kun ’boron ki ’bor gana/ mo dhali mmota kun dhelelin mo dhali kun dar gi mii m’ba/ mo goma tee ma Ḵrisṯẖos mo be.
50001011	Mmo’tu’d mo ki maman gi mo ma ḵar/e jin p̱u’du’d ’pena Yesus Ḵrisṯẖos mo mmota monyca mo dhali momaŋ ma Arumgimis mo be.
50001012	Aha/ ŋap̱a um mmomish mo mo, iwaḵ, gom to gun mii aha/ mo ka jiŋ gana/ tani a’di ta ’pemen mmop̱al gwom ’borga/ mo be.
50001013	Dhali wakan mondeḵ pem goma Ḵrisṯẖos a’di wara’d ki mo jin mishu mo isi ki tur mo e uni gun dhunu mo mmohil gu’b ma mudhiir e mo jin jin ma askar ma Ithaaliya aji mo dhala ris unin tiya si’da/ mo.
50001014	Dhali awaḵa tiya ka ris bu’thkina du mo e Tap̱a gom mondim pem eya sijin mo dhali uni dar ma du mo ki nyanye/ mmoṯor gwo ma Arumgimis ki dar gi moŋḵo/ is’ mo be.
50001015	Kun tiya ka jiŋ gana/ c̱i gwo goma Ḵrisṯẖos ’peni bwa shigga/ mo dhali mmobira bir si’da/ mo hili kun tiya si’da/ ki bwaŋ gana mo be.
50001016	Ku gi ’ban yansan mii a’di ki mo/en mmomisha uni ki aha/ karkunu mo gom gwo mmo’ce’d she/ mo gom gwom ’borga/ mo.
50001017	Ku gi ṯwa/a/ c̱i gwo goma Ḵrisṯẖos ’peni bwa jin ḵwa/u mo tani yisa ki bwaŋ gana/ mo hili uni kulumki gwo ibwa mo mmoṯo’c aha/ ’kus mo e mondim pem eya sijin mo be.
50001018	Gomata ’te/. Jasi eya ris mii ’baar mo waḵki/ mii jin p̱wanu/ ’te/ mo walla e gwoŋ gana/ mo tani aḴrisṯẖos c̱ikunu ’twa/ maŋ mo dhali e a’di yan kantan mo tani aha/ ’kunykina bwa mo be.
50001019	Nye, dhali aha/ mina bwa ’kuny mo. Haali/ aha/ misha ka ’thom bum jin ’thokina um mo dhali mowoṯẖ gi Shi/in ma Yesus Ḵrisṯẖos kan mo tani a’di ṯu’kki mii is mo mmo’cuḵ aha/ mo be.
50001020	Me’d jin tana a’di moŋganan ’bam pem mo dhali mo ma ’teŋ kap̱e/ mo ki aha/ mina isi diki ’theya ’the ki sule/ mo tani hili ka du jin roc̱u sho’k isi bwaman mo shwane/ me’d isa yempa/ mo tani aḴrisṯẖos minu eh mo e buŋgwar is pem mo waḵki/ a’di ta mondiki/e walla mowu mo.
50001021	Haali/ gom aha/ mmodi mo tani a’di ta’da Ḵrisṯẖos mo dhali mmowu mo tani a’di ta nyunycina/ mo be.
50001022	Waḵki/ a’di ta mo gi ’konu ki e e buŋgwar is mo tani a’di ta ’pemen mmoḵal maman goma ṯu’c pem mo. Hili aha/ mola ṯor naskina/ a’di jin miga/ kwany mo.
50001023	Aha/ budha bwa ka yissa/ mo. Bwa oyaa/ ki ḵwa/ is mo dhali mmonyaḵ di eya Ḵrisṯẖos mo haali/ a’di ’boro’d ki ’bor gana/ mo be.
50001024	Hili mmodi mo ki buŋgwar is mo tani a’di minu mii mii mo gom gway bum mo be.
50001025	Dhali mmomishga/ yan ki isa duŋ gana/ mo tani aha/ misha ki aha/ mina di mo dhali rash c̱a’b mo e umi ’baar mo gom moŋḵal iim bum mo dhali bwaŋ’kunygam bum mo e moŋgam gwo is mo.
50001026	Wakan e aha/ mo tani ki um mini ta gi ’kup̱ mii mo kun mini ish ka enthus mo mmodhu ’ba/ eya Ḵrisṯẖos jin ta’da Yesus mo gom mmomiga/ p̱u’dku/ doḵ/e e um mo be.
50001027	Jasi a’di imina umi mii mo: Dhali dhalki um ta kum paŋ gana/ mo kun mini ha me’d mo gom gwom ’borga/ ma Ḵrisṯẖos mo. Wakan waḵki/ aha/ mina yaku/ mo dhali p̱ar um e mo walla aha/ mina p̱i mo tani aha/ mina ’taki ciḵ gwo gom um mo ki um ṯelki sho’k mo e shi/ina ’de/ mo ka dun ṯal ’de/ mo mmobira bir ki ’ban kuku/ mo gom moŋgam gwo is gi gwom ’borga/ mo be.
50001028	Dhali mmo’koki ḵo/ is gom toŋ kamu/ ṯal ’de/ mo ’peni uni gun asa uma p̱o/ mo. A’di ta to jin ṯoru eya tente/ mo gom uni mo mmo’kol e ki me’d mo gom mony’ce’d sho’k buni mo hili gom bway mowoṯẖ bum mo tani dhali a’di yan ’peni Arumgimis mo be.
50001029	Haali/ a’di c̱ikunu um mo gom gway ma Ḵrisṯẖos mo tani ki um mini ’taki ’koki gam a’di gwo is jasi ’te/ mo hili um si’da/ mina isi ’kosh ka nyor gom gway piti mo be.
50001030	Mmomal e e moŋ’kosh mii yan a’di jin p̱arkina um e mo dhali jin ciḵkina um jin di’d e aha/ shwane/ mo be.
50002001	Wakan waḵki/ mo jin roc̱uwa du sho’k mo eya Ḵrisṯẖos di’d mo dhali mo gi lalu sho’k mo ki gwo gi mo/en mo dhali mo gi nyaḵu to mii ka dun ’de/ gi Shi/in mo dhali waḵki/ adu jin gama gam mo dhali mii jin miinu ki mo/en mo tani
50002002	’tu’daa/ mo ki mom’bor bwa mo mmota ga du jin nyaḵka’d mo mmo’tu’d ki mo/en ’de/ mo dhali mmo’tu’d ki bwan ’de/ mo dhali ka dun ’de/ mo be.
50002003	Dhalka aŋkirre/ ki mii mo mmota ham ’kus mo walla mmodhu is ki ’kwanim pa mo. Hili mmodhu is ki gwa’d mo mmohil ci i e ki ’bore/ mmobol is bumi e mo.
50002004	Dhalka ris um ka ’deṯe/ ’deṯe/ hil to gi cin tiya i e mo mmo’koki hil jasi tom bum gana/ i e mo.
50002005	Tayi gi bwa yan e bwaman is bum um ’cena mo ma, a’di jin takina um eya Ḵrisṯẖos jin ta’da Yesus mo,
50002006	a’di ba/ a’di jin ta jamas ma Arumgimis mo tani a’di diki o ki mo gi nyaḵa nyaḵ ka Arumgimis midi ta to jin minu bu’th ki wup̱ mo.
50002007	Hili a’di karki is piti bwa ’te/ mo mmobu’th jamas gi c̱iŋkina/ mo mmodhodhu a’di ki dho’th jin dho’thkunu ’kwani kansan mo be.
50002008	Dhali mmogamu a’di kan ki is gi wathiny’cesh mo tani a’di karki isi is piti ki gwa’d mo dhali mmowar ka manha gwo e mo mmowu mo isi wu gi cwany’ciṯẖan dhul mo be.
50002009	Wakan Arumgimis karki a’di ki caŋ gana/ mo dhali c̱i a’di gway jin di’d eya p̱owa ris gwayi ’baar mo.
50002010	Dhali ki gway ma Yesus mo tani aris ’kup̱a’dup̱uni ’baar mo mini mii luŋ mo ki ’beles e momis mo dhali e mony’cesh mo dhali e bwaŋ’kwariny mony’cesh mo
50002011	dhala risa le’di ’baar mo mini pi gwo mo ka Yesus Ḵrisṯẖos ta Tap̱a mo gom monyca ma Arumgimis jin ta Com mo be.
50002012	Dhali wakan, um pem gun enka/ mo, me’d jin hana um gwo e isa yempa/ mo tani wakan shwane/, yisa jasi mmodika/ um e buŋ’kus mo hili ki nyanye/ mmop̱ika/ mo, miiyi mowoṯẖ bum gana/ mo ki moŋko/ is mo dhali ki mondee mo.
50002013	Haali/ Arumgimis umki mii mo e um mo dhali ki bwa jin ta bwa mo dhali ki bwa ma ṯu’c jin ta bwam pitiŋ gana/ mo be.
50002014	Miiyi aris to ’baar mo ki dar ga gumgum mo ma walla ki gwo jin doṯuwa doṯ mo.
50002015	Ki um mini dar gi mii ’ba/ mo dhali dar ga maḵ mo mmota uc̱i ma Arumgimis mo mmodar gi thalkin mo e bwaman ’kwani ma nyaḵum yil mo kun burusha ii ki burush mo dhali kun c̱aca ii ki c̱aca mo e bwam uni mo, uni kun kusha um mo me’d moŋkush eya ’cesh mo.
50002016	Mmolana um gwo gi mondiki/e bu’th mo wakan ka tee ma Ḵrisṯẖos mo tani aha/ mina kar is ki ca mo ki aha/ dinaki gus mo ka wuny is walla miiya ṯu’c ka wuny is mo be.
50002017	Me’d waḵki/ aha/ ’thinu mo e mo jin miinuwa basa ’cesh mo gom moŋgam gwo is bum mo tani aha/ ’bora bwa mo dhali ’kunya bwa mo nyaḵki umi ’baar mo be.
50002018	Wakan si’da/ um mina bwa ’bor mo dhali ’kuny bwa mo nyaḵki aha/ mo be.
50002019	Aha/ ṯosha e Tap̱a Yesus mo mmohashka/ Ṯimuṯẖawuus e um mo ki ’dishe/ mo. Wakan ki aha/ minu malas mo ki gwo ’peni um mo.
50002020	Aha/ dara gi jan ’de/ jin waki a’di mo jin midi ta gi bwaŋ gana/ mo mmo/anan is gom mmo’kona um ki ’kom pa mo.
50002021	Uni ’baar mo hili jasi ’kup̱ki tom buni mo, yisa gom to ma Yesus Ḵrisṯẖos mo.
50002022	Hili Ṯimuṯẖawuus ta a’dim pa jin misha um mo mmomii to me’d ya/ jin mii to gom com mo tani a’di miiki to nyaḵki aha/ mo gom gwom ’borga/ mo be.
50002023	Aha/ ṯosha wakan mmohashki a’di i um mo ki ’dishe/ me’d jin miga/ mish ki a’di midi ya kata gom aha/ mo.
50002024	Dhali aha/ gama gwo is e Tap̱a mo ki aha/ ki ’dishe/ ki is pem mina yaku/ si’da/ mo be.
50002025	Aha/ kuluma gwo ibwa ki kulum gana/ mo ki a’di minu mii mii mmohash ki uma Abap̱rudiṯus a’di jin ta’da kam pem mo dhali agarr jin nyaḵa’da ṯu’c mii mo dhali agarr jin ta’da askar mo dhali amanyam bum mo dhali amanmii to jin miga/ mii ta mo.
50002026	Haali/ a’di ’kosha ṯe/ umi ’baar kagahara mo dhali a’di butha ’tham mo haali/ um ciḵ gwo mo gom a’di ki a’di ’ba’thki’d mo be.
50002027	Ka jiŋ gana/ a’di ’ba’thki’d mo mmo’dish ’twa/ mmowu mo be. Hili Arumgimis miimii ap̱o/ a’di mo dhali yisa jasi e a’di, hili ap̱o/ aha/ si’da/ isi ciki/ aha/ mina ’taki ta gi bwan diṯi’d jin ta jin diṯadiṯ mo.
50002028	Aha/ tup̱a bwa kagahara mo mmohash ki um a’di wakan mo ki um mina bwa ’kuny mo mmop̱ar a’di e mo doḵ/e dhali kan mo ki aha/ mina mo/anan is pem idinin is mo be.
50002029	Wakan buthi a’di e Tap̱a ki bwaŋ ’kunyga/ ’baar mo ma dhali taḵi ’kwani kun wakan mo.
50002030	Haali/ a’di muru’di wu mo goma ṯu’c ma Ḵrisṯẖos mo, a’di c̱i mondiki/em piti mmothima ṯu’c bum gom aha/ mo be.
50003001	Gom gwo jin boc̱o’d mo gom um, iwaḵ pem mo. ’Bori bwa mo ma, e Tap̱a mo. Mmo’kwar um gwo kun nyaḵkan mo tani a’di diki ṯocaa/ bwa mo haali/ a’di ta’da teṯe/ gom um mo be.
50003002	Jiyi a’ka ki e ki ’bore/ mo ma. Dhali jiyi uni gun mii tonthus ki e ki ’bore/ mo ma. Jiyi uni gwansan ki e ki ’bore/ mo ma kun ’ciṯẖi/ buŋgwar is is mo.
50003003	Haali/ ana tana uni gun ’ciṯẖuwa munyjal yis gana/ mo ana gun luŋa Arumgimis ki shi/in mo dhali monyca eya Ḵrisṯẖos jin ta’da Yesus mo dhali mmo’koki dhu buŋgwar is e buŋgwar is mo.
50003004	Ba aha/ ki is pem tana gi ’kup̱ gwo mo gom buŋgwar is jin ta buŋgwar is mo si’da/. Waḵki/ wathiŋ kamu/ midi kulum gwo ibwa ki a’di ta gi ’kup̱ gwo e buŋgwar is mo tani aha/ tana ki nyanye/ ki nyanye/ mo be.
50003005	Aha/ ’ciṯẖkunuwa munyjal yis mo ka cim pekwara mo dhali aha/ tana wathi/ ’peni ’Kwani ma Israyiil mo dhali aha/ tana ja waḵ ma Benyamiin mo, dhali aha/ tana ji Ibraniyiin mo jin dhodhu e ’Kwani ma Ibraniyiin mo be. Me’d gwo gi gwoŋḵan jin c̱inu ki ’Kwani P̱arisiyiin mo tani
50003006	aha/ shwakina anyor mo mmoṯoca ḵaniisa bwa mo, me’d gwo gi mo ma ḵar/e jin baṯẖ gwoŋḵan jin c̱inu i’ko’d mo tani aha/ dina ka p̱o/ mo be.
50003007	Hili waḵki/ nyunycinaŋ kamu/ di’d jin taka/ mo tani a’di karka/ me’d to jin thisu e mo gom gway ma Ḵrisṯẖos mo be.
50003008	Ka jiŋ gana/ aha/ dhuna ris to me’d to kun thisu e mo gom to jin bolo’da ris to ’baar mo e ki ’bor mo jin ta mmomisha Ḵrisṯẖos jin ta’da Yesus Tap̱am pem mo be. Dhali gom gway piti mo tani aha/ wana gwo kan e bwa mo mmodhala ris to ’peni ’baar mo dhali aha/ dhuna uni me’d to gun pishu mo ki mii gi wakan ki aha/ mina gama Ḵrisṯẖosa du is mo be.
50003009	Dhali ki aha/ minu this mo i is e a’di mo, yisa mmota gi mo ma ḵar/e ki is pem mo yisa, mmo’dap̱ ’ko’di gwoŋḵan jin c̱inu mo. Hili a’di jin ta mo gi gamu gwo is eya Ḵrisṯẖos mo. Mo ma ḵar/e yan ’peni Arumgimis mo a’di jin di ’ko’d e mo jin gamu gwo is mo be.
50003010	Ki aha/ mina mish a’di mo dhali mom’bi’th gi mompim piti mo dhali aha/ mina pash mo gi isa nyor piti mo mmowar waki a’di e jwam piti mo be.
50003011	Wakan waḵki/ a’di mishu mii mo gom aha/ ki aha/ mina bumbur mo e mo jin pinu mo ’peni mowu mo be.
50003012	Yisa mmobu’thkika/ to yansan mo hila/ walla mmowarki jim ’borgaŋ gana/ mo hila/, hili aha/ dina mmo/ur a’di mo mmomiga/ bu’th a’di jin bu’thkin ma Ḵrisṯẖos jin ta’da Yesus aha/ mo, mmokar aha/ mo mmota jim piti mo be.
50003013	Iwaḵa, aha/ dinaki kar is pem ki jim bu’th to mo hila/. Hili ton ṯal ’de/ miiga/ mo mmodhalka ris to gunn ŋ’ko’d mo dhali mmogoŋ is ka ḵarambuye/ ki to gun ’koni buŋ’kup̱ mo tani
50003014	aha/ gusa ur to i’ko’d mo e mo jin tanu gi ’kup̱ to mo mmogam ’kup̱a ŋwa ’pena yuḵ ma Arumgimis ’peni momis mo eya Ḵrisṯẖos jin ta’da Yesus mo be.
50003015	Dhalki ana gwansan gun isa mo tani tana gi bwa ki wakan mo ma. Dhali waḵki/ um ’kona bwa ka bwanycin mo, ma e ton tiya mo tani Arumgimis midi ṯor a’di yan eya tente/ e um si’da/ mo be.
50003016	Isi kan dhalki ana iina iiŋ gana/ mo e mo jin bumburkina ana mo.
50003017	Iwaḵa, ’thoḵaa/ mii mo ma dhali ḵuthi uni gwansan ki e mo ma uni gun ’kokin mo mmomii kan me’d jin p̱ara um she/mm e e aman mo.
50003018	Haali/ uni ka ris ṯorkika/ um mo me’d ka ris mo dhali shwane/ aha/ ṯora um gwo ki jabu’th mo uni gun ’kokin mo mmomii waki uni gun ta ’kup̱ gi cwany’ciṯẖan dhul ma Ḵrisṯẖos mo be.
50003019	’Pemen buni ta mony’ce’d sho’k mo dhali arum buni jin luŋa uni mo tani ta bwa mo dhali uni caki can thus e mon’the is buni mo ki bwa jin dhuna uni ki to ga ’cesh mo be.
50003020	Hili ’peŋkuman pam bana a’di ta momis mo be dhali ’peni a’di mo tani ana c̱orkina Amanwoṯẖ mo jin ta Tap̱a Yesus Ḵrisṯẖos mo be,
50003021	a’di jin midi aḵ buŋgwara ha’th’ko’d bana yan e mo mmowa e ki buŋgwar is piti mo e monyca mo ki mom’bi’th jin ’bitha a’di e mo mmomisha ris to dhu ’baar mo mmobaṯẖ a’di i’ko’d me’d is pitiŋ gana/ mo be.
50004001	Wakan iwaḵ pem, um gun enka/ mo dhali kun ’kosha ṯe/ aha/ mo dhali kun ta bwaŋ ’kunygam pem mo dhali kun ta toŋ’kup̱ pem mo tani ṯeli sho’k wakan e Tap̱a mo ma um gun enka/ ki mo/en gana/ mo.
50004002	Aha/ malaskina Ap̱uudiya mo dhali aha/ malaskina Sinṯiiḵi mo mmogam gwo me’d mo e Tap̱a.
50004003	Dhali aha/ doṯkina /e si’da/ amannyaḵ dhaŋḵa’b ganam pem bu’th mo ki woṯẖi/ up̱ gwansan mo ma, haali/ uni nyaḵkina ṯu’c mii ki ’ban kuku/ nyaḵki aha/ mo e gwom ’borga/ nyaḵka Aḵlimandus mo dhali kun tiya kun nyaḵkana ṯu’c mii ki aha/ mo uni gun ’kona gway eya warka/ gi mondiki/e mo be.
50004004	’Kunyi bwa mo ma, e Tap̱a, isa yempa/ mo. Doḵ/e aha/ mina o um gwo mo ki: ’Kunyi bwa mo ma.
50004005	Dhalka ris ’kwani ’baar mo mishi mo mo ma, mo ma dum bum jin ’tima um mo. Haali/ Tap̱a a’di ’disha ’twa/ mo hila/.
50004006	Dhalka anan ki anan mo gom ton ’deŋ kamu/ mo ma hili eya ris to ’baar mo ki mon’tho mo dhali ka thip̱ jin thip̱u mo ki mom’bor bwa i is mo tani dhalki ton doṯ bum minu mish mo eya Arumgimis mo.
50004007	Dhali moŋḵu’th is ma Arumgimis a’di jin peki’d eya ris mo jin mishu gwo ’ban mo tani a’di midi jiya dum bum mo dhali bwam bum eya Ḵrisṯẖos jin ta’da Yesus mo be.
50004008	Gom gwo jin boc̱o’d mo gom um, iwaḵ mo tani aris to gun ta kuŋ gana/ mo, aris to gun ta kun taḵu mo, aris to gun ta kuŋ ḵar/e mo, aris to gun ta kun dhelelin mo, aris to gun ta kun ŋa/u mo, aris to gun ta kuny jaro/ mo, waḵki/ akamu/ midi ’taki di jin bol tiya e ki ’bor gana/ mo tani waḵki/ ṯal ’deŋ kamu/ midi ’taki di jin ta jin ha me’d mo ki momaŋ mo tani kulumi gwo gwansani bwa mo ma.
50004009	To gun da/ara um mo dhali kun budha um mo dhali kun ciḵa um mo dhali kun p̱arkina um e mo e aha/ mo tani to gwansan miiyi uni mo ma dhali Arumgimis gi moŋḵu’th is midi di e um mo be.
50004010	Hili aha/ ’bora bwa mo e Tap̱a ki canye haali/ me’d doḵ/e hila/ um ṯuju bwam bum ki cu mo mmokayaa/ e mo. Ka jiŋ gana/ um kaka/ e mo hili um dar gi bway ’boro’d mo mmomii to mo.
50004011	Yisa mmo/oka/ gwo gom mo gi hara to mo haali/ aha/ mishkina mo ki is pem mo ki mo yin jin dika/ nycine/ mo tani aha/ c̱a’bkina mo ka this mo i e mo be.
50004012	Aha/ misha mmokar is ki jiŋ gwa’d mo dhali aha/ misha si’da/ mmo/isha to ka enthus mo. Eya ris to ’baar mo dhali gom to ’baar mo tani aha/ mishkina ka malimbu’da/ mmokap̱ mo dhali mmo’kosha ṯe/ mo, mmo/isha to ka enthus mo dhali mmohara to mo.
50004013	Aha/ misha aris to ’baar mo mii mo e a’di jin ’bi’thki aha/ is mo be.
50004014	Bahili um miikin ki ’bore/ mo mmoc̱ina um to gom aha/ gom monṯo’c is pem mo be.
50004015	Dhali um ki is bum si’da/ mishin um gi Pam P̱ilibbi ki me’d ka muŋ’kup̱ ’peni gwom ’borga/ ki aha/ dhalkina Pam Makiduniyya ’pen mo tani aḵaniisaŋ kamu/ yisa nyaḵ to mii ki aha/ yisa e momii jin c̱inu to ki me’d mo dhali e mo jin budhu to mo hili isi ciki/ um ’cena mo be.
50004016	Gom me’dyin e Pan Tasaluniiki tani um hashki jan ’de/ mo dhali doḵ/e gom to jin miga/ mii ta mo.
50004017	Yisa mmosimmka/ to jin c̱inu ki me’d e mo yisa, hili aha/ simma maman e mo ki a’di midi mar is mo mmoḵam gom um mo be.
50004018	Hili aha/ bu’thkina to ’baar mo ki nyanye/ mo. Aha/ ’tu’dkunu mo mmobu’thkika/ to mo ’pena Abap̱rudiṯus mo, to gun p̱u’dkin mo ’peni um jin ta’da shim jin c̱inu jin ḵuyi mo ki ḵuy jin ta mo jin miikunuwa bas mo jin mishu bu’th mo mmo’bora Arumgimis bwa i is mo be.
50004019	Dhali Arumgimis pem midi thip̱ um ka ris to gun mina umi mii ta mo isi to gun waki kun tana a’di pam piti mo e monyca eya Ḵrisṯẖos jin ta’da Yesus mo be.
50004020	Shwane/ dhalki monyca a’di di’d eya Arumgimis bana jin ta’da Babam bana ki sule/ sule/ ya ye ’ba/ moonnii. Amen.
50004021	Theka ris uni ’baar mo me’d kun dhunu ki she/ ki dhelel dhelel eya Ḵrisṯẖos jin ta’da Yesus mo ma. Dhala waḵ kun ’kon nyaḵki aha/ mo tani theki um me’d mo si’da/.
50004022	Aris uni kun dhunu ki she/ ki dhelel dhelel mo tani theki um me’d mo uni gun mumki ’ko mo e gu’b ma Kaysar mo be.
50004023	A’the ’peni Tap̱a Yesus Ḵrisṯẖos midi di e shi/in bum mo be.
51001001	ABuulus, a’di jin karu ki she/ mo goma Ḵrisṯẖos jin ta’da Yesus mo ki bwa ma Arumgimis mo dhala Ṯimuṯẖawuus jin ta’da kam bana mo.
51001002	E uni kun dhunu ki she/ ki dhelel dhelel mo dhali iwaḵ kun ta ku isiŋ gana/ mo eya Ḵrisṯẖos mo, uni kun ’kokin mo e Paŋ Kuluusi mo. A’the e um mo dhali moŋḵu’th is ’peni Arumgimis jin ta’da Babam bana mo be.
51001003	Aman isa yempa/ ’bora Arumgimis bwa i is mo, a’di jin ta’da Baba gi Tap̱a Yesus Ḵrisṯẖos bana mo, me’d jin ’thokina aman mo gom um mo,
51001004	haali/ aman ciḵkina gwo gom moŋgam gwo is bum eya Ḵrisṯẖos jin ta’da Yesus mo dhali mo/en jin takina um mo goma ris uni ’baar mo kun dhunu ki she/ ki dhelel dhelel mo,
51001005	haali/ mo ma ’teŋ kap̱e/ a’di karkunu mo gom um e momis mo. Gom a’di yansan mo tani um ciḵki gwo nṯwa/a/ mo e gwo jin ta gwoŋ gana/ mo, a’di jin ta gwom ’borga/ mo,
51001006	a’di jin p̱u’dki’d e um mo, me’d a’di ka jiŋ gana/ diki’d e mony’ceshi ’baar mo mmodho’thkina a’di maman mo dhali mmo’twaḵkina a’diya ’twaḵ mo — wakan e bwam um ki is bum mo ’pena tee jin ciḵkina um a’di mo dhali mish a’di ’ban mo, a’di jin ta’da ’the ma Arumgimis mo e gwoŋ gana/ mo,
51001007	me’d jin da/arkina um a’di mo ’pena Abap̱raas mo, a’di jin ta’da garr bam jin enu jin mii to mo. A’di ta a’di isiŋ gana/ mo jin mii to goma Ḵrisṯẖos mo gom gway bam mo
51001008	dhali a’di ṯorki a’di aman mo gom mo/en bum e Shi/in mo be.
51001009	Dhali wakan ’pena tee jin ciḵkina aman a’di mo tani aman yisa daḵkina ’tho mo mmo’tho mo gom um mo, mmodoṯa/ doṯ mo ki um minu ’taki ’tu’d mo ki monyiṯẖ bwam piti mo eya ris miin to gi shi/in gi moyuḵ mo dhali momish gwo ’ban mo,
51001010	mmosusa sus e bway mii kun mini ha me’d gom Tap̱a mo, mmo’tu’d mo ki mii kun mini ’bor a’di bwa i is mo mmoḵal mamana dho’th mo goma ris miim ’borga/ mo dhali mmomara mar is mo ki monyiṯẖa/ Arumgimis mo be.
51001011	Dhalki um ’bitha is mo eya ris mom’bithi ’baar mo isi ki monycam piti jin c̱a’bki dem dem mo goma ris mo jin ’dimuwa ’dim ’kup̱ mo dhali bwa jin ’kuc̱u ki ’kari’th mo ki moŋ’kuny bwa mo,
51001012	mmoc̱iya Baba bwam ’boro’di is mo, a’di jin thumki ana mo mmonyaḵ mal pwaḵ ki uni kun dhunu ki she/ ki dhelel dhelel mo e moŋkush mo be.
51001013	A’di ’cuḵki ana mo ’peni mom’bi’th gi mondhurumi’d mo, mmo’ciṯẖ ana agap̱ mo e bampa/ gi Ya/m piti jin ena a’di mo,
51001014	e a’di jin takina ana mo jin wanuwa wan ’ba/ mo dhali amure/ gi miinthus jin dhalkunu ana ’pen mo be.
51001015	A’di jin bu’thki jamas ma Arumgimis mo, a’di jin molu mish ki e ga ’cesh mo, a’di jin ta’da bwa nyara/ jin ṯwa/a/ ka ris to ’baar mo kun uḵu mo be.
51001016	Haali/ e a’di mo tani aris to ’baar mo ’kokunu mo mmo/uḵ mo e momis mo dhali e mony’cesh mo, uni gun mishu ki e ga ’cesh mo, dhali uni kun molu p̱ar e ki e ga ’cesh mo, waḵki/ adhana ḵursi ma maliḵ mo walla mo jin tanu tap̱a mo, walla mom’bi’th kun molu gadhir mo walla moshirr mo tani — aris to ’baar mo ’kokunu mo mmo/uḵ mo e a’di mo dhali gom a’di mo be.
51001017	A’di diki’di ṯwa/a/ ka ris to ’baar mo, dhali e a’di mo tani aris to ’baar mo tulkunu ’twa/ ’kup̱ mo e a’di mo mmonṯal ’de/ mo be.
51001018	A’di ta’da ’kaŋ’kup̱ gom buŋgwar is mo a’di jin ta’da ḵaniisa mo. A’di ta monṯel ’pen mo, a’di ta’da bwa nyara/ ’peni mowu mo, ki a’di eya ris to ’baar mo tani midi ’taki ta isa ’cilman gana/ mo be.
51001019	Haali/ e a’di mo tani arisa ’tu’d kun ta ku ma Arumgimis mo tani ’borkina bwa mo mmota gi moŋ’ko mo be.
51001020	Dhali e a’di mo tani a’di gwamki’da gwam ki is pitiŋ gana/ mo eya ris to ’baar mo, waḵki/ to gun ’kon e mony’cesh mo walla e momis mo tani a’di karki mo ma ḵu’th is ka bas piti ki cwany’ciṯẖan dhul mo be.
51001021	Dhali um kun ’thissa/ ’kokin ka pije/ ’peni a’di mo dhali kun ta ’kup̱ ki ’kup̱ eya dum bum mo mmomii to kun ta thus ki thus mo tani
51001022	a’di shwane/ gwamki’da gwam mo ki is piti mo jin ta shuman is ki jwam piti mo, ki mii gi wakan mo tani a’di midi ṯor um eya tente/ mo me’d ku gun dhelelkin mo dhali kun dar gi thalkin mo dhali ku gun mini dar gi mo ma waḵ ibwambori a’di mo,
51001023	ba shi/ mii a’dan ’te/ ba/, waḵki/ um mini ṯikir ’ko mo e moŋgam gwo is mo, ki moŋḵa’b mo dhali ṯel sho’k mo, yisa mmoṯi’k mo ’peni mo ma ’teŋ kap̱e/ gi gwom ’borga/ jin ciḵkina um mo, a’di jin c̱ikunu aris ’kwani ’baar mo kun uḵkunu mo e bwaŋ’kwariny momis mo, dhali gom a’di mo tani aha/ jin tana Buulus warkina ka manmii a’di mo be.
